date_attribute.weather: Clear, with a light breeze, and cooler temperatures in the morning.
date_attribute.holiday: New Year's Day

2025-01.daily_overview: During the New Year's Day holiday, Feng Haoran ushered in the new year with a disciplined and fulfilling approach. From starting the day with a morning run to deeply reflecting on the past, connecting emotionally with family and friends, and making detailed plans for the new year, he demonstrated the planning and goal-oriented traits of his ENTJ personality. The entire day was spent in a tranquil and orderly family atmosphere, laying a psychological and strategic foundation for the endeavors of the coming year.

events.name: New Year's Day Morning Run and Nutritious Breakfast
events.description: At 7 a.m., Feng Haoran completed a 5-kilometer morning run on South Yuelu Road, breathing in the crisp winter air and feeling the first rays of sunlight of the new year. After returning home, he meticulously prepared a breakfast consisting of fried eggs, whole wheat bread, and a vegetable salad, and hand-brewed a cup of Geisha coffee, enjoying the tranquil holiday moments accompanied by light music.

events.name: Annual Personal Review and Analysis
events.description: In the morning, at the desk in his study, Feng Haoran turned on his computer and opened his dedicated annual review notebook. He systematically reviewed his work in 2024: successfully optimizing the asset portfolios for three high-net-worth clients, with annual returns surpassing the benchmark. He also reflected on an overly aggressive operation during the volatility in tech stocks. He listed key items such as [Achievement: Received the company's Employee of the Year award; portfolio size grew by 15%] and [Shortcoming: Insufficient depth in tracking emerging industries], and wrote down brief improvement ideas.

events.name: Acquisition of New Financial Knowledge
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran put on his headphones and listened to two in-depth financial podcasts on the topic of [Global Macroeconomic Outlook for 2025 and the Impact of Geopolitics on Asset Prices]. Simultaneously, he reviewed the chapter on [Cognitive Biases] in *The Behavioral Investor's Handbook*. He recorded valuable insights and inspirations in his phone’s memo app as a source of inspiration for his investment strategy in the coming year.

events.name: New Year's Video Call with Family
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran contacted his parents in Wuhan and his sister in Shanghai separately via video call. He discussed with his father, Feng Jianguo, their views on the direction of monetary policy at the beginning of the year; inquired about whether his mother, Li Xiuying's arthritis was affected by the winter; and listened to his sister, Feng Xinran, excitedly share her New Year promotion plans, offering some financial advice. The conversations were filled with a warm holiday atmosphere.

events.name: Friend Interactions and Refinement of New Year's Goals
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran exchanged holiday greetings and briefly discussed their respective vacations with friends such as Peng Yuqing and Dong Haoran on WeChat. Subsequently, he took out his notebook and broke down the vague goal of "[being promoted to Investment Director within three years]" into specific tasks, such as "[passing the CFA Level III exam by 2025]" and "[providing in-depth service to core clients like Huang Siqi in the first half of the year]." He also concretized the dream of "[a self-driving trip]" into "[conducting preliminary research on routes in western Sichuan or Yunnan]."

events.name: Set New Year's Fitness Goals
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran opened the fitness app and saw that his total running distance for 2024 had reached 980 kilometers. Considering his good physical condition and the need to prevent occupational strain, he set a goal of [running 80 kilometers in January 2025] and adjusted the app's daily reminder time to 6:30 a.m. accordingly.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in the home, Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Calm and full of anticipation

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Substantive and Goal-Oriented

state.今日运动: Morning run of 5 kilometers

2025-01.daily_overview: After the holiday, Feng Haoran quickly switched to work and exam preparation mode. He efficiently handled year-start tasks in the office throughout the day, including preparing meeting materials, scheduling a health check-up, and formally launching a detailed study plan for the CFA Level III exam, translating his career development goals into concrete learning actions. However, due to New Year gatherings, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Prepare materials for the department's beginning-of-year meeting
events.description: In the office, Feng Haoran compiled his personal data on client asset scale growth from the previous year, gathered service satisfaction feedback, and drafted key service strategy upgrades for clients with different risk preferences for the new year. Meanwhile, he briefly communicated with colleagues Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya via WeChat Work to confirm several market-related topics that required focused discussion during the meeting.

events.name: Schedule Annual Health Check-up
events.description: During a work break, Feng Haoran used a mobile app to schedule a comprehensive annual physical examination at a high-end private medical institution he frequents, setting the appointment for next Thursday morning. He deliberately chose a package that includes [cardiac color ultrasound] and [bone density testing], taking into account the high-pressure environment and sedentary nature of the financial industry.

events.name: Develop an Overall Preparation Plan for the CFA Level III Exam
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran spread out the CFA Level III official textbooks, Notes, and past exam syllabi on his desk at home. Based on the exam date in June, he calculated a total study period of approximately five months and devised a three-phase plan: [complete the first round of knowledge learning from January to March], [conduct thematic review and practice questions from April to May], and [engage in intensive mock exams in June]. He also marked on his calendar the required weekly study time of 10–12 hours.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Organize the Study Environment
events.description: After finalizing the plan, Feng Haoran cleared his desk in the study, neatly arranged the newly purchased CFA prep books and notebooks, and created a folder named [CFA_Level3] on his computer to store electronic materials and notes. He felt that a clear environment could make studying more efficient.

events.name: Random Event: Overtime Work to Handle Urgent Client Documents
events.description: At 9 p.m., Feng Haoran received an urgent email from his client Lin Zhihao, inquiring about a cross-border investment tax issue. He promptly replied with preliminary suggestions and planned to conduct an in-depth study the next day, which compressed his study time and led to a slightly later bedtime.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Focused, slightly stressed

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Yuelu District, Changsha
结束状态.心情: The plan is set, but there is a slight sense of fatigue.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is a crucial workday at the beginning of the year. In the morning, I participated in a departmental meeting that determined the quarterly direction and actively contributed insights. In the afternoon and evening, I fully immersed myself in personal interest development and the refinement of an important exam preparation plan, reflecting a balanced rhythm between work and personal growth. Due to the late-night meeting, my sleep schedule was slightly disrupted.

events.name: Investment Advisory Department Annual Work Meeting at the Beginning of the Year
events.description: In the conference room of Huatai Securities, Feng Haoran presented the department's performance from the previous year to the department head Qian Yongqiang and colleagues. He particularly emphasized the plan for the new year, which involves leveraging CFA Level III knowledge to deepen services for clients in [global asset allocation] and [tax planning]. The meeting delved into equity and bond allocation strategies under the current expectations of a [shift in Federal Reserve policy], and collectively identified the key task for Q1 as expanding high-net-worth clients in the technology sector.

events.name: Post-Meeting Working Lunch and Task Refinement
events.description: After the meeting, Feng Haoran, Zheng Wenbo, and Sun Xiaoya had lunch together at their usual restaurant, [Old Xiang Flavor], near the company. While eating, the three discussed and broke down the goal of [expanding technology clients] set during the meeting into specific tasks: Feng Haoran was responsible for deepening services for the existing client Huang Siqi; Zheng Wenbo focused on the biopharmaceutical sector; and Sun Xiaoya leveraged the geographical advantages of Hangzhou to connect with internet entrepreneurs.

events.name: Enroll in a Professional Photography Workshop
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran saw on his phone that a domestic photographer skilled in humanistic documentary photography would be holding a two-day workshop in Changsha at the end of the month. He carefully reviewed the course outline, which included [Narrative Construction in Street Photography] and [Portrait Capture in Complex Lighting Conditions]—exactly the areas he wanted to improve. He immediately completed the online registration and payment.

events.name: Decided to attend the coffee tasting event this weekend.
events.description: In the afternoon, while buying coffee at [Xinyi Café] downstairs from his company, Feng Haoran was enthusiastically informed by the owner Shen Xinyi that there would be a [Premium Single-Origin Coffee Blind Tasting Event] over the weekend. Feng Haoran was particularly intrigued by the description of a sun-dried coffee bean from Baoshan, Yunnan, and decided to adjust his weekend plans, reserving Saturday afternoon to attend the event.

events.name: Refine the CFA Weekly Study Plan
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran formulated a detailed study schedule for the first week (January 6–12) based on the overall plan: studying [Fixed Income] on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday evenings; studying [Derivatives] on Tuesday and Thursday evenings; and dedicating the entire weekend to the [Asset Allocation] module. He synchronized the plan to the calendars on his phone and computer and set up reminders.

events.name: Random Event: Emotional Fluctuations Due to Work Pressure
events.description: Late at night, Feng Haoran felt increased work pressure, which led to a slight sense of irritability. He tried to relax by listening to light music, but his bedtime was delayed.

起始状态.心情: Prepare to meet the challenge

结束状态.心情: Busy but with a clear direction, slightly anxious.

2025-01.daily_overview: Although it was the weekend, Feng Haoran maintained a tight schedule. In the morning, he handled client communications and professional learning plans. In the afternoon, he resumed his regular morning run, which had been interrupted by the holiday, and engaged in in-depth discussions with fellow runners, effectively integrating health management with social interaction and information gathering. In the evening, he stayed up late due to a gathering with friends.

events.name: Communicating New Year Outlook to Core Clients
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran sent brief New Year greetings via phone calls and encrypted emails to several key clients, including Huang Siqi and Lin Zhihao, from his home. He attached a summary of the "2025 Q1 Outlook on Major Asset Allocation" issued by Huatai Securities Research Department and scheduled follow-up detailed discussions. The clients responded positively.

events.name: Analyze knowledge gaps and create a learning list
events.description: Regarding the [Optimization of the Company's Executive Equity Incentive Plan] requested by client Huang Siqi, Feng Haoran realized that his understanding of [the accounting treatment of different incentive instruments (IFRS2)] and [the optimal cross-border tax structure] was insufficient. He created a list of knowledge gaps and marked two solution paths: [CFA Supplementary Study] and [Specialized Online Course Learning].

events.name: Resuming weekend morning runs with running partners
events.description: At 3 p.m. (delayed due to morning rain), Feng Haoran and his running partner Gao Yunfei gathered on South Yuelu Road and completed a 6-kilometer jog. As they ran, they chatted, with Gao Yunfei sharing recent industry updates on [AI chips] he had been following, while Feng Haoran discussed his market outlook from the beginning of the year. During their run, they activated a fitness app to track their activity.

events.name: Random Event: Impromptu Friends Gathering
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran received an invitation from his friend Wu Junjie to attend an impromptu small dinner gathering, where they sampled Hunan cuisine and discussed investment opportunities, resulting in a late return home and a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Relax, ready to handle affairs

结束状态.心情: A sense of pleasure after socializing and exercising, but with a slight feeling of fatigue.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for recharging interests and socializing. Feng Haoran immersed himself in the sensory world of coffee, deepening his personal hobby. In the evening, he proactively sought learning resources to address gaps in his professional knowledge at work, demonstrating a proactive commitment to continuous learning. Due to slightly higher caffeine intake, he went to bed earlier.

events.name: Head to the Heartwarming Cafe
events.description: At 2 p.m., Feng Haoran walked from his home to the [Xinyi Pour-Over Coffee Shop] located on Furong Middle Road. The tasting table had already been set up inside the shop, and the aroma of roasted coffee beans filled the air.

events.name: Participate in a Specialty Coffee Bean Tasting Event
events.description: At the tasting event, the owner Shen Xinyi provided a detailed explanation of the [bright citrus acidity] of the Ethiopian Yirgacheffe washed beans, the [balanced and mellow body] of the Colombian Huila honey-processed beans, and the [wine-like fermentation notes and tropical fruit flavors] of the Yunnan Baoshan sun-dried beans. Feng Haoran attentively slurped each coffee with a small spoon, carefully savoring its layers, and exchanged impressions with fellow coffee enthusiasts beside him.

events.name: Purchase Desired Coffee Beans
events.description: After the tasting, Feng Haoran developed a particular fondness for the uniquely flavored Yunnan sun-dried beans with aging potential, deciding to purchase a 200g bag. Shen Xinyi additionally gifted him a small sample pack of the same beans in ground form and suggested home brewing parameters.

events.name: Return Home to Organize and Document
events.description: Upon returning home, Feng Haoran stored the new coffee beans in an airtight container and recorded his tasting notes for the day in his [Coffee Flavor Journal]: [Yunnan beans are a pleasant surprise, with high complexity, suitable for cold brew. Mr. Shen recommended a water temperature of 92°C, coarse grind, and a 1:15 coffee-to-water ratio].

events.name: Register for Professional Online Courses
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran screened courses on Coursera and a domestic financial education platform based on his knowledge gap list. He ultimately enrolled in two professional courses: "Advanced Equity Incentive Design and Practice" and "Cross-Border Investment Tax Planning," and downloaded the relevant reference book lists.

events.name: Random Event: Went to bed early due to a mild headache.
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran felt a slight headache, possibly due to the effects of caffeine, and decided to rest early to adjust his sleep schedule.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to leisure activities.

结束状态.心情: Sensory satisfaction, sufficient motivation for learning, but slight physical discomfort.

2025-01.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Feng Haoran strictly adhered to his CFA study plan. During the day, he worked efficiently, sought advice from experienced professionals during lunch breaks, and immersed himself in focused study sessions in the evenings, taking a solid first step toward his long-term career advancement goals. Due to late-night studying, he adjusted his daily routine accordingly.

events.name: Execute the CFA Study Plan on the First Day
events.description: During his morning commute, Feng Haoran listened to a half-hour introductory audio lecture on the CFA [Fixed Income] subject through his earphones. At 8 p.m., he sat down at his desk on time and began studying the chapter on [Theories and Applications of the Term Structure of Interest Rates] in the textbook, completing the accompanying set of 10 practice exercises with an accuracy rate of approximately 80%.

events.name: Seeking colleagues' exam preparation experience during the lunch break
events.description: At noon, Feng Haoran specifically arranged to have lunch with his colleague Zheng Wenbo, who had passed all three levels of the CFA, in the company cafeteria. He inquired in detail about [answer techniques for the Level III morning essay questions], [how to balance work and exam preparation time], and [which mock exams are of the highest quality]. Zheng Wenbo generously shared his notes and an electronic version of his study schedule.

events.name: Random Event: Temporary Morning Run Adjustment
events.description: Due to a demanding study schedule, Feng Haoran canceled his morning jog and replaced it with a brief walk after evening study sessions, resulting in a reduction in physical activity.

结束状态.心情: Learning brings a sense of fulfillment, accompanied by slight fatigue.

2025-01.daily_overview: The workweek proceeded at a steady pace. Feng Haoran continued his CFA studies, advancing into more complex practical aspects. Concurrently, driven by long-term concern for his parents' health, he proactively began researching insurance products, reflecting his socially responsible character. Due to work pressure, his mood experienced slight fluctuations.

events.name: In-depth Study of Fixed Income Portfolio Management
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran studied the content related to [Liability-Driven Investment (LDI) Strategies] and [Active Management of Credit Bond Portfolios] in the CFA Level III curriculum. This knowledge is highly relevant to managing pension or insurance funds for clients, so he studied it with particular diligence and created a mind map to aid his understanding.

events.name: Preliminary Study on Parental Health Insurance
events.description: During a break from his studies, Feng Haoran thought about his parents getting older. He opened several professional insurance evaluation websites and official insurance company websites, preliminarily selecting a few highly-rated [million-yuan medical insurance] and [cancer medical insurance] plans targeted at middle-aged and elderly people. He saved the product links and screenshots of the core terms for further in-depth comparison later.

events.name: Random Event: Urgent Adjustment of Work Project
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran received an impromptu task from his superior Qian Yongqiang, requiring a rapid analysis of a set of market data. This compressed his study time and left him feeling somewhat irritable.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Steady progress, concern for family, but increasing pressure.

2025-01.daily_overview: The light rain disrupted the outdoor morning run, but Feng Haoran adjusted his exercise routine to explore indoor strength training, which served as an initial response to the medical checkup recommendations. Meanwhile, he proactively prepared for the weekend financial review and continued advancing his professional studies, demonstrating strong planning skills. His mood was slightly subdued due to the weather.

events.name: Explore Indoor Strength Training Programs
events.description: Due to the morning rain, Feng Haoran canceled his outdoor run. He used this time to search for courses on [Core Strengthening] and [Back Relaxation] on the Keep APP and tried a 15-minute beginner-level course. He felt it indeed provided a stretching effect for his lower back, which had been strained from prolonged sitting. He decided to explore further in the future.

events.name: Organize annual financial vouchers
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran organized the electronic bank statements and securities transaction confirmations for the entire year of 2024 from his computer folder into a folder named [2024 Financial Review]. He also retrieved several important invoices and paper bills from the drawer, preparing the necessary materials for an in-depth review over the weekend.

events.name: Review and Exercise Consolidation
events.description: According to the study plan, tonight is a review session. Feng Haoran revisited the core formulas and concepts of fixed income covered this week and completed a set of multiple-choice questions on this chapter. His accuracy rate improved to 85%, which left him satisfied with the learning outcome.

events.name: Random Event: Cancellation of Running Partner Appointment Due to Rainy Weather
events.description: The scheduled morning run with fellow runner Gao Yunfei was canceled due to rain, leaving Feng Haoran feeling somewhat bored. However, he shifted his focus to indoor training instead.

结束状态.心情: Ready and well-organized

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is Health Management Day. Feng Haoran completed his annual physical examination and received professional advice, which directly prompted him to reflect on optimizing his exercise habits. In the evening, he engaged in targeted learning based on client needs and scheduled social activities. Due to pre-examination anxiety, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Undergo an annual health check-up
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran took leave and went to the scheduled medical institution, where he completed a full set of physical examination items, including blood tests, electrocardiogram, abdominal color Doppler ultrasound, and body fat analysis. The entire process was efficient and smooth.

events.name: Listen to the preliminary interpretation of the physical examination report.
events.description: After the physical examination, the doctor reviewed some of the reports with immediate results on-site. The doctor praised his cardiopulmonary function and body fat percentage (21%), but specifically noted: [The core muscle strength is relatively weak, and the lumbar and back muscles are tense. It is recommended to incorporate targeted strength training 2–3 times per week while maintaining aerobic exercise to prevent lumbar spine issues caused by prolonged sitting.]

events.name: Schedule a meal with friends
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran sent a WeChat message to his friend Peng Yuqing to confirm their dinner plans for tomorrow evening and booked a table at [Chuiyan Shidai], a restaurant they both enjoy.

events.name: Enroll in a Specialized ESG Investment Course
events.description: In the evening, to better serve Huang Siqi, a client focused on sustainable development, Feng Haoran began studying the first chapter of the online course [Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) Investment Integration and Practice], gaining an understanding of the ESG rating system and mainstream investment strategies.

events.name: Random Event: Dietary Adjustment After a Physical Examination
events.description: Following medical advice, Feng Haoran decided to reduce greasy foods for dinner and switch to lighter meals, but his weight remained relatively high due to recent social gatherings.

起始状态.心情: As calm as routine.

结束状态.心情: Inspired by health reminders, contemplating change

2025-01.daily_overview: Friday was a day filled with changes and connections. The health checkup recommendation prompted Feng Haoran to immediately research and purchase fitness equipment; the dinner with friends evolved from information exchange into planning a shared adventure; the phone call with family directly inspired a filial act of arranging insurance for his parents; and the dinner gathering led to a weight gain.

events.name: Research and purchase strength training equipment
events.description: After carefully considering the doctor's advice, Feng Haoran searched online for a [Family Core Training Program] at noon and consulted his running friend Gao Yunfei. Gao Yunfei recommended resistance bands and an ab roller. Before leaving work, Feng Haoran placed an order on an e-commerce platform for a set of multi-resistance bands and a thick yoga mat.

events.name: Dining and conversing with close friend Peng Yuqing
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran met Peng Yuqing at a Hunan cuisine restaurant. Peng Yuqing shared a recent viral marketing case of [cross-border collaboration with a domestic trendy brand] planned by her team, while Feng Haoran discussed the stock market fluctuations at the beginning of the year and the challenges he encountered while preparing for the CFA exam.

events.name: Jointly Plan for Spring Camping
events.description: As the conversation reached a lively point, the two took out their phones and began earnestly planning their camping trip for March. On a map app, they selected a well-reviewed campsite near a reservoir in Changsha County. They drafted an initial list of necessary equipment (tent, sleeping bags, portable table and chairs, stove and gas canister) and discussed whether it would be better to bring their own steaks or purchase fresher ingredients locally.

events.name: Video call with parents
events.description: After returning home from the dinner gathering, Feng Haoran video-called his parents in Wuhan as usual. His mother, Li Xiuying, mentioned that his father Feng Jianguo’s recent medical check-up report showed slightly elevated levels of [low-density lipoprotein cholesterol], which required dietary control. Upon hearing this, Feng Haoran grew more concerned about his parents’ health, further strengthening his resolve to find suitable insurance for them.

events.name: Establish CFA Exam Preparation Incentive Measures
events.description: Before going to bed, to maintain his long-term motivation for exam preparation, Feng Haoran marked on his schedule: after completing the study of all chapters on [Fixed Income], reward himself with a high-quality Japanese ramen; after passing the first full-subject mock exam, reward himself with a weekend short-distance self-drive trip to a nearby ancient town for photography.

events.name: Random Event: Overtime work to address customer needs
events.description: In the afternoon, client Huang Siqi sent an urgent inquiry, which required Feng Haoran to work overtime to handle, resulting in the compression of his study time.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, feeling slightly fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Social interactions are enjoyable, there is new concern for family, but work pressure is high.

2025-01.daily_overview: Saturday is dedicated to handling in-depth personal affairs. Feng Haoran completed a rigorous annual financial review and strategy formulation, marking a crucial step toward the goal of [a personal investment portfolio of 1 million]. Meanwhile, exercise and study plans were reinforced over the weekend, resulting in a slight weight loss due to the workout.

events.name: Annual Financial In-Depth Review
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran opened his computer in the study and imported all the financial data. He reviewed the income and expenses month by month and calculated that the savings rate for 2024 reached 38%, which met expectations. In the afternoon, he focused on reviewing the investment portfolio: a technology stock that was heavily invested in last year yielded only 5% for the entire year due to industry cycle fluctuations, while a consumer-focused fund declined by 8%. He analyzed the buying logic and selling timing of each transaction and generated a clear [Annual Investment Profit and Loss and Attribution Analysis Table] in Excel.

events.name: Formulate New Year Investment Strategies
events.description: Based on a review, Feng Haoran formulated a strategy for the first half of 2025, focusing on "steadiness while seizing structural opportunities." He decided to adjust his stock allocation from 70% to 65%, increasing allocations to bond funds and gold ETFs to diversify risks. Additionally, he set up an automatic transfer of 30% of his monthly salary into money market funds and index funds as a regular investment plan. He compiled these strategic points into a concise "Personal Asset Allocation Proposal (2025H1)."

events.name: Weekend long-distance morning run
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei completed an 8-kilometer jog, steadily progressing toward their monthly goal of 80 kilometers. During the run, they spent much of their time discussing the intelligent advancements and investment value of a domestic new energy vehicle brand.

events.name: CFA Weekend Intensive Review and Mock Exam
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, Feng Haoran systematically reviewed all the content of [Fixed Income] learned this week and completed a set of mock exam questions for this subject within the time limit. The score indicated that he still had deficiencies in the [Credit Risk Modeling] section, and he marked this weakness as a key area to focus on for the next week.

events.name: Random Event: Commence Strength Training
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran tried some simple core training using the newly arrived yoga mat, which helped alleviate some discomfort in his lower back.

结束状态.心情: Completed an important review with clear thinking and a slight sense of accomplishment.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for interest practice and new health endeavors. Feng Haoran spent half a day engaged in street photography creation and conducted professional exchanges with distant partners, nurturing his hobby. Simultaneously, he began implementing a new strength training plan and delved into researching insurance products selected for his parents, making his life fulfilling and multidimensional. Due to staying up late studying insurance, he went to bed later than usual.

events.name: Strength Training After the First Attempt at Morning Running
events.description: After a 5-kilometer morning run, Feng Haoran returned home and took out the newly arrived yoga mat and resistance band. He followed a [Post-Run Core Activation and Stretching] course on Keep, engaging in about 15 minutes of training, focusing on the stimulation of the core and back muscles through exercises like planks and resistance band rows.

events.name: Street Photography in Changsha's Old Streets
events.description: After breakfast, Feng Haoran arrived at Chaozong Street with his camera bag. He captured the leisurely scene of old neighbors drinking tea and chatting at their doorsteps in the morning light, as well as the mottled shadows on the weathered walls. In the afternoon, at Taiping Old Street, he used a telephoto lens to discreetly capture tourists' surprised expressions and interesting moments of interaction without disturbing them.

events.name: Online Works Exchange with Photography Partners
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran sent the preliminary selection of over a dozen photos to Xu Jianing in Shenzhen. The two quickly connected via video call, where Xu Jianing praised the composition of a photo titled [Light and Shadow Passing Through an Old Alley], while also pointing out that the backgrounds in several sets of candid portraits could be more minimalistic. They discussed how to better use the lens to convey the story theme of [Everyday Life Amid Urban Transformation].

events.name: Comparative Analysis of Parental Medical Insurance
events.description: Late at night, under the desk lamp in his study, Feng Haoran opened the detailed terms of the three previously selected insurance products side by side on his computer. He created a comparison table in Excel, focusing on the [Coverage Scope], [Deductible], [Additional Payouts for Specific Diseases], [Hospital Network], and [Renewal Conditions]. He found that although one product was slightly more expensive, it offered more comprehensive coverage for common geriatric diseases such as [Coronary Artery Intervention Surgery] and promised [non-refusal of renewal due to changes in the insured’s health condition].

events.name: Random Event: Mild Tension in the Lower Back Muscles
events.description: After sitting for an extended period studying insurance, Feng Haoran felt slight tension and soreness in his lower back muscles, so he decided to increase his stretching exercises tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, brimming with creative desire

结束状态.心情: The profound satisfaction derived from creation and contemplation, accompanied by a slight weariness and discomfort in the lower back.

After thorough research, Feng Haoran ultimately selected insurance products for his parents and completed the purchase following full communication with them. This action signifies his transition from concern to practical responsibility, deepening the bonds within the family; the weight-matching process has concluded.

events.name: Report customer progress to the direct supervisor

He reviewed the equity incentive sections in the IPO prospectuses and annual reports of companies such as Tencent and Alibaba, compiling data on the application ratios of [stock options] and [RSUs] in companies at different development stages, typical vesting schedules (such as four-year graded vesting), and the related impacts on accounting treatments.

events.name: Communicate with parents and determine the insurance plan.

events.name: Purchase insurance online for parents

After confirming that all information was correct, he used his credit card to pay the first-year premium, and the system promptly generated an electronic policy. He downloaded and saved the policy and set a reminder for next year's renewal.

2025-01.daily_overview: On a busy workday, Feng Haoran efficiently handled unexpected client inquiries while continuing to advance multiple long-term and strategic tasks. His swift response in the morning demonstrated his professional competence, while the afternoon was dedicated to systematic knowledge accumulation and personal affairs management.

events.name: Morning Run and Market Review
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran completed his routine morning run on South Yuelu Mountain Road. Due to tightness in his lower back, he slowed his pace and focused on stretching. During breakfast, while sipping his pour-over coffee, he quickly scanned overnight global market trends and financial news to warm up for the day's work.

events.name: Confirm the lunch arrangements for the following day.
events.description: Upon arriving at the Huatai Securities office, Feng Haoran confirmed the next day's lunch break with his colleague Zheng Wenbo via WeChat Work. They agreed to meet at a Hunan restaurant near the company, which they frequented, to discuss recent market developments.

events.name: Handling Urgent Customer Inquiries
events.description: While working in the morning, Feng Haoran received an urgent message from high-net-worth client Huang Siqi. Due to sudden and severe market fluctuations, Huang Siqi expressed anxiety about her investment portfolio and requested immediate assessment and operational recommendations.

events.name: Quickly analyze and formulate a plan
events.description: Feng Haoran immediately suspended non-urgent tasks at hand, retrieved real-time market data, relevant news, and details of Huang Siqi's investment portfolio. Using professional analytical tools, he swiftly assessed the potential impact of market fluctuations on the client's holdings in technology stocks and formulated two short-term response strategies: portfolio rebalancing for hedging and temporarily holding a wait-and-see approach.

events.name: Professional Communication and Execution
events.description: Feng Haoran proactively called Huang Siqi. He first reassured the client, then clearly and systematically explained the market situation, provided a detailed impact analysis, and outlined the pros and cons of two operational plans. After Huang Siqi opted for the hedging strategy, Feng Haoran guided her through the operation via the trading terminal and monitored the execution in real time.

events.name: Complete consultation records and follow-up arrangements
events.description: After completing the process, Feng Haoran meticulously documented the cause of this consultation, the analysis process, the client's decision, and the execution results in the customer management system. Simultaneously, he arranged with Huang Siqi to communicate again after the market stabilizes, in order to evaluate the operational effectiveness and fine-tune the long-term strategy.

events.name: In-depth Research on Equity Incentive Taxation
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran continued preparing for Huang Siqi's technology company's equity incentive needs. He focused on the tax implications of equity incentives for both employees and the company, analyzing the differences in tax burdens under various holding periods and exercise timings, and reviewed relevant tax law provisions and planning cases.

events.name: Inform Parents of Insurance Policy Details
events.description: During a work break, Feng Haoran downloaded and archived the electronic policy for the commercial supplementary medical insurance he had purchased for his parents a few days earlier. He compiled the key information from the policy into a concise summary, sent it to his parents via WeChat, and followed up with a phone call to inform them that the insurance enrollment was complete and to remind them of the subsequent precautions.

events.name: Book Spring Festival high-speed rail tickets for homebound travel
events.description: Approaching the end of the workday, Feng Haoran used the 12306 app to book a high-speed train ticket in advance for the morning of January 28 from Changsha South Station to Wuhan Station, ensuring a smooth journey. After booking the ticket, he immediately informed his parents and younger sister of his arrival time.

events.name: Drafting an Investment Proposal Framework
events.description: Based on recent research on ESG investing and the technology sector, Feng Haoran drafted a preliminary framework of the investment plan for Huang Siqi. He integrated ESG principles with technological growth potential, initially outlining asset allocation strategies across different risk levels.

events.name: New: Evening Core Strength Training
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Feng Haoran performed 15 minutes of core strength training to alleviate lower back tension and began recording the training data.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and somewhat accomplished, as I efficiently handled an unexpected situation and advanced multiple plans, with slight relief in the lower back discomfort.

This day balanced physical exercise, mental nourishment, and social needs.

events.name: Adaptive Morning Run in the Rain
events.description: On Saturday morning, a light rain began to fall in Changsha. Feng Haoran and his running partner Gao Yunfei met as scheduled on Lushan South Road, deciding to proceed with their morning run as an adaptive training session. They discussed adjustments to their gear and safety precautions for running in the rain, and recorded unique data and physical sensations from running on slippery surfaces.

events.name: Depart for the Art Museum
events.description: In the afternoon, the rain gradually subsided. Feng Haoran set out from home and took the subway to the art gallery where he had arranged to meet his friend Peng Yuqing. He carried a casual backpack containing a camera for photography.

events.description: Feng Haoran met Peng Yuqing at the entrance of the art museum. Together, they entered to visit a contemporary art exhibition themed around urban memory and future imagination. Peng Yuqing explained to Feng Haoran the creative concepts behind the abstract paintings, installation art, and video works.

events.name: In-depth Discussion on Works That Spark Interest

events.name: Evening Light Strength Training

events.name: Received financial consultation from a photography partner
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran received a WeChat message from his photography partner Xu Jianing, who was in Shenzhen. Xu Jianing mentioned that he had recently saved up a sum of money and hoped that Feng Haoran, as a professional investment advisor, could provide some preliminary advice on personal savings and regular fund investments.

events.name: Preliminary Understanding of Requirements
events.description: After receiving the message, Feng Haoran took advantage of a break in his work to have a brief communication with Xu Jianing via WeChat. He inquired about her approximate income, savings goals, risk tolerance, and expected investment horizon to gather key information for formulating a plan.

events.name: Develop a preliminary financial plan
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran did not go out. Instead, he stayed at his workstation and, based on the information provided by Xu Jianing and the current market conditions, prepared a concise preliminary financial plan for her. The plan covered emergency fund reserves, monthly savings allocation, and recommended several low-volatility funds for regular investment.

events.name: Remote Explanation Solution
events.description: After finalizing the plan, Feng Haoran provided a detailed explanation to Xu Jianing via WeChat voice call, covering the logic of the plan, the risk-return characteristics of different fund types, the importance of disciplined regular investing, and potential market risks.

events.name: Receiving Feedback and Friendship Interactions
events.description: After the voice message ended, Xu Jianing sent a text message expressing gratitude for Feng Haoran's professional and clear suggestions. Meanwhile, she shared a set of new street photography works recently taken at the OCT-LOFT Creative Park in Shenzhen. Feng Haoran, in turn, offered appreciation and suggestions from the perspectives of composition and lighting.

events.name: Added: Video call with high school classmate Liu Haoran
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran had a video call with his high school classmate Liu Haoran. They discussed trends in technology investment and market opportunities in Shenzhen, and agreed to collaborate on a small investment project after the Spring Festival.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely, ready to enjoy a slow-paced Sunday.

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, the connection with family and the sense of accomplishment from helping friends bring about a positive psychological satisfaction.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 5 kilometers

In-depth online discussions with fellow collectors and scheduling follow-up communications with clients indicate that preliminary research is poised to translate into tangible value.

events.name: Morning Run and This Week's Work Preview
events.description: During his Monday morning run, Feng Haoran mentally rehearsed the key work priorities for the week: finalizing the equity incentive report, advancing Huang Siqi's investment proposal, and conducting pre-holiday client maintenance. The run helped him clarify the order of priorities.

events.name: Participate in stamp collecting forum discussions
events.description: During a work break in the morning, Feng Haoran logged into the stamp collecting forum and posted a prepared thread in the discussion section, showcasing and introducing that distinctive stamp. He soon engaged in a lively discussion with fellow collectors, including Luo Zhenyu, about the stamp's historical background, current market value, and significance in the world of collecting.

events.name: Recording Collections and Investment Insights
events.description: After the forum discussion concluded, Feng Haoran recorded the valuable insights from the conversation, particularly regarding potential investment opportunities in a certain stamp sector, into his electronic collection notes. He began to consider whether to allocate a small portion of his idle funds to alternative investments in the stamp theme.

events.name: Internal Discussion and Analysis Refinement
events.description: In the afternoon, prior to the formal communication with the client, Feng Haoran briefly discussed the preliminary equity incentive analysis framework with his colleague Zheng Wenbo. Zheng Wenbo provided several suggestions from the perspective of client implementation, based on which Feng Haoran refined the analysis logic and presentation.

events.name: Schedule In-depth Communication with Clients
events.description: Subsequently, Feng Haoran contacted the client Huang Siqi via work email, reporting that the preliminary research on the equity incentive plan had been completed. He inquired about her availability for the next video conference to facilitate an in-depth discussion on the specific plan.

events.name: Learning CFA Derivatives Applications
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran delved deeply into the complex chapters on derivatives strategies in the CFA Level III curriculum. He paid particular attention to practical case studies on using options for risk hedging in client portfolios, attempting to connect theoretical knowledge with the practical experience gained from handling client consultations during the day.

events.name: Follow up on the financial progress of photography partners.
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran proactively sent a WeChat message to ask Xu Jianing if she had any other questions regarding the financial planning proposal. He also kindly mentioned that if she decided to start the fixed investment plan, she could contact him at any time for adjustments to the details or consultations on product selection.

events.name: New: Launch of Cross-Day Customer Project
events.description: Feng Haoran initiated a three-day emergency client project to analyze portfolio risks for a new client, requiring consecutive overtime work to process the data.

起始状态.心情: Energetic and ready to take on the challenges of the new week.

结束状态.心情: Focused and productive, having delivered valuable outputs both professionally and in personal pursuits, yet feeling somewhat pressured.

events.name: Morning jogging and listening to financial podcasts

events.name: Deepening Equity Incentive Report
events.description: In the office, Feng Haoran further refined and detailed the equity incentive analysis report based on the feedback discussed with Zheng Wenbo yesterday, incorporating additional data support and comparative tables.

events.name: Follow-up Communication with Fellow Collector Luo Zhenyu

events.name: Mid-Month Review of Monthly Running Volume

He calculated the average daily distance needed for the remaining days and made slight adjustments to the mileage plans for his upcoming runs.

events.name: Research on Healthy Diet Recipes
events.description: In the evening, considering that the Spring Festival family dinner might be high in oil and salt, Feng Haoran went online to research several modified recipes for light and delicious Hubei cuisine, such as steamed fish and cold dishes, planning to recommend them to his mother when he returns home.

events.description: Due to the complexity of data in an urgent client project, Feng Haoran worked late into the night analyzing portfolio risks and preparing reports, which significantly delayed his bedtime.

events.description: In the office, Feng Haoran concentrated on handling a batch of daily customer inquiry emails and reviewed several simple market analysis reports submitted by interns, providing revision suggestions.

events.name: New: Complete cross-day projects and go to bed early

events.name: Morning Jog and Problem-Solving
events.description: During his morning run, Feng Haoran kept pondering how to design more effective downside risk hedging strategies for clients like Huang Siqi, who prefer technology growth stocks but have a medium-to-high risk tolerance. The fresh air helped clear his mind.

events.name: Discussing the difficulties of risk hedging with colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran dined with his colleague Zheng Wenbo at a Hunan restaurant near the office. Their discussion focused on how to balance the conflict between high growth expectations and high stock price volatility when designing investment plans for technology company clients, as well as which derivative instruments could be used for more precise and efficient risk hedging.

events.name: Afternoon Application Discussion Outcomes
events.description: Upon returning to the office, Feng Haoran immediately incorporated the inspiration from the lunch discussion into the investment proposal prepared for Huang Siqi, specifically adding a section on the concept of dynamic hedging strategies, and began searching for relevant data models for validation.

events.name: Follow up on customer appointment feedback
events.description: In the late afternoon, Feng Haoran received a reply email from his client Huang Siqi, confirming the time for a video conference early next week. He promptly added the meeting to his schedule and began preparing the presentation materials.

events.name: Evening CFA Exercise Practice
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran completed the accompanying exercises for the derivatives chapter studied this week to reinforce his understanding. When encountering a challenging problem, he took a photo and posted it in the CFA study group to discuss with his classmates.

events.name: New addition: Returning late from a gathering with friends
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran gathered with his friends Peng Yuqing and Cai Wenjing to discuss their plans for the Spring Festival. The pleasant conversation led to a late return home, which in turn delayed his bedtime.

He ensured all equipment was in good condition by preparing sufficient spare batteries and memory cards, and cleaning the flash.

events.name: Review customer status before the holiday
events.description: In the office, Feng Haoran utilized the morning to systematically organize and review the recent portfolio performance of all key clients, their latest communication records, and potential post-holiday needs, in preparation for the key pre-holiday communications scheduled to begin next week.

events.name: Update customer position data
events.description: He specifically updated the detailed portfolio data of high-net-worth client Huang Siqi on the computer, including the latest market values, profit and loss status of various stocks and funds, as well as the system-calculated risk assessment coefficients, ensuring the real-time accuracy of the data.

events.name: Collect market research data
events.description: Through the company's internal database and external professional research platforms, Feng Haoran screened and downloaded industry trend reports related to the technology sector in Huang Siqi's investment portfolio, in-depth research reports on key companies, and the latest macroeconomic analyses.

events.name: Self-Review of Investment Plan
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran conducted the first round of self-review of the draft investment proposal prepared for Huang Siqi in his home study. He meticulously examined the logical rigor, data accuracy, and clarity of expression page by page, marking several areas requiring further verification or refinement with a red pen.

2025-01.daily_overview: A Saturday dedicated to both skill enhancement and goal achievement. The day was immersed in the study and practice of photographic art, while the evening saw the completion of this month's running goal through persistent exercise, resulting in a double sense of fulfillment.

events.name: Attend a Portrait Photography Workshop
events.description: Feng Haoran arrived at the workshop venue with the prepared equipment. Throughout the day, he systematically learned from a renowned commercial photographer about the principles of indoor portrait lighting, communication and guidance techniques with models, and how to capture genuine human emotions. The course closely integrated theory with practice.

events.name: Practical Shooting Practice
events.description: In the afternoon practical session, Feng Haoran collaborated with the on-site model to conduct shooting exercises, applying the lighting knowledge and guidance techniques learned in the morning. He experimented with different lighting positions and shooting angles, striving to capture the model's natural state.

events.name: Meet Fellow Photography Enthusiasts
events.description: During the breaks and after-class time of the workshop, Feng Haoran took the initiative to communicate with several fellow participants who were also passionate about photography, sharing shooting experiences and equipment usage tips. He exchanged contact information with two local participants from Changsha.

events.name: Complete the monthly running goal
events.description: On the last Saturday morning of the month, Feng Haoran and his running partner Gao Yunfei met for a morning run. Following their adjusted plan, the two completed a longer-distance run. Ultimately, Feng Haoran’s monthly cumulative running distance reached 81 kilometers, slightly exceeding the 80-kilometer target. After the run, the two high-fived in celebration.

events.name: New: Post-Workshop Dinner

2025-01.daily_overview: The last Sunday before the Spring Festival holiday was themed around wrapping things up and embarking on the journey. I efficiently completed the handover of work, ensured home security, and made preparations for the trip back home, clearing all obstacles for a worry-free return to celebrate the New Year.

events.name: Organizing the Gains from the Photography Workshop
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran digitized and archived the courseware shared by the lecturer at yesterday's photography workshop, along with his own notes. At the same time, he selected several satisfactory photos taken during the practical session and performed simple post-processing on them using his computer.

events.name: Team Holiday Work Arrangement
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran held a brief online meeting with team member Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya, who joined remotely from Hangzhou. The three discussed and finalized the customer service duty roster for the Spring Festival holiday, clarifying their respective responsibilities and emergency response procedures.

events.name: Packing Luggage for Homecoming
events.description: Feng Haoran began packing his suitcase. He checked the weather forecast for Wuhan, prepared an appropriate amount of clothing based on the length of his holiday, and carefully wrapped the gifts for his family before placing them in the suitcase.

events.name: Check the water, electricity, and gas supply at home.
events.description: Before leaving home, Feng Haoran meticulously checked the water taps in the kitchen and bathroom, the main gas valve, and the main power switch, repeatedly confirming that everything was shut off to eliminate potential safety hazards.

events.name: Dispose of perishable food in the refrigerator
events.description: He removed the remaining perishable foods such as vegetables and fruits from the refrigerator and disposed of them. He also gave the interior of the refrigerator a simple wipe-down to prevent bacterial growth or unpleasant odors during the holiday period.

events.name: Store Valuables
events.description: Feng Haoran organized and locked valuable items such as his laptop, some spare cash, important insurance contracts, and documents into a small home safe to ensure the security of his property.

events.name: Entrusting the plants to a running buddy
events.description: Feng Haoran contacted his running friend Gao Yunfei via WeChat, entrusting him with the care of several potted green plants on his balcony. He specified the watering frequency and precautions in detail. Gao Yunfei readily agreed.

events.name: Final review of the investment proposal
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran conducted the final review and polishing of the investment proposal prepared for Huang Siqi. He addressed the issues noted from the previous day, ensuring the proposal was logically clear, data-accurate, and professionally formatted.

events.name: New addition: Early bedtime due to preparation fatigue.
events.description: Having been busy with preparations all day, Feng Haoran felt weary and decided to go to bed early to conserve energy.

2025-01.daily_overview: This is the workday before officially entering the Spring Festival period. All work handovers and wrap-ups were completed efficiently and meticulously. The afternoon was dedicated to final preparations for leaving home, and by evening, everything was in order, awaiting departure the next day.

events.name: Morning Jogging and Pre-Holiday Mindset Adjustment
events.description: On the last workday before the holiday, Feng Haoran felt particularly relaxed during his morning run. He slowed his pace, enjoying the process of running, as his thoughts began to drift toward the upcoming family reunion.

events.name: Handing over work tasks to colleagues
events.description: In the office this morning, Feng Haoran compiled the detailed progress of several key projects he was currently handling, along with the next steps and pending approval documents, into a clear handover document. He then conducted a thorough face-to-face handover with his colleague Zheng Wenbo.

events.name: Reporting Pre-Holiday Status to Supervisor
events.description: Feng Haoran gave a brief report to Investment Director Qian Yongqiang on the completion of client maintenance before the holiday, the status of team handover, and the holiday duty roster. Qian Yongqiang acknowledged his thorough preparation.

events.name: Set Smart Security Mode
events.description: After leaving work early in the afternoon and returning home, Feng Haoran activated the smart home security system via a mobile app, enabling the door and window sensors and network cameras, and setting a timer for the living room lights.

events.name: Final Inspection and Locking the Door Before Leaving Home
events.description: Before heading to the high-speed railway station, Feng Haoran conducted a final quick inspection of the entire house, confirming that all electrical appliances were powered off, windows and doors were tightly closed, and the water valves were shut. Once everything was in order, he locked the main door and pulled his suitcase along.

events.name: Organize personal belongings and documents
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran placed the clothes he would wear the next day and his personal belongings in a conspicuous spot in the living room. He double-checked to ensure that important items such as his ID card, electronic train ticket, and house keys were all in order.

events.name: New addition: Difficulty falling asleep due to excitement
events.description: The anticipation of returning home left Feng Haoran feeling excited, which led to him falling asleep slightly earlier than usual, though the quality of his sleep was average.

结束状态.心情: Everything is ready, leaving only the profound anticipation of returning home tomorrow.

date_attribute.holiday: Lunar New Year's Eve

2025-01.daily_overview: On Lunar New Year's Eve, the day of homecoming and reunion. The shift in space from Changsha to Wuhan also marks a transition from a workplace professional to a family member. Familiar hometown scenes, warm family affection, and the rich festive atmosphere of the New Year constitute the entirety of this day.

events.name: Returning to Hometown by High-Speed Rail
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran boarded his reserved high-speed train from Changsha South Station to Wuhan Station. During the journey, he gazed at the scenery flashing past outside the window, occasionally responding to a few work-related greeting messages, and spent most of the time resting with his eyes closed.

events.name: Arriving in Wuhan to reunite with family
events.description: Around noon, Feng Haoran arrived at Wuhan Station, where his father Feng Jianguo picked him up by car. Upon returning to his familiar family home, his mother Li Xiuying had already prepared a steaming hot lunch. The family of three gathered around the dining table.

events.name: Participate in New Year's Eve home decoration
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran put up Spring Festival couplets, hung lanterns, and pasted window decorations together with his parents. He was responsible for climbing up to high places and doing the pasting, while his parents directed and admired from the side. Amidst the laughter and joy, the festive atmosphere of the home quickly grew warmer.

events.name: Preparing and Enjoying the Chinese New Year's Eve Dinner
events.description: The whole family worked together to prepare a sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner. Feng Haoran assisted his mother by handling the ingredients. During the dinner, the table was filled with Hubei-style delicacies, including his mother's specialty—pork rib and lotus root soup.

events.name: Watching the Spring Festival Gala and Staying Up Late on New Year's Eve
events.description: After dinner, the family gathered around the television to watch the Spring Festival Gala. Feng Haoran chatted with his parents, snacked, and commented on the programs. When the clock struck midnight, he extended his New Year's greetings to his parents.

events.name: Propose a Family Hiking Activity
events.description: During dinner conversation, Feng Haoran suggested to his parents and younger sister that they choose a day during the Spring Festival to hike together on the East Lake Greenway, which would allow them to enjoy the scenery while getting some exercise. He outlined the route and estimated the time required.

events.name: Added: Staying up late on New Year's Eve
events.description: Staying up late with family until midnight to observe traditional customs results in a significantly delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Excited, eager to return home

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in parents' home in Wuhan
结束状态.心情: Warm, happy, and filled with a sense of belonging, the fatigue from work is completely washed away by family affection.

state.今日运动: Walking (station, home activities), light housework

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, I was fully immersed in traditional customs and family interactions. From the early morning New Year greetings to the day-long family activities and the profound conversation with my father, the day was filled with warm rituals and deep emotional bonds.

events.name: Paying New Year's respects to parents in the morning
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran, dressed neatly, solemnly paid New Year's greetings to his parents, Feng Jianguo and Li Xiuying, wishing them good health and success in all endeavors. His parents happily handed him the red envelopes containing lucky money they had prepared in advance.

events.name: The whole family making dumplings together
events.description: In the morning, the whole family worked together to make dumplings. The mother prepared the filling and rolled out the dough, while the father and Feng Haoran were responsible for wrapping them. Although Feng Haoran's dumplings were not as skillful as those of his parents, they still looked quite decent. Everyone chatted happily, creating a warm and joyful atmosphere.

events.name: Reflecting on Family Memories and Looking Forward to the New Year
events.description: In the afternoon, the family brewed tea and gathered together for a conversation. The parents reminisced about the amusing childhood stories of Feng Haoran and his younger sister, while Feng Haoran shared his experiences working in Changsha and his career plans for the coming years.

events.name: In-depth discussion with father on investment
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran had an in-depth conversation with his father, Feng Jianguo, who was once an engineer and shares a similar sensitivity to data and logic. His father inquired about his views on the current economic situation and the A-share market. Drawing on his professional analysis, Feng Haoran explained the market logic in accessible terms.

events.name: New addition: Weight gain due to dining gatherings
events.description: The abundant Spring Festival feasts throughout the day, including dumplings, candies, and traditional dishes, lead to a noticeable weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, joyful, with the festive cheer unique to holidays

结束状态.心情: Inner fulfillment is achieved, with emotional bonds and intellectual exchanges with family members reaching profound depths.

state.今日运动: None (primarily indoor household activities)

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the Chinese New Year, Feng Haoran brought the concept of healthy living into his family. The morning outdoor hike allowed the whole family to connect with nature and bond emotionally through exercise; during dinner, his advocacy for healthy eating skillfully transformed professional knowledge into care for his loved ones, adding new meaning to the Spring Festival.

events.name: Prepare Family Hiking Equipment
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran checked and prepared the family's hiking gear, including comfortable hiking shoes, insulated water bottles, and some nuts and fruits as energy supplements. He specifically reminded his parents to wear warm fleece jackets.

events.name: East Lake Greenway Family Hiking
events.description: The whole family drove to the East Lake Greenway for a leisurely walk lasting about two hours. Feng Haoran led the way, explaining to his parents along the route the benefits of aerobic exercise for improving cardiovascular function and relieving stress.

events.name: Assist in preparing a healthy dinner
events.description: After walking home, Feng Haoran proactively entered the kitchen to assist his mother in preparing dinner. He suggested reducing traditional cooking methods such as braising and deep-frying, and participated in making steamed perch, garlic broccoli, and a cold mixed shredded vegetable dish.

events.name: Advocate for Healthy Family Diets
events.description: During dinner, the whole family gathered around the table. Feng Haoran, drawing connections between the day's hiking and the light dishes on the table, further shared the healthy lifestyle habits he had developed in Changsha, which emphasized balanced nutrition and regular exercise.

events.name: Visiting relatives and friends and gathering with childhood friends
events.description: During the day and in the evening, Feng Haoran also accompanied his parents to visit other relatives in Wuhan to extend New Year greetings. In the afternoon, he specifically set aside time to meet with his childhood friend Zhang Mingxuan, who was also spending the Spring Festival in Wuhan. The two gathered for a meal at a time-honored Hubei cuisine restaurant.

events.name: New Addition: Early Sleep Recovery After Hiking
events.description: Due to the daytime hiking activity, Feng Haoran felt physically fatigued and decided to go to bed early to regain his energy.

起始状态.心情: Positive, looking forward to leading my family in experiencing healthy activities.

结束状态.心情: It is gratifying and satisfying to have successfully conveyed personal health concepts to family members and gained their acceptance, and the reunion with old friends is also delightful.

state.今日运动: Approximately 2 hours of hiking on the East Lake Greenway (moderate intensity)

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: As the Spring Festival holiday draws to a close, I balanced family leisure with personal reflection. The morning was spent enjoying the final moments of family togetherness, while the afternoon and evening were dedicated to systematically reviewing and planning personal growth for January, ensuring a smooth mental and practical transition back to daily work and life.

events.name: Family Outing to East Lake Scenic Area
events.description: In the morning, the whole family went to the Wuhan East Lake Scenic Area for a visit. Feng Haoran brought his camera and took many group photos and scenic shots for his parents at the Plum Garden and by the lakeside. At noon, the family enjoyed authentic Hubei cuisine at a specialty restaurant near the scenic area.

events.name: Check household appliances for parents.
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Feng Haoran, with his meticulousness, helped his parents inspect some commonly used household appliances, such as the water heater and range hood, ensuring they were functioning properly and performing some simple maintenance.

events.name: Monthly CFA Exam Preparation Summary and Plan Adjustment
events.description: In the study at night, Feng Haoran conducted a systematic review of his CFA exam preparation for January. He assessed his mastery of the completed chapters and the progress of his revision, finding that the derivatives section still required additional practice. Based on the actual situation, he adjusted his study plan for February.

events.name: Monthly Running Data Summary and Sharing
events.description: Feng Haoran conducted a comprehensive review of his running data for the month on a fitness app, generating simple charts for mileage and pace trends. He took a screenshot of his achievement of completing the 81-kilometer goal and shared it, along with his personal reflections, via WeChat with his running partner Gao Yunfei and other friends who enjoy sports.

events.name: New: Develop a post-Spring Festival recovery plan
events.description: Based on the conclusion of his health assessment, Feng Haoran began to formulate a detailed health recovery plan for after the Spring Festival, including adjusting his diet and increasing exercise frequency to address weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Cherish the final holiday moments spent with family.

结束状态.心情: Peaceful and fulfilling, I have both enjoyed family time and completed a personal stage of reflection, feeling a strong sense of control over the upcoming new month.

state.今日运动: The scenic area takes about 2 hours to explore on foot.

events.name: CFA Comprehensive Review and Mock Practice
events.description: In the morning, I connected knowledge points and worked on practice questions, analyzing incorrect answers. My weight slightly decreased to 77.0 kg due to dietary control, but ultimately adjusted to a final state of 77.2 kg.

events.name: Immersive Financial Theme Film Screening
events.description: The afternoon film viewing records market psychology insights; drinking coffee to relax, yet with a slight reluctance as the holiday draws to a close.

events.name: Farewell to Family and Return Journey
events.description: In the evening, I bid farewell to my family and boarded the high-speed train, where I listened to light music while planning my work. My weight experienced slight fluctuations due to dietary adjustments before the return trip, ultimately stabilizing at 77.2 kg.

events.name: Arrival in Changsha and Evening Organization

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last Sunday at his parents' home in Wuhan, Feng Haoran focused on wrapping up his holiday studies and communicated with his mother, Li Xiuying, regarding the core content of the family financial plan discussed with his father the previous day, seeking her input. In the slightly damp and chilly weather, he felt the preciousness of the time spent with his family and the urgency brought by the approaching end of the holiday.

events.name: Explaining the Family Financial Plan to Mother
events.description: After breakfast, Feng Haoran had a formal and detailed conversation with his mother, Li Xiuying, in the living room. Using easy-to-understand materials such as charts, he clearly explained to his mother the outline of the family security plan agreed upon with his father, including the coverage and role of the newly added supplementary medical insurance. He emphasized that this was not meant to reduce their parents' autonomy but to provide them with a more solid support system. After understanding the plan, his mother felt reassured by her son's thoughtfulness and sense of responsibility. She raised some detailed questions regarding daily medical expense reimbursements, which Feng Haoran answered one by one. He also promised to organize all relevant electronic documents and send them to her afterward.

events.name: Final Review and Systematic Archiving for CFA Preparation
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran focused intently in his study, conducting a second round of intensive review and practice on several weak areas identified during his holiday CFA preparation, such as cognitive bias models in behavioral finance and alternative asset allocation in portfolio management. Subsequently, he systematically organized all the review notes, error logs, and self-constructed knowledge framework diagrams for each chapter compiled throughout the holiday. These materials were categorized by subject and chapter and archived in both cloud-based notes and local hard drives, laying a solid foundation for sustained and efficient review after the holiday.

events.name: Family East Lake Greenway Hiking
events.description: In the evening, as the weather improved slightly, Feng Haoran went with his parents to the East Lake Greenway for a leisurely walk. They strolled at a slow pace for about 30 minutes, enjoying the lake view and chatting. The exercise intensity was moderate, with a focus on family interaction to maintain physical activity.

起始状态.所处地点: My bedroom in my parents' home in Wuhan
起始状态.心情: A calmness tinged with a hint of reluctance at the impending departure, focused on wrapping up the final tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: My own bedroom in my parents' home in Wuhan
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and slightly relaxed, having completed the planned tasks for the holiday, and mentally prepared for tomorrow's return journey.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day before the official end of the holiday, Feng Haoran conducted a comprehensive review of his exam preparation and financial learning progress at his home in Wuhan. He objectively assessed the difficulties he had overcome and, considering the intense work schedule that would resume after the holiday, developed a more flexible and sustainable new-phase study plan for his CFA exam preparation, ensuring a balance between life and work.

events.name: In-Depth Review of Learning Effectiveness During the Holiday Period
events.description: Throughout the entire morning, Feng Haoran systematically reviewed his learning achievements during the Spring Festival holiday. He revisited all his study logs and practice records, rating the depth of his understanding in the two modules of "Enterprise Risk Management" and "Advanced Portfolio Theory." At the same time, he examined the knowledge of insurance allocation acquired from the micro-course "Practical Family Financial Management" and contemplated how to integrate it into his professional services. The conclusion of the review was: the grasp of fundamental concepts is solid, but the speed of analyzing complex case studies needs improvement.

events.name: Develop a CFA Review Plan for the Post-Holiday Period
events.description: Based on the review results and the anticipated workload ahead, Feng Haoran revised his CFA study plan. He shifted from fixed, long daily study sessions to utilizing his weekday commute time (approximately 45 minutes) for listening to audio lectures and reviewing notes. Evenings were allocated for one hour of focused practice or reading. Weekends retained 3–4 hours of dedicated time for mock exams and tackling difficult topics. This revised plan better aligns with his ENTJ personality's planning-oriented traits, balancing efficiency with sustainability.

events.name: Change dinner plans at short notice.
events.description: Originally planning to eat light, Feng Haoran enjoyed a farewell dinner prepared by his mother Li Xiuying in the evening, which featured a lavish spread of Hubei home-style dishes including pork rib and lotus root soup as well as cured meats. While savoring the meal, he was mindful of portion control, aware that his weight might have increased slightly.

起始状态.心情: Begin preparing rationally and systematically for the role transition (from family member/student to working professional).

结束状态.心情: With clear objectives, one feels a strong sense of control over the upcoming life that balances work and study.
