2025-02.daily_overview: As the Spring Festival holiday came to an end, Feng Haoran embarked on his journey back to Changsha from Wuhan. Throughout the day, he experienced bidding farewell to his family, efficiently preparing for work during the high-speed train ride, and settling into his home in Changsha. His pace of life swiftly shifted from holiday mode to a state of readiness for work. In the evening, he not only attended to household matters but also made thorough preparations for the first day back at work.

events.name: Pack up and bid farewell to family.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran carefully packed the clothes he had changed during the Spring Festival and the Hubei specialties (such as cured fish and lotus root strips) prepared by his parents into his suitcase. Before leaving, he hugged his parents goodbye at the door. His mother, Li Xiuying, repeatedly reminded him to take care of his health, while his father, Feng Jianguo, patted him on the shoulder, conveying everything without words. Feng Haoran promised to keep in touch frequently through video calls.

events.name: Proceed to the high-speed railway station and commence the journey.
events.description: Feng Haoran used a ride-hailing app to book a car, departing from his parents' home to Wuhan Railway Station. Along the way, he gazed at the familiar streetscape, feeling a faint sense of melancholy about leaving home, as well as anticipation for returning to work. He arrived at the station half an hour early, smoothly passed through security, and boarded the high-speed train bound for Changsha South.

events.name: Work and Study Preparations on High-Speed Rail
events.description: During the approximately one-and-a-half-hour high-speed rail journey, Feng Haoran put on noise-canceling headphones and listened to a financial podcast episode about "Investment Logic for Tech Stocks in the First Quarter." At the same time, he opened the memo app on his phone, quickly organized the recent updates of three key clients (such as Huang Siqi, Lin Zhihao, etc.) that needed priority follow-up after returning to work, and listed the latest market reports that required review. This allowed him to transform the return trip into highly efficient work preparation time.

events.name: Arrived in Changsha and settled in at home
events.description: Upon arriving at Changsha South Station by high-speed rail, Feng Haoran took Metro Line 2 and transferred to Line 4 to return to his home in the Yuelu District. After arriving home, he first checked the safety of the water, electricity, and gas supply, confirming that everything was in order. He then placed the clothes from his suitcase into the washing machine and sorted the local specialties prepared by his parents, storing them in either the refrigerator or the storage cabinet. After a quick dusting of the living room, he restored the week-long unoccupied house to a tidy state.

events.name: Review Work Emails and Tomorrow's Schedule
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran turned on his work computer and quickly reviewed dozens of work emails that had accumulated during the holiday. He marked important customer inquiries, internal notifications, and market updates. He specifically confirmed the schedule and location of the department meeting scheduled for the next morning (February 19) and prepared the necessary documents and laptop in advance, placing them by the entrance.

events.name: Video call with mother to discuss insurance matters
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran proactively video-called his mother, Li Xiuying. Besides reassuring her of his well-being, he formally informed her that he had successfully purchased supplementary medical insurance for her. He briefly shared the key pages of the electronic policy through screen sharing, explained the coverage and claims process in simple terms to put her at ease, and reminded her to save the relevant documents on her phone. Deeply moved, his mother repeatedly praised her son for his thoughtfulness.

events.name: Holiday Study Review Summary
events.description: After organizing everything, Feng Haoran spent a few minutes writing a brief summary in his personal notes regarding his CFA review and financial knowledge study during the Spring Festival holiday. He recorded the main takeaways (such as practical reflections on family financial case studies) and listed several points that required further consolidation and in-depth research after the holiday, setting the tone for the upcoming phase of learning.

起始状态.心情: With a touch of melancholy, yet already shifting into "return mode" in action, clear-headed and orderly.

结束状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet settled in, I am prepared for returning to work tomorrow while also feeling a hint of nervousness about stepping back into the fast-paced rhythm.

state.今日运动: The entire day was primarily spent on commuting and organizing/relocating items, with no dedicated exercise.

2025-02.daily_overview: On his first day back at work, Feng Haoran quickly immersed himself in a demanding work schedule. In the morning, he attended a departmental meeting to clarify the strategic direction for the new quarter, and in the afternoon, he worked with his team to break down objectives and formulate specific action plans. Simultaneously, he proactively purchased new investment books to broaden his perspective and began organizing his personal materials for the upcoming promotion review, demonstrating a strong sense of professional ambition.

events.name: Prepare reporting materials for client Huang Siqi
events.description: Arriving at the office early in the morning, Feng Haoran first turned on his computer to organize the latest data of client Huang Siqi's investment portfolio and updated the market analysis brief, which included recent policy changes in the technology industry. He meticulously prepared the presentation for the next day's video conference, ensuring the data was accurate, the logic was clear, and the key points were highlighted.

events.name: Attend the department's new quarter mobilization meeting
events.description: At 10 a.m., in the conference room of Huatai Securities Changsha Branch, Feng Haoran attended a department-wide meeting chaired by his direct supervisor, Qian Yongqiang. The meeting reviewed the performance before the Spring Festival. Mr. Qian formally announced the performance targets for the new quarter and emphasized that the company’s strategy would shift toward targeting tech newcomers and founders of startup companies. Feng Haoran carefully took notes and noted that this aligned closely with the background of his client, Huang Siqi.

events.name: Decomposition of Group Objectives and Formulation of Plans
events.description: Immediately after the departmental meeting, Feng Haoran promptly convened a brief team huddle with team members Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya (who joined via video link from Hangzhou). Based on the department’s new direction, the three quickly broke down the quarterly goals into individual tasks. Leading the discussion, Feng Haoran drafted an initial research list and outreach plan timeline targeting potential technology clients in cities such as Shenzhen and Shanghai, and assigned preliminary information-gathering tasks.

events.name: Purchase and download the new investment book
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran searched for and purchased the e-book and audiobook of the recently recommended investment book "Cycles, Value, and Human Nature" on his frequently used Dedao APP and WeChat Reading. He appreciated the book's perspective of integrating value investing, market cycles, and behavioral psychology, believing it would enrich his analytical framework. After completing the payment, he immediately downloaded the e-book to his iPad and cached the audiobook on his phone, planning to utilize his commute and fragmented time for learning.

events.name: Organize the team collaboration section in the performance review materials.
events.description: Before leaving work, Feng Haoran set aside an hour to gather materials for his promotion presentation. He began by reviewing his work logs and project files, organizing collaboration records from the past year with Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya while serving key clients such as Huang Siqi and Lin Zhihao. He focused on summarizing his core contributions to the projects, his experience in cross-departmental coordination, and the leadership he demonstrated while leading the team in pre-holiday review meetings, and he drafted a preliminary written overview.

events.name: Staying up late to prepare client materials.
events.description: Due to the client Huang Siqi's last-minute request for additional requirements, Feng Haoran worked late into the night, revising and refining the presentation materials to ensure the success of the meeting the following day. He drank a cup of hand-brewed coffee to stay alert but realized it might affect his sleep.

起始状态.心情: Ready to go, with a clear plan to tackle the challenges of returning to work.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet increasingly stressful, the new quarter's objectives bring motivation, but staying up late leads to fatigue.

state.今日运动: None, the entire day primarily involves mental work and meetings.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the second workday, Feng Haoran successfully chaired a video conference with the key client Huang Siqi, receiving positive feedback. After the meeting, he promptly implemented the action plan and reported to his supervisor. In the afternoon, he developed a detailed personal quarterly work plan. Meanwhile, noise issues from the new neighbor began to emerge. He attempted to adjust on his own but with limited effectiveness, as new challenges in life quietly surfaced. In the evening, he remotely coordinated with his sister to plan their father's birthday celebration, while family matters continued to progress simultaneously.

events.name: Video Conference with Client Huang Siqi
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran conducted a 1.5-hour in-depth video conference with Huang Siqi, a client in Shenzhen, in the company's video conference room. He provided a detailed report on the investment plan adjusted based on pre-holiday market changes and emphasized the analysis of recent regulatory dynamics in artificial intelligence and the semiconductor industry cycle, highlighting their potential impact on the technology-themed asset allocation. Huang Siqi expressed high recognition for Feng Haoran's professional analysis and forward-looking suggestions. Both parties agreed to meet in Shenzhen next month for an in-depth discussion on the next phase of the asset expansion plan.

events.name: Organize meeting minutes and update client files
events.description: After the meeting concluded, Feng Haoran promptly compiled a detailed meeting summary, clearly outlining the key discussion points, the consensus reached by both parties (such as agreeing to a slight increase in defensive asset allocation), and the follow-up action items requiring attention (such as providing a detailed draft expansion plan next month). Based on this, he updated Huang Siqi's client file and set up relevant reminders.

events.name: Report the meeting outcomes to supervisor Qian Yongqiang
events.description: After starting work in the afternoon, Feng Haoran proactively provided a brief report to his direct supervisor, Qian Yongqiang, on the key points of the meeting with Huang Siqi and the next steps agreed upon. Qian Yongqiang acknowledged Feng Haoran’s efforts in maintaining client relations and reminded him that, when expanding the client base with similar backgrounds, he could summarize the successful experience of serving Huang Siqi as a template.

events.name: Develop a personal work plan for the new quarter
events.description: Based on team discussions and supervisor feedback, Feng Haoran used a mind mapping tool in the office to develop a detailed personal work plan for the new quarter. The plan includes: the goal of contacting three potential clients in the technology industry each week, a preliminary schedule and visit list for business trips to Shenzhen/Shanghai (expected in mid-to-late March), as well as industry analysis materials that need to be prepared in advance. He shared the plan with the team members.

events.name: Discover and conduct preliminary research on neighborhood noise issues
events.description: Upon returning to his home in Yuelu District in the evening, Feng Haoran was preparing for his bedtime reading when he clearly heard a continuous, rhythmic vibration and low humming sound coming from upstairs. He deduced that it was his new neighbor using a treadmill or other fitness equipment. This severely disrupted his concentration while reading. Initially, he tried wearing noise-canceling headphones and delaying his rest time, but the noise was highly penetrating, rendering the measures ineffective.

events.name: Planning Father's Birthday Banquet with Younger Sister
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran discussed his father's upcoming sixtieth birthday with his sister Feng Xinran in Shanghai via video call. Both agreed to host a warm and formal family birthday celebration in their hometown of Wuhan. Preliminary responsibilities were assigned: Feng Haoran would coordinate with local restaurants in Wuhan and invite his father's old colleagues and friends, while Feng Xinran would remotely select gifts, design electronic invitations, and plan the day's schedule. The siblings agreed to refine the plan further over the weekend.

events.name: Poor sleep due to noise
events.description: Due to noise disturbance, Feng Haoran had difficulty falling asleep and tossed and turned in bed, resulting in slightly poorer mental state the following day.

起始状态.心情: Focus on the work and be confident about the morning client meeting.

结束状态.心情: A sense of professional fulfillment is interwoven with mild irritation toward emerging life disturbances (noise), accompanied by a decline in sleep quality.

2025-02.daily_overview: Feng Haoran resumed his morning jog for the first time after the holiday, objectively assessed the impact of the break on his physical fitness, and scientifically adjusted his training plan. During the day, he planned his business trip itinerary and reported his work to his supervisor. In the evening, as noise issues continued to trouble him, he decided to adopt a proactive communication strategy, taking the first step toward resolving the problem.

events.name: Confirm the morning running plan and check the equipment
events.description: The night before, Feng Haoran confirmed the running plan with his running partner Gao Yunfei via WeChat, agreeing to meet at the starting point on Lushan South Road at 6:30 a.m. the next morning. Before going to bed, he checked his professional running shoes (noting that the sole wear was within the normal range), his sportswear, and ensured that his sports watch was fully charged.

events.name: First recovery morning run after the holiday
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei met on time and embarked on a 5-kilometer slow run along the Yuelu Mountain loop. During the run, Feng Haoran clearly felt that his cardiopulmonary capacity was not as good as before the holiday, with more labored breathing and greater difficulty maintaining the target pace. His final average pace was approximately 45 seconds slower than his personal record from January.

events.name: Running Data Recording and Physical Assessment
events.description: After finishing his run, Feng Haoran performed 15 minutes of targeted stretching (focusing on relaxing his hamstrings and gluteal muscles, which had become stiff due to prolonged sitting and a lack of systematic exercise during the holiday). Meanwhile, he checked the detailed data on his fitness app: his average heart rate was slightly elevated, his cadence remained stable, but his stride length had slightly decreased. Combining this with his physical sensations, he clearly realized that the irregular sleep schedule and diet during the nearly two-week Spring Festival holiday had caused a measurable impact on his basic physical fitness.

events.name: Adjust the weekly training plan
events.description: Based on the objective data of the day, Feng Haoran decided to adjust his training plan. He increased his weekly running frequency from three to four times (Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday, Sunday) and planned a progressive training schedule for the following week, focusing on "low intensity and slow recovery." The goal is to gradually rebuild his aerobic foundation and regain his pre-holiday fitness level within two weeks.

events.name: Preliminary planning of the Shenzhen business trip itinerary
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran, in accordance with the agreement with Huang Siqi, began preliminary planning for a business trip to Shenzhen in mid-to-late March. He checked the flight schedules and prices for round trips between Changsha and Shenzhen, preselected hotels under the company's corporate agreement, and drafted an outline for the in-person presentation agenda. This included four sections: market review, portfolio performance, future strategies, and risk discussion.

events.name: Report the New Quarter Action Plan to the Supervisor
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran formally presented his refined new quarter action plan, along with that of his team, to Qian Yongqiang, with a particular focus on the expansion strategy targeting the technology client segment. He emphasized the resources requiring company support, such as access to more detailed industry databases and budget allocation for attending specific technology summits. Qian Yongqiang approved his plan in principle and encouraged him to proceed boldly.

events.name: Decided to take the initiative to communicate with the neighbor.
events.description: After another day of observation and self-adjustment (including trying white noise software), the issue of nighttime noise persisted. Feng Haoran decided he would no longer passively endure it. He carefully considered his communication approach and wording, resolving to address his neighbor in a friendly and constructive manner. He planned to explain how the noise affected his rest and reading, and to propose negotiating a mutually acceptable quiet period in the evenings (for example, after 10 p.m.), rather than making direct accusations.

events.name: Minor calf muscle strain
events.description: Due to an overly intense first morning run after the holiday, Feng Haoran experienced a mild strain in the right calf muscle after jogging. He immediately applied ice and rested, and is expected to recover in a few days, with no impact on daily activities.

起始状态.心情: I feel both anticipation and some apprehension about resuming morning runs, determined to reestablish a regular routine.

结束状态.心情: The body feels slightly fatigued from exercise but the mind has relaxed somewhat. A clear approach to resolving the noise issue has been identified, shifting the mindset toward proactive engagement, though the strain brings mild discomfort.

state.今日运动: 5km morning run (recovery jog), 15 minutes of stretching.

2025-02.daily_overview: Saturday morning began with conversation and a leisurely jog among running companions, reflecting the balance between life and work through relaxed dialogue. In the afternoon, Feng Haoran prepared for the following day's photography session by checking equipment and planning the route. In the evening, he mustered the courage to engage in friendly communication with his neighbor, making initial progress in resolving the neighborhood issue.

events.name: Weekend Morning Run and Communication with Running Partners
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei met again and completed a 6-kilometer jog along Lushan South Road. Both were in better condition than the previous day. During the run, they exchanged insights on recent investment and financial management. Feng Haoran shared his investment logic regarding tech stocks, while Gao Yunfei discussed some recent business developments at Tencent's Changsha branch and the dynamics of the local IT circle. Running was not only a form of exercise but also a channel for information exchange.

events.name: Having Breakfast with Running Partners
events.description: After finishing their run, the two went to a breakfast shop they often visited on Lushan South Road and ordered rice noodles and soy milk. During the meal, they continued their relaxed conversation, shifting from work to daily life, with Gao Yunfei also sharing his experience in handling conflicts with neighbors in his apartment. They agreed to meet again for a run at the same time and place next Saturday.

events.name: Checking Equipment and Planning for Sunday Street Photography
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran retrieved his DSLR camera and commonly used lenses from his home study. He meticulously checked the cleanliness and focusing functions of both the camera body and lenses, ensuring that two spare batteries were fully charged. Meanwhile, using map software and information from local photography communities, he planned a detailed street photography route for the following day in the old urban areas of Changsha, including Taiping Street and Pozi Street. He also checked the weather forecast, which indicated overcast conditions with soft light the next day, ideal for photography.

events.name: Friendly Communication with Neighbors Regarding Noise Issues
events.description: At around 9 p.m., Feng Haoran politely knocked on the door of his upstairs neighbor. He first introduced himself and then calmly and sincerely explained how the noise from equipment in recent evenings had affected his pre-sleep reading and rest. He suggested whether they could come to an agreement, such as minimizing the use of equipment like treadmills that produce continuous vibrations after 10 p.m. The neighbor, also a young professional, expressed understanding upon hearing this, apologized for not realizing the noise was so loud, and agreed to adjust the usage time, making an effort to avoid using such equipment after 10 p.m.

events.name: Weekend gathering with friends
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran gathered with friends Peng Yuqing, Wu Junjie, and others at a Hunan restaurant, enjoying food and socializing while consciously moderating alcohol consumption, aware that his weight might have increased slightly.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, enjoying the weekend morning, with a slight anticipation for the upcoming run and communication.

结束状态.心情: The mood was relatively pleasant; morning jogging and social interactions were refreshing. Communication with the neighbors yielded positive results, and stress was alleviated, though staying up late had a slight negative impact.

state.今日运动: Ran 6 kilometers in the morning, accompanied by running partners, maintaining a steady pace.

2025-02.daily_overview: Sundays are entirely dedicated to personal hobbies. Feng Haoran, with his camera in tow, wanders through the old streets and alleys of Changsha, immersing himself in the joy of street photography and applying the photographic techniques he has previously learned. In the evening, upon returning home, he conducts an initial selection of the numerous photos, enjoying the process of organizing his creative work and bringing the weekend to a satisfying conclusion through artistic exploration.

events.name: Street Photography Practice in Changsha's Old Districts
events.description: From morning until afternoon, Feng Haoran conducted street photography in old districts such as Taiping Street and Pozi Street as planned. He focused on capturing vivid street scenes: the rising steam from breakfast stalls and the expressions of diners, the mottled textures and interplay of light and shadow on the walls of old buildings, as well as the fleeting moments of street performers' acts. He deliberately practiced the rule of thirds composition and the technique of using natural light to shape the contours of subjects, both of which he had learned in last month's photography workshop. In total, he captured approximately 200 RAW-format photos.

events.name: Preliminary Photo Screening and Classification
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Feng Haoran imported all the photos from his camera into the computer. He quickly browsed through all the images and, based on first impressions as well as criteria such as composition, lighting, and subject matter, made an initial selection of about 50 promising shots. He organized these photos into folders by themes like "People," "Architecture," and "Daily Scenes," adding simple labels to prepare for subsequent detailed post-processing.

events.name: Temporarily suspend the sports plan.
events.description: Originally scheduled for an afternoon strength training session, Feng Haoran decided to take a day off due to the extended street photography time and slight physical fatigue, focusing instead on his photography hobby.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely and full of creative desire, looking forward to a day of shooting.

结束状态.心情: Content and serene, immersed in the sense of fulfillment from artistic creation, the process of selecting photos is also filled with enjoyment.

state.今日运动: All-day street photography walk, covering approximately 8 kilometers, is considered a moderate-intensity activity.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with light rain in the afternoon.

2025-02.daily_overview: The start of a new week brings work back into focus as the main theme. The lunch gathering with colleague Zheng Wenbo not only strengthened our bond but also facilitated the exchange of valuable industry insights. In the evening, Feng Haoran extended his weekend passion for photography into post-processing, meticulously refining his work to produce satisfying results. Work and personal interests were well-balanced throughout the day.

events.name: Lunch gathering with colleague Zheng Wenbo
events.description: On Monday morning, Feng Haoran arranged via WeChat Work to meet Zheng Wenbo, a colleague from the same department, during the lunch break at a Hunan restaurant they frequented near the company. During the break, the two ordered several homestyle dishes and chatted over the meal. The conversation naturally flowed from recent market fluctuations and feedback from their respective clients to personal work progress and minor challenges they had encountered, all in a relaxed and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Exchange industry information and plan to participate in the forum
events.description: During the meal, Zheng Wenbo mentioned that he had heard about a financial investment forum on "Digital Finance and Investment Technology" to be held at the local convention center next month, featuring guests from several leading institutions. Feng Haoran showed great interest upon hearing this, and the two promptly made a preliminary agreement to register for the event together if their schedules allowed, considering it an excellent opportunity to broaden their industry perspectives and expand their professional network.

events.name: Return to work after lunch.
events.description: The lunch lasted about an hour. After finishing their meal, the two walked back to the company office building together, continuing to discuss some details from the morning meeting along the way. They then each immersed themselves in the busy work of the afternoon.

events.name: Retouching Street Photography Works
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran utilized a dedicated block of time to perform detailed post-processing on the photos selected over the weekend using Lightroom software. He focused on adjusting the color tones to highlight the nostalgic atmosphere of the old town, applied appropriate skin retouching and enhanced catchlights for some portrait photos, and optimized the composition through cropping. Ultimately, he meticulously refined 15 of his most satisfactory works from the initial selection of 50 photos, preparing them for future sharing.

events.name: Outline the Framework for a Promotion Performance Report
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran spent half an hour outlining the overall logical framework of his promotion presentation in a document. He identified three core sections that the report needed to showcase: key achievements and quantitative data from the past year, an in-depth analysis of the most representative customer service cases, as well as his leadership contributions within the team and a specific plan for skill enhancement over the next six months (such as completing the CFA Level III exam and deepening expertise in the technology industry).

events.name: Commence cross-day client project planning
events.description: Feng Haoran has initiated a new client project proposal targeting clients in the technology industry. The plan is to complete the preliminary proposal within three days, starting today with the collection of data and industry trends.

起始状态.心情: After weekend adjustments, I am full of energy to welcome the new week of work.

结束状态.心情: Enrichment, both the professional engagements during the day and personal creative pursuits in the evening bring a sense of fulfillment.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise regimen, only walking during lunch breaks.

2025-02.daily_overview: Outside of work, Feng Haoran continues to advance his personal development plan: he has started reading a book on long-term investment and shares his refined photography works with friends in the circle to obtain professional feedback. Meanwhile, he continues to gather supporting materials for his promotion review and has reserved a restaurant in Wuhan for his father's birthday banquet, demonstrating his multidimensional progress in career, hobbies, and family responsibilities.

events.name: Start reading the new book on value investing.
events.description: During his lunch breaks and before going to bed at night, Feng Haoran began reading the book "Value Investing and Long-Termism" that he had purchased earlier. He carefully read the preface and the first chapter, gaining an understanding of the author's core perspectives on filtering out market noise and evaluating the intrinsic value of companies. He also came to initially agree with the importance of "patience" and "rationality" in investing as emphasized in the book.

events.name: Share photography works and receive feedback
events.description: Feng Haoran uploaded nine meticulously refined and most representative street photography works to a professional photography community and his own social media circle, briefly noting the shooting locations and insights. Shortly after, his photography partner in Shenzhen, Xu Jianing, provided professional feedback in the comments section, specifically pointing out that one photo using a door frame for composition could further enhance its contrast of light and shadow. The two then engaged in a private discussion via WeChat to exchange details on specific post-processing parameters.

events.name: Organize Personal Continuous Learning Supporting Documents
events.description: To enrich his promotion self-assessment report, Feng Haoran compiled materials that demonstrate his continuous learning capabilities. These include screenshots of online industry training certificates from the past year, summaries of his self-study notes on Python-based financial data analysis, and records of market analysis posts published on professional forums such as Xueqiu, which have received considerable recognition. He categorized and archived these materials, preparing them as attachments.

events.name: Review of High-Net-Worth Client Service Cases
events.description: He specifically set aside one hour to conduct an in-depth review of the successful case of serving high-net-worth client Huang Siqi. He organized the entire timeline of the process, from initial contact and needs analysis to solution formulation, periodic adjustments, and ultimately gaining recognition. He also highlighted several key service strengths, such as "cross-market asset allocation to hedge against industry cycle risks" and "regularly providing in-depth industry briefings that exceed expectations."

events.name: Booking a Restaurant for Father's Birthday Banquet
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran compared several restaurants in Wuhan suitable for family gatherings through Dianping and phone inquiries. He ultimately selected a restaurant located near the riverbank, known for its elegant ambiance and authentic Hubei cuisine. He communicated with the manager over the phone, reserved a private room accommodating 15 to 20 people, and tentatively confirmed a menu that included his father's favorite dishes—steamed Wuchang fish and pork rib lotus root soup. He also paid a deposit in advance.

events.name: First Swimming Recovery Training Session
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran went to the swimming pool at the gym contracted by his company and attempted his first post-holiday swimming session. He engaged in 30 minutes of freestyle swimming, practicing techniques at a moderate intensity. He felt that his cardiovascular system experienced low-impact recovery, but his endurance still needs improvement.

events.name: Continue Customer Project Planning
events.description: Feng Haoran spent an hour advancing the client project proposal, collected more data from the technology industry, and began drafting the preliminary analysis section.

起始状态.心情: Focus, plan to advance multiple personal matters within a day.

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment was felt as progress was made on multiple tasks, particularly in finalizing key arrangements for my father's birthday banquet and attempting swimming, which brought a sense of reassurance.

state.今日运动: Swim for 30 minutes.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last Wednesday of February, Feng Haoran conducted a rigorous monthly financial review. He meticulously analyzed income, expenditures, and investment performance, identified minor deviations in asset allocation, and decisively executed rebalancing operations. In the evening, he also exchanged experiences with fellow runners on handling neighborhood issues, demonstrating his rational planning and proactive approach to life's challenges.

events.name: Export monthly financial data
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran first exported all the income and expenditure records for February from the China Merchants Bank app, his Huatai Securities account, and the "Sui Shou Ji" app he uses, along with details of his stock and fund investment returns and overall asset change data. He consolidated these disparate sources of data into a unified Excel spreadsheet, performed preliminary cleaning and categorization, and prepared them for in-depth analysis.

events.name: In-depth Analysis of February Financial Status
events.description: In the evening, in his study, Feng Haoran began analyzing item by item, facing the organized financial data spreadsheet and portfolio management software. He discovered that in February, due to the Spring Festival bonus and a project commission, his income beyond salary exceeded expectations, resulting in a savings rate of 35%, which was higher than the preset target of 25%. Meanwhile, among his various investments, a heavily weighted technology stock showed significant gains due to favorable industry developments.

events.name: Identify Asset Allocation Deviations
events.description: While analyzing the investment portfolio, Feng Haoran found that due to the rise of the technology stock, the market value proportion of the "technology growth sector" in the entire portfolio increased from the preset 30% to 34%, exceeding the upper limit of the strategic allocation ratio. He judged that this deviation was caused by short-term market fluctuations and required tactical rebalancing.

events.name: Execute portfolio rebalancing
events.description: Adhering to established investment discipline, Feng Haoran logged into the securities trading software and executed a rebalancing operation: he sold a portion of the technology stocks that had experienced significant gains, thereby locking in some profits. Subsequently, he used the proceeds to purchase, in batches as originally planned, ETF funds tracking the CSI 300 Index. This operation restored his overall asset allocation ratio to the target range.

events.name: Document Review Conclusions and Next Month's Plan
events.description: After completing the operation, Feng Haoran recorded the key conclusions of this monthly review in his personal financial management system and investment log: excellent savings rate and successful execution of rebalancing. At the same time, based on his current market outlook (believing that volatility will persist), he set a goal to maintain the current savings rate in March and reminded himself to pay close attention to the impact of inflation data on monetary policy.

events.name: Exchanging experiences with fellow runners on handling neighborhood issues
events.description: When speaking with Gao Yunfei on the phone in the evening to confirm the running plan for the next day, Feng Haoran casually mentioned that the noise issue had been preliminarily resolved through communication. Gao Yunfei shared his experience: he suggested giving the neighbor some time to adapt and adjust, while observing the subsequent effects; if the problem recurs, then consider more formal written coordination through the property management or the homeowners’ association, which would be a more prudent approach. Feng Haoran found this suggestion to be sound and reasonable.

events.name: Complete the initial draft of the client project proposal
events.description: Feng Haoran has completed the initial draft of the client project proposal, integrating data analysis and strategic recommendations, and plans to revise it tomorrow.

events.name: Eating out leads to weight gain.
events.description: I had lunch with colleagues at a restaurant and enjoyed Hunan cuisine, but the high oil intake led to a slight rebound in my weight.

起始状态.心情: Calm and prepared for the routine financial review.

结束状态.心情: Feeling satisfied and in control, financial review and adjustments bring a sense of security, leading to greater ease in handling life's challenges.

2025-02.daily_overview: After several consecutive days of handling data and reports, Feng Haoran chose to unwind at his regular café in the evening. He engaged in conversations with the owner, Shen Xinyi, about coffee and photography, sharing his recent street photography works, which provided him with a pleasant social experience and creative inspiration. Meanwhile, he continued to make progress on drafting his work report and decided to allow a period of observation regarding neighborhood issues.

events.name: Read new investment books and reflect on them
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran continued reading "Cycles, Value, and Human Nature," focusing on the chapters about market sentiment and investor psychology. He reflected on the "herd effect" and "overreaction" phenomena he had observed in the A-share market, finding the book's analysis of retail investors' irrational behavior particularly insightful. He decided to incorporate some of the core ideas into his future risk education communications with clients. He also made notes in the margins of the book (using the e-book annotation feature).

events.name: Tranquil Moments at the Café
events.description: After finishing a day's work, Feng Haoran did not head straight home. Instead, he walked to the hand-drip coffee shop near the company, run by Shen Xinyi. He ordered a hand-drip coffee made with newly arrived Yunnan anaerobic-processed beans, sat in his usual spot by the window, and savored the wine-like fermentation aroma and fruity acidity brought by the beans.

events.name: Communicating with the Shop Owner about Coffee and Photography
events.description: When the shop owner Shen Xinyi wasn't too busy, she would sit down and chat with Feng Haoran. They discussed the special processing method of this Yunnan coffee bean and the flavor characteristics of different producing regions. Feng Haoran then showed Shen Xinyi some selected photos from his street photography the previous week, particularly the one capturing the scene in front of the café. The two engaged in a lively discussion about the use of light and shadow in the photos, the moment captured, and the possible stories behind them, transitioning from the art of coffee to street aesthetics.

events.name: Decision to Extend the Neighborhood Noise Observation Period
events.description: After reviewing the situation following several days of communication with his neighbor, Feng Haoran noted that the noise had largely subsided after 10 p.m., though occasional slight sounds still occurred between 9 and 10 p.m. Based on Gao Yunfei's suggestion and his own judgment, he decided to grant the neighbor an additional week for adjustment and adaptation, extending the observation period until March 5. If the issue remains unresolved to his satisfaction by that time, he will then consider initiating formal communication through the property management.

events.name: Writing the Team Contribution Section in a Performance Report
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Feng Haoran began drafting the section on "Team Collaboration and Leadership" for his performance report, based on the materials he had previously organized. He emphasized how he guided the team to optimize the client periodic reporting process during the pre-holiday review meeting. To make the description more convincing, he included comparison charts illustrating the process before and after optimization, along with screenshots of positive feedback emails from team members.

events.name: Future Learning Plan in Planning Performance Report Materials
events.description: He further refined his personal capability enhancement plan for the next six months. For the objective of "deepening understanding of the technology industry," he specifically planned to: thoroughly read two authoritative technology industry research reports each month, register for an online technology investment summit, and establish a regular communication mechanism with the company's internal technology industry researchers. He documented these specific actions in the materials to demonstrate the feasibility of his plan.

events.name: Revise Client Project Proposal
events.description: Feng Haoran spent time revising the client's project proposal by incorporating additional market risk assessment content, thereby making the plan more comprehensive.

起始状态.心情: Slightly dull, looking forward to the evening café time as a diversion.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and relaxed, the cafe conversations bring creative inspiration and social fulfillment, enhancing the sense of balance between work and life.

2025-02.daily_overview: The final day of February concluded with a sense of fulfillment. During the day, work was carried out efficiently, and invitations for my father’s birthday banquet were finalized. In the evening, Feng Haoran participated in an inspiring online gear-sharing session with camping companions, jointly planning a spring camping trip. Simultaneously, he and his running friends accepted a new sports challenge and completed the first draft of a report for an upcoming promotion review. The day ended on a proactive and well-organized note, welcoming the arrival of March.

events.name: Contacting an old friend of my father's.
events.description: During a break in his workday, Feng Haoran called several of his father Feng Jianguo's former colleagues and longtime friends, using the contact information provided by his father. He politely introduced himself, informed them of the time and location of his father's sixtieth birthday celebration, and extended a sincere invitation on behalf of the entire family, hoping to give his father a pleasant surprise. The elders gladly accepted the invitation and praised Feng Haoran for his filial devotion.

events.name: Morning Run Recovery Training
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, Feng Haoran completed a 5-kilometer morning run, gradually increasing his pace to around 5 minutes and 10 seconds per kilometer. His cardiorespiratory endurance showed signs of recovery but has not yet returned to pre-holiday levels. He used a fitness app to record the data, emphasizing progressive overload.

events.name: Strength Training
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran went to the company gym for a 30-minute strength training session, focusing on enhancing core and lower body strength to prepare for spring camping needs.

events.name: Online Equipment Sharing Session with Camping Partners
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran held an online video call with his camping partner Xie Yutong, who was in Shenzhen. Each of them showcased the outdoor gear they had recently been focusing on: Xie Yutong shared a review video of an ultralight two-person tent, while Feng Haoran introduced portable hand-press coffee pots from several brands. They also discussed potential camping locations in Hunan during the spring season (April), such as Dawei Mountain and non-core scenic areas around Zhangjiajie, and tentatively planned a weekend short-distance camping trip for April.

events.name: Record Key Points of Camping Discussion
events.description: After the video conference, Feng Haoran compiled the equipment models, their advantages and disadvantages, and the camping location suggestions discussed into a concise note, which he saved in a cloud document. He shared the note with Xie Yutong via WeChat, leaving a message saying they could start working on more detailed plans separately and schedule another meeting next month.

events.name: Summary of Progress in Addressing Noise Issues
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran briefly recorded in his diary the progress made over approximately one week in addressing the neighborhood noise issue. He believed that proactive and friendly communication was the correct first step toward resolving the problem. Although the situation had not yet reached an ideal state, it had opened channels for dialogue and yielded initial results. He decided to continue observing the situation as planned until March 5. This experience also prompted him to reflect more concretely on balancing the protection of personal rights with maintaining harmonious neighborly relations.

events.name: Completed the initial draft of the promotion performance report.
events.description: He compiled the sections he had written over the past few days, the collected performance data, the review of customer cases, the list of supporting materials, and the future plans into a complete draft of his promotion report. He conducted preliminary proofreading and formatting adjustments to ensure the report appeared well-structured and detailed in content. He plans to spend more time over the weekend polishing and rehearsing the presentation.

events.name: Agreed with running buddies to participate in an online running challenge.
events.description: Runner Gao Yunfei discovered a 30-day online running challenge called "Spring Renewal" on the Keep APP, with the rule that completing a total of 60 kilometers within the month would earn a medal. He shared the link with Feng Haoran, suggesting they form a team to participate and hold each other accountable. After reviewing it, Feng Haoran found the goal reasonable (averaging 2 kilometers per day, which was quite manageable for him) and believed it could add a sense of purpose and fun to his regular morning runs. He gladly agreed and briefly discussed with Gao Yunfei via voice call how to distribute the running distance.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the online gathering tonight and feeling highly motivated to complete the report soon.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and full of anticipation, conversations with friends have ignited a passion for outdoor activities. Significant work tasks (such as reports) have also achieved phased progress, and there are comprehensive plans for March.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 5 kilometers at a pace of 5 minutes and 10 seconds per kilometer; strength training for 30 minutes.

2025-03.daily_overview: On a typical Saturday, Feng Haoran efficiently balanced work review with the initiation of personal interests, though he felt slightly fatigued in the morning due to studying late the previous night. In the morning, he immersed himself in critical reading of professional books. In the afternoon, he focused on completing the key first draft of his promotion report and initiated a spring challenge with his running partners. In the evening, he began contemplating and planning the intelligent upgrade of his home environment, demonstrating the planning and execution abilities characteristic of an ENTJ personality.

events.name: Critical Reading of "Value Investing"
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran was in his study reading the chapter on classic value investment cases in the book "Cycles, Value, and Human Nature." With four years of professional experience, he keenly noticed that the cases in the book simplified the specific historical contexts and complex market environments. He took out his notebook and recorded his points of skepticism, believing that the overly idealized discussions overlooked the dynamic interplay in practice, which prompted him to engage in deeper critical thinking.

events.name: Received a reminder for personal income tax settlement.
events.description: Feng Haoran received a text message on his phone from the tax bureau, reminding him to complete the annual settlement of comprehensive income for the 2024 personal income tax. He glanced at it, categorized it as a routine financial matter to be handled in the near future, and did not take immediate action, planning to address it over the weekend.

events.name: Drafting the Initial Version of the Promotion Self-Assessment Report
events.description: Utilizing the entire afternoon, Feng Haoran focused on drafting his promotion report for the position of Investment Director in his study. He systematically reviewed client service cases and investment performance data from the past year. By integrating his ongoing preparation for the CFA Level III exam, he clearly articulated his professional contributions and future career goals, resulting in a well-structured and thoroughly substantiated initial draft.

events.name: Schedule a Review of the Report with the Supervisor
events.description: After completing the initial draft, Feng Haoran sent the report to his direct supervisor Qian Yongqiang via the company's WeChat platform. He also left a message requesting a brief face-to-face meeting, hoping to seek professional advice from this career mentor on both the content and presentation of the material, thereby setting the tone for subsequent revisions.

events.name: Initiate a running challenge with fellow runners
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran and his running partner Gao Yunfei discovered the "Spring Renewal" 100-kilometer team challenge on their usual running app. Through the app's chat function, they immediately agreed to form a team and participate, setting a goal to complete the challenge by the end of March. This added a new competitive thrill to their regular morning runs.

events.name: Launch the inaugural run of the challenge competition
events.description: To kick off the challenge on a positive note, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei arranged an evening adaptive jog on Yuelu Mountain. They recorded the mileage of their first joint training session via an app, discussing excitedly as they ran about their weekly running plans and pacing strategies for the weeks ahead, officially marking the beginning of the hundred-day challenge.

events.name: Plan Smart Home Upgrades
events.description: While resting in the evening, Feng Haoran noticed that the old air purifier in the living room produced noticeable noise during operation and could not be connected to a smartphone for control. Additionally, the lighting in the study only had an on/off functionality. Driven by his pursuit of efficiency and quality of life, he decided to upgrade his residence with smart technology. He initially listed the devices that needed replacement (a smart air purifier and smart light bulbs) and set a budget of around 2,000 yuan.

events.name: Temporary Adjustment of Morning Running Plan
events.description: When he woke up in the morning, Feng Haoran felt slightly fatigued, likely due to staying up late the previous night studying for the CFA. He decided to shorten his originally planned morning run to a 4-kilometer jog, aiming to maintain the continuity of his exercise routine without overexerting himself.

起始状态.心情: Calm and methodical, yet slightly weary, ready to begin a fulfilling day.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and satisfied, having accomplished multiple plans, and feeling excited about newly initiated challenges, with fatigue somewhat alleviated.

state.今日运动: Jogged 4 kilometers with Gao Yunfei at Yuelu Mountain to warm up for the challenge competition.

date_attribute.weather: Changsha, sunny with rising temperatures, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-03.daily_overview: The pace on Sunday was relatively relaxed and more socially oriented, but Feng Haoran adjusted his activities due to mild muscle soreness from the previous day's exercise. He mainly handled several tasks requiring collaboration: planning a spring itinerary with camping companions, refining his promotion report based on feedback from his supervisor and colleagues, and detailing a one-month training plan with his running partners. In the evening, he promptly executed the idea from the previous night by completing the purchase of smart home products.

events.name: Plan the April camping itinerary
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran had a video call with his camping companion Xie Yutong. Both of them were eager to embark on a short camping trip in spring to relieve work-related stress. They tentatively decided to schedule the outing for a weekend in mid-April. After checking their respective work calendars, they identified two potential date ranges: April 12–13 and April 19–20. They agreed to finalize the specific location in further discussions.

events.name: Solicit colleagues' opinions on the report
events.description: Feng Haoran sent the first draft of his work report to his close colleague Zheng Wenbo, hoping to gain some optimization suggestions from an outsider's perspective. During their lunch break, the two discussed the report over a meal at a Hunan restaurant near the company. From the perspective of a reader, Zheng Wenbo proposed several revisions to make the expressions clearer and the case studies more prominent.

events.name: Finalize and complete the promotion materials
events.description: After returning home, Feng Haoran focused on revising his performance review materials by incorporating the directional suggestions Qian Yongqiang had provided via WeChat in the morning, along with the detailed feedback from Zheng Wenbo. He placed particular emphasis on strengthening the logical connection between his past achievements and his future plans after promotion, making the entire document more persuasive. This process ultimately resulted in the finalized version ready for submission.

events.name: Develop a Monthly Running Training Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei met at a café at the foot of Yuelu Mountain. They opened the calendar and running app data on their phones and, based on the overall goal of "completing 100 kilometers in one month," combined with their respective work intensity (Feng Haoran might be busier at the end of the quarter) and physical fitness levels, jointly discussed and formulated a detailed weekly training plan. This plan clearly outlined mileage distribution, joint training times, and rest days.

events.name: Selecting Smart Home Devices
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran carefully researched smart air purifiers and smart light bulbs on an e-commerce platform. He focused on the products' noise control, energy consumption ratings, compatibility with the Mi Home or Huawei Smart Home platforms, and user reviews. After comparing options, he finally placed an order for a Xiaomi air purifier that supports remote control via an app and automatic mode, as well as a set of Yeelight smart color-changing light bulbs.

events.name: Brief call with family
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran made a brief video call to his mother Li Xiuying, inquiring about his parents' weekend routine and reminding them of his father's upcoming birthday, mentioning that he was preparing a surprise.

events.name: Adjusting Exercise Due to Muscle Soreness
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran felt slight soreness in his calf muscles from running the previous day and decided to cancel his morning jog, opting instead for a light walk in the afternoon to promote recovery, demonstrating a cautious approach toward injury management.

起始状态.心情: Relax, looking forward to handling some planning and social matters, but feeling slightly unwell.

结束状态.心情: Everything is proceeding in an orderly manner, with all plans advancing as scheduled. We are well-prepared for the upcoming new week, and the soreness has subsided.

state.今日运动: Morning run canceled (Sunday rest day), light afternoon walk of 3 kilometers.

2025-03.daily_overview: At the start of the new workweek, Feng Haoran deeply integrated his reading insights with professional reflections. He thoroughly contemplated the concept of the "circle of competence" and resolved to internalize it as a guiding principle for his services. Concurrently, campsite selection, final polishing of reports, and the initiation of morning runs according to a new plan collectively shaped a highly efficient and disciplined day, though the evening was slightly busier due to unexpected work emails.

events.name: Reflect on and internalize the concept of the 'circle of competence'
events.description: During his commute, Feng Haoran continued to ponder the concept of the "circle of competence" from the book *Cycles, Value, and Human Nature*. By analyzing his client base (primarily entrepreneurs and high-net-worth individuals) and his expertise in the technology and consumer sectors, he clarified his strengths and boundaries as an advisor. He decided to place greater emphasis on "staying within the circle of competence" in his future services, avoiding advice beyond his own scope of understanding, and recorded these reflections in his phone's memo app.

events.name: Selecting Spring Camping Sites
events.description: Utilizing fragmented time during lunch breaks and evenings, Feng Haoran searched for campsites suitable for spring in Hunan and its surrounding areas on outdoor forums and apps. He focused on well-established campsites that were easily accessible (within a 3-4 hour drive), offered scenic views, and had certain infrastructure facilities. After an initial screening, he narrowed down the options to 3-5 locations, including Zhangjiajie, Liuyang Dawei Mountain, and Chenzhou Dongjiang Lake.

events.name: Final Polishing of the Performance Report
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran was in his study making final refinements to his debriefing report. He focused on verifying the accuracy of all cited data, ensuring the logical flow was rigorous, and optimized the presentation of certain cases to make them more concise and impactful, guaranteeing that this critical document was impeccable in both professionalism and detail.

events.name: First Training Session of the New Running Plan
events.description: At 6:45 a.m., Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei met on South Yuelu Road according to the new plan and conducted their first formal training session. They completed 5 kilometers at a moderate-to-slow pace, with the primary goals of activating their bodies, adapting to the new training rhythm, and briefly exchanging feedback on physical sensations after the run to prepare for subsequent intensity adjustments.

events.name: Handling Work Emails and Customer Inquiries
events.description: As an investment advisor, Feng Haoran handled daily consultation emails from multiple clients during the day and had a brief discussion with his colleague Zheng Wenbo regarding recent market fluctuations, preparing for the busy period at the end of the quarter.

events.name: Received an urgent consultation from a client at short notice.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran received an urgent email from his client Lin Zhihao, inquiring about the impact of changes in real estate policies. He quickly consulted relevant materials and provided a preliminary analysis in his reply, which resulted in him going to bed slightly later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Stay focused and goal-oriented, ready to embrace the workweek.

结束状态.心情: Enriched, with tangible progress made in both professional reflection and personal planning, though feeling slightly pressured due to temporary work.

state.今日运动: Completed a 5-kilometer morning run with Gao Yunfei, finishing the first day's task of the training plan.

2025-03.daily_overview: This day marked a crucial step in career advancement. Feng Haoran formally submitted his promotion application and promptly received a positive response from his supervisor. The entire day's work revolved around preparing for the quarter-end reports, which was intense yet well-directed. However, the afternoon saw a slight overindulgence in food due to a gathering with colleagues.

events.name: Formally Submit Promotion Self-Assessment Materials
events.description: Upon arriving at the office in the morning, Feng Haoran formally submitted the final version of his promotion review materials to his direct supervisor, Qian Yongqiang, through the company's internal OA system. After submission, he specifically left a message for Mr. Qian on the corporate WeChat platform, briefly noting that the materials had been submitted and respectfully requesting to schedule a follow-up review presentation or interview.

events.name: Confirmation of Performance Review Interview Appointment Received
events.description: In the afternoon, Qian Yongqiang replied to Feng Haoran's message, affirming the efficiency of his submitted materials and confirming that a one-on-one performance review discussion would be scheduled within the week. Upon receiving the notification, Feng Haoran breathed a sigh of relief and began mentally rehearsing the questions he might be asked, preparing for the interview.

events.name: Commence preparation of the quarterly strategy report.
events.description: As the first quarter draws to a close, the department needs to produce a quarterly investment strategy review and outlook report. Feng Haoran's main task during the day is to collect and organize recent macroeconomic data (GDP, CPI, PMI) as well as performance data from major markets, laying the groundwork for the report.

events.name: Maintaining Rhythm During a Solo Morning Run
events.description: In the morning, due to Gao Yunfei's unexpected business, Feng Haoran completed a 6-kilometer jog along the Xiangjiang Scenic Belt alone. He used the running time to organize his work thoughts for the day and enjoyed a moment of solitary tranquility.

events.name: Smart home devices delivered
events.description: When Feng Haoran returned home from work, he received the smart air purifier and light bulbs he had ordered the previous day. He placed the boxes in the living room, planning to install them over the weekend.

events.name: Celebrate the submission of the application with colleagues over a meal.
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran and Zheng Wenbo had a gathering at a Hunan cuisine restaurant to relax a bit. The slightly excessive food intake might lead to a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: With a hint of nervousness and anticipation, the key materials are about to be submitted.

结束状态.心情: Feeling relieved and greatly encouraged, my career development has entered a new stage, and I am more confident in facing the upcoming challenges, though I feel slightly full after the meal.

state.今日运动: Ran 6 kilometers alone in the morning to maintain training continuity.

2025-03.daily_overview: The day was filled with inspiring exchanges. A call with a photography partner opened up a new world of night photography for Feng Haoran; a lunch discussion with colleagues deepened his insights from reading; and ordering a birthday gift for his father in advance set the stage for family warmth. The boundaries between work and personal interests became blurred yet creatively enriched throughout the day, though the evening was slightly extended due to late-night studying.

events.name: Complete reading notes and summary
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran finished reading the final chapter of "Cycles, Value, and Human Nature." He closed the book and spent half an hour organizing several pages of reading notes, clearly summarizing the core insights that inspired him (such as market sentiment cycles and the circle of competence), as well as the parts he viewed critically (such as overly idealized case studies), thereby forming a systematic outcome of his reading reflections.

events.name: Photography Partners Spark Interest in Night Scenes
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran held his monthly routine video call with Xu Jianing, his photography partner in Shenzhen. Xu Jianing excitedly shared her recent series of Shenzhen city nightscape photographs, providing detailed explanations on technical aspects such as long exposure and light trails from vehicle traffic, as well as her insights on composition. Feng Haoran was deeply captivated by this form of light and shadow art, which differed greatly from daytime photography. Xu Jianing also encouraged him to try capturing the nightscape of the Xiang River in Changsha.

events.name: Sharing Reading Gains with Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran and his colleague Zheng Wenbo had a meal at the "Yi Zhan Deng" Hunan restaurant near the company. He proactively shared his recent reading of "Cycles, Value, and Human Nature," particularly the book's analysis of investor psychological biases (overconfidence, loss aversion). The two engaged in a lively discussion on how to integrate these insights from behavioral finance into practical client communication and investment advice.

events.name: Ordering a birthday gift and cake for father
events.description: During his lunch break, Feng Haoran browsed online to select a gift for his father's sixtieth birthday. He was well aware that his father disliked extravagance but valued practicality and sentimental significance, ultimately settling on a high-quality wristwatch. Meanwhile, he ordered a birthday cake decorated with railway-themed elements from a time-honored bakery in Wuhan and scheduled delivery for the day of the celebration.

events.name: Regular Wednesday Team Practice
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei conducted their scheduled Wednesday joint training session on Yuelu Mountain as planned. The two jogged along the familiar route, naturally exchanging updates on their recent work and sharing their running experiences along the way. They motivated each other and completed a total of 6 kilometers.

events.name: Received notice of increased workload pressure at the end of the quarter.
events.description: During the afternoon department weekly meeting, supervisor Qian Yongqiang emphasized the various year-end tasks and report submission deadlines for the first quarter. Feng Haoran realized that overtime work over the next two weeks would be unavoidable, which conflicted with his originally planned full-day CFA review sessions on the weekend. He began contemplating adjustments to his schedule.

events.name: In-depth study of photography techniques in the evening.
events.description: Inspired by the daytime, Feng Haoran studied online tutorials on night photography until late at night, which led to a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, looking forward to concluding today's reading and engaging in social interactions.

结束状态.心情: Deeply inspired and mentally active, he felt excited about both new directions in photography and investment philosophy, yet also had a premonition of the upcoming high-pressure work period. After studying, he felt somewhat fatigued.

state.今日运动: Joint 6-kilometer training session with Gao Yunfei at Yuelu Mountain.

2025-03.daily_overview: Inspired by the previous day, Feng Haoran proactively began building his knowledge base in night photography. Meanwhile, the workload pressure at the end of the quarter officially emerged, with the task of writing in-depth investment reports occupying the majority of his daytime energy. His personal time was significantly reduced, leading to the cancellation of his morning runs due to fatigue.

events.name: Preliminary Study of Night Photography Techniques
events.description: After returning home from working overtime in the evening, Feng Haoran did not rest immediately. Driven by his newfound passion, he searched for introductory tutorials on night photography on Bilibili and photography forums. He focused on learning the principles of combining the three key camera settings (aperture, shutter speed, and ISO) in low-light conditions, the use of a tripod, and basic post-processing noise reduction techniques. He also took brief electronic notes.

events.name: Writing an Investment Analysis Report on Technology Stocks
events.description: Engrossed in drafting the quarterly report all day. Feng Haoran was responsible for analyzing the technology stock sector. He collected first-quarter financial data and research perspectives on leading A-share and Hong Kong-listed technology companies via the Wind terminal, integrating current industrial policies to draft an initial in-depth analysis report on investment opportunities in "AI computing power," working until 9 p.m.

events.name: Adjust the CFA Exam Preparation Strategy
events.description: Realizing that it would be difficult to secure uninterrupted study time over the next two weeks, Feng Haoran drafted a new exam preparation strategy in his phone's memo app during his commute: he decided to give up full-day weekend study sessions and instead listen to course audio during his commute, complete 30–45 minutes of practice problems on weekday evenings, and use fragmented time on weekends to tackle key chapters.

events.name: Canceling morning run due to fatigue.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran, feeling fatigued from studying and working the previous night, decided to cancel his morning run to conserve energy for the demanding work ahead. This marked the first time this month that he completely abandoned exercise due to exhaustion.

events.name: Confirming Father's Birthday Arrangements with Sister
events.description: Before going to bed, I chatted with my younger sister Feng Xinran on WeChat. We synchronized the details of the gifts and cake prepared for our father, confirmed her train schedule from Shanghai to Wuhan, and jointly refined the details of the birthday surprise.

events.name: Temporarily handling urgent customer inquiries
events.description: In the afternoon, client Huang Siqi sent an urgent email inquiring about the regulatory dynamics of technology stocks. Feng Haoran responded promptly and provided preliminary analysis, which increased the workload pressure.

起始状态.心情: Awake, yet already feeling the pressure of work approaching, with a slight sense of physical fatigue.

结束状态.心情: Fatigued yet with a sense of accomplishment (having completed the first draft of the report), while also feeling curious about newly acquired photography knowledge, with a growing sense of pressure.

state.今日运动: No formal exercise; morning run canceled due to fatigue.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday is a day of efficient sprinting before the weekend. Feng Haoran, like a project manager, simultaneously advances multiple tasks: preparing for personal income tax settlement, organizing client meetings, planning weekend photography practice, and even spontaneously starting balcony gardening. The preparations for work and life intertwine, fully setting the stage for the upcoming weekend, but the evening was extended due to an impromptu gathering with friends.

events.name: Organize materials for the annual individual income tax reconciliation
events.description: Before heading to work, Feng Haoran quickly organized the materials needed for the annual individual income tax settlement in his study. He printed the annual income certificate issued by his company, located the electronic invoice for his CFA course fees, and checked whether the information for special additional deductions such as mortgage interest was complete. He then placed all the documents in a folder for future use.

events.name: Preparing for Night Photography Practice
events.description: Encouraged by Xu Jianing, Feng Haoran decided to try night photography over the weekend. After work, he checked the condition of his camera and lenses, cleaned the CMOS sensor, ensured the battery was fully charged, and retrieved the tripod and shutter release cable that had been unused for a long time. He tentatively chose a location near the Du Fu Pavilion along the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt for the shoot.

events.name: Prepare for the Quarterly Investment Strategy Seminar
events.description: As one of the keynote speakers for the department's quarterly seminar next week, Feng Haoran spent the entire day refining his PowerPoint presentation. Drawing on the completed technology stock report, he drafted a detailed meeting agenda and specifically prepared extended reading materials on "Hard Tech Investment Integrated with ESG" for topics that might interest Huang Siqi, a client with a technology background.

events.name: Buying Strawberry Potted Plants Initiates "Micro-Investment"
events.description: During his lunch break, Feng Haoran passed by the flower market downstairs from his company and, on a whim, purchased a pot of strawberry seedlings along with some nutrient-rich soil. After returning home, he selected the sunniest spot on his balcony for the plant, completed the repotting, and watered it. He regarded this as a form of relaxation and an "investment in the growth of life," then took a photo and sent it to his mother, who enjoys gardening.

events.name: Friday Relaxation Run with Running Buddies
events.description: In the morning, I went for a 5-kilometer relaxed run with Gao Yunfei, without focusing on pace. The main goals were to get the body moving and exchange thoughts about the week, while conserving energy for a potential long-distance training session over the weekend.

events.name: Late return from an impromptu gathering with friends
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran received an invitation from his friend Peng Yuqing to attend a small gathering. He chatted with friends at a café until quite late, which helped him relax but also led to a later bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, the arrival of Friday signifies a sprint and transition.

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment from being fully prepared, looking forward to the weekend's photography practice and family activities, and feeling slightly relaxed after the gathering.

state.今日运动: Run 5 kilometers at a relaxed pace with Gao Yunfei.
