2025-03.daily_overview: A fruitful weekend. Feng Haoran efficiently handled multiple tasks spanning finance, social engagements, and personal interests: he successfully completed his personal income tax refund application; finalized detailed itineraries with camping companions; completed a long-distance training run with fellow runners, significantly advancing his challenge event progress. More importantly, he successfully conducted his first night photography practice and personally upgraded his home smart environment, though he stayed up late due to the photography session.

events.name: Finalize the camping itinerary
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran compiled the selected campsite information into a comparison table and sent it to Xie Yutong. After an in-depth discussion via video call, the two, considering their preferences for natural scenery and hiking experiences, ultimately agreed on a well-equipped campsite near Zhangjiajie National Forest Park. They officially finalized the travel dates as April 12th to 13th.

events.name: Complete the annual individual income tax reconciliation and settlement.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran opened the "Individual Income Tax" app in his study, carefully verified the pre-filled salary and wage data in the system, and supplemented the declaration for the special additional deduction for continuing education. The system automatically calculated and showed a tax refund of approximately 1,200 yuan. After repeatedly checking and confirming the details, he submitted the declaration.

events.name: First Night Photography Practice Session
events.description: At 8 p.m., Feng Haoran arrived at the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt with his camera bag and tripod. Near the Du Fu Pavilion, he spent nearly two hours experimenting with different combinations of exposure parameters (such as shutter speeds ranging from 1 second to 15 seconds) to capture reflections on the river, the city skyline, and light trails from passing vehicles. Although many shots were discarded during the process, he ultimately succeeded in capturing several photographs with satisfying layers of light and shadow.

events.name: Weekend Long-Distance Joint Training
events.description: On Saturday morning, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei arranged a key training session for the upcoming challenge competition. Starting from the south gate of Yuelu Mountain, they jogged along the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt to Orange Isle and then returned, covering a total distance of approximately 15 kilometers. This not only significantly increased the team’s overall mileage but also effectively enhanced their endurance.

events.name: Install and Set Up Smart Home
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran installed the newly arrived smart devices. He placed the air purifier in the corner of the living room and replaced the main lights in the study and living room with smart bulbs. He then downloaded the corresponding app, successfully connected the devices to the home Wi-Fi, and set up scenarios such as "automatically turning on the purifier upon returning home" and "reading light mode."

events.name: Staying up late due to photography practice
events.description: Night photography continued until late, and after returning home, Feng Haoran processed the photos until late into the night, resulting in a significantly delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Eager to give it a try, the weekend's free time allows him to freely arrange multiple activities of interest.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet immensely fulfilled and excited, successful tax refund, breakthrough in running, initial attempts at photography, and home upgrades—each has brought tangible achievements, though a slight fatigue lingers from staying up late.

state.今日运动: Running 15 kilometers along the riverbank with Gao Yunfei is a significant test of endurance.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday's theme was deep communication and emotional connection. Feng Haoran honed his skills with his photography partner, had a heartwarming online "tea party" with his parents, and immersed himself in the convenience brought by smart home upgrades in the evening. This served as a perfect emotional recharge and technological relaxation before the high-pressure workweek began, though he woke up slightly later in the morning due to staying up late the previous night.

events.name: Discuss post-processing techniques with photography partners.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran imported several raw photos taken the previous night into his computer and performed preliminary adjustments to the tone and contrast using Lightroom. He then sent the before-and-after comparison images to Xu Jianing for feedback. Xu Jianing responded promptly, affirming his efforts and offering specific advice for one of the river scene photos: "Lower the highlights and brighten the shadows to enhance the details."

events.name: Weekend Family Video Tea Party
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran specially prepared his collection of Yirgacheffe coffee beans and meticulously brewed two cups of pour-over coffee. He invited his parents for a video call, and the three of them held their respective beverages (his parents had tea) as if they were gathering in person. Feng Haoran shared amusing stories about preparing birthday surprises for his father and recent updates from Changsha. His mother, concerned about his work stress, remotely guided him through the cooking technique of "pork rib and lotus root soup," which he had long wanted to learn. The call lasted over an hour, filled with laughter and cheerful conversations.

events.name: Deep Experience of Smart Home
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran leaned back comfortably in his study, reading under the new smart lighting. He casually adjusted the color temperature and brightness of the lights through a mobile app, settling on the "warm yellow light" most suitable for reading. The air purifier in the living room operated quietly on its own, with the app showing that indoor PM2.5 levels consistently remained in the single digits. He was very satisfied with the improvement in quality of life brought about by this upgrade.

events.name: Develop a Night Photography Learning Plan
events.description: Inspired by his first practice session and the guidance of Xu Jianing, Feng Haoran briefly outlined a systematic improvement plan for night photography spanning several months before going to bed. The plan is roughly divided into three stages: theoretical study, technical practice, and thematic creation. He decided to steadily advance the plan in his spare time.

events.name: Light Activities on Rest Days
events.description: Considering the long-distance run from the previous day and staying up late, Feng Haoran did not schedule any strenuous exercise on Sunday. He only walked approximately 3 kilometers while shopping for daily necessities at the supermarket in the afternoon, treating it as active recovery.

events.name: Adjusting wake-up time due to late sleep
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran, having stayed up late the previous night for photography, postponed his wake-up time to 8 o'clock to make up for sleep.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and warm, looking forward to connecting with family and friends, but feeling slightly physically fatigued.

结束状态.心情: With a heart full of contentment, emotional support from family, and affirmation of interests from companions, there is an added sense of composure toward the upcoming challenge week, and fatigue has been somewhat alleviated.

2025-03.daily_overview: The anticipated surge in work pressure arrived as expected by the end of the first quarter. This week began with intense overtime and frequent client communications. Feng Haoran promptly adjusted his strategy, demonstrating not only flexibility in handling tasks but also proactively modifying his exercise and study plans, showcasing the adaptability and execution capabilities typical of an ENTJ under pressure. However, his food intake slightly increased throughout the day due to stress.

events.name: Addressing the Peak of Customer Inquiries at the End of the Quarter
events.description: On Monday morning, Feng Haoran's email and WeChat were flooded with inquiries from multiple high-net-worth clients, primarily focusing on the first-quarter market review and second-quarter allocation adjustments. He and Zheng Wenbo quickly divided the tasks: Feng Haoran took charge of responding to complex inquiries from key clients such as Lin Zhihao and began drafting relevant analysis reports, instantly ramping up the work pace.

events.name: Plan a camping road trip route
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran quickly checked the route from Changsha to the Zhangjiajie campsite using a mobile navigation app. He estimated the driving time to be approximately four hours and briefly noted the main gas stations and service areas along the way, creating a rough itinerary. He planned to refine it further over the weekend.

events.name: Formally implement the "divide and conquer" exam preparation strategy.
events.description: Faced with the impossibility of having a solid block of study time, Feng Haoran began implementing a new strategy today: during his 45-minute commute to work, he listened to an audio explanation of a CFA chapter with headphones on; after returning home from working overtime in the evening, even though it was nearly 10 p.m., he still forced himself to complete 30 practice questions from the lesson.

events.name: Exercise plan impacted by work for the first time.
events.description: When the morning alarm rang, Feng Haoran felt an unprecedented exhaustion, having worked overtime until nearly 10 p.m. the previous night. After a brief struggle, he reluctantly canceled his morning run with Gao Yunfei. This was the first time this month that he had completely abandoned exercise due to work, making him realize the impact of high-pressure periods on his habits.

events.name: Negotiate with running partners to adjust exercise modes.
events.description: After recognizing the issue, Feng Haoran proactively contacted Gao Yunfei and candidly explained the recent work pressure. Following discussion, the two decided to adjust their originally fixed schedule of three morning runs per week to a more flexible model of "at least two runs, aiming for three." They agreed to confirm whether to run the next day the night before, thereby increasing flexibility in their arrangements.

events.name: Sharing Smart Home Experiences with Colleagues
events.description: During lunch, Feng Haoran and Zheng Wenbo discussed upgrading smart home devices over the weekend, sharing experiences on product selection and the convenience of remote control. Zheng Wenbo showed interest, so Feng Haoran recommended several cost-effective products. The two agreed to visit Feng Haoran’s home for a hands-on experience when they had time.

events.name: Work overtime to refine the customer analysis report.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran continued refining the quarterly asset allocation adjustment report for his client Lin Zhihao in the office, integrating the latest market data. He worked until 9:30 p.m. before leaving the company.

events.name: Increased snack intake due to stress
events.description: During the afternoon work, Feng Haoran unconsciously consumed some high-sugar snacks due to stress, which may lead to a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Tired and slightly stressed, anticipating the arduous tasks of this week.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted, yet mentally accepting reality and having found coping strategies, there is a sense of stability that "despite the difficulty, it remains under control," though with a slight feeling of guilt after eating.

2025-03.daily_overview: Amid the sound of rain, Feng Haoran faced an even more demanding workday. He devoted the entire day to drafting and revising a core report and held a crucial video conference with a client. To compensate for the lack of physical activity and address the fatigue from prolonged sitting, he began incorporating strength training into his evening routine—a significant adjustment to his health management approach—though he ended up working late into the night.

events.name: Deep Learning in Night Scene Composition
events.description: During a brief evening break, Feng Haoran chose not to continue working but instead switched gears by reading articles on night photography composition in a photography forum. He learned how to use leading lines, foreground elements, and layers of light to create depth in photographs and saved several outstanding example photos for reference.

events.name: Focus on writing and revising investment reports
events.description: I was practically glued to my desk all day. In the morning, I completed the main sections of the investment analysis report on technology stocks, and in the afternoon, I began preparing the quarterly outlook for the bond market. While cross-checking the report with Zheng Wenbo, we had a productive debate over the interpretation of several data points. In the evening, Qian Yongqiang reviewed the report and provided key revision suggestions. Based on his feedback, Feng Haoran worked on revisions until 10 p.m. before finalizing the draft.

events.name: Video conference with high-net-worth client Huang Siqi
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran held a one-hour video conference with Huang Siqi, a client based in Shenzhen, providing a detailed report on the quarterly adjustment plan tailored for the client's technology-themed assets. He also professionally addressed in-depth questions regarding recent industry regulatory risks, earning the client's preliminary approval.

events.name: Rain Adaptation Running
events.description: In the morning, despite the light rain, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei, adhering to their "minimum commitment" agreement, completed a 5-kilometer jog in the park near their residential area while wearing their newly purchased waterproof running jackets. The damp environment and slippery road surfaces posed a minor test of both their focus and equipment.

events.name: Initiate evening core strength training.
events.description: After returning home from working overtime in the evening, to compensate for the potential reduction in aerobic exercise and alleviate the stiffness in his lower back and waist caused by prolonged sitting, Feng Haoran laid out a yoga mat in the living room and began his first 20-minute core workout (including planks, crunches, glute bridges, etc.) following a fitness app. Although it was challenging, the sense of relief after completing the session made him decide to incorporate it as a regular routine, two to three times a week.

events.name: Working late into the night to process reports.
events.description: After revising the report, Feng Haoran still had to handle some follow-up tasks, which led to him going to bed very late.

起始状态.心情: Stay focused and get ready for another intense reporting day.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted on two fronts (mentally and from the first strength training session), yet mentally grounded from completing the key report and client meeting, and feeling positive about the new health management attempt, though slightly drained from staying up late.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 5 kilometers (in the rain) + 20-minute evening core strength training.

2025-03.daily_overview: This was a day that demonstrated leadership and professional depth. Feng Haoran not only successfully chaired the department's quarterly seminar, guiding high-quality team discussions, but also efficiently advanced the detailed preparations for the camping trip. Despite the heavy workload, he maintained physical and mental balance through exercise, though his mood fluctuated slightly in the afternoon due to work pressure.

events.name: Host the department's quarterly investment strategy seminar
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran chaired the Investment Advisory Department's first-quarter review and outlook meeting at the Huatai Securities Changsha Branch conference room. Using a meticulously prepared PowerPoint presentation, he guided the discussion, reviewed market performance, analyzed the successes and shortcomings of strategies, and facilitated a brainstorming session focused on opportunities in sectors such as technology and consumer goods for the second quarter. The meeting specifically explored the feasibility of designing a technology-themed investment plan for Huang Siqi, with a lively and engaging atmosphere.

events.name: Collaboratively develop an equipment checklist with camping partners.
events.description: During the intervals between meetings and lunch breaks, Feng Haoran and Xie Yutong collaborated through an online collaborative document to draft a comprehensive camping equipment checklist, covering everything from tents and sleeping bags to cooking utensils, photography gear, and first-aid supplies. They divided the tasks clearly, each responsible for inspecting and preparing a portion of the items.

events.name: Deeply Learn Stability Techniques for Night Photography
events.description: In the evening, to ensure greater success in the next shoot, Feng Haoran focused on learning the key techniques for maintaining image clarity in night photography: stable tripod setup, the use of a shutter release cable, and the mirror lock-up function. He watched videos of professional photographers demonstrating practical techniques for stabilizing tripods in windy conditions.

events.name: Wednesday Minimum Joint Training and Strategy Optimization
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei completed their second and "baseline" joint morning run training session of the week. Based on data from previous sessions, they consciously attempted to adjust their breathing rhythm and cadence during the run to find a more efficient and less strenuous running technique.

events.name: Final Approval of Overtime Processing Report and Customer Inquiries
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, Feng Haoran submitted the finalized versions of two core reports to Qian Yongqiang for final approval and addressed scattered inquiries from several other clients. Although the seminar had concluded, the follow-up work remained busy.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work pressure
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran was mildly criticized by his supervisor for a data error, which left him feeling somewhat down, but he quickly adjusted, demonstrating the resilience characteristic of an ENTJ.

起始状态.心情: With a sense of responsibility as a host and a touch of excitement, ready to embrace the highlight moment of work.

结束状态.心情: The sense of achievement is significant, the meeting was chaired smoothly, and team collaboration was highly efficient. Meanwhile, the progress of the camping plan has filled people with anticipation for future leisure activities, though emotional fluctuations have since subsided into calmness.

state.今日运动: Ran 6 kilometers with Gao Yunfei in the morning, focusing on technical adjustments.

2025-03.daily_overview: As the work entered its final wrap-up and organization phase, Feng Haoran began systematically compiling the business summary for the first quarter. In terms of personal interests, he developed a more detailed plan for his second night photography session. The new model of exercise and health management (morning runs + evening strength training) gradually stabilized after several days of practice, though the evening sessions were occasionally delayed due to late-night studying.

events.name: Formulate a Detailed Plan for the Second Night Scene Shooting
events.description: Based on the experience and lessons learned from his first practice, Feng Haoran developed a detailed plan for his second night photography session: the location was selected on the opposite bank of the Young Mao Zedong Art Sculpture at Orange Isle; the equipment list was clearly defined (camera, wide-angle lens, sturdy tripod, spare batteries); and two sets of reference exposure parameters were preset for static architecture and dynamic cruise ships.

events.name: Organize the first quarter business summary materials
events.description: In accordance with company requirements, Feng Haoran began compiling the first-quarter work summary for himself and the clients under his responsibility. He exported relevant performance data, aggregated customer service records, and held a brief meeting with Zheng Wenbo and the remote participant Sun Xiaoya to synchronize information and integrate team achievements. Qian Yongqiang provided a summary template, based on which Feng Haoran started drafting the report and creating the presentation slides.

events.name: Informal Exchange of Market Views with Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran, Zheng Wenbo, and Sun Xiaoya, who joined via video call, engaged in an informal discussion over their meal about the impact of recent loosening real estate policies on the market. Such relaxed exchanges often yield more vivid insights than formal reports.

events.name: Integrate the outcomes of the seminar and distribute the minutes
events.description: Feng Haoran compiled the discussion outcomes from the previous day's quarterly seminar into clear meeting minutes, documenting the consensus reached, unresolved issues, and the preliminary direction for technology-themed investments regarding Huang Siqi's client. He distributed the minutes to all participating colleagues as a basis for follow-up actions.

events.name: Stably implement the new exercise regimen
events.description: In the morning, Gao Yunfei completed the third morning run of the week (an additional session "secured" through effort). In the evening, despite working late, he persisted in completing a 20-minute core strength training session. He feels that this combination of "morning cardio runs + evening strength training" better aligns with his work rhythm and effectively helps relieve stress.

events.name: Studied CFA until somewhat late in the evening.
events.description: In preparation for the exam, Feng Haoran studied CFA courses late into the night, which delayed his bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Steady, entering the work wrap-up phase, with clear objectives.

结束状态.心情: Methodical and summarizing tasks bring a sense of clarity after organization, while the steady execution of exercise routines instills confidence in bodily control, leaving a subtle feeling of fulfillment after learning.

2025-03.daily_overview: The high-pressure work period at the end of the quarter officially concluded on this day. Feng Haoran successfully completed the departmental report and, after work, carried out a second, more refined nighttime photography practice. In the evening, he boarded the high-speed train back to Wuhan to prepare for an important family occasion the following day. His mood shifted from the tension of work to the warm anticipation of reunion, though he stayed up late due to photography and travel.

events.name: Conduct the second night photography practice session.
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran went directly to the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt on the opposite bank of Orange Isle with his equipment. Thanks to meticulous planning, he quickly found a spot and set up his tripod. Applying newly learned techniques, he used a lower ISO and a smaller aperture, experimenting with various exposure times. He successfully captured several high-quality photos that harmoniously featured the sculpture, city lights, and reflections on the river surface, achieving a much higher success rate than his first attempt.

events.name: Complete the department's quarterly summary report.
events.description: On Friday morning, during the department's quarterly review meeting, Feng Haoran presented his work achievements for the first quarter, shared insights from market analysis, and outlined key customer service plans for the upcoming quarter to Qian Yongqiang and all colleagues. The presentation received positive feedback, bringing a successful conclusion to this busy quarter.

events.name: Check and supplement camping equipment
events.description: Before departing for Wuhan, Feng Haoran took some time to inventory his camping gear and discovered that the gas canister for his portable stove was nearly empty. He promptly placed an online order to restock, specifying the delivery time to ensure it would not affect his trip next month.

events.name: Summarize and Establish a New Movement Pattern
events.description: Reflecting on the adjustments made to his exercise routine under high pressure this week, Feng Haoran believes that the combination of "flexible morning runs + evening strength training" is effective and sustainable. He has decided to formally incorporate this model into his long-term health management plan to cope with potential periodic busy work periods in the future.

events.name: Return to Wuhan by high-speed rail
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran took the last high-speed train from Changsha back to Wuhan. On the train, he sorted through and briefly processed the night scene photos he had taken in the afternoon, selecting the most satisfactory ones for subsequent detailed post-processing.

events.name: Final Confirmation of Birthday Party Preparations
events.description: On the high-speed train, Feng Haoran reconfirmed with the manager of the Wuhan restaurant over the phone regarding the arrangements for the private room, the sequence of dishes for the next day, and ensured that the cake would be delivered on time. His younger sister, Feng Xinran, also sent a message informing him that she had safely arrived home in Wuhan.

events.name: Late nights due to travel and filming.
events.description: After arriving in Wuhan, Feng Haoran processed photos and prepared for the birthday party until late, which caused him to go to bed later than usual.

起始状态.心情: The ease of wrapping up work intertwines with the anticipation for the night shoot.

结束状态.心情: The joy of photographic success coexists with the warmth of returning home, while the fatigue from quarterly work is alleviated by the anticipation of family, though a slight weariness lingers after staying up late.

state.今日运动: There was no dedicated exercise during the day, but I walked for about two hours carrying photography equipment to take pictures.

2025-03.daily_overview: This was a day filled with warmth and a strong sense of family responsibility. Feng Haoran, together with his sister, meticulously planned their father’s sixtieth birthday celebration, which turned out to be a tremendous success. Deep familial affection and years of gratitude flowed amidst laughter and joy. At the same time, he also received a notification confirming the deposit of his personal income tax refund, adding a touch of financial delight to this already perfect day. The entire day was centered around family activities, with exercise routines put on hold.

events.name: Surprise Birthday Banquet for Father's 60th Birthday
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran, his younger sister Feng Xinran, and their mother Li Xiuying arrived early at the reserved private dining room. They greeted their father’s former colleagues, old friends, and relatives as they arrived one after another. When the unsuspecting father, Feng Jianguo, was led into the elaborately decorated room filled with family and friends, his face lit up with surprise and emotion. As the eldest son, Feng Haoran delivered a heartfelt toast, reflecting on how his father’s meticulousness as a railway engineer had influenced his own professional outlook. He then led the entire family in raising their glasses to toast their father, creating a warm and touching scene.

events.name: Received personal income tax refund
events.description: During a break in the banquet, Feng Haoran received a text message from his bank, indicating that a personal income tax refund of approximately 1,200 yuan had been deposited into his account. After verifying the amount, he smiled knowingly, viewing it as a small "red envelope" brought about by national policies. He promptly marked it as "completed" in the financial matters section of his phone's memo.

events.name: Confirm the final itinerary with camping partners.
events.description: Taking advantage of the free time before the birthday banquet began, Feng Haoran and Xie Yutong conducted their final online communication, consolidating all equipment lists, task divisions, and itinerary details. They confirmed the final plan to assemble in Changsha on the morning of April 12 before setting off, marking the successful completion of the camping trip planning phase.

events.name: Family Reunion Tea Time
events.description: After the birthday celebration, having seen off their relatives and friends, the family returned to their home in Wuhan. Gathered in the living room, they brewed a pot of hot tea, shared the cake, and reminisced about the amusing childhood stories of Feng Haoran and his younger sister, as well as discussed their parents' retirement plans. Feng Haoran felt a long-lost, pure sense of family warmth and relaxation.

events.name: Synchronize progress with running partners and encourage each other.
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran checked the running app and saw that the "Yuelu Runners" team had surpassed a cumulative distance of 70 kilometers. He exchanged messages with Gao Yunfei, praising each other for sticking to exercise despite their busy schedules and encouraging one another to push through the final half-month to complete the 100-kilometer challenge.

events.name: Adjusting Daily Routine Due to Family Activities
events.description: Feng Haoran devoted the entire day to family activities and did not engage in formal exercise. His schedule was adjusted according to family arrangements, and his bedtime was slightly later due to the warm and cozy atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation and excitement, mingled with the nervousness of creating a surprise for the family.

结束状态.心情: Happy, content, and filled with inner strength. The deep emotional connection within his family has infused him with immense energy, making him feel more resolute and composed about his future work and personal goals.

state.今日运动: No formal exercise, with the day primarily focused on social walking and family activities.

2025-04.daily_overview: Tuesday's workday was centered around project leadership and proposal integration. Feng Haoran maintained high energy throughout the day, efficiently chairing an online project meeting in the morning to advance work. In the afternoon, while at his regular café, he received an invitation to a weekend event. In the evening, he conducted a preliminary presentation of a key proposal to his supervisor Qian Yongqiang, obtaining valuable feedback. It was a professionally dense day with a tight schedule and intensive communication.

events.name: Preside over the second online meeting of the science and technology themed project.
events.description: In the morning, as the project lead, Feng Haoran convened a video conference with Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya. The two reported on their recent progress regarding data collection and client needs analysis, respectively. Feng Haoran integrated the information from all parties, proposed several adjustments to the preliminary asset allocation framework, and assigned specific tasks and milestone requirements for the next phase of the integration plan. During the meeting, Zheng Wenbo raised an unexpected data issue, which extended the discussion by 15 minutes.

events.name: Invited to a weekend tasting event at the café.
events.description: After the lunch break, Feng Haoran went to his regular [Xinyi Pour-Over Coffee Shop] near the company. While preparing his pour-over coffee, the owner Shen Xinyi enthusiastically informed him that a small-scale specialty coffee bean tasting event would be held on Saturday afternoon (April 5) and specifically invited this knowledgeable regular customer to attend. Feng Haoran was very interested in the rare beans recommended by Shen and gladly accepted the invitation, confirming the specific time and location. He also tried a newly arrived Ethiopian bean, which had a unique flavor profile.

events.name: Pre-reporting the proposal to Investment Director Qian Yongqiang
events.description: Before leaving work, Feng Haoran submitted the initial draft of the completed presentation and the draft asset allocation recommendations to Investment Director Qian Yongqiang, and conducted a preliminary briefing in his office. After listening carefully, Director Qian provided professional revision suggestions from a higher-level perspective regarding the logical framework and presentation details. Feng Haoran took detailed notes and prepared to refine the materials based on the feedback to ensure the final content meets the high standards required for the upcoming important seminar. After the briefing, Director Qian also chatted briefly about the recent updates of their fellow townspeople from Wuhan.

events.name: Planned a Pilates class but postponed it due to work.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran originally planned to book a Pilates trial class for this week. However, after receiving an urgent email from a client that required immediate attention, he decided to postpone the class to next week and opted for a brief stretching session at home instead.

起始状态.心情: Full of drive and anticipation for the leading project, but with a slight feeling of neck stiffness.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled yet slightly stressed, contemplating how to optimize the reporting plan, and experiencing some fatigue due to unexpected tasks.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Feng Haoran shifted his work focus from project execution to strategic thinking and sharing. He began by systematically reviewing his financial status and fine-tuning his investment strategy. Subsequently, as the keynote speaker in the departmental meeting, he shared professional insights, demonstrating his increasingly refined investment perspective and leadership potential. In the evening, he felt some pressure due to his CFA exam preparation.

events.name: Personal Financial Review and Strategy Adjustment for the First Quarter
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran systematically analyzed the income and expenditure details for March in his study and evaluated the performance of his personal investment portfolio for the first quarter. Drawing insights from recent market changes and discussions with clients, he revisited his risk appetite and long-term goals, concluding that a moderately aggressive approach was necessary. During the process, he discovered an unexpected expense, which left him slightly annoyed.

events.name: Execute investment strategy adjustments
events.description: Based on the review conclusion, Feng Haoran logged into the investment platform to make adjustments: he increased the monthly fixed investment amount in the stock index fund tracking the broader market by 15% to accelerate the accumulation of core assets; simultaneously, he allocated a small amount of funds separately to establish an [Innovative Assets Observation Portfolio], intended for subsequent research and experimental investments in some emerging sectors. During the operation, a brief network delay occurred, causing a slight sense of urgency.

events.name: Update Personal Financial Planning Document
events.description: After completing the operation, Feng Haoran clearly recorded the adjusted investment strategy, the new dollar-cost averaging plan, as well as the purpose of establishing the [Observation Portfolio] and the subsequent tracking methods into his personal financial planning electronic document. This ensures that future execution is based on documented guidelines and facilitates quarterly reviews. He also backed up the document to cloud storage to prevent loss.

events.name: Share Q2 Investment Strategy at Departmental Regular Meeting
events.description: At the afternoon departmental meeting, Feng Haoran, as one of the main speakers, shared his analysis and judgment on the macroeconomic trends and capital market performance for the second quarter with team members such as Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya. Using a prepared analytical framework, he focused on explaining the potential structural opportunities in the technology and consumer sectors and presented a preliminary draft of asset allocation recommendations tailored to clients with different risk preferences. His presentation sparked a lively discussion among the team, and his supervisor Qian Yongqiang cast an approving glance. However, Sun Xiaoya raised a pointed question, prompting him to make some on-the-spot adjustments to parts of his content.

events.name: Staying up late due to anxiety over CFA exam preparation.
events.description: While reviewing the CFA materials in the evening, Feng Haoran felt confused about the equity investment module, which heightened his anxiety. He decided to stay up an extra hour to study, resulting in a delay in his sleep schedule.

起始状态.心情: Focused and organized, ready to handle personal financial matters, but the stiffness in the neck persists.

结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement and satisfaction intertwine, bringing excitement from the recognition gained through professional sharing, yet the pressure of exam preparation brings slight restlessness.

2025-04.daily_overview: Thursday's workday was imbued with a sense of transition. In the morning, Feng Haoran efficiently advanced projects in Changsha and engaged in brief social interactions. In the afternoon, he embarked on his journey home, taking a high-speed train back to Wuhan to reunite with his family for the Qingming Festival holiday. The schedule smoothly shifted from the intense pace of work to the eve of a warm family gathering, though a slight delay of the high-speed train left him feeling somewhat fatigued.

events.name: The Third Meeting of the Virtual Project Team and the Formation of a Preliminary Plan
events.description: In the morning, the virtual team for technology-themed asset allocation held its third meeting, where they summarized and conducted in-depth discussions on their respective research findings. Feng Haoran integrated the industry data provided by Zheng Wenbo with the refined customer demand profiles developed by Sun Xiaoya, forming a preliminary framework for the technology-themed asset allocation plan. Together, they also determined the core content and timeline for the upcoming mid-term presentation to the client. During the meeting, Sun Xiaoya experienced a brief disconnection due to network issues, which temporarily interrupted the discussion.

events.name: Discussing market views with fellow runners during morning jogs
events.description: During their routine morning run on Wednesday, Feng Haoran jogged alongside his running partner Gao Yunfei. He briefly shared the reasoning behind his recent adjustments to personal investment strategies and proactively asked Gao Yunfei, as an IT professional, for his views on technology industry trends and the macroeconomic landscape, intending to use these industry insights as supplementary references for his own research. Gao Yunfei mentioned an emerging tech company, which Feng Haoran noted down for further study.

events.name: Departing for Wuhan to observe the Qingming Festival
events.description: After work in the afternoon, Feng Haoran went directly from his company to Changsha South Station and took the high-speed train in the evening to return to Wuhan. On the smoothly running train, he informed his parents of his estimated arrival time by phone. Approximately one and a half hours later, he arrived at Wuhan Station, where his father, Feng Jianguo, was already waiting outside in the car. The father and son then drove home together. The high-speed train was delayed by 10 minutes due to weather conditions, during which Feng Haoran took a short nap on the train to relieve his fatigue.

events.name: Family Dinner and Casual Conversation
events.description: Upon arriving home, his mother Li Xiuying had prepared a steaming hot dinner. The family of three gathered around the table, chatting as they ate. Feng Haoran shared updates on his recent work progress, while his parents inquired about the details of his life in Changsha. The room was filled with the warmth of a long-awaited reunion. His mother had specially made his favorite spare rib and lotus root soup, and Feng Haoran helped himself to an extra bowl.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision to accompany my father for morning exercise tomorrow.
events.description: After dinner, Feng Haoran offered to accompany his father for a walk in the park tomorrow morning instead of his usual jog, in order to spend more quality time together.

起始状态.心情: Slightly expectant, feeling lighthearted due to the imminent return home, yet with neck discomfort alleviated.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in parents' home in Wuhan
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and warm, enveloped in the comfort of home, feeling slightly full from a bit of overeating.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 5.5 kilometers (with Gao Yunfei, trying a new route with slight slopes), but walked less during the afternoon itinerary.

date_attribute.weather: Wuhan, overcast with occasional drizzle, temperature 15-20°C, consistent with the typical climate during the Qingming Festival.
date_attribute.holiday: Qingming Festival

2025-04.daily_overview: On the day of Qingming Festival, Feng Haoran's main activities revolved around family traditions and reunion. In the morning, he solemnly participated in tomb-sweeping to honor his ancestors; in the afternoon, he returned to the warmth of daily family life, engaging in deep conversations with his parents and enjoying the comfort of familial bonds. Throughout the day, he immersed himself in a strong family atmosphere, with meals being relatively abundant.

events.name: Sweeping the Grave for Grandfather
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran went to the suburban cemetery with his parents to pay respects at his grandfather's grave. They brought flowers and fruits, which they respectfully placed before the tomb and observed a moment of silence. Feng Haoran softly updated his grandfather on his work and life in Changsha over the past year, as if conversing with a wise elder. A light drizzle fell, adding to the atmosphere of remembrance. After the visit, they encountered a distant relative and exchanged brief greetings.

events.name: Family Lunch and In-Depth Communication
events.description: After returning home from the tomb-sweeping visit, mother Li Xiuying prepared a table of hearty Hubei home-style dishes, especially Feng Haoran’s favorite pork rib and lotus root soup. During lunch, the family chatted while eating. Feng Haoran shared his career plans and views on the market in detail, while his parents listened attentively, with his father Feng Jianguo occasionally offering advice from his own experience. Feng Haoran also specifically inquired about his parents’ recent health check-ups and discussed the need to develop a more systematic health management plan for them. The lunch included a fair amount of oily food.

events.name: Handling work matters remotely: Confirming the coffee tasting event arrangements
events.description: During an afternoon nap, Feng Haoran recalled the coffee tasting event scheduled for the weekend. He reviewed the materials sent by Shen Xinyi, familiarizing himself in advance with the characteristics of beans from regions such as Ethiopia and Panama. He also confirmed his itinerary for the following afternoon via WeChat, ensuring a balance between holiday leisure and personal interests. Simultaneously, he received a text message from his colleague Zheng Wenbo, discussing a market data issue.

events.name: Family Leisure Time
events.description: In the remaining hours of the afternoon, Feng Haoran accompanied his father for a walk in the residential complex, listening to his father share updates about their old neighbors. After returning home, he joined his mother in the kitchen to prepare dinner, learning the techniques for pickling Hubei-style fermented vegetables. In the evening, the family gathered in the living room to watch television and chat, savoring the simple yet precious moments of reunion. His father suggested visiting a nearby ancient town the next day, but Feng Haoran politely declined due to his already scheduled itinerary.

events.name: Remotely caring for the strawberry potted plants at home in Changsha
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran checked the strawberry potted plant on the balcony of his home in Changsha through a smart home camera. Seeing that the plant was in good condition, he set an automatic watering reminder for the next day via his phone with peace of mind. He also noticed that one strawberry was almost ripe and planned to taste it after returning to Changsha.

events.name: Mild gastric distension due to overeating
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran felt slight discomfort in his stomach and decided to go to bed early to aid digestion.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in parents' home in Wuhan
起始状态.心情: Calm and solemn, ready for the tomb-sweeping ritual, with a slightly empty stomach.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in parents' home in Wuhan
结束状态.心情: The heart is content, filled with the warmth and sense of belonging from family affection, but there is a noticeable feeling of stomach bloating.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, but moderate activity throughout the day (walking, household chores), accompanied father for a walk for about 40 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Wuhan, sunny to cloudy, temperature 16-24°C. Changsha, sunny, temperature 17-25°C.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the last day of the Qingming holiday, Feng Haoran enjoyed a leisurely morning of parent-child time in Wuhan. In the afternoon, he returned to Changsha and attended a long-awaited specialty coffee tasting event. This day connected two cities and two states of mind, transitioning from familial warmth to personal refined interests. However, due to the effects of caffeine, he remained quite alert in the evening.

events.name: Accompanied my father for a morning walk and conversation.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran accompanied his father, Feng Jianguo, for a walk in the park near their residential community. Under the gentle spring sunshine, the father and son strolled slowly along the lakeside. Their conversation evolved from everyday family matters to in-depth discussions on investment and financial planning, long-term career strategies, as well as potential challenges and opportunities the family might face in the future, making it a rare and profound exchange. The father mentioned his interest in investing in government bonds, to which Feng Haoran offered his advice.

events.name: Bidding farewell to my parents, I returned to Changsha.
events.description: After lunch, Feng Haoran packed his luggage and bid farewell to his parents. His father drove him to Wuhan Station. He took the afternoon high-speed train and arrived safely at Changsha South Station in about two hours, then took a taxi back to his residence in Yuelu District. On the train, he took a short nap to relieve his fatigue.

events.name: Attend the Xinyi Café Premium Coffee Bean Tasting Event
events.description: After dropping off his luggage and settling in, Feng Haoran arrived punctually at [Xinyi Pour-Over Coffee Shop]. The tasting event had a relaxed and elegant atmosphere, with fewer than ten participants. The owner, Shen Xinyi, served as the host, guiding everyone through the tasting of three rare micro-lot coffee beans. She provided detailed explanations of each bean's origin, processing method, and flavor profile—such as prominent floral notes, citrus acidity, or a red wine finish. Feng Haoran focused intently on savoring the coffee, attempting to discern the subtle differences, and exchanged brewing parameters and impressions with Ms. Shen and other coffee enthusiasts. He particularly enjoyed a Panamanian bean and decided to purchase a small quantity.

events.name: Exchange and Documentation Following the Tasting Session
events.description: After the tasting event concluded, Feng Haoran was still eager for more. He continued to converse with Shen Xinyi and several other like-minded participants, discussing their favorite coffee beans and sharing experiences regarding hand-brewing equipment and techniques. He also took several photos of the exquisite equipment and coffee beans on-site with his phone, planning to share them in his photography social circle.

events.name: Evening Personal Affairs Review
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Feng Haoran attended to the backlog of emails and messages. While checking his digital calendar, he noticed that his vehicle insurance and annual inspection were due to expire in mid-month, so he reminded himself to arrange time to handle these matters promptly to avoid oversight. He also received a WeChat message from his sister, Feng Xinran, inquiring about investment advice, to which he gave a brief reply.

events.name: Staying up late due to caffeine stimulation
events.description: Due to consuming a significant amount of caffeine during the afternoon coffee tasting session, Feng Haoran remained energetic in the evening, handled affairs until late, and postponed his sleep time.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in parents' home in Wuhan
起始状态.心情: Relaxed yet reluctant to part, cherishing the final moments with family, while the feeling of abdominal bloating has eased.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and content, both from family reunion and the refined delight of coffee, yet slightly too excited to fall asleep.

state.今日运动: No specific sports activities, but there is considerable walking during the day (at stations and during commutes), approximately 1.5 hours.

date_attribute.weather: Changsha, sunny, with temperatures ranging from 18 to 26°C, exuding a strong spring atmosphere.

2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for returning to one's personal rhythm. Feng Haoran attended to practical matters such as vehicle insurance and family finances, embarked on a new gardening experience with a strawberry pot, and maintained close connections with family members scattered across different locations through a video call in the evening. The day was filled with the warmth of daily life and family affection, though a slight fatigue lingered due to insufficient sleep the previous night.

events.name: Renewal of Vehicle Insurance
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran contacted a familiar insurance broker via phone and WeChat to obtain and compare multiple car insurance quotation plans. After comprehensive consideration, he ultimately selected a comprehensive insurance plan that increased the coverage amount for third-party liability insurance based on the basic coverage types and included an additional medical expenses outside medical insurance liability rider. He completed the online payment through mobile banking and received the electronic policy. During the process, the broker recommended additional riders, but Feng Haoran politely declined to control expenses.

events.name: Go to the flower market and purchase a strawberry potted plant.
events.description: With the idea of adding greenery to his office and home, Feng Haoran drove to a large flower market in Changsha. Originally intending to buy a pothos or cactus, he was attracted by a stall displaying strawberry potted plants laden with red fruits while browsing. He inquired in detail about the care methods from the vendor and learned that they were easy to grow and suitable for beginners. Out of curiosity for something new and a desire for a challenge, he changed his original plan and purchased a strawberry potted plant full of fruits, along with a small bag of organic fertilizer.

events.name: Place and study strawberry maintenance
events.description: After bringing the strawberry pot home, Feng Haoran placed it in a well-lit corner of the south-facing balcony, as suggested by the vendor. Following the simple instructions, he watered it for the first time and observed the shapes of the fruits and leaves with great interest. Later, he searched online for more detailed tutorials on strawberry care, learning advanced knowledge about lighting, watering, fertilizing, and fruit thinning, and took brief notes. This marked the beginning of his daily gardening observation routine. He also noticed that one strawberry had fully ripened, carefully picked it, and tasted it, finding its flavor pleasantly sweet and sour.

events.name: Share new hobbies with friends
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran shared with his friend Peng Yuqing on WeChat about starting his gardening experience by purchasing a strawberry plant, and sent several photos of the potted plant. The two then chatted about the joy of cultivating a new hobby, with Peng Yuqing jokingly saying she looked forward to tasting the strawberries he grew himself. Feng Haoran invited her to come over to his house over the weekend to take a look.

events.name: Weekly family video call
events.description: At the agreed time in the evening, Feng Haoran initiated a family group video call via WeChat, connecting simultaneously with his parents in Wuhan and his younger sister Feng Xinran in Shanghai. After exchanging greetings, Feng Haoran shared his reflections on the Qingming family reunion and his work updates from the week. His parents inquired about his daily routines, diet, and progress in preparing for the CFA exam. His sister excitedly shared details of a successful marketing project she had participated in while in Shanghai and sought her brother’s advice on adjustments to her personal financial plan. Feng Haoran provided specific recommendations based on his sister’s income and risk tolerance, and engaged in a more in-depth discussion with his father regarding recent stock market trends. The call lasted approximately one hour and concluded with warm goodnight wishes. His mother reminded him to pay attention to his cervical spine health.

events.name: Organizing Photos and Reflections from My Hometown Visit
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran imported the photos he took during his trip back home for the Qingming Festival into his computer for simple organization and backup. Reflecting on his conversations with family, he noted down his parents' health advice and decided to follow up on it later. This brief reunion gave him a deeper appreciation of the importance of family bonds, and he prepared to face the new workweek with renewed energy. He also deleted several blurry photos to save storage space.

events.name: Postponing evening exercise due to fatigue
events.description: I had originally planned to take an evening walk, but after handling some tasks and a video call, I felt fatigued and decided to rest instead, without engaging in any physical activity.

起始状态.心情: Feeling leisurely and at ease, ready to enjoy some personal time over the weekend, though slightly sleep-deprived.

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, satisfied with family connections and new attempts, though slightly physically fatigued.

state.今日运动: No specific sports activities, but walked for about one hour at the flower market and engaged in household chores for 20 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Monday, Feng Haoran fully resumed his work routine. He proactively communicated the latest investment strategy perspectives to key clients while also focusing on personal development. Not only did he deepen his CFA exam preparation methods, but he also began considering systematically studying a new field due to emerging client needs. His day was meticulously organized with work and study, but stress led to emotional fluctuations.

events.name: Communicating Second Quarter Strategy Perspectives to Key Clients
events.description: Feng Haoran conveyed the second-quarter macroeconomic analysis and core investment strategy viewpoints, confirmed through departmental seminars, to key clients such as Huang Siqi and Lin Zhihao via phone or video conference. He also conducted preliminary communication and solicited opinions regarding potential adjustments to their personal investment portfolios for the second quarter. During the call with Huang Siqi, she suddenly raised an urgent question regarding market volatility, prompting Feng Haoran to temporarily adjust his strategy in response, which left him feeling slightly tense.

events.name: Replan the CFA Study Schedule
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran systematically reviewed his CFA study progress for March in his study and found that his grasp of modules such as Financial Statement Analysis and Equity Investments was not solid enough. Based on the remaining preparation time and the key exam topics, he re-planned a detailed daily study schedule for April, specifying the required daily study hours and module objectives, determined to catch up. Feeling stressed during the planning process, he drank a cup of coffee to refresh himself.

events.name: New customer needs trigger learning intentions.
events.description: During communication with client Huang Siqi, she once again expressed interest in digital assets such as Bitcoin ETFs. Feng Haoran realized his own insufficient knowledge in this area and found it difficult to provide in-depth analysis. This prompted him to make a firm decision to systematically study the blockchain and digital asset fields in the near future, in order to better serve forward-looking client needs. He immediately bookmarked several related articles.

events.name: Feeling down due to work pressure
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran received a customer complaint email. Although it was not his direct responsibility, his mood was affected, and he experienced a brief period of low spirits. After confiding in his colleague Zheng Wenbo, he felt relieved.

起始状态.心情: Energetic and ready to dive into the intense work of the new week, but with slight neck soreness.

结束状态.心情: Focused with a sense of urgency, driven by both exam preparation pressure and a thirst for knowledge in new academic fields, emotions gradually stabilizing from a low point.

state.今日运动: Ran 5 kilometers in the morning and performed 20 minutes of shoulder and neck stretching in the evening (targeting prolonged sitting), but was absent-minded during the stretching.

2025-04.daily_overview: Tuesday was a pivotal day for Feng Haoran's career development. He received positive feedback from his supervisor regarding his promotion presentation and jointly established clear second-quarter goals, making his career path more defined. Concurrently, he efficiently handled personal matters such as scheduling his vehicle's annual inspection and arranging a visit to the observatory, while continuing to make steady progress in his CFA exam preparation. The good news left him in high spirits.

events.name: Performance Review and Goal Setting Meeting with Supervisor
events.description: In the morning, a one-on-one meeting was held in Qian Yongqiang's office. Mr. Qian provided detailed feedback on Feng Haoran's previously submitted promotion review materials, highly commending his leadership capabilities in project management and innovative thinking in customer service. He also offered specific suggestions on how to more effectively showcase achievements in cross-departmental collaboration. In the latter part of the meeting, based on the company's annual strategy and Feng Haoran's career plan, the two jointly discussed and set key performance objectives for the second quarter. These included prioritizing the IPO service project for client Huang Siqi's company and expanding the number of newly acquired high-net-worth clients, with clear implementation paths. Mr. Qian also hinted at a potential bonus increase, which secretly delighted Feng Haoran.

events.name: Schedule Vehicle Annual Inspection
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran successfully booked an annual vehicle inspection service for Saturday morning (April 12) at a motor vehicle inspection station in Changsha City through the Traffic Management 12123 APP. The system was busy during the booking process, and he had to try twice before succeeding.

events.name: Inquire and book the public open day of the observatory
events.description: Out of interest in astronomical observation, Feng Haoran checked the public open day schedule for April on the official WeChat account of the Hunan Astronomical Observatory during his work break. After confirming that there was an observation event themed [Exoplanet Exploration] on Saturday evening this week, he immediately completed the online reservation. He also took the opportunity to browse astronomical photography works to seek inspiration.

events.name: Review the knowledge structure of CFA weak areas
events.description: To address weak areas such as financial statement analysis and equity investment, Feng Haoran spent the evening systematically reviewing official textbooks and his own notes. He summarized and distilled core knowledge points, including complex accounting standards and key valuation models, to create a well-structured and easily memorable review outline, laying the groundwork for subsequent in-depth study. During this process, he identified and promptly corrected a misunderstanding of a concept.

events.name: Canceling a morning run with a running partner at short notice
events.description: I had originally planned to go for a morning run, but due to staying up late studying the previous night and feeling physically fatigued, I sent a WeChat message to Gao Yunfei to cancel the plan and rescheduled the exercise for the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Wednesday morning, Feng Haoran explored a new running route with his running partner, extending their conversation to health management and further deepening their friendship. During the day, his work focused on planning around set goals. In the evening, he innovated his CFA exam preparation method and formed a study group with colleagues, which is expected to improve learning efficiency, though his neck discomfort intensified.

events.name: Exploring new routes with running partners and discussing health management.
events.description: On Wednesday morning, Feng Haoran met up with his running partner Gao Yunfei on South Yuelu Road and decided to change their usual route, opting for a new path with better scenery and slight slopes for a leisurely run. During the run, Feng Haoran mentioned his recent medical check-up report and the neck discomfort caused by prolonged sitting. Gao Yunfei, who works in the IT industry, shared practical stretching techniques to address similar issues and suggested trying sports like badminton to exercise the shoulders and neck. Feng Haoran noted down the suggestions and planned to give them a try.

events.name: Post-Run Breakfast Discussion
events.description: After their morning run, the two had rice noodles together at a roadside breakfast shop and continued their in-depth discussion on how to better integrate regular exercise with high-intensity financial work. They exchanged their respective experiences in time management and health maintenance. Gao Yunfei recommended a health management app, which Feng Haoran downloaded to try out.

events.name: Organize the Action Plan for the Meeting with the Supervisor
events.description: Upon returning to the company, Feng Haoran compiled a detailed personal key task action plan for the second quarter based on the content discussed with Qian Yongqiang the previous day. The plan clearly outlined the timelines, expected outcomes, and required resources for each task. He then sent it via email to General Manager Qian for confirmation, demonstrating strong execution capabilities. The email included preliminary data for support.

events.name: Recording voice memos for CFA exam preparation
events.description: To make full use of his commuting time, Feng Haoran began recording voice memos in the evenings based on the key exam points he had outlined. He recorded brief audio clips in his own words, covering essential concepts, complex formulas, and problem-solving approaches, making it convenient to listen to them repeatedly during his commute to reinforce his memory. Due to noise interference, he had to re-record several times during the process.

events.name: Establish a CFA exam preparation study group with colleagues.
events.description: Upon learning that his colleague Zheng Wenbo was also preparing for the CFA exam, Feng Haoran proactively invited him to form a study group. The two agreed to use the company meeting room for approximately one hour of mutual learning every Wednesday after work. The primary format involved asking each other questions and explaining complex case studies, aiming to consolidate knowledge and identify gaps. During their first group discussion, Zheng Wenbo raised a challenging problem, which they resolved after a debate.

events.name: Temporary Medical Consultation for Cervical Pain
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran's cervical spine pain intensified, prompting him to schedule an impromptu quick consultation at a physical therapy clinic near his company. The doctor recommended strengthening core training and adjusting his sitting posture.

起始状态.心情: Feeling joyful and looking forward to the morning exchange and exercise with fellow runners, but the neck pain has intensified.

结束状态.心情: Feeling positive and productive, satisfied with healthy communication and innovative learning methods, yet experiencing slight irritability due to cervical discomfort.

state.今日运动: Ran 5.5 kilometers in the morning (new route), performed 15 minutes of cervical spine stretching in the evening, but the pain was not fully relieved.

2025-04.daily_overview: Thursday's workday brought a small milestone and a highlight moment. Feng Haoran not only successfully chaired an important client meeting, gaining forward-looking professional requirements from the client, but also pleasantly received an unexpectedly high quarterly performance bonus. Professional challenges and material incentives arrived on the same day, though the rain disrupted his exercise plans.

events.name: Conduct a regular asset allocation review meeting with client Huang Siqi.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran conducted a regular portfolio review with his client Huang Siqi via video conference. During the meeting, Huang Siqi not only expressed satisfaction with the current allocation but also proactively and thoroughly discussed the feasibility of incorporating Bitcoin spot ETFs into her alternative asset allocation. She elaborated on her views from professional perspectives such as technological disruptiveness, macroeconomic asset correlation, and regulatory evolution, demonstrating a high level of expertise. Feng Haoran listened attentively and documented the client's needs and opinions, while also recognizing the need to quickly supplement his knowledge in this area. The meeting lasted 90 minutes, exceeding the scheduled time.

events.name: Organize Client Meeting Minutes
events.description: As soon as the meeting concluded, Feng Haoran immediately began organizing the meeting minutes. He highlighted the detailed requirements, logical viewpoints, and follow-up action points regarding Bitcoin ETF allocation as expressed by the client, Huang Siqi, and clarified the areas requiring further in-depth research. Personal reflection points were also incorporated into the minutes.

events.name: Received the first quarter performance bonus.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran received the notification for the first-quarter performance bonus distribution through the company's internal system. Upon confirming that the bonus amount exceeded his expectations, he felt a wave of delight and satisfaction, as it served as direct recognition of his hard work in the previous quarter. He immediately shared the good news with his parents.

events.name: Begin collecting relevant materials on Bitcoin ETFs
events.description: Inspired by the client meeting during the day, Feng Haoran began to preliminarily gather and read research reports and industry news on Bitcoin spot ETFs, cryptocurrency market structure, regulatory developments, and their role in asset allocation in the evening, officially embarking on his learning journey in this new field. He downloaded several PDFs and planned to study them in detail over the weekend.

events.name: Retrieve another client's data in preparation for in-depth analysis.
events.description: Meanwhile, the work of preparing an in-depth analysis report for another important client, Lin Zhihao, is also progressing. Feng Haoran logged into the company's system, retrieved Lin Zhihao's complete asset details and transaction reports from the previous quarter, and exported the key data to organize it into a preliminary table, preparing materials for subsequent behavioral finance analysis. Given the large volume of data, he decided to process it in batches.

events.name: Outdoor sports cancelled due to rainy weather.
events.description: I had originally planned to go for a morning run, but it rained in the morning, so I switched to 20 minutes of jump rope at home instead. However, due to limited space, the workout was not as effective.

结束状态.心情: Complex and exhilarating, it encompasses the joy of receiving a bonus, the urgency and thirst for knowledge when facing new intellectual challenges, and a profound sense of fulfillment.

2025-04.daily_overview: Friday night belonged to the stars and curiosity. After work, Feng Haoran drove to the suburban observatory to participate in a fascinating stargazing event, temporarily forgetting the pressures of work in the vast universe. During the day, he had meticulously prepared for the observation and other weekend activities, though he felt a bit drowsy from staying up late the previous night.

events.name: Preparing for Astronomical Observation Activities
events.description: Considering the lower temperatures in the suburbs at night, Feng Haoran prepared a warm outdoor jacket and a red-filter flashlight for night vision that does not harm the eyes after returning home from work, and checked the camera's battery level. He also planned the driving route from his home to the Hunan Astronomical Observatory in advance and estimated the travel time. Upon discovering that the flashlight batteries were insufficient, he purchased replacements on short notice.

events.name: Confirm the weekend morning running arrangement with running partners.
events.description: Through WeChat communication with fellow runner Gao Yunfei, the time and location for meeting at Meixi Lake on Saturday morning, as well as the planned running route around the lake, were confirmed. Both looked forward to a long-distance, relaxing weekend run. Gao Yunfei suggested increasing the distance, and Feng Haoran agreed to take on the challenge of 10 kilometers.

events.name: Drive to the Hunan Provincial Observatory.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran drove from his home to the Hunan Provincial Observatory located in the suburbs of Changsha. Along the way, the traffic gradually thinned out, and the glow of the setting sun illuminated the horizon. He was filled with anticipation for the upcoming stargazing session. During the drive, he listened to a CFA audio lecture.

events.name: Attend a Popular Science Lecture on [Exoplanet Exploration]
events.description: Upon arriving at the observatory and completing check-in, Feng Haoran entered the lecture hall to attend a popular science lecture on [exoplanet exploration] delivered by an astronomer. He learned about how humans search for planets beyond the solar system and the significance of these discoveries, deeply feeling the vastness and mystery of the universe. During the lecture, he raised a question about investing in space technology, sparking a brief discussion.

events.name: Observing the stars with professional telescopes
events.description: After the lecture, under the guidance and assistance of the docent, Feng Haoran took turns with other visitors to use the observatory's professional telescope, clearly observing Saturn with its beautiful rings and several bright globular clusters (such as M13 in Hercules). The profound view through the eyepiece left him in awe. He attempted to capture it with his mobile phone, but the results were mediocre.

events.name: Brief Exchange with Astronomy Enthusiasts
events.description: During the observation break, Feng Haoran briefly exchanged observation experiences with several fellow astronomy enthusiasts who were equally enthusiastic. He also used his phone to take a few photos of Saturn through the telescope eyepiece (though blurry, they held great commemorative value) and captured some shots of the event venue. They exchanged contact information and planned to share the photos later.

events.name: Return home after the event concludes.
events.description: The public open day event concluded around 10 p.m. Feng Haoran, still savoring the memory of the starry sky and feeling completely relaxed, drove safely back to his home in Changsha city. Due to fatigue, he drove relatively slowly on the way.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision to get up early tomorrow morning to handle emails.
events.description: Before going to bed, I checked my email and found an urgent message from a client. I decided to get up early the next morning to handle it, which disrupted my sleep schedule.

起始状态.心情: A calmness tinged with a subtle anticipation for the night's activities, yet with a distinct sense of drowsiness.

结束状态.心情: Tranquil, expansive, and filled with awe, the vastness of the universe made his daily worries seem trivial, though he felt slightly weary.

state.今日运动: Ran 5 kilometers in the morning, but walked for about an hour during afternoon and evening activities.

2025-04.daily_overview: Saturday was a blend of efficiently handling chores and enjoying weekend leisure. Feng Haoran successfully completed his vehicle annual inspection in the morning, followed by a pleasant long-distance slow run with his running companions in the afternoon, interspersed with study discussions and bonus distribution planning. By the end of the day, administrative tasks were wrapped up, and both body and mind were fully relaxed, though muscle soreness set in after the workout.

events.name: Vehicle Annual Inspection
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran drove his car to the scheduled motor vehicle inspection station. After submitting the vehicle and relevant documents, during the two-hour wait for the inspection, he sat in the car wearing headphones and used the time to listen to the recorded CFA exam preparation audio course from the previous day. The vehicle ultimately passed all inspection items, and he received and affixed the new annual inspection compliance label on the spot. During the inspection, a small light was found not working, but it was temporarily repaired and passed afterward.

events.name: Weekend long-distance slow running with fellow runner Gao Yunfei
events.description: After completing the morning annual inspection, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei met at Meixi Lake and completed a 10-kilometer jog along the scenic lakeside route. While running, they enjoyed the beautiful lake views and spring scenery, chatting freely about work and life. They also agreed to challenge longer distances in the future, aiming to turn running from a habit into a shared pursuit of interest. Feng Haoran tried out his newly purchased running shoes and found them comfortable.

events.name: Exchanging views on cryptocurrency with colleagues
events.description: During lunch break, Feng Haoran and his colleague and fellow student Zheng Wenbo had a meal near the company, discussing recent market trends. Feng Haoran mentioned client Huang Siqi's interest in Bitcoin ETFs. The two exchanged their preliminary views on cryptocurrencies as an alternative asset class and the limited industry information they had gathered, both agreeing that this is a new area requiring ongoing attention. Zheng Wenbo recommended a book, which Feng Haoran noted down.

events.name: Develop a Performance Bonus Allocation Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, based on his recent review of personal financial status, Feng Haoran formulated a detailed bonus allocation plan: 60% of the bonus would be used for a one-time additional investment into his existing broad-based index fund regular investment plan to accelerate long-term asset accumulation; 30% would be transferred into a high-liquidity money market fund as a supplement to the family emergency reserve; and the remaining 10% would be allocated to a [self-reward fund] for potential future upgrades to photography equipment or short trips. The plan also took tax implications into consideration.

events.name: Muscle soreness due to excessive exercise
events.description: After the long-distance run, Feng Haoran experienced soreness in his leg muscles. He performed additional stretching exercises in the evening and decided to reduce his exercise intensity the next day.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed, ready to handle the routine weekend tasks, but slightly fatigued from waking up early.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied yet slightly fatigued, feeling fulfilled from completing multiple tasks and enjoying exercise, with noticeable muscle soreness.

state.今日运动: 10-kilometer jog around Meixi Lake, followed by 15 minutes of evening stretching.
