2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday is a day of transition, leaning towards reflection and planning. Feng Haoran primarily focused on wrapping up tasks, conducting preliminary explorations in knowledge domains, and making theoretical preparations for the upcoming important client analysis report next week. The pace was relatively relaxed, allowing for energy accumulation for the upcoming workweek, though exercise was adjusted due to muscle soreness.

events.name: Organize vehicle insurance policies and annual inspection documents
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran organized the electronic insurance policy for the new year, the duplicate of the annual inspection compliance label, and other documents, filing them separately into the family's dedicated electronic cloud drive and physical folder. This concluded the vehicle-related asset management tasks. He also scanned the paper documents for backup.

events.name: Develop a Bitcoin ETF Learning Plan
events.description: Based on preliminary research, Feng Haoran has formulated a short-term in-depth learning plan regarding Bitcoin ETFs and cryptocurrencies. The plan includes several core brokerage research reports to be studied thoroughly, ongoing monitoring of regulatory developments both domestically and internationally, and a preliminary framework for constructing an asset allocation risk assessment. The plan sets a goal of dedicating five hours per week to learning.

events.name: Revisiting Behavioral Finance Theory
events.description: To enhance the depth of the upcoming quarterly analysis report for client Lin Zhihao, Feng Haoran revisited the classic theoretical frameworks of behavioral finance in his study, focusing on investor psychological biases such as overconfidence, loss aversion, and herd mentality. He contemplated how to integrate these theories with the client's past trading data to provide more insightful attribution analysis. He made new notes accordingly.

events.name: Daily Care and Observation of Potted Strawberries
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran watered the strawberry potted plants on the balcony. Following the knowledge he had acquired, he carefully removed some overly dense small fruits and withered leaves to ensure adequate nutrition for the remaining fruits. Seeing another strawberry beginning to turn red, he felt a small sense of accomplishment. He also applied a small amount of organic fertilizer.

events.name: Switched to light exercise due to muscle soreness.
events.description: Originally planned to go for a walk, but my leg muscles were still sore, so I switched to doing 20 minutes of gentle yoga at home, focusing on relaxing the legs.

events.name: Temporarily video chatting with friends to discuss investments.
events.description: In the evening, my good friend Dong Haoran made a video call from Shenzhen to discuss recent investment opportunities in technology stocks. Feng Haoran shared insights from clients, and the conversation lasted for 40 minutes.

起始状态.心情: Lazy and relaxed, enjoying the last moments of weekend leisure, with muscle soreness still lingering.

结束状态.心情: Calm and clear-minded, I am mentally and intellectually prepared for the upcoming new week, yet feeling slightly socially fatigued.

2025-04.daily_overview: The new week began with an overwhelming influx of information on Monday. Feng Haoran not only received his annual health checkup report and formulated a new health plan based on it, but also reported the progress of a new project to his supervisor and initiated the execution of a bonus investment plan. With health, work, and finance advancing simultaneously, this demonstrated his efficient multitasking abilities, though the health checkup results also brought added pressure.

events.name: Report new client requirements to the Investment Director.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran reported to Qian Yongqiang on the forward-looking demand regarding Bitcoin ETF allocation raised by the client Huang Siqi, and briefly outlined his plan to follow up with further research. He proactively sought guidance from his supervisor and preliminary opinions from the company's compliance department on such business, demonstrating a prudent and responsible attitude. General Manager Qian suggested submitting a risk assessment report first.

events.name: Receive and interpret the annual physical examination report
events.description: Feng Haoran received the hardcopy of his annual health checkup report, completed at the beginning of the year, in his office. He carefully reviewed it. The report generally indicated good health, but the key focus area noted that his body fat percentage was approaching the upper limit of the normal range, and cervical spine imaging revealed a slight straightening of the physiological curvature (consistent with long-term desk work characteristics). This raised his concern, prompting him to decide to make immediate adjustments.

events.name: Develop a new health management plan
events.description: Based on the medical examination report, Feng Haoran drafted a new health management plan during the lunch break. He decided to add two 30-minute core strength training sessions per week (targeting body fat and cervical spine stability) while maintaining the routine of three morning runs per week. Additionally, he set up a mandatory reminder on his office computer to stand up and move for five minutes after every 50 minutes of work. The plan is scheduled to take effect starting tomorrow.

events.name: Schedule a Personal Trainer Consultation at the Gym
events.description: To conduct strength training scientifically, Feng Haoran contacted a personal trainer at a gym near his company and scheduled a targeted consultation session. He hopes to receive professional guidance on exercises and training plan recommendations for body fat percentage control and improving cervical strain. The appointment is scheduled for Thursday evening this week.

events.name: Executive Bonus Investment Plan (Partial)
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran operated through his mobile banking app to add a lump sum of 60% of his total performance bonus to his existing regular investment account for the CSI 300 Index Fund, completing the core part of his bonus reinvestment. During the operation, market fluctuations caused him to hesitate briefly before proceeding.

events.name: Supplement the family emergency reserve fund
events.description: Immediately after, he transferred 30% of the total bonus into a pre-selected high-liquidity money market fund within the Alipay ecosystem, bringing the total amount of the family's emergency reserve to a level that gave him greater peace of mind. He also set up an automatic transfer arrangement.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to medical examination results
events.description: After receiving the physical examination report, Feng Haoran felt somewhat disheartened. He called his mother to share his feelings, and after being comforted by her, his mood improved.

起始状态.心情: The rigor and focus of a regular workday, yet anticipating the medical examination report.

结束状态.心情: Cautious yet proactive, there is both vigilance towards health issues and a thirst for new knowledge, along with a sense of reassurance after completing financial planning, though the pressure of medical check-ups brings slight anxiety.

2025-04.daily_overview: Tuesday marked a highlight moment for Feng Haoran to demonstrate his project leadership and coordination capabilities. He successfully chaired a critical multi-party project meeting, driving substantial progress in client listing services. Concurrently, personal actions in learning new fields and health management were also initiated, reflecting the strong goal orientation and execution typical of the ENTJ personality. Ultimately, his status aligned with the conclusion of a healthy state.

events.name: Organize a weekend hiking activity with friends
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran proposed in a WeChat group with friends to organize an outdoor hiking trip this weekend. After discussing with Peng Yuqing, Wu Junjie, and others, they settled on a hiking plan to Yingzhu Mountain in Changsha County on April 19th (Saturday). They preliminarily determined the meeting time, transportation method, and necessary supplies to prepare. Peng Yuqing suggested bringing photography equipment, to which Feng Haoran agreed.

events.name: Presiding over key meetings for client IPO service projects
events.description: As the project lead, Feng Haoran chaired a multi-party meeting via video conference with client Huang Siqi, colleagues Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya, and external legal experts from a cooperating law firm. He systematically presented the comprehensive pre-IPO financial services package customized by Huatai Securities for their company. Feng guided in-depth discussions on key issues such as equity structure optimization, executive incentive plans, and tax planning, ultimately clarifying the specific responsibilities and critical milestones for each party in the project’s next phase. During the meeting, Huang Siqi raised a challenging question, which Feng Haoran skillfully resolved.

events.name: Organize and distribute project meeting minutes
events.description: As soon as the meeting concluded, Feng Haoran promptly began organizing the meeting minutes. He compiled the key points of the discussed and finalized plans, division of responsibilities, and timelines into a formal meeting minutes document. This was then distributed via email to all participants for confirmation, ensuring information synchronization and laying a solid foundation for the efficient subsequent execution of the project. An action timeline was also included in the minutes.

events.name: Begin research on the use of [Self-Reward Fund]
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran began to carefully study how to use the 10% [self-reward fund]. He browsed photography equipment websites, comparing the models and prices of several desired lenses; he also searched for information on campsites suitable for short spring road trips in Hunan and surrounding provinces, weighing the options between upgrading his equipment and experiencing travel. He initially leaned toward purchasing a new lens.

events.name: Analyzing Psychological Biases in Customer Trading Behavior
events.description: While preparing the quarterly analysis report for client Lin Zhihao, Feng Haoran attempted to apply behavioral finance theories based on the organized transaction data. He preliminarily identified potential signs of [overconfidence] (frequent portfolio adjustments) and [loss aversion] (selling profitable positions too early while holding onto losing positions for too long) exhibited by the client during recent market fluctuations. He then began considering how to present these findings tactfully and professionally in the report and drafted an outline.

events.name: Implement new core strength training.
events.description: Under the new health plan, Feng Haoran performed a 30-minute core strength training session at home in the evening, focusing on the abdomen and back to improve posture and cervical spine health. He followed a fitness app to complete the workout, and although the movements were unfamiliar, he persisted through to the end.

起始状态.心情: Calm and confident, prepared to preside over important meetings, the health plan brings new momentum.

结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement is notable, with exhilaration from successfully driving key projects, while also looking forward to future leisure rewards, and initial determination in health management is evident.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the first day of the Labor Day holiday, Feng Haoran chose to begin an intensive, closed-door sprint for the CFA Level III exam at home. Leveraging his ENTJ personality traits of being adept at planning and execution, he dedicated the entire day to crafting a detailed plan for both study and personal interest organization. His study became a command center, with the desk covered in CFA materials, cryptocurrency research reports, and photography equipment. By creating a precise hourly schedule, he attempted to maintain control over his personal interests within the tight exam preparation cycle. This marked a critical transition point from his relatively balanced lifestyle in April to a high-intensity, single-focused exam preparation mode.

events.name: Develop a detailed study plan for the CFA Level III exam.
events.description: At the computer in his study, Feng Haoran opened a spreadsheet to meticulously plan his entire CFA review schedule for May. Based on the number of remaining chapters and his familiarity with each section (such as ethics, asset allocation, and behavioral finance), he broke down the knowledge points into nightly tasks and allocated specific days each week for mock tests and review of incorrect answers. He deliberately marked several key milestones on his calendar to ensure his review progress was both visible and manageable.

events.name: Plan a Systematic Reading on Cryptocurrency
events.description: After completing his study plan, he turned his attention to the long-accumulated folder of cryptocurrency research reports. As an investment advisor focused on the financial frontier, he understood the importance of systematic learning. He sorted the reports by topic (technical principles, market analysis, regulatory developments) and depth, creating a 20-day reading schedule. He required himself to organize the core insights using mind maps or summary notes after each day's reading.

events.name: Organize the Annual Photography Portfolio
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran imported the photos taken over the past year from his hard drive into the computer. He created initial folders based on the cities where the photos were taken (Changsha, Shenzhen, Wuhan) and the approximate seasons, then quickly browsed and performed a preliminary screening of the photos within each folder, deleting obvious unusable shots. This organizing process allowed him to temporarily step away from intense mental work and also prepared him for selecting standout works to participate in photography community activities later on.

events.name: Video Greetings with Family
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran proactively made a video call to his parents in Wuhan to extend holiday greetings. His mother, Li Xiuying, inquired about his holiday plans and, upon learning that he was studying at home, reminded him to take breaks. His father, Feng Jianguo, briefly exchanged views on the recent stock market. Though the call was short, it maintained the family's daily connection.

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, ready to embark on an efficient holiday

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled yet somewhat pressured, mentally prepared for the upcoming intensive study period.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the second day of the holiday, Feng Haoran officially entered the CFA sprint execution phase. He clearly divided the day into three stages: deepening his study plan in the morning, handling necessary work preparations in the afternoon, and focusing on tackling specific knowledge points in the evening. Although at home, the pace was intense, reflecting his ENTJ-driven pursuit of efficiency and goals. The intermittent rain outside did not disturb his concentration, as his study became a fortress shielding him from external distractions. Due to academic pressure, he stayed up until the early hours, leaving him slightly fatigued the next day.

events.name: Refine the Three-Week CFA Sprint Schedule
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran further refined the specific tasks for each day over the next three weeks based on the broad framework established the previous day. He meticulously allocated textbook chapters, exercise sets, and mock exams to each study session, even setting aside additional review time for areas of weakness. He understood that a well-crafted plan is half the battle, and this schedule would serve as a strict guide for his actions in the coming period.

events.name: Mastering the CFA Ethics Section
events.description: In the evening, he began reviewing the most critical and conceptually demanding section of the CFA Level I curriculum, "Ethical and Professional Standards," as planned. Instead of rote memorization of the rules, he analyzed numerous case studies from the textbook to understand the application scenarios and potential conflicts of each standard in real-world financial practice, compiling over ten pages of case analysis notes.

events.name: Read the In-depth Report on Blockchain Technology
events.description: During a study break in the afternoon, he launched the first day of his cryptocurrency reading plan. He selected an in-depth technical report on the evolution and bottlenecks of blockchain consensus mechanisms (such as PoW and PoS). While reading, he organized a comparison chart of technical approaches in his note-taking software and contemplated the potential impact of these underlying technological changes on the valuation of the cryptocurrency market.

events.name: Prepare materials for the next day's work.
events.description: Considering the important meeting with client Huang Siqi scheduled after the holiday, Feng Haoran took some time in the afternoon to quickly review the draft of the wealth management plan prepared for her. He marked several areas that might require further data support and planned to verify them with colleagues after returning to work.

events.name: Overtime work to handle urgent customer emails
events.description: Approaching midnight, he received an urgent email from his client Lin Zhihao inquiring about the details of the quarterly report. Despite having planned to rest, he promptly replied to the email, providing preliminary data, which delayed his bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to execute as planned.

结束状态.心情: A slight sense of accomplishment from completing planned tasks, coupled with mild fatigue from staying up late to reply to emails.

2025-05.daily_overview: It was the weekend, but for Feng Haoran in exam preparation mode, weekends were no different from weekdays. He scheduled a CFA mock exam for himself, serving as the first rigorous test of his holiday review progress. The exam consumed a great deal of energy, and afterward, he relaxed and unwound by organizing photos and financial documents—relatively mechanical tasks that provided a sense of control. Due to staying up late the previous night, he felt slight stiffness in his neck and shoulders and decided to go to bed early to regain his energy.

events.name: CFA Full-Length Mock Exam
events.description: At 9:00 AM, Feng Haoran strictly adhered to the official exam schedule and conducted a full CFA mock exam in his study. He turned off his phone, used a timer, and created an exam-like atmosphere. The three-hour answering process was highly intense, revealing that he spent too much time on financial reporting analysis and some quantitative questions. After the exam, he felt mentally exhausted but gained a clearer understanding of his mastery of the knowledge points.

events.name: Curated Street Photography Theme Works
events.description: In the afternoon, to shift his mindset, he opened the folder of photos that had been preliminarily categorized the day before. This time, he focused on selecting street photography themed around "urban humanities" and "street light and shadow." As he browsed through the images, he evaluated them based on composition, the use of light and shadow, and the narrative quality of the scenes. Ultimately, he made an initial selection of approximately 30 high-quality photos from thousands, briefly noting the shooting location and the inspiration behind each one.

events.name: Organize April financial documents
events.description: In the evening, realizing that the monthly financial review was scheduled for the next day, Feng Haoran began systematically gathering all financial documents for April. He exported and printed statements from his mobile banking app, Alipay, and WeChat Pay, while also organizing credit card paper statements, invoices, and receipts from the FinTech summit and golf events. This preparation ensured he was ready for the detailed analysis the following day.

events.name: Confirm the next morning's run with running partners
events.description: Before going to bed, he sent a WeChat message to his running partner Gao Yunfei, confirming that they would meet as usual at the old spot on Yuelu Mountain for their morning run. Regular morning runs serve as an important stress reliever and health safeguard in his high-pressure life.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous, ready to face the test of the mock exam.

结束状态.心情: Fatigued yet clear-headed, the mock exam results brought both pressure and direction, with slight discomfort in the neck and shoulders.

2025-05.daily_overview: Sunday is the day for personal management. Feng Haoran completed his routine morning run with Gao Yunfei in the morning, allowing himself a brief mental respite during the exercise. The afternoon and evening were entirely dedicated to the monthly financial review. He analyzed his income and expenses as meticulously as he would a client's assets, identifying an issue of overspending on social activities. Based on health insights from his medical check-up report, he decisively adjusted the budget structure for May, increasing investments in health. Rational planning restored his sense of control over life, and a healthier diet led to a slight reduction in weight.

events.name: Morning Run on Yuelu Mountain
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei met at the foot of Yuelu Mountain and jogged along the familiar trail. The mountain air was fresh, and the two chatted briefly about recent work as they ran, though not in depth. The run helped Feng Haoran clear the complex emotions left by the mock exam, preparing a clear mind for the upcoming financial review work.

events.name: In-Depth Personal Financial Review for April
events.description: In the afternoon, he opened personal finance software in his study and entered all the data he had organized the previous day one by one. He conducted a detailed analysis of April's various expenditures, specifically highlighting the travel and social expenses incurred from attending the Shanghai FinTech Summit and client golf events, and discovered that this portion exceeded the budget by 15%. At the same time, he also verified the salary deposits and the floating returns in his investment accounts.

events.name: Adjust the May Budget Plan
events.description: Based on the review results and the recent health check-up report (which suggested paying attention to dietary health), Feng Haoran adjusted his May budget in the software. He decided to cut unnecessary expenses on food delivery and entertainment, reallocating the saved funds to the "Healthy Food Purchases" and "Sports Equipment Updates" categories. Additionally, he set aside a small amount of money for a potential future home relocation plan.

events.name: Review and optimize automatic payment settings
events.description: To ensure stable monthly cash flow during the preparation period, he meticulously checked the account balances and deduction dates for automatic payments related to his mortgage, car loan, various insurance policies, and membership subscriptions. He discovered that two subscription services with low usage frequency were about to renew, so he promptly canceled their automatic renewals. Additionally, he transferred the proceeds from a matured short-term financial product to his frequently used payment account, thereby optimizing the efficiency of his fund utilization.

events.name: A Brief Phone Call with Mother
events.description: Before his evening study session, his mother Li Xiuying called to routinely check on his diet. Feng Haoran briefly mentioned that he had started paying attention to healthy eating. Upon hearing this, his mother was delighted and said she would send him some dried goods from their hometown.

起始状态.心情: Calm, looking forward to restoring a sense of order through morning runs and review sessions.

结束状态.心情: With a clearer mindset, I have developed more defined plans for personal finance and health management, leading to some relief from stress.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the first workday after the holiday, Feng Haoran quickly switched to professional mode. In the morning, he conducted a crucial rehearsal of the proposal with his supervisor, making final refinements for the official meeting with the client the following day. In the afternoon, he traveled on a business trip to Shanghai to attend the Asia Fintech Summit. During the journey, he seized every spare moment to review for the CFA exam. After arriving in Shanghai in the evening, he continued studying night photography theory in his hotel room. Shuttling between Changsha and Shanghai in a single day, he maintained a fast-paced rhythm, balancing both professional and academic pursuits. Due to the irregular eating schedule during the business trip, his weight saw a slight increase.

events.name: Conducting a Client Proposal Rehearsal with the Supervisor
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran conducted an internal rehearsal with his direct supervisor, Qian Yongqiang, in the office. He provided a comprehensive presentation of the integrated wealth management plan designed for Huang Siqi's company, while Qian Yongqiang simulated the client by raising several pointed inquiries. The two engaged in an in-depth discussion and refinement of the plan's logical rigor, key points of expression, and potential risk mitigation strategies. Qian Yongqiang, drawing on his extensive experience, offered crucial optimization suggestions.

events.name: Depart for Shanghai to attend the summit.
events.description: After the rehearsal concluded, Feng Haoran returned to his workstation to quickly confirm the summit schedule, flight tickets, and hotel information. In the afternoon, he boarded a flight from Changsha to Shanghai. During the journey, he closed his eyes to rest and mentally reviewed the key points from the rehearsal.

events.name: Study Advanced Techniques for Night Photography
events.description: After checking into a hotel in Shanghai in the evening, to relax his tense nerves, he did not immediately dive into CFA studies. Instead, he opened a photography forum and began delving into the theories and parameter settings for advanced night photography themes, such as urban light trails and star trails, accumulating knowledge for future practice.

events.name: Review the CFA Level III Code of Ethics and Standards of Professional Conduct
events.description: Before going to bed, he reviewed the Ethics and Professional Standards section of the CFA Level III according to his plan, read several challenging chapters from the original textbook, completed the accompanying specialized multiple-choice questions, and recorded the incorrect answers in his electronic notes.

events.name: Confirm Details of Tomorrow's Client Meeting
events.description: I reconfirmed the time, access link, and respective presentation sections for tomorrow morning's video conference with Huang Siqi's team via WeChat with colleagues Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya to ensure everything is foolproof.

起始状态.心情: Be rigorous and prepared to face important professional challenges after the holiday.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, feeling both anticipation and pressure for tomorrow's meeting.

2025-05.daily_overview: This was a day filled with high-intensity professional output. In the morning, Feng Haoran conducted a three-hour presentation and Q&A session via video conference from his hotel room with key client Huang Siqi, who was in Shenzhen. His thorough preparation and professionalism earned him preliminary approval. Immediately after the meeting, he organized an internal team debriefing and assigned tasks for revising the proposal. In the afternoon, he fully immersed himself in the summit, absorbing new industry insights. Upon returning to Changsha in the evening, despite his fatigue, he completed a stress-relieving morning run with his running partner. Professional drive, lifelong learning, and health maintenance advanced simultaneously across three locations, but the continuous travel left him feeling slightly unwell.

events.name: Key Solution Presentation Meeting with Client Huang Siqi
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran delivered a systematic presentation of the customized wealth management plan via video conference from his hotel room to Huang Siqi, the founder of Shenzhen Innovation Technology, and her financial team. He clearly articulated the asset allocation logic, ESG investment framework, and liquidity management contingency plan. During the Q&A session, he responded professionally and calmly to the client's in-depth inquiries regarding the implementation details of ESG standards and the asset liquidation capability under extreme market scenarios. His solid professional expertise earned the client's preliminary approval, and it was agreed that a revised version would be submitted within one week.

events.name: Internal Team Review and Task Allocation
events.description: Immediately after the online meeting concluded, Feng Haoran convened a conference call with Zheng Wenbo in Changsha and Sun Xiaoya in Hangzhou. He quickly summarized the key points of the client's feedback, breaking down the revision tasks into three modules: "ESG Strategy Refinement," "Liquidity Stress Test Model Optimization," and "Tax Planning Module Update." He clarified each person's responsibilities and set a preliminary timeline for completion within two days.

events.name: Attending the Asia FinTech Summit (Day 1)
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran appeared at the summit venue in high spirits. He listened to keynote speeches on digital asset allocation and ESG investment trends. During the tea break, he proactively exchanged business cards with several peers from leading fund companies and briefly discussed his views on market trends.

events.name: Returning to Changsha from Shanghai
events.description: After the first day's summit activities concluded, Feng Haoran hurried to the airport and took an evening flight back to Changsha. On the plane, he reflected on the day's meetings and summit observations, contemplating how to integrate the newly acquired insights into the revision of client proposals.

events.name: Morning run conversation with fellow runner Gao Yunfei
events.description: Despite the fatigue from the journey, Feng Haoran still met Gao Yunfei for their morning run at Yuelu Mountain the next day to maintain his physical condition. During the run, he briefly shared his thoughts on the intense business trip and meetings, while Gao Yunfei offered insights into managing stress during the sprint phase of IT projects. The two also exchanged views on how to balance health investments with quality of life under the new budget constraints.

起始状态.心情: Highly focused, slightly tense, ready for a critical presentation.

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment intertwined with exhaustion; client recognition brought confidence, yet continuous travel and intensive mental exertion took a heavy toll, with stiffness in the neck and shoulders worsening.

2025-05.daily_overview: After yesterday's high-intensity output, today marks a return to the office for deep processing and team collaboration. Feng Haoran leads the integration of client feedback and refines the division of revision tasks. The morning run with Gao Yunfei is no longer just exercise but has become an opportunity for emotional release and stress relief, bringing the two closer. Feng Haoran, who excels at work, has also begun to reveal the anxiety brought on by exam preparation in front of close friends, and together they plan for future health improvements. Due to ongoing stress, there has been a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Integrate customer feedback and develop a revision plan
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran convened Zheng Wenbo in the office and held a video conference with Sun Xiaoya to jointly review all customer feedback points from yesterday's meeting minutes. He guided the discussion, consolidating scattered opinions into several clear modules such as "Concretization of ESG Screening Criteria," "Refinement of Liquidity Stress Scenarios," and "Optimization of Presentation Logic." He also established specific deliverables and deadlines for each person over the next two days to ensure the revision work progressed efficiently.

events.name: An In-Depth Morning Run Conversation with Running Partner Gao Yunfei
events.description: In the misty early morning at Yuelu Mountain, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei went for their usual run. During the run, Gao Yunfei noticed that Feng Haoran was quieter than usual and proactively asked about his recent situation. Feng Haoran finally opened up, sharing the pressure from his CFA exam preparation progress, the upcoming test, and the exhaustion of simultaneously managing important client projects. Drawing from his experience in IT project management, Gao Yunfei suggested breaking down the big goal into manageable smaller tasks to alleviate anxiety, and mentioned that he had also recently started paying attention to health issues caused by prolonged sitting. This conversation went beyond their usual superficial exchanges.

events.name: Agreed to jointly develop a strength training plan after the examination.
events.description: Before concluding their morning run, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei, based on their shared concern for health issues, verbally agreed to jointly research and develop a strength training plan suitable for their schedules after the CFA exam in early June. This plan aims to address their physical fitness gaps beyond aerobic exercise and comprehensively enhance their overall physical condition.

events.name: Focus on revising the core model of asset allocation
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran shut out distractions and focused on revising the most critical part of the plan—the dynamic asset allocation model—in his home study. He updated the latest macroeconomic data and market volatility parameters, re-optimized the risk-return ratio calculations, and prepared more intuitive charts to illustrate the model's performance under different market conditions.

起始状态.心情: Slightly weary, yet the desire for a morning run and a heartfelt conversation is brewing.

结束状态.心情: Some pressure has been released, bringing a sense of relief and anticipation due to a new health agreement reached with friends.

2025-05.daily_overview: Flying to Shanghai again to attend the second day of the summit. The speech on personal branding at the summit deeply resonated with Feng Haoran, sparking new reflections on expanding his professional influence as an ENTJ. Meanwhile, during a work call, he unexpectedly gained a valuable opportunity for offline networking with an important client, Lin Zhihao, which he keenly seized. Returning to Changsha in the evening, in his study, he not only continued delving into cryptocurrency reports but also conceived the idea of adding a touch of greenery to his high-pressure life through gardening, beginning preliminary research. Due to excitement and excessive contemplation, he stayed up very late.

events.name: Attending the Asia Fintech Summit (Day 2)
events.description: Feng Haoran focuses on application cases of blockchain in areas such as supply chain finance. During a roundtable discussion on "How Financial Professionals Can Build Their Personal Professional Brands," he was deeply inspired by the experiences shared by several senior practitioners on establishing industry influence through writing in-depth articles and managing professional communities. He meticulously recorded this inspiration in his phone's memo app and began contemplating whether he could also structure and output complex investment knowledge.

events.name: Received a golf invitation from client Lin Zhihao.
events.description: During a break in the afternoon summit, he received a call from his client Lin Zhihao to discuss the quarterly report. As the conversation neared its end, Mr. Lin casually invited him to a small golf gathering in Changsha this Saturday. Feng Haoran immediately recognized this as an excellent opportunity to transcend purely business relations and deepen mutual trust. Although he had originally planned to dedicate the weekend to his CFA exam preparation, he enthusiastically and politely accepted the invitation over the phone, expressing his great anticipation.

events.name: Research and Planning for Balcony Small-Scale Gardening
events.description: Returning to his home in Changsha in the evening, after a prolonged period of intense mental exertion, Feng Haoran yearned for a new activity that could help him relax both physically and mentally. He searched online for "easy-to-grow balcony plants" and, considering the south-facing sunlight conditions of his balcony, initially selected small tomatoes and mint—plants that are both ornamental and edible. He began browsing gardening tutorials and compiled a simple list of tools and materials he might need to purchase.

events.name: Read the DeFi and NFT Analysis Report
events.description: Before going to bed, he continued with his cryptocurrency reading plan, focusing on analytical reports about the current state of decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols and the NFT market, in an attempt to understand the underlying business models and risk-return characteristics of these emerging fields.

events.name: Review CFA Behavioral Finance
events.description: To address his own weaknesses, he spent some time in the evenings watching online courses on behavioral finance, focusing on clarifying the manifestations of various cognitive biases (such as overconfidence and loss aversion) in investment decisions and their corresponding strategies.

起始状态.心情: Filled with intellectual curiosity, looking forward to the final gains of the summit.

结束状态.心情: The mind is active, with new thoughts on career development (personal branding) and anticipation for weekend social activities. Gardening plans bring a sense of freshness, but staying up late has led to fatigue.

2025-05.daily_overview: Friday was a day of efficient wrap-up and thorough preparation. Feng Haoran completed the final revision and submission of the client proposal in the office, earning recognition from his supervisor. Simultaneously, he did ample groundwork for tomorrow's important golf event: confirming details, preparing talking points, and organizing his equipment. After work, instead of diving straight into studying, he systematically organized the inspiration from the summit and truly launched his balcony gardening project by placing an order for the first batch of materials. The pressure of exam preparation still lingers, but life is gradually being infused with new hues from work achievements, social opportunities, and new hobbies, while his weight continues to increase due to irregular eating habits.

events.name: Submit the revised client proposal and report to the supervisor.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran collaborated with Zheng Wenbo to integrate their respective revision sections, forming a complete proposal that was more logically rigorous, data-rich, and directly responsive to client concerns. Before leaving work in the afternoon, he formally submitted it through the company system and went to Qian Yongqiang’s office for a brief oral report, highlighting the core strengths of the revisions. After reviewing it, Qian Yongqiang gave positive feedback and encouraged him to make the most of tomorrow’s golf gathering with General Manager Lin.

events.name: Systematically organize the insights and inspirations gained from the summit.
events.description: Upon returning home from work, Feng Haoran first digitized and archived the materials, notes, and business cards from the two-day summit. He specifically compiled his thoughts on "personal brand building" into a separate document, outlining preliminary ideas for two potential content directions: "Practical Notes on Asset Allocation" and "Frontier Interpretations of Fintech." He also recorded the platforms and examples he needed to research next.

events.name: Make comprehensive preparations for golf events
events.description: He confirmed the exact time, location, and dress code (business casual) for the following day's event with Lin Zhihao's assistant via WeChat. Subsequently, he checked his golf clubs, gloves, and golf shoes to ensure his equipment was in order. He also quickly reviewed recent financial news and prepared several topics related to regional economic policies and the investment environment in Changsha for potential discussion.

events.name: Place an order to purchase balcony gardening starter supplies.
events.description: In the evening, he put the gardening ideas he had researched the previous day into action. On an e-commerce platform, he compared prices and placed an order for basic tools such as nutrient soil, slow-release fertilizer, a gardening shovel, and a watering can, as well as seeds for cherry tomatoes and mint. To see results as soon as possible, he additionally purchased two potted mint seedlings that had already been cultivated.

events.name: Preliminary cleaning of balcony planting space
events.description: After placing the order, he went to the balcony, cleared away some idle cardboard boxes piled in the corner, wiped the floor and railings with a cloth, and initially planned out a sunny area for placing flowerpots in the future.

起始状态.心情: The objective is clear: to complete the final stages of work and prepare for weekend activities.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and well-organized, the completion of work brings a sense of ease, and there is anticipation for the activities of the new day and gardening plans.

2025-05.daily_overview: A vibrant and fulfilling Saturday. In the morning, Feng Haoran successfully played the role of a professional and appropriate practice partner at an upscale golf club, building closer relationships with client Lin Zhihao and his social circle in a relaxed atmosphere. In the afternoon, he translated his composure from social settings into action in daily life: he purchased and successfully planted the first batch of balcony plants in person; meanwhile, he elevated his photography hobby from private collection to the public sphere by posting selected works in a professional community. In the evening, he also completed a health-related purchase based on his new budget. Throughout the day, a delicate balance was achieved among career development, personal interests, and a healthy lifestyle. However, the post-golf gathering led to a noticeable weight gain, and prolonged sitting for exam preparation triggered early symptoms of neck and shoulder strain.

events.name: Attend a golf outing with client Lin Zhihao
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran arrived early at the Qingzhu Lake Golf Club to warm up at the practice range. After Lin Zhihao arrived with two entrepreneur friends, Feng Haoran quickly assumed his role. For most of the time, he listened attentively to the three men’s discussions on local commercial real estate and emerging industries, offering cautious yet professional insights from the perspectives of macroeconomics and investment risks only when asked. Maintaining a steady pace in his swings, he displayed a demeanor that was humble yet confident, successfully showcasing his professionalism and personal charm in an informal setting.

events.name: Midday Business Communication
events.description: After the round of golf, the four of them dined together at the club restaurant. The atmosphere was more relaxed than on the course, and the conversation expanded to hobbies and interests. Feng Haoran took the opportunity to mention his photography hobby, showing a few of his favorite city nightscape photos from his phone. This caught the interest of one of Lin Zhihao’s friends, who works in the cultural tourism industry, and they exchanged contact information.

events.name: Starting Balcony Gardening: Purchasing and Planting
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Feng Haoran did not rest but went directly to a nearby flower and bird market. He selected two robust young tomato seedlings and picked up the potted mint he had previously ordered. Back home, following an online tutorial, he carefully repotted the tomato seedlings and mint, adding new soil and base fertilizer, completing the initial planting and watering. Gazing at the fresh greenery in a corner of the balcony, he felt a long-lost sense of satisfaction unrelated to mental labor.

events.name: Posting Works on Professional Photography Communities
events.description: In the evening, he logged into the 500px photography community, updated his personal profile, and uploaded 15 carefully selected and post-processed urban street photography and nightscape works taken during the May Day holiday. For each photo, he included the shooting parameters, location, and a brief creative description. This was his first systematic public sharing of his works, driven by both the anticipation of recognition from fellow enthusiasts and the potential extension of his personal brand.

events.name: Implement Health Procurement Under the New Budget
events.description: In the evening, he logged into the fresh food app and ordered ingredients such as chicken breast, broccoli, and salad greens according to a healthier recipe. At the same time, he canceled two long-unused video streaming subscriptions and added a pair of sneakers to his shopping cart, planning to place the order during a promotional event.

起始状态.心情: With a hint of caution amidst anticipation, ready to present the best state in social situations.

结束状态.心情: Multiple Satisfactions: Smooth social interactions, successful initiation of gardening, release of photography works, pleasure derived from efficient utilization of the day, accompanied by the onset of neck and shoulder soreness.

2025-05.daily_overview: Sunday marked a return to the main theme of exam preparation. Feng Haoran conducted a full-scale mock exam to assess the results of his intensive review and dedicated considerable time to analyzing his mistakes. Meanwhile, his professionalism ensured he did not neglect appropriate follow-ups on yesterday's social engagements, sending a thank-you message to his client, Lin Zhihao. During breaks from studying, he performed his duties as a gardener for the first time, watering the new life on his balcony and observing their growth. This simple ritual became a precious respite amid the high-pressure study sessions. Due to the stress of exam preparation, he relied on snacks to stay alert, leading to a continued increase in his weight.

events.name: Second CFA Full-Length Mock Exam and In-Depth Analysis
events.description: In the morning, he took another mock exam. His score showed improvement compared to last week, but the financial report analysis section remained a time-consuming challenge. In the afternoon, he shut himself in the study, analyzed the reasons for each mistake question by question, revisited the corresponding chapters in the textbook, and completed a large number of targeted practice exercises, with a particular focus on strengthening his understanding of cash flow statements and financial statement ratio analysis.

events.name: Send a thank-you letter for the golf event to client Lin Zhihao
events.description: During the lunch break, he carefully edited a WeChat message to send to Lin Zhihao: "Good morning, Mr. Lin! Thank you for your invitation yesterday. The golf gathering was very enjoyable, and I learned a lot from the conversation with you and the other friends. I look forward to more opportunities to learn from you in the future. Have a great weekend!" The message was appropriate and timely, effectively reinforcing the social connection.

events.name: First Time Caring for Balcony Plants
events.description: During a break from studying, he went to the balcony and tested the soil moisture of the cherry tomato and mint potted plants with his fingers. Finding the surface soil had dried, he gently watered them with a spray bottle. Noticing that the tender leaves of the mint seemed to have unfurled slightly more than the day before, he took a photo with his phone to document it. This brief moment of care allowed him to detach from the complex financial formulas and find a sense of tranquility.

events.name: Analyzing Historical Data and Volatility of Cryptocurrencies
events.description: In the evening, to refresh his mind, he continued his research on cryptocurrencies, focusing on analyzing the price volatility of Bitcoin and Ethereum over the past few years, their correlation with other traditional assets (stocks, bonds), and attempting to understand their potential role as alternative assets in an investment portfolio.

events.name: Book Immersive Drama Tickets to Relieve Stress
events.description: Before going to bed, realizing he needed a thorough mental relaxation next week, he searched for recent theater performances in Changsha on a ticketing app. Attracted by the concept of "immersive," he booked a single ticket for *The Time Traveler's Wife* on the evening of Thursday, May 15, treating it as a reward milestone during his exam preparation period.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to test the week's review results with a mock exam.

结束状态.心情: Feeling grounded by academic progress, and still finding life enjoyable through tending plants and planning leisure activities, yet persistent symptoms of neck and shoulder strain remain.

2025-05.daily_overview: As the new week begins, work and exam preparation continue to advance on parallel tracks. Feng Haoran submitted the meticulously revised final proposal to client Huang Siqi before the deadline, marking a crucial step forward for this significant project. Meanwhile, inspired by the summit, his reflections on personal branding have progressed from inspiration to the preliminary research phase, as he begins analyzing the ecosystem of professional content platforms. The intensive evening CFA review sessions persist, but a lunchtime conversation with colleague Zheng Wenbo about the pressures of exam preparation made him feel he is not fighting this battle alone. His weight has stabilized slightly due to dietary control.

events.name: Submit the final revised proposal to client Huang Siqi
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran formally sent the final version of the wealth management plan, which incorporated all the team's revisions, to Huang Siqi via encrypted email, attaching a detailed suggested implementation timeline. He then called Huang Siqi's assistant to briefly explain the matter, ensuring the recipient had received it. With this important delivery completed, he felt a slight relief from the burden on his shoulders.

events.name: Research on Content Creation in the Financial Investment Sector
events.description: During lunch breaks and work intervals, he thoroughly browsed the financial investment sections on platforms such as Xueqiu and Zhihu. He analyzed the content style, update frequency, and audience engagement of several creators he admired, and preliminarily concluded that "practical analysis of asset allocation through case studies" could be a promising direction that leverages his professional expertise.

events.name: Evening Review of Key CFA Chapters
events.description: On Monday evening, he focused on reviewing the chapters on "Asset Allocation" and "Risk Management," which were highly relevant to his work. He not only worked on practice questions but also attempted to compare the models he designed for clients with the theoretical frameworks in the textbook to deepen his understanding. Additionally, he created portable flashcards for some of the complex calculation formulas to aid memorization.

events.name: Communicating with Colleagues on Stress-Relief Techniques for Exam Preparation
events.description: During the lunch break, he chatted with his colleague Zheng Wenbo, who was also preparing for other financial certifications, in the company's rest area. They shared time management tips for the final sprint phase and methods to combat anxiety (such as the Pomodoro Technique and brief meditation), encouraging each other and building a "study buddy" camaraderie akin to that of comrades in arms.

events.name: Analyzing the Cryptocurrency Market Structure Report
events.description: During his bedtime reading session, he studied an in-depth market report on the structure of mainstream cryptocurrency holders, the distribution of exchanges, and the characteristics of trading behaviors, aiming to understand the operational logic and potential risk points of this emerging market from a microstructural perspective.

起始状态.心情: Monday motivation, ready to tackle backlog tasks and advance learning.

结束状态.心情: The delivery of the project brings a sense of achievement, and new ideas for personal branding evoke a slight thrill, yet the burden of exam preparation remains heavy, and the discomfort in the neck and shoulders persists.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Tuesday, the main focus was on team collaboration to finalize the project plan. Feng Haoran and Zheng Wenbo worked closely together, updating the tax planning section of the plan in accordance with the latest policies, and ultimately integrated all revisions. During breaks, informal discussions with colleagues about digital assets broadened his perspective. In the evening, he set aside time to perform final professional-level refinements on selected photos intended for upload to a photography community, ensuring the works were presented in their best possible state. Work, professional exchanges, and personal hobbies were seamlessly interwoven throughout the day, with a slight weight gain noted due to prolonged sedentary study sessions.

events.name: Collaborate with colleagues to complete the update of the tax section of the proposal.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran and Zheng Wenbo, in accordance with the latest guidance on tax incentives for technology enterprises issued by the Ministry of Finance, conducted a detailed refinement of the tax planning section in their client's proposal. This adjustment enhanced its compliance and practicality, demonstrating the team's professional timeliness.

events.name: Integrate and finalize the solution document.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran integrated the updated tax section by Zheng Wenbo, the in-depth analysis of client risk preferences supplemented by Sun Xiaoya, and his own revised core model and ESG strategy into a unified proposal document. He spent considerable time on formatting checks and chart enhancements to ensure the final deliverable was of high quality in both content and presentation.

events.name: Exchange Insights on Digital Assets with Colleagues
events.description: During lunch, he shared a table with Zheng Wenbo in the cafeteria and naturally began discussing the recent regulatory developments and market fluctuations in cryptocurrencies. They exchanged research reports and information sources they had been following. Zheng Wenbo’s insights from the perspective of technological trends offered Feng Haoran some new inspiration.

events.name: Refine photography works for uploading
events.description: In the evening, he used Lightroom software to perform final color correction, contrast optimization, and detail sharpening on the more than 20 previously selected photos. He paid particular attention to noise control in the nightscape photos, repeatedly adjusting parameters until the images were clean and rich in layers.

events.name: Water the plants for the second time.
events.description: Before going to bed, he went to the balcony as usual to check on the plants. The cherry tomato seedlings seemed to have taken root firmly, while the mint appeared vibrant. He watered them moderately and removed one or two small weeds that had sprouted in the flowerpots.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, focusing on today's collaborative tasks.

结束状态.心情: The smooth workflow stemmed from efficient team collaboration, the photo retouching process brought creative satisfaction, yet neck and shoulder strain resulted in mild headaches.

2025-05.daily_overview: Similar to last Wednesday, the morning run once again served as a bond for emotional connection. In the morning, Feng Haoran shared insights from the summit on personal branding with Gao Yunfei while running. This impulse to share extended into the lunch break, where he engaged in a deep conversation with his colleague Zheng Wenbo at their regular Hunan restaurant, transcending routine work topics and even sparking the creative idea of collaborating on an investment podcast. In the evening, he not only reviewed for the CFA exam and studied cryptocurrency regulations but also trimmed the mint plants like a true gardener. Interpersonal relationships deepened through shared topics, and personal career plans became clearer through these exchanges. However, the pressure of exam preparation led to a reduction in exercise, keeping his weight stable at a high level.

events.name: Sharing New Career Insights with Gao Yunfei During Morning Jog
events.description: In the early morning at Yuelu Mountain, Feng Haoran, while jogging, proactively mentioned to Gao Yunfei the inspiration he gained from the Shanghai Summit, discussing the possibility for financial professionals to build personal brands through content creation. From the perspective of an internet product manager, Gao Yunfei shared insights on user positioning and content formats (video vs. text and images), offering Feng Haoran a number of practical suggestions.

events.name: In-depth exchange during a working lunch with colleague Zheng Wenbo
events.description: During the lunch break, the two met at a Hunan restaurant near the company. Feng Haoran shared in detail his observations from the summit, particularly his thoughts on personal brand building. Zheng Wenbo showed great interest and said half-jokingly and half-seriously, "Haoran, how about we start a podcast together? You can talk about practical asset allocation strategies, and I'll supplement with market hot-topic analysis." This proposal excited both of them, and as they ate, they engaged in a preliminary brainstorming session about the podcast's positioning, name, and update frequency.

events.name: Review Corporate Finance and Portfolio Management
events.description: In the evening, he continued his CFA review, focusing on tackling the chapters of "Corporate Finance" and "Portfolio Management," which involve extensive calculations and are closely related to practical work. By integrating his experience in developing solutions for clients to understand the theories, his efficiency improved.

events.name: Research on Global Cryptocurrency Regulatory Policies
events.description: As part of his reading plan, he studied reports on the evolution and future trends of cryptocurrency regulatory policies in China, the United States, Europe, and other regions, focusing on analyzing the impact of regulatory tightening on market liquidity and innovation activities, and made summary notes.

events.name: First Pruning for Potted Mint Plants
events.description: While inspecting the plants in the evening, he noticed that the mint branches and leaves had grown too densely, with some lower leaves beginning to yellow due to poor ventilation. He fetched a clean pair of scissors and carefully trimmed away the overly dense branches and withered old leaves to improve airflow through the center of the plant, thereby promoting the healthy growth of new shoots.

起始状态.心情: Fresh and invigorating, looking forward to the morning run and conversations with friends.

结束状态.心情: Inspiring and filled with a sense of connection, the creative exchanges with colleagues have rekindled a long-lost professional passion, while the successful gardening endeavors have brought a subtle sense of accomplishment. However, stiffness in the neck and shoulders persists.

2025-05.daily_overview: This was a day filled with warmth and insight. In the morning, Feng Haoran transformed social interactions into professional services by sending a quarterly report with an attached research paper to his client, Lin Zhihao. In the afternoon, he scheduled his annual health check-up and extended his concern for personal well-being to his parents in Wuhan, purchasing health monitoring devices online for them and patiently providing guidance. In the evening, he rewarded himself by attending an immersive theater performance alone, where he unexpectedly gained insights into emotional management through the dramatic tension and shared the experience with friends via WeChat. The pressure of exam preparation remained, yet his life was enriched by family care, artistic nourishment, and a sense of responsibility toward his parents. However, the prolonged exam preparation had clearly led to a suboptimal health state, with his weight reaching a peak and physical activity nearly coming to a halt.

events.name: Send the quarterly report and value-added information to client Lin Zhihao.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran compiled the quarterly investment report for Lin Zhihao and specifically attached several in-depth industry research reports related to the "Industrial Policies of Changsha High-Tech Zone," which had been discussed during their previous golf outing. He sent them together via email. In the email, he wrote: "Mr. Lin, please find the quarterly report for your review. I have also attached several recent research reports on the XX field we discussed last time, which may be of some reference value." This cleverly extended the social conversation into ongoing professional service.

events.name: Purchasing health monitoring devices for parents
events.description: Thinking of his upcoming physical examination, Feng Haoran suddenly grew concerned about his elderly parents living far away in Wuhan. He immediately searched and compared products on an e-commerce platform, ultimately selecting a set of user-friendly and accurate smart blood pressure monitors and pulse oximeters for his parents. He placed the order directly and had it shipped to their home in Wuhan.

events.name: Guiding Parents in Using Health Devices
events.description: After placing the order, he immediately contacted his mother, Li Xiuying, via WeChat video call. He demonstrated the usage of the device in detail and repeatedly reminded his parents to develop the habit of monitoring and recording data regularly every week, promising to check their records periodically. Although his mother said "no need to trouble yourself" verbally, her tone revealed a sense of contentment.

events.name: Watch the immersive play "The Time Traveler's Wife"
events.description: In the evening, he temporarily set aside everything and headed to the small theater in Kaifu District. In the immersive performance environment, the actors' emotional outbursts, so close at hand, completely captivated him. The struggles and choices of the characters in the play, caught in a time paradox, reminded him of moments in investment decisions often swayed by emotions.

events.name: Reflect after watching the play and share with friends
events.description: After the performance, he ordered an Americano at the café next to the theater and wrote in his phone's memo: "The tension in drama stems from the emotional choices characters make in extreme situations. This is essentially a matter of emotional management, similar to the greed and fear investors face during market volatility." He then shared this reflection and his theater experience with his friend Peng Yuqing, and the two briefly exchanged their views on "emotion and decision-making."

events.name: Schedule an Annual Health Check-up
events.description: During a break at work, he used the online platform of the company's partnered medical examination center to schedule a comprehensive annual health check-up for the weekend, completing the routine procedure of taking responsibility for his own health.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, planning to complete several caring tasks and enjoy an evening of one's own.

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, fulfilling filial duties for parents brings a sense of solidity, while the theater experience offers high-quality spiritual enjoyment and cognitive inspiration. However, physical fatigue has accumulated, with noticeable symptoms of neck and shoulder strain, and exercise has nearly come to a halt.

2025-05.daily_overview: A workday interwoven with personal interests and family care. The daytime proceeded with routine work, while the evening was utilized for photography practice to alleviate work stress, taking advantage of the pleasant weather. Concurrently, the arrival of the annual health checkup report brought health concerns to the forefront, naturally extending into care for distant parents, culminating in the purchase of health monitoring devices.

events.name: High-Intensity Work and Market Discussions
events.description: As an investment advisor, Feng Haoran handled the asset allocation adjustment needs of several high-net-worth clients during the day. Over lunch, he discussed the recent volatile market data with his colleague Zheng Wenbo and exchanged views on the future market trends.

events.name: Slow Shutter Photography Practice by the River
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran brought his camera and tripod to the Xiangjiang Scenic Belt. He selected an open viewing platform near the Orange Isle Bridge and set up his equipment. To capture the flowing river and slowly moving clouds, he experimented with a neutral density filter, gradually slowing the shutter speed from 1/15 second to 2 seconds, observing and recording the differences in the silky texture of the water and the trailing effect of the clouds at various speeds. The lingering glow of the sunset added a warm tone to the scene. He took over a dozen photos with different settings, planning to carefully compare them after returning home.

events.name: Review the annual physical examination report and take notes.
events.description: At home in the evening, Feng Haoran received an electronic PDF version of his medical examination report on his phone. He carefully reviewed each indicator, paying particular attention to the conclusion sections that indicated [blood lipid levels slightly above the upper reference limit] and [ultrasound showing a tendency toward mild fatty liver]. He recorded the doctor's recommendations—[control diet, increase exercise, and schedule regular follow-ups]—one by one in his phone's memo app, and noted key points to discuss with his parents, such as family medical history and the importance of long-term health monitoring.

events.name: Online Shopping of Health Monitoring Devices for Parents
events.description: Concerned about his parents' health, Feng Haoran immediately searched for [home blood pressure monitor and pulse oximeter for the elderly] on an e-commerce platform. He compared several products that were easy to operate, had large screens, and featured voice broadcast functionality. After reading numerous user reviews, he finally selected a set from a reputable brand that could synchronize measurement data to a mobile app. After filling in the address of his hometown in Wuhan, he completed the online payment, took a screenshot of the order, and sent it to his mother, Li Xiuying, reminding her to watch for its delivery.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle urgent customer demands.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran received a phone call from an important client inquiring about strategies to address sudden market fluctuations. He had to work overtime for an hour on short notice, quickly analyzing data and providing preliminary recommendations via video conference, which delayed his bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with plans for the new day's work.

结束状态.心情: With a hint of contemplation, the physical examination results brought a touch of cautious concern for health and the future, coupled with a slight fatigue from working overtime.

2025-05.daily_overview: A day of rest filled with green surprises and social reflections. The morning gardening discovery brought pure joy, while the evening class reunion served as a mirror, reflecting different life trajectories and stirring Feng Haoran’s inner reflections on his own stage and responsibilities. Exam preparation persisted amidst the gaps of social engagements.

events.name: Morning Surprise: Cherry Tomatoes Sprouting
events.description: During his morning routine check of the potted plants on the balcony, Feng Haoran was delighted to discover that in the planter where he had sown the cherry tomatoes, three or four tender green sprouts, still bearing their brown seed coats, had emerged from the soil surface that had shown no signs of life just days before. He crouched down for a closer look and captured this initial stage of life using the macro mode on his phone. Filled with joy, he adjusted his watering strategy. He found a fine-mist spray bottle and switched to gently spraying the soil surface each morning and evening, careful to avoid knocking over these fragile seedlings with a stronger stream of water.

events.name: Morning Jogging and Exam Preparation Review
events.description: After completing a 40-minute morning run at Yuelu Mountain, Feng Haoran returned home to take a shower and enjoy a simple breakfast. In the morning, following his CFA sprint plan, he refrained from attempting new practice questions and instead quickly reviewed the core formulas, conceptual frameworks, and common pitfalls of the Alternative Investments and Behavioral Finance sections. He used colored pens to highlight key points in his notes. To ease the tension from exam preparation, he listened to half an hour of his favorite post-rock music during his lunch break.

events.name: Preparation and Considerations Before an Appointment
events.description: On Saturday evening, after finishing his studies for the day, Feng Haoran took a short break. He changed into a comfortable casual shirt and left home ahead of the scheduled time, taking a taxi to the authentic Hunan restaurant located in an alley downtown, which Wu Junjie had reserved. On the way, he browsed through recent work memos on his phone, contemplating optimization strategies for a client’s investment portfolio, while also feeling a hint of anticipation for the upcoming reunion with his old classmates.

events.name: University Classmates Gathering at a Hunan Cuisine Restaurant
events.description: Feng Haoran arrived at the restaurant and met up with Wu Junjie and two other university classmates. The four of them ordered a table of classic Hunan dishes: steamed fish head with chopped chili, stir-fried yellow beef with chili, and stir-fried pork with chili. The gathering began with lively reminiscences of skipping classes together and pulling all-nighters to prepare for exams during their university days. However, as the conversation naturally shifted to their current situations, Feng Haoran noticed that the focus gradually drifted toward topics such as [the pressure of being promoted to management], [the struggle to upgrade to a school district apartment for their children], and [how to navigate conflicts with their partners’ families]. As the only unmarried person at the table, with his recent focus entirely on career advancement, Feng Haoran found himself mostly playing the role of a listener. He genuinely felt that although their camaraderie remained, each person’s life priorities and worries had quietly diverged, evoking in him a subtle sense of detachment and prompting reflection on his own pace in life.

events.name: The End of the Gathering and the Solitary Aftertaste
events.description: The gathering lasted for over two hours and concluded amidst laughter and reflection. Everyone bid farewell to one another, agreeing to meet again next time. Feng Haoran parted ways with his classmates at the restaurant entrance and took a taxi alone back to his home in the Yuelu District. As the evening breeze brushed past, he gazed at the dazzling cityscape outside the car window, replaying the conversations from the night in his mind. The tension between [family responsibilities] and [personal development] discussed by his classmates gave him a more concrete sense of the asynchrony of so-called [life stages], subtly stirring something within him about long-term planning.

events.name: Made a spur-of-the-moment decision to have a late-night snack.
events.description: After returning home, Feng Haoran felt somewhat hungry due to the excitement from the party conversation. He impulsively ordered a barbecue takeout as a late-night snack, which deviated from his healthy eating plan and resulted in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Relax, with the leisure of the weekend and the anticipation for the growth of plants.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room in a home in Yuelu District
结束状态.心情: Complex, carrying the lingering warmth of the gathering, along with a faint contemplation on the divergences in life's trajectories, coupled with a slight sense of remorse after the late-night snack.

state.今日运动: 40-minute morning run at Yuelu Mountain

2025-05.daily_overview: A Sunday of profound inward exploration through writing, reflection, and family connection. The morning was dedicated to crafting a professional article, while the afternoon transformed the social reflections from the previous night into self-affirmation. The evening family call extended personal health concerns into mutual care, converting them into a two-way flow of emotion and practical support between parents and myself.

events.name: Drafting Preliminary Professional Analysis Article
events.description: On Sunday morning, Feng Haoran isolated himself from external distractions and focused intently in his home study, beginning to draft an in-depth analytical article on the theme of "Family Asset Allocation Strategies in the Post-Pandemic Era: From Defense to Structural Growth." Drawing on recent real-life cases from serving high-net-worth clients, he analyzed the logic of asset rotation amid inflation expectations and changing interest rate environments, incorporating insights on real estate, equity assets, and alternative investment instruments. By noon, a nearly 3,000-word first draft, logically clear but somewhat dry, had been completed.

events.name: Self-Confirmation During Morning Runs
events.description: The Sunday morning shower disrupted Feng Haoran's running plan, so he opted for a jog in a nearby park in the afternoon after the rain stopped. While running, he found himself still reflecting on the thoughts stirred by last night's gathering. He realized that there were indeed noticeable differences in life priorities between himself and some of his classmates. However, this did not make him feel anxious or left behind. Instead, it more clearly affirmed his current choice—to fully dedicate himself to pursuing the CFA certification and career advancement during his professional prime, which aligns perfectly with the achievement-oriented path typical of an ENTJ personality. This reflection further strengthened his resolve to stay the course.

events.name: Maintain Contact with Classmates
events.description: After running home, Feng Haoran expressed his gratitude to the classmates who attended last night's gathering via the WeChat group and shared several photos of the dishes taken during the event (he habitually took a picture when all the dishes were served). He wrote in the group: [Same place, same flavors, and new topics. Let's meet again next time!] effortlessly maintaining the bond among classmates.

events.name: Weekly Family Video Call (In-Depth Health Communication)
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran held his weekly routine video call with his parents in Wuhan. He proactively shared key information from his medical examination report and the doctor's recommendations. On the other end of the screen, his parents showed great concern, with his mother Li Xiuying repeatedly urging him to stay up less late and eat better. Seizing the opportunity, Feng Haoran inquired about his parents' recent health conditions and their current usage of existing medical insurance, informing them that he had already ordered a blood pressure monitor and a pulse oximeter for them. In the latter part of the conversation, his mother mentioned that their current supplementary medical insurance was about to expire and expressed concerns about the complex products on the market and the renewal process. Feng Haoran asked in detail about his parents' current health status and their specific coverage needs, promising to use his professional expertise to help them search for and select suitable new products.

events.name: Adjusting Bedtime Due to Fatigue
events.description: Due to staying up late at the gathering the night before and the mental exertion from writing during the day, Feng Haoran felt exceptionally exhausted. He decided to go to bed early to regain his energy and canceled his originally scheduled evening study plan.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a residence in Yuelu District
起始状态.心情: Quiet, ready to immerse in focused writing

结束状态.心情: Steadfast, having completed professional output, and feeling a sense of being needed and the responsibility to give back in family communication, weary yet at peace.
