2025-05.daily_overview: A day filled with pragmatic actions and the transmission of care. In Wuhan, a mother prepares healthy hometown flavors for her son in her kitchen, while in Changsha, Feng Haoran simultaneously advances multiple plans: designing a scientific exercise regimen for health, constructing a research framework for knowledge expansion, and securing important health and financial protection for his parents. Efficiency and warmth progress hand in hand.

events.name: (Mother) Selects Healthy Ingredients
events.description: In Wuhan, mother Li Xiuying had her son's medical report on her mind, particularly the advice to [control his diet]. She made a special trip to the supermarket and farmers' market near her home, carefully selecting ingredients that her son enjoys while adhering to low-fat and healthy principles: fresh, soft lotus roots, grass carp with fewer bones, lean pork tenderloin, and she specifically chose low-sodium soy sauce and olive oil.

events.name: (Mother) Prepares Healthy Hometown Cuisine
events.description: Li Xiuying spent the entire afternoon busying herself in the kitchen at home. Following the principle of using less oil and salt, she minced fish into a paste to make light fish cakes and stuffed lean meat filling into lotus root slices to prepare steamed lotus root sandwiches. Each dish was a Hubei-style home-cooked meal that Feng Haoran had loved since childhood, but the recipes had been modified for healthier preparation. She carefully divided the prepared food into small portions, packed them in airtight containers, making it convenient for her son to consume them over multiple meals.

events.name: (Mother) packs and sends a care package
events.description: Li Xiuying carefully packed portioned health foods, some vacuum-sealed Wuhan-style bean skin, along with her handwritten health reminder cards and an improved recipe, into a foam-insulated box containing ice packs. She then went to a courier service point to send this weighty expression of maternal love to Changsha, opting for next-day delivery in hopes that her son would receive it as soon as possible.

events.name: Develop a structured two-week exercise plan
events.description: Based on the recommendations from the medical examiner and insights gained from discussions with his running friend Gao Yunfei, Feng Haoran utilized his evenings in the study to meticulously formulate a two-week scientific exercise plan. The plan specifies interval running or core training on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday mornings, with a long-distance slow run or hike on weekends. He established specific goals, such as using a fitness tracker to monitor heart rate zones and taking breaks to move every 45 minutes of work, and set the schedule as his phone wallpaper.

events.name: Building a Cognitive Framework for Cryptocurrency
events.description: Utilizing fragmented time during lunch breaks and evenings, Feng Haoran systematically integrated the extensive notes he had taken over the past two weeks on blockchain and cryptocurrencies. He created a mind map using whiteboard software, initially constructing a cognitive framework that included dimensions such as technical principles, market ecosystems, risk categories (volatility, regulation, security), and mainstream applications. He also marked several core questions that required further in-depth research.

events.name: Research and select supplementary medical insurance for parents
events.description: During a break in his morning work, Feng Haoran utilized multiple online insurance platforms and financial information websites to conduct an in-depth study of medical and accident insurance suitable for middle-aged and elderly individuals. He focused on comparing coverage, premiums, renewal conditions, and service reputation. After a comprehensive evaluation, he ultimately selected a combination of hospitalization medical insurance and accident insurance with extensive coverage and flexible renewal terms for each of his parents. During his lunch break, he completed the online application and payment through the official app.

events.name: Explain the insurance policy to parents and arrange follow-up matters.
events.description: After returning home from work, Feng Haoran downloaded and saved the generated electronic insurance policy, and organized key information such as insurance coverage and claims procedures. In the evening, he sent the electronic policy along with a self-compiled [Important Notes] document to his parents via WeChat. He then followed up with a phone call, explaining the coverage details and the steps to follow in case a claim needs to be filed in the future, using simple and understandable language. He also reminded them to keep the relevant information properly stored.

events.name: Temporary Work Project Launch
events.description: In the evening, supervisor Qian Yongqiang assigned an urgent project that required Feng Haoran to assist in analyzing a complex market report over the next three days, forcing him to adjust his evening plans and extend his working hours.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a residence in Yuelu District
起始状态.心情: Start the new week with positivity and the drive to execute new plans.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at Home in Yuelu District
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and reassured, several plans have been advanced, especially after securing insurance for my parents, which made me feel that a step of responsibility has been fulfilled. However, work pressure has slightly increased.

state.今日运动: 30-minute morning run (Day 1 of implementing the new plan)

2025-05.daily_overview: A workday that strikes a balance between deepening client relationships and personal health vigilance. Proactive communication from clients brings positive professional feedback, while the formally received health check report serves as a wake-up call, swiftly shifting health management from [planning] to [immediate action]. From adjusting dietary habits to purchasing equipment and engaging in evening core training, the gears of change have begun to turn.

events.name: Positive Feedback from Customer Lin Zhihao
events.description: In the morning, client Lin Zhihao proactively called Feng Haoran to express appreciation for a research report on commercial real estate REITs that Feng had shared the previous week, noting that the analytical perspective was quite unique. During the call, Lin Zhihao spoke more openly than before about his company's potential future capital operation plans and financing needs, hinting that he hoped Feng Haoran could become involved in the planning process at an early stage. This communication marked an evolution in their relationship from a one-way advisory service to a deeper and more forward-looking partnership.

events.name: Received and processed the medical examination report
events.description: Before his noon break, Feng Haoran received the official annual electronic report from the medical examination center on his phone. Although he had been mentally prepared, seeing the clear diagnostic conclusions of [elevated total cholesterol and LDL cholesterol] and [a tendency toward mild fatty liver disease] gave him a genuine sense of urgency. He immediately booked and conducted a 15-minute video medical consultation through the company’s partnered online healthcare platform. After understanding his work nature, dietary habits, and exercise routine, the doctor provided clear recommendations: [immediately adjust the dietary structure, reduce the intake of saturated fats and refined carbohydrates, and adhere to at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic exercise per week].

events.name: Adjust Lunch Options
events.description: Following the doctor's advice, Feng Haoran gave up his original plan of ordering Hunan cuisine takeout and instead went with his colleague Zheng Wenbo to a newly opened light food restaurant near the company. He ordered a salad that included grilled chicken breast, a generous portion of vegetables, and quinoa, specifically requesting the dressing to be served on the side and drizzling only a small amount of vinaigrette.

events.name: Harvesting mint leaves to make beverages
events.description: Returning home in the evening, he noticed that the mint on the balcony had grown quite lush. He picked a few of the freshest and most tender leaves, washed them, placed them in a glass, poured in warm water, and prepared a refreshing glass of mint water. This zero-calorie natural beverage replaced the sugar-free carbonated drinks he might have consumed after work in the past.

events.name: Purchase equipment for implementing the exercise plan.
events.description: To better implement his exercise plan, particularly to improve his sedentary habits, Feng Haoran ordered a mini pedal exerciser for use under his desk online. At the same time, he retrieved his fitness tracker, which had been unused for some time, fully charged it, and checked whether functions such as heart rate monitoring were working properly, ensuring that his quantitative monitoring tools were ready.

events.name: Evening Core Strength Training Initiated
events.description: At 8 p.m., Feng Haoran laid out a yoga mat in the living room and began his planned core strength training. Following the tutorial from a fitness app, he completed three sets of planks (45 seconds per set), three sets of crunches (15 repetitions per set), and Russian twists. After the workout, he performed thorough stretching. Although his muscles felt somewhat sore, the post-exercise sweat left him feeling refreshed and more energized.

events.name: Continue the Urgent Work Project
events.description: Due to the needs of a temporary project, Feng Haoran worked an extra hour after core training to analyze market data, resulting in a slightly later bedtime.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District
起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare for the workday.

结束状态.心情: Alert yet positive, the health warning prompts action. After completing the first core training session, there is a slight sense of accomplishment, but work pressure persists.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning jogging, 20 minutes of evening core training

2025-05.daily_overview: A day navigating through health management, exam preparation stress, and the need for emotional support. Morning runs have shifted to a more scientific interval training mode, with continuous refinements in the details of the health improvement plan. The intense CFA review and lingering thoughts after a class reunion left him feeling the need to talk, prompting him to proactively reach out to a friend. The research on digital assets has also concluded, entering the review and reflection phase.

events.name: Develop a detailed health improvement plan
events.description: During breakfast, Feng Haoran refined his health improvement plan in his memo. He decided to limit his takeout meals to no more than three times per week and noted the ingredients he needed to increase his intake of, such as deep-sea fish, oats, and broccoli. Regarding exercise, he planned to gradually extend his morning run from 30 minutes to 45 minutes and scheduled strength training sessions for Tuesday and Thursday evenings. He also set data tracking goals, including weighing himself once a week and checking his body fat percentage monthly.

events.name: Variable Pace Running Training at Yuelu Mountain in the Early Morning
events.description: At six in the morning, Feng Haoran arrived at Yuelu Mountain, put on his fitness tracker, and began implementing his new variable-speed running plan. He adopted a cyclic pattern of [jogging for 5 minutes to warm up, then running at a faster pace for 3 minutes, and returning to jogging for 2 minutes], completing a total of 6 cycles. During the run, he closely monitored his heart rate changes to ensure that his heart rate remained within the aerobic fat-burning zone during the [faster pace] segments. After the training, he recorded his average heart rate and perceived exertion in the app.

events.name: Internal Investment Strategy Seminar
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran's team held a quarterly strategy seminar, chaired by his direct supervisor Qian Yongqiang. The meeting analyzed the impact of recent macroeconomic data on various asset classes and discussed several potential investment opportunities. Based on his research on digital assets, Feng Haoran cautiously shared his observations on the application of blockchain technology in traditional finance, which sparked discussions among his colleagues.

events.name: Proactively contact friends to seek emotional support
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran felt an invisible pressure building up as he recalled the reflections from a class reunion a few days earlier and the increasingly approaching CFA exam. He contacted his friend Peng Yuqing via WeChat: [Lately, I’ve been feeling a bit overwhelmed by work and the exam, and it’s been a while since we last met. Are you free to have dinner and chat tomorrow evening?] Peng Yuqing replied promptly, and the two agreed to meet the following evening at a quiet Japanese ramen restaurant.

events.name: Reviewing the Digital Asset Cognitive Framework
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran conducted a final review of the cryptocurrency cognitive framework he had constructed the previous day. He examined the completeness of each logical chain and identified several core questions that required further in-depth research, such as the evolution of regulatory policies in different countries and security risk cases of mainstream DeFi protocols. This prepared him for potential expert consultations or in-depth reading in the future.

events.name: Complete urgent work projects
events.description: Feng Haoran completed the data analysis section of the temporary project by working overtime, submitted the preliminary report, and felt relieved, though he experienced significant mental fatigue.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a residence in Yuelu District
起始状态.心情: Slightly tense, with the determination to implement the new training plan.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at Home in Yuelu District
结束状态.心情: Having released some pent-up emotions and actively arranged to meet friends, there is now an anticipation for venting pressure, leading to a slight sense of relief, though fatigue still lingers.

state.今日运动: 40-minute Variable Speed Running Training at Yuelu Mountain

2025-05.daily_overview: A day interwoven with action and solace. From booking cleaning services for a healthy home to receiving a care package from a mother bridging the distance, practical actions brought a sense of control. In the evening, a candid conversation with a close friend provided a valuable emotional outlet and steadfast support to "proceed at one's own pace" amid his high-pressure exam preparation and reflections on life stages.

events.name: Schedule a Home Deep Cleaning Service
events.description: Considering the upcoming hot summer and the need to improve the living environment's health, Feng Haoran scheduled an in-depth air conditioner cleaning service for the weekend via a mobile app. At the same time, based on his shopping list, he purchased refrigerator and washing machine cleaners online, as well as consumables such as water purifier filter cartridges and bathroom ventilation filter screens, planning a comprehensive home maintenance session over the weekend.

events.name: Received a loving health package from my mother.
events.description: In the afternoon, a courier delivered a foam insulated box sent by his mother from Wuhan. Upon opening it, Feng Haoran found neatly packaged fish cakes and lotus root sandwiches, along with a handwritten note from his mother. Deeply moved, he immediately took a photo and sent it to his mother to express his gratitude. That evening, he heated up a portion of the lotus root sandwiches as part of his dinner. Prepared with less oil and salt, this healthier version of a hometown delicacy felt particularly heartwarming.

events.name: Review the CFA Core Framework
events.description: Thursday evening is the designated time for CFA review. Feng Haoran focused on reviewing the core frameworks of two subjects: performance attribution and private wealth management. Using a hypothetical high-net-worth client case, he practiced how to systematically develop a comprehensive wealth planning solution covering tax planning, estate inheritance, and insurance allocation, and simulated drafting the core sections of the proposal.

events.name: Stress-Relieving Heart-to-Heart with Close Friend Peng Yuqing
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran met Peng Yuqing at the agreed-upon Japanese ramen restaurant. After ordering, Feng Haoran initiated the conversation by mentioning the health issues discovered during his recent medical check-up and the immense time and mental pressure brought on by his CFA exam preparation. Peng Yuqing listened attentively and then shared her own stress-relief methods from working in a high-pressure internet company, such as ten minutes of midday meditation and short walks in the park after work. The conversation naturally shifted to the class reunion a few days earlier, where Feng Haoran half-jokingly asked, "Did you feel pressured by peers who seem to have moved ahead to the next stage of life?" Peng Yuqing responded candidly, "Of course I did! But I think everyone has their own timeline, and it’s most important to follow your own pace. Like you, fully focusing on your career right now is also a cool pace, isn’t it?" She also openly shared the different yet similar pressures she faces as a woman in both the professional and marriage markets.

events.name: An old friend dropped by unexpectedly.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran's high school classmate Dong Haoran unexpectedly visited Changsha on a business trip. The two spontaneously met for coffee, talked late into the night, shared updates and investment ideas, which resulted in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic, planning today's various arrangements.

结束状态.心情: The warmth and understanding, along with a mother's care and the empathy and encouragement from close friends, greatly alleviated the inner anxiety and sense of loneliness, though staying up late brought slight fatigue.

state.今日运动: 30-minute morning run

2025-05.daily_overview: A Friday steadily advancing amidst multitasking. From skill practice driven by personal interests, to morning jog conversations with friends, and then to plant care in the scorching weather, life is filled with intricate details. Exam preparation has entered an intensive phase of full-scale simulations, while the heart-to-heart talk from the previous night prompted him to reflect alone, leading to subtle adjustments in the priorities of life’s important matters.

events.name: Low-Light Photography Parameter Practice
events.description: Early in the morning after getting up, Feng Haoran practiced photography by simulating low-light conditions in his study. He turned off the main light, leaving only a desk lamp on, and used his camera to shoot still-life ornaments on the bookshelf at different ISO values (ranging from 800 to 6400). He then zoomed in on the images on his computer for comparison, gaining an intuitive understanding of his camera's noise control capability and detail retention at high ISO settings. This exercise provided him with valuable parameter experience for future nighttime or indoor street photography.

events.name: Morning jog and conversation with university classmate Wu Junjie
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran met with Wu Junjie, who was also in Changsha, for a morning run at Yuelu Mountain. During the run, Feng Haoran verbally outlined the core viewpoints of the article he was writing on [Family Asset Allocation] and his preliminary ideas for personal branding. As an IT professional, Wu Junjie raised several questions from the perspective of a non-financial reader, such as [How can ordinary families determine whether they should adopt a defensive or offensive strategy?] and [Are there too many technical terms in the article?]. This feedback made Feng Haoran realize that the article needed to include more relatable real-life examples and more accessible explanations.

events.name: Dealing with High Temperatures, Carefully Tending to Plants
events.description: Changsha has been experiencing consecutive days of sunny and hot weather. Feng Haoran noticed that the soil on the balcony was drying out particularly quickly. He adjusted his watering strategy by increasing the amount of water during his morning inspection to ensure the soil was thoroughly moistened. During the hottest part of the afternoon, he also made a point of temporarily moving the shade-loving mint potted plant to a location with diffused light to prevent the tender leaves from being scorched by the intense sun.

events.name: High-Intensity CFA Full-Length Mock Exam
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran strictly adhered to the time limit for the morning session (Essay) of the CFA Level III exam and completed a full-length mock test. He eliminated all distractions, wrote his answers by hand on scratch paper, and practiced both his response speed and handwriting standards. After three hours of intense mental exertion, he felt somewhat fatigued but persisted in conducting an in-depth analysis by comparing his answers with the model solutions, summarizing his areas of lost points and issues with time allocation.

events.name: Variable Speed Running Training and Heart Rate Optimization
events.description: To consolidate the workout effect, Feng Haoran went to the gym after work in the afternoon (as it was too hot outdoors) and performed interval running training again on the treadmill. He attempted to adjust different incline levels to simulate uphill running, continuously monitoring changes in heart rate to identify the optimal intensity range that could provide effective exercise without causing excessive fatigue.

events.name: Reflection and Fine-Tuning of Life Priorities
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran reflected alone on his conversation with Peng Yuqing from the previous night. He realized that anxiety about life stages was not unique to him, and this sense of shared experience was in itself a comfort. He decided to move the matter of "finding a suitable partner" slightly forward on his priority list—from "leaving it to fate, to be considered after the exams" to "consciously paying attention and making connections after the exams." However, concrete actions were still clearly scheduled after the CFA exam, with the current core goal remaining unwavering.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a residence in Yuelu District
起始状态.心情: Clear-headed and action-oriented

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District
结束状态.心情: Slightly weary yet clear-minded, with a heightened sense of purpose after intense simulation and deep reflection.

state.今日运动: Had a one-hour morning run conversation with Wu Junjie, followed by a 30-minute interval run at the gym.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, hot but windy in the evening.

2025-05.daily_overview: A comprehensive [Healthy Living Action Day]. From curtains and sofas to air conditioners and water purifiers, a systematic deep cleaning and maintenance was carried out. Through the labor, a sense of control over the living environment was felt, followed by purchasing healthy ingredients and trying new stress-relief methods after completion. This extended the concept of health management from the body to every space in life.

events.name: Self-cleaning of curtains and sofas
events.description: Before the scheduled air conditioning cleaning technician arrived, Feng Haoran used the morning to carefully remove surface dust from the living room and bedroom curtains with the curtain attachment of the vacuum cleaner. He then wiped the sofa surfaces with a damp cloth and used the crevice tool of the vacuum cleaner to clear away accumulated snack crumbs and dust from between the sofa cushions, making the living room feel instantly brighter.

events.name: Professional Deep Cleaning for Air Conditioning Systems
events.description: The scheduled technician arrived on time and performed a professional deep cleaning of the wall-mounted air conditioner at home. Feng Haoran observed nearby and saw that the removed filter screen was covered with a thick layer of dust. The technician used high-pressure steam and equipment to clean the interior and demonstrated how to disassemble and clean the filter screen monthly by oneself. Feng Haoran carefully noted down the steps.

events.name: Cleaning the Refrigerator and Washing Machine
events.description: After seeing off the master, Feng Haoran began cleaning the refrigerator. He unplugged the power, emptied the contents, wiped the interior shelves and seals with specialized cleaner, and discarded expired food. Next, following the instructions, he ran a high-temperature drum self-cleaning cycle for the drum washing machine and cleaned the detergent dispenser.

events.name: Replace the filter element and ventilation filter screen
events.description: Feng Haoran turned off the water supply and power to the kitchen water purifier, then proceeded to replace the new PP cotton filter element and activated carbon filter element. Afterward, he removed the ventilation cover of the bathroom heater and replaced the ventilation filter inside, which had already turned somewhat black.

events.name: Enjoy a Clean Home Environment
events.description: After completing all the cleaning and maintenance tasks, it was already evening. Feng Haoran opened all the windows to let in fresh air, enjoying the coolness brought by the evening breeze. He turned on the newly cleaned air conditioner, which now looked as good as new, and savored the comfort of the clean air. He felt very satisfied with this systematic home maintenance effort, believing that the healthiness of his living environment had been greatly improved.

events.name: Procurement of Healthy Food Ingredients and Monitoring Equipment
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran went to the supermarket for a major shopping trip. He purchased more vegetables (spinach, broccoli, tomatoes), high-quality protein sources (chicken breast, salmon fillets), and staple foods such as whole-wheat bread and oats. Meanwhile, to achieve more precise health management, he placed an online order for a smart body fat scale that can connect to an app and an upper-arm electronic blood pressure monitor.

events.name: Try new stress-relief methods
events.description: Inspired by Peng Yuqing's suggestion, Feng Haoran tried a 10-minute guided meditation using a mobile app before bed. Following the audio instructions, he focused on his breathing and body scan, gaining an initial experience of this relaxation method. Although his thoughts occasionally drifted to the upcoming exams during the process, he felt that his nerves had indeed relaxed somewhat after completing the session.

events.name: Exercise suspended due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to the significant physical exertion from a full day of household chores, Feng Haoran made a temporary decision to cancel the evening's scheduled strength training and opted for rest instead to recover his energy.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, ready to dive into [Household Chores Day]

结束状态.心情: Clean, comfortable, and filled with a sense of accomplishment, a thorough transformation of the living environment brings control and joy over life—tired yet satisfied.

state.今日运动: All-day household chores (cleaning, carrying), equivalent to moderate physical activity

2025-05.daily_overview: A Sunday that balances long-term planning, financial review, and mental relaxation. In the morning, important client follow-ups and personal asset organization are handled, while the afternoon is dedicated to balancing mental work with regular exercise and social running. The evening involves knowledge integration and financial review, incorporating newly added family responsibility expenses into the overall plan. The blueprint for life and work unfolds steadily and methodically.

events.name: Drafting a Comprehensive Customer Service Framework
events.description: Based on the in-depth communication with Lin Zhihao on Tuesday, Feng Haoran organized the potential business needs of his company in the study. He began drafting a preliminary [Comprehensive Financial Services Cooperation Framework Concept], covering areas such as potential M&A financing advisory, executive incentive plan design, and family trust establishment, laying the groundwork for subsequent formal proposals.

events.name: Initiate Preliminary Financial Assessment for Housing Exchange
events.description: Out of consideration for his living environment and future family, Feng Haoran began to seriously contemplate the possibility of changing his home. He conducted an online valuation of his current property through apps such as Beike and Lianjia, and logged into his mobile banking app to check the remaining mortgage balance. Through simple calculations, he preliminarily estimated his net assets and potential home replacement capacity, forming a rough financial framework in his mind.

events.name: Second Round Core Strength Training
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran conducted his second round of core training at home. He appropriately increased the duration of the plank (aiming to hold it for 60 seconds) and the number of sets of crunches, while incorporating new exercises such as leg raises. He focused more on strengthening the abdominal and lower back muscle groups to alleviate the strain caused by prolonged sitting.

events.name: Long-distance slow jogging and communication with running partners on weekends
events.description: On Sunday afternoon, Feng Haoran and his running partner Gao Yunfei met at Yuelu Mountain for a 10-kilometer long-distance steady-paced run. As they ran, they chatted along the way. Feng Haoran shared his recent experiences with health management and the pressure of exam preparation, while Gao Yunfei talked about the progress of his IT project and amusing anecdotes about parenting. Running has become their regular ritual for catching up and encouraging each other.

events.name: Integrate Personal Knowledge Documentation for Digital Assets
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran integrated his previous reading notes, research framework, and core questions regarding cryptocurrencies and blockchain, initially forming a personal knowledge document titled "Digital Asset Investment: Opportunities, Risks, and a Personal Cognitive Framework." He intends to use this as foundational material for future professional exchanges with interested clients.

events.name: Monthly Financial Review and Budget Fine-Tuning
events.description: During his monthly personal financial review before bedtime, Feng Haoran officially recorded the annual premium payment for his parents' insurance as part of his monthly expenses. Considering this new, ongoing family responsibility expenditure, he made slight adjustments to his monthly consumption budget and savings plan, cutting back on some non-essential entertainment expenses to ensure that his overall financial planning remained robust and sustainable.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a mixed mindset of planning and relaxation for Sunday.

结束状态.心情: Substantial and well-structured progress has been made in both long-term planning and short-term review, providing greater confidence for the future.

state.今日运动: Core training for 25 minutes, followed by a long-distance slow run of 10 kilometers (approximately 1 hour) at Yuelu Mountain.

2025-05.daily_overview: A day when the pressure of exam preparation reached its peak. The high-intensity mock practice brought both physical and mental exhaustion. Yet at the height of the pressure, he tried mindful breathing and unexpectedly found an effective pressure release valve. This marked a crucial turning point in mindset—from passively enduring anxiety to actively managing emotions. The growth of the green plants and the promise made with running partners brought a touch of soothing greenery to his tightly wound life.

events.name: Observe plant growth and share the joy
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran spent some time observing the plants on the balcony. The cherry tomato seedlings had grown their first pair of fuzzy true leaves, and the mint had become more upright and lush. He took several close-up photos and shared them via WeChat with Xie Yutong, a friend who shares a passion for camping and nature. The two briefly exchanged tips on plant care and recent outdoor experiences.

events.name: CFA Afternoon Session Full-Length Mock Exam
events.description: On Monday evening, Feng Haoran strictly adhered to the exam schedule and completed a full-length mock test of the CFA Level III afternoon session (Item Set). He focused on improving his efficiency and accuracy in answering multiple-choice questions. After three hours of intense concentration, he immediately conducted a detailed review by comparing his answers with the answer key, marking knowledge gaps and easily confused concepts.

events.name: Launch of Office Health Habits
events.description: To reduce prolonged sitting, Feng Haoran has set a sedentary reminder on his office computer that goes off every 45 minutes. Upon receiving the alert, he stands up to fetch water, gazes into the distance, or uses a newly acquired under-desk foot pedal to move his legs, thereby promoting blood circulation.

events.name: Physical and Mental Exhaustion Under High-Pressure Exam Preparation
events.description: After a full day of intensive CFA mock exam practice and review, Feng Haoran felt his head throbbing, his shoulders and neck unusually stiff, and his eyes dry and fatigued. The cumulative pressure from exam preparation had reached a distinct peak at this moment.

events.name: Try mindful breathing to relieve stress.
events.description: After finishing his studies, feeling both mentally and physically exhausted, Feng Haoran recalled Peng Yuqing's recommendation of the meditation app. He turned off the main light, and in the soft glow of the desk lamp, he put on his headphones and followed the app's introductory guided audio for a 10-minute mindfulness breathing exercise. He focused his attention on the flow of breath through his nostrils, gently bringing his mind back to his breathing whenever it wandered to thoughts of exams or work.

events.name: Evaluating the First Meditation Experience
events.description: After the 10-minute practice concluded, Feng Haoran sat quietly for a while. He felt that his previously tense nerves seemed to have relaxed somewhat, and the stiffness in his shoulders and neck had also eased. Although distracting thoughts still lingered, the feeling of being overwhelmed by anxiety had diminished. He had gained a preliminary experience of the positive role of mindful breathing as a tool in alleviating immediate stress.

events.name: Decided to incorporate meditation into daily routine
events.description: Based on this positive initial experience, Feng Haoran decided to incorporate brief (e.g., 10-minute) mindful breathing exercises into his daily routine as a fixed relaxation practice during study breaks or before bedtime. He regarded it as a manageable tool for actively managing exam-related stress and emotions, rather than merely enduring them passively.

events.name: Binge eating due to emotional fluctuations
events.description: Due to high stress, Feng Haoran ordered a high-calorie takeout meal as a temporary comfort in the evening, deviating from his healthy eating plan and resulting in a slight weight gain.

2025-05.daily_overview: A Tuesday themed around [Seeking External Feedback] and [Initiating Concrete Planning]. Sending the first draft of the article to a friend for readability evaluation marks the transition of personal brand building from internal conception to external validation. Meanwhile, the idea of moving to a new home has taken its first substantial step forward, evolving from a vague notion through detailed financial research and consultations with professionals.

events.name: Sending the initial draft of the article to seek reader feedback.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran sent the revised draft of the article "[Family Asset Allocation]" to his friend Peng Yuqing, who works in new media operations. In his WeChat message, he explained that he hoped she could provide the most direct feedback from the perspective of an ordinary reader and content disseminator, focusing on the readability, structure, and potential for dissemination on social media.

events.name: Conduct a Detailed Investigation of the Target Property and Financial Framework
events.description: During work breaks and lunch hours, Feng Haoran conducted detailed research on several residential complexes in Yuelu District known for their low density and high greenery. He recorded the current average resale prices and floor area ranges of these properties, and roughly estimated the potential taxes and fees involved in transactions as well as basic renovation budgets. He compiled these data into a simple table, forming a preliminary financial framework for the home exchange.

events.name: Contact the real estate agent to initiate the property viewing process.
events.description: Based on the preliminary financial framework and specific requirements for the property (Yuelu District, low density, good greenery, relatively quiet), Feng Haoran contacted the real estate agent Lu Jiaming, who had previously helped him purchase a home, via WeChat and phone. He informed the agent of his intention to change homes, his budget range, and core needs, requesting that the agent begin to keep an eye out for suitable properties on the market. They agreed to schedule a concentrated viewing session after Feng completed his CFA exam in June.

events.name: Conduct regular telephone communication with client Huang Siqi.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran held a scheduled teleconference with Huang Siqi, a client based in Shenzhen. The two parties discussed the linkage between the recent equity incentive plan of her technology company and her personal asset allocation. Feng Haoran provided some preliminary tax planning ideas and agreed to deliver a more detailed proposal at a later stage.

events.name: Add a cross-day event: Start planning a self-driving tour.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran began contacting his friends Peng Yuqing and Wu Junjie to preliminarily discuss potential in-depth road trip plans after the exams, researching routes and budgets, with plans to continue detailed planning over the next few days.

起始状态.心情: Start the day clearly and with purpose.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at home in Yuelu District
结束状态.心情: There is a strong sense of progress, with two important matters (the article and the housing change) having achieved phased progress. I feel that affairs are under control and am filled with anticipation for the new plans.

Regular exercise has become a habit for stress relief, while video meetings with high-end clients serve as a direct reflection of professional value.

events.name: Revise and polish the article based on feedback
events.description: After receiving feedback from Peng Yuqing and Wu Junjie, Feng Haoran conducted a second round of revisions on the article in his home study. He optimized the case introduction at the beginning of the article to make it more relatable to everyday life, replaced some obscure professional terms with more accessible explanations, and adjusted the logical structure of certain sections to enhance the overall flow of the argument. The revised article retains its professional core while significantly improving readability.

events.name: Develop a detailed schedule for the house-moving action

He has scheduled key steps such as [in-depth property viewings], [price negotiations], and [transaction procedures] to take place strictly after mid-June, following the conclusion of the exam. This ensures that his exam preparation remains largely undisturbed while allowing for efficient and immediate progress once the exam is over.

Based on his training experience from the previous week, he appropriately increased the duration of his side plank exercises.

events.name: Conduct a video conference with the client on the topic of digital assets.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran conducted a thematic communication via video conference with Huang Siqi, a high-net-worth client interested in digital assets. He shared the cognitive framework developed from his preliminary research and gained insights into the client's specific concerns and potential investment intentions in this field. This exchange not only served the client but also validated and deepened his own research.

events.name: Continue Road Trip Planning

2025-05.daily_overview: Entering the late May phase of review and planning. Review the progress in client relationships, plan new formats for personal content, summarize initial gardening experiences, and have preliminary discussions with parents about future housing upgrade ideas. In the evening, consolidate health achievements through strength training and delight in the discovery that sleep quality has improved due to consistent exercise.

events.name: Review of the Interaction with Client Lin Zhihao
events.description: In his work log, Feng Haoran conducted a specialized review of his interactions with Lin Zhihao this month. He evaluated the significant improvement in their relationship following the golf event, analyzed the potential needs revealed by the client, and planned the relationship maintenance pace and possible business advancement milestones for the next quarter, pre-marking key actions on his calendar.

events.name: Plan a FinTech short video series
events.description: Inspired by the previous FinTech summit, Feng Haoran began planning a short video series on [How to Use FinTech Tools to Assist Personal Investment Decisions] in his spare time after work. He completed the storyboard script and outline of key points for the first episode, with the theme set as [Understanding Fund Holdings Through Data Visualization Tools], in preparation for potential video production after the exam.

events.name: Monthly Balcony Gardening Summary
events.description: On the penultimate day of May, Feng Haoran conducted a brief review of his nearly twenty days of balcony gardening. He confirmed that the habit of checking and watering the plants every morning and evening had been established, and both the cherry tomatoes and mint were thriving. He began considering whether to prepare support stakes for the fast-growing, slightly tilted cherry tomato seedlings and planned to focus on fertilization and pest control for the upcoming month's maintenance.

events.name: Initial Communication with Parents about the Idea of Changing Houses
events.description: During a video call with his parents in the evening, Feng Haoran initially discussed his idea of upgrading his housing based on health considerations—hoping for a quieter living environment with better greenery to improve sleep quality. He shared preliminary financial assessment results, explaining that it was still in the research phase and that everything would have to wait until after his exams. His parents expressed understanding and support, with his father, from the perspective of a construction engineer, offering some details to pay attention to when viewing properties.

events.name: Feedback on Upper Limb Strength Training and Sleep Improvement
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran performed a 30-minute upper-body strength training session at home using dumbbells, including presses, curls, and rows. During post-workout stretching, he noticed that his sleep quality over the past week had indeed improved compared to the early stages of his exam preparation, with faster sleep onset and fewer instances of waking up during the night. He attributed this positive change to regular exercise and stress management, and made slight adjustments to the stretching portion of his training plan by adding relaxation movements targeting the shoulders and neck to consolidate the improvement.

events.name: Complete the preliminary plan for the self-driving tour.
events.description: Feng Haoran and his friends finalized the detailed itinerary and budget for their self-driving trip, planning to embark on it immediately after the exams to relieve stress and explore new places.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a mindset of review and planning.

结束状态.心情: It is gratifying and hopeful to see the positive feedback of exercise improving sleep, which has strengthened confidence in health management and sparked excitement for future travels.

2025-05.daily_overview: A comprehensive review and final sprint preparation before the close of May. Conduct a monthly recap of the three main areas: personal branding, health management, and CFA exam preparation, adjusting the final plan based on identified weaknesses. Prepare for tomorrow's Dragon Boat Festival while adhering to the exercise regimen. The individual's life reflects a state of [intense yet orderly] sprinting.

events.name: Review of Personal Brand Launch Work
events.description: Feng Haoran conducted a review and summary of his work over the past three weeks regarding personal brand building (article writing, seeking feedback, video planning). He evaluated the preliminary results (completion of a draft of an in-depth article, acquisition of effective feedback, completion of video planning) and also recognized the shortcomings (limited time investment due to exam preparation). He formulated a specific action plan for the next month (post-exam), including the selection of platforms for article publication and preliminary preparations for video shooting.

events.name: Review of Health Management Implementation
events.description: Using the newly arrived body fat scale, Feng Haoran measured his weight and body fat percentage. The data showed a steady decline in weight and an improvement in body fat percentage. Reflecting on his health management efforts over the past ten days, he felt more energetic. He preliminarily planned a more systematic exercise and diet regimen for June and decided to treat health management as a long-term commitment, continuing it even after the exams.

events.name: Summarize the Effectiveness of CFA Monthly Review
events.description: Friday evening marked the final sprint for CFA review. Feng Haoran stopped attempting new practice questions and instead revisited the electronic spreadsheet documenting his study records from May, analyzing changes in accuracy rates across various knowledge modules and the time spent on answering questions. He summarized the overall effectiveness of his review and, based on the latest identified weaknesses (such as specific application cases in behavioral finance), adjusted the ultimate sprint plan for the last few days in early June. This adjustment focused more time on identifying and filling gaps in his knowledge.

events.name: Final Comprehensive Review and Psychological Preparation Before the Exam
events.description: On the evening of the last working day in May, Feng Haoran conducted a final comprehensive review before the exam. He quickly flipped through his error notebook and core concept notes, constructing a complete knowledge network in his mind. He engaged in positive self-talk, reassuring himself that his preparation was thorough enough, and deliberately adjusted his sleep schedule earlier to conserve energy for the upcoming official examination.

events.name: Preparing for the Dragon Boat Festival
events.description: On his way home from work, Feng Haoran bought some Changsha-style meat zongzi and red bean paste zongzi at a bakery, planning to show them to his family during the video call the next day. After returning home, he also checked the Wi-Fi network and computer camera at home to ensure a high-quality video call with his family the following day.

events.name: Adhere to the exercise plan.
events.description: Even in the final stage before the exam, Feng Haoran persisted with his morning run and consciously added two intervals of sprinting on Yuelu Mountain to further enhance his cardiopulmonary function. In the evening, he performed lower-body strength training at home, focusing on strengthening leg muscles and preparing for possible outdoor activities over the weekend.

events.name: Plan the Next Steps for Digital Asset Research
events.description: Before going to bed, he briefly reviewed the entire month's research process on digital assets and evaluated his learning outcomes. He planned the next steps for in-depth study after the exam, such as conducting a detailed analysis of specific DeFi (Decentralized Finance) protocols or researching the valuation logic of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens). He also considered how to transform this knowledge into materials that could serve clients.

events.name: Canceling social activities temporarily due to exam preparation pressure.
events.description: The originally scheduled evening gathering with friends was canceled at the last minute because Feng Haoran felt the need to focus on reviewing his studies. He chose to study alone at home, which left him feeling somewhat lonely.

起始状态.心情: Highly focused, entering the final review state before the exam.

结束状态.心情: Calm and resolute, I have completed all review plans, making both physical and mental preparations for tomorrow's festival and the upcoming exams, though feeling a slight sense of loneliness.

state.今日运动: 35 minutes of morning running (including interval sprints), 25 minutes of lower body strength training in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a strong festive atmosphere
date_attribute.holiday: Dragon Boat Festival

2025-05.daily_overview: A Dragon Boat Festival filled with both harvest and gratitude. In the early morning, I harvested the first fruits from my balcony and shared them with a good friend. The core of the holiday was a long, deep video call with my family. Amidst the aroma of zongzi and warm greetings, stress was released, experiences were shared, and the warmth of family became the most solid support on the journey ahead. In the afternoon, I organized documents for a housing change, and in the evening, I concluded this fulfilling and transitional month of May with a nature-immersing hike.

events.name: Harvesting the First Batch of Balcony Fruits
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran noticed that several small tomatoes on the branch had begun to turn red, and the mint was also lush and thriving. He carefully harvested the first batch of three ripe small tomatoes and a large handful of mint leaves. He brewed a pot of refreshing mint tea with the mint leaves and shared the joy of the harvest along with the homemade tea with his friend Peng Yuqing, who had come to discuss the details of an article.

events.name: Dragon Boat Festival Family Video Call
events.description: On the day of the Dragon Boat Festival, unable to return home due to exam preparations, Feng Haoran held a family video call lasting over an hour with his parents in Wuhan and his younger sister Feng Xinran in Shanghai. He showed them the zongzi from Changsha and received holiday greetings from his family. His mother, Li Xiuying, keenly noticed the fatigue in his eyes and repeatedly reminded him to rest and not focus solely on studying. His father, Feng Jianguo, shared his own experiences from his youth working on railway projects, discussing how he balanced high-intensity work with maintaining good health. His sister, Feng Xinran, shared various stress-relief techniques popular in internet companies and teased her brother, saying, "Even an ENTJ master can be stumped by exams sometimes?" The entire conversation revolved around the themes of "stress" and "health," filled with care, light-hearted teasing, and practical experience-sharing, providing Feng Haoran with valuable emotional support and spiritual comfort.

events.name: Recording Family Reminders and Self-Reflection
events.description: After the video call ended, Feng Haoran recorded the health tips and caring reminders shared by his family in his memo. Reflecting on his nearly frenzied study routine over the past month, he decided to pay more attention to balancing work and rest in the final days before the exam. He also resolved to adopt some of his sister’s stress-relief suggestions, such as listening to music during study breaks and taking short moments to gaze into the distance.

events.name: Organize the Room Change Planning Document
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran compiled the housing price data collected over the past few days, budget spreadsheets, communication records with agents, and a detailed timeline into an electronic document titled "House Replacement Plan - Preliminary Research and Financial Assessment," which he then archived. This marked the official completion of the first phase of the house replacement plan—financial assessment and preliminary planning—allowing him to focus wholeheartedly on the final sprint for his CFA exam preparation.

events.name: Holiday hiking with running partners
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran and his running partner Gao Yunfei arranged to meet for a one-day hike at Heimi Peak on the outskirts of Changsha. They treated this hike as a supplement to their weekly aerobic exercise, allowing them to fully relax their tense nerves in the natural mountain forest environment. As they walked, they chatted about their recent workout experiences, observations in the investment market, and thoughts on holiday arrangements. After the hike, they returned feeling refreshed both physically and mentally.

events.name: Implement a structured exercise program
events.description: Before the hike, Feng Haoran conducted a morning interval running session, strictly adhering to heart rate zone guidance to consolidate his health improvement results.

起始状态.心情: The relaxation and anticipation brought by holidays

结束状态.所处地点: Living room in Yuelu District residence
结束状态.心情: Warm, fulfilling, and empowering. The support of family dispelled the loneliness of exam preparation, outdoor activities released the pressure, and there is a greater sense of confidence and anticipation for both the upcoming exams and future life.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of interval running in the morning, followed by approximately 3 hours of hiking at Black Elk Peak (moderate intensity).

2025-06.daily_overview: On the Dragon Boat Festival, Feng Haoran had a video call with his parents after working in the morning, with family care alleviating his homesickness. In the evening, he adjusted his personal plans slightly and began to consider the idea of a family reunion.

events.name: Pre-holiday work wrap-up
events.description: In the morning, I handled urgent emails and customer inquiries at the company. During the lunch break, I checked the home Wi-Fi to prepare for a video call.

events.name: Preparing to call family
events.description: After returning home, I brewed some tea and organized the key points I wanted to share in my notes, including the CFA mock exam, work cases, and the thorough cleaning.

events.name: Dragon Boat Festival Video Family Talk
events.description: At 7 p.m., I had a video call with my parents. My mother expressed concern about my diet and daily routine, while my father encouraged me to push through the final sprint for the CFA exam. The conversation then extended to my sister's work and the family's health.

events.name: Sharing and Inspiration
events.description: Father showed the zongzi made by Mother, evoking a sense of homesickness. Mother said she had saved some zongzi for him to eat when he returns.

events.name: Reflection and Action After the Call
events.description: After hanging up the phone, save the photo of zongzi as wallpaper, adjust the study pace according to father's suggestion, and decide to call my sister this weekend.

events.name: Budding Reunion Initiative
events.description: Before going to bed, I checked the calendar and tentatively scheduled my parents' visit to Changsha in mid-July. I plan to discuss the arrangements with them tomorrow.

结束状态.心情: Warm, filled with the power of family affection, and with a hint of steadfastness in action planning.

2025-06.daily_overview: On the day of the CFA Level III exam, Feng Haoran completed the six-hour-long test. With the pressure released, he celebrated that evening by gathering with colleagues and close friends at a Hunan restaurant, marking the restart of his life routine. The gathering resulted in a slight weight gain.

However, the client added additional requirements at the last minute, increasing the complexity of the work.

events.description: Issue a notification for the CFA Level III knowledge sharing session via the company's internal tool, inviting colleagues Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya, and confirm through private messages, but adjust the timing to coordinate multiple schedules.

events.name: Staying up late to review work projects
events.description: Due to the high complexity of the client's proposal, Feng Haoran spent an extra hour in the evening reviewing and adjusting his approach, which resulted in a delayed bedtime.

2025-07.daily_overview: Feng Haoran completed his morning run with friends, invigorating himself for the day. During the day, he efficiently handled research and client drafts, though he gained a little weight due to his lunch. In the evening, he prepared for his trip to Macau and stayed up late due to excitement.

events.name: Morning Run with Running Partner Gao Yunfei
events.description: Met with Gao Yunfei at 6 a.m. on the Yuelu Mountain Greenway, completed a 5-kilometer steady-paced run, discussed recent work updates, and felt refreshed after exercise, though heart rate was slightly elevated due to insufficient sleep the previous night.

events.name: Preparing for the Macao Trip
events.description: After work, exchange for Macau Pataca, check and print the electronic tickets and hotel reservation confirmations, organize them into the travel folder, feeling slightly excited in anticipation of the trip.

events.name: Study the New Pension Policy
events.description: In the morning, I reviewed internal research reports, focusing on analyzing the investment scope and tax incentives of personal pension accounts, and took notes. However, the complexity of the information led to a brief distraction.

events.name: Plan the camping route in Mangshan
events.description: In the evening, I used an outdoor app to study the hiking routes and campsites in Mangshan, and communicated online with Xie Yutong to select a moderately difficult route, feeling slightly concerned due to weather uncertainties.

events.name: Drafting Client Asset Allocation Proposal
events.description: Draft the initial asset allocation proposal based on Huang Siqi's requirements, outlining the equity and fixed-income ratios, but repeated revisions are necessary to optimize the logic.

events.name: Temporary Colleagues' Dinner Gathering
events.description: I unexpectedly had lunch with my colleague Zheng Wenbo, during which we enjoyed Hunan cuisine. The slightly richer meal resulted in a slight weight gain.

In the evening, I sampled Portuguese chicken and Serradura, indulging slightly more than usual in the dining experience.

events.name: Night Street Photography Creation
events.description: In the evening, I continued strolling and photographing the night scenery on the Macau Peninsula, enjoying the exotic atmosphere, but stayed up late due to excitement.

2025-07.daily_overview: Returning to work at full throttle, I've been delving into policy research, advancing client proposals, organizing sharing sessions, and initiating apartment sales. However, the high intensity has led to late nights and a slight weight gain.

events.name: Collect official policy documents
events.description: In the morning, I visited the official websites of the Ministry of Finance and other relevant departments to download official documents on the new pension policy, compiling first-hand information. However, the process was time-consuming due to the large number of files.

events.name: Finalize the itinerary with my sister.
events.description: Confirm hotel and restaurant details with my sister via video call, fine-tune the art gallery schedule, and finalize all arrangements.

events.name: Confirmation of FinTech Salon Invitation
events.description: Received Qian Yongqiang's invitation, confirmed attendance at Friday's salon via email, adjusted work schedule in anticipation of the robo-advisor topic.

events.name: Submit the proposal for compliance pre-review
events.description: Submit Huang Siqi's proposal to the compliance department for pre-review through the internal system, along with the requirement description and self-inspection report, but the process is complex and may cause slight delays.

events.name: Communicate with the legal department in advance.
events.description: Proactively consult with the legal specialist regarding the terms and risk points of the private equity fund contract to obtain legal opinions, but additional modifications to the plan are required.

events.name: Formal Authorization for Apartment Sale through an Agency
events.description: In the afternoon, go to Lu Jiaming's store to sign the sales commission agreement, submit a copy of the property ownership certificate, and initiate the listing process.

events.name: Final rehearsal before the sharing session.
events.description: After work, rehearsed the CFA sharing session PPT in the conference room and tested the equipment to ensure smooth proceedings, though nervousness slightly increased the pressure.

events.name: Successfully delivered a CFA internal sharing session
events.description: Shared knowledge on behavioral finance and asset allocation in a departmental meeting, incorporating case study analysis, which received high praise and enhanced professional influence.

events.name: Celebrating the Success of the Sharing Session

2025-07.daily_overview: After yesterday's high-intensity work, today was dedicated to information intake, communication confirmation, and detail refinement. I went for a morning run to recover my physical stamina, conducted in-depth research on policies, confirmed camping arrangements, and prepared for my sister's visit and the upcoming salon. My weight has slightly decreased.

2025-07.daily_overview: Immersed in hiking and photography in the mountains, enjoying evening barbecues and stargazing conversations, I achieved complete physical and mental relaxation. However, the intense hiking led to a slight weight loss, and the activities resulted in staying up late.

events.name: Mountain Hiking and Photography
events.description: The team trekked through the primeval forest along the route. Feng Haoran captured the Tyndall effect, streams, and moments with his companions along the way, satisfying his creative drive but exhausting his physical strength.

events.name: Camp Barbecue and Stargazing Night Talk
events.description: In the evening, we built a campfire for a barbecue, gathered around to share stories, and at night, observed the Milky Way while attempting to photograph the starry sky. It was immensely enjoyable, though we stayed up late.

2025-07.daily_overview: The camping trip concluded successfully with the filming of the sunrise over a sea of clouds. Upon returning, the rhythm was disrupted by a shattered phone, prompting immediate emergency measures. Muscle soreness is pronounced, body weight has slightly decreased, and an earlier bedtime was necessitated by the incident.

events.name: Photographing the sunrise over the sea of clouds at Mangshan Mountain
events.description: Wake up before sunrise and head to the viewing platform to capture the magnificent sea of clouds and mountain ranges, bringing the camping trip to a perfect conclusion.

events.name: Clean up the campsite and return.
events.description: After breakfast, pack up the equipment and clean up the trash, then hike back to the parking lot and drive back to Changsha.

events.name: Clean camping gear after returning home.
events.description: In the afternoon, I cleaned and aired out equipment such as tents and sleeping bags on the balcony at home to remove moisture.

events.name: Accidentally dropped and shattered the phone.
events.description: While organizing equipment, I accidentally dropped my primary phone onto a concrete floor, causing the screen to shatter and the touch function to fail. After attempting a restart, the user experience remained poor.

events.name: Assess Repair and Activate Backup Equipment
events.description: After assessing the high repair cost, the decision was made to purchase a new machine. The backup device was activated to log into the core work application, ensuring uninterrupted communication.

events.name: Muscle soreness intensifies.
events.description: After camping, there is significant soreness in muscles throughout the body, particularly in the legs and back. Even after resting, discomfort persists, affecting evening activities.

结束状态.心情: With a touch of regret but satisfaction, swiftly shift to solving the problem.

2025-07.daily_overview: This was a highlight workday in Feng Haoran's career development, though the journey brought slight discomfort and anxiety. He focused on handling client projects, flying to Shenzhen to complete a crucial implementation, while also addressing lessons learned from data backup.

events.name: Fly to Shenzhen to complete the project implementation.
events.description: To ensure the smooth implementation of the 5-million-yuan asset allocation project tailored for high-net-worth client Huang Siqi, Feng Haoran set out early in the morning from his home in Changsha and headed to Huanghua Airport to catch an early flight to Shenzhen. During the flight, he experienced slight dizziness due to turbulence but quickly adjusted. At the meeting in Shenzhen, he provided an in-depth explanation using detailed materials, and both parties successfully signed the agreement, marking the official commencement of the project. After the meeting, Huang Siqi expressed gratitude for his professionalism and dedication.

events.name: Optimization of Data Backup Process (Supplementary Events)
events.description: On the flight to Shenzhen, Feng Haoran reflected on the lesson from last week when his phone accidentally shattered and led to data loss. Amid anxiety, he compiled a backup list, planned a dual-backup strategy, and resolved to address the security risks of his digital assets.

events.name: Short Rest and Return Journey
events.description: After the afternoon meeting concluded, Feng Haoran handled work emails in Shenzhen and booked his return flight. In the evening, he politely declined a dinner invitation, had a simple meal, and reviewed the signing process. However, due to anxiety over data backup, his sleep quality deteriorated.

events.name: Slight anxiety due to flight delay.
events.description: The return flight was slightly delayed due to weather conditions. While waiting at the airport, Feng Haoran felt somewhat anxious, worrying that it might affect his work the next day. He distracted himself by reading financial articles.

起始状态.心情: Focused and full of anticipation, with a slight sense of tension before the journey.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly weary and anxious, the project's success brings a sense of accomplishment, but data issues remain troubling.

2025-07.daily_overview: This was a day filled with challenges and artistic ambiance. In the morning, I efficiently handled the client's urgent portfolio rebalancing under significant pressure. In the afternoon, I returned to my regular work. In the evening, I visited an art gallery alone, but irregular eating habits led to slight discomfort.

events.name: Efficiently Handling Clients' Urgent Portfolio Adjustments
events.description: In the morning, after returning from Shenzhen, Feng Haoran suddenly received an urgent call from his client Lin Zhihao, informing him that a certain technology stock had experienced a flash crash due to regulatory rumors. He quickly analyzed the data, evaluated strategies within 20 minutes, guided the client in decision-making through a video conference, and assisted in completing a partial reduction of positions. Afterward, he meticulously documented the process and reported to his supervisor. The entire procedure was professional and efficient, albeit highly stressful.

events.name: Deepening Policy Analysis and Case Construction
events.description: After handling the urgent portfolio adjustment, he continued to deepen his analysis of macroeconomic policies and constructed client allocation simulations by incorporating case studies, making the report more practical. However, due to stress, he only had a salad for lunch and experienced a loss of appetite.

events.name: A friend suggested a movie night this weekend.
events.description: In the afternoon, Peng Yuqing suggested a weekend movie night in the WeChat group, and everyone responded enthusiastically. It was decided to hold the event at Wu Junjie's home on Saturday evening, with Feng Haoran promising to bring desserts.

events.name: Designing a Personal Self-Media Content Framework
events.description: During work breaks, he conceptualized a self-media account, constructing content modules such as "Investment Mindset Development," and contemplated how to integrate personal interests with financial themes, such as "How Morning Runs Can Save on Medical Expenses."

events.name: An Exclusive Visit to the Xie Zilong Museum of Image Art
events.description: After work, he drove to the art gallery to visit the 'Digital and Nature' exhibition, capturing futuristic scenes with his new phone, but the experience was slightly diminished due to work-related stress.

events.name: Online Artistic Discussions with Photography Partners
events.description: After viewing the exhibition, he sent the photos to Xu Jianing, and the two engaged in a lively discussion on the topic of technology and art, with professional resonance bringing them joy.

events.name: Procuring Supplies for Parents' Visit (Supplementary Event)
events.description: After returning home in the evening, he purchased ribs, fruits, and other items for his parents. However, encountering a promotion at the supermarket, he bought additional healthy snacks, which slightly exceeded his budget.

起始状态.心情: Calm, preparing to return and resume work.

结束状态.心情: Full yet slightly stressful, a blend of morning tension, afternoon focus, and evening artistic immersion.

2025-07.daily_overview: Friday is a day that intertwines wrapping up work tasks with planning for the weekend. I completed an important report and initiated a housing relocation consultation. In the evening, while photographing the night scenery, I caught a slight chill from the evening breeze, leading to mild discomfort.

events.name: Complete the drafting of the policy analysis report.
events.description: Feng Haoran compiled and analyzed to produce a macro policy report, which serves as a reference for future consulting and training, demonstrating his ability to translate research into practical applications. However, due to his intense focus on writing, he missed lunch.

events.name: Launching Consultation on Improved Housing Demand
events.description: During the lunch break, he met with real estate agent Lu Jiaming at a café. He elaborated on his requirements for the house exchange and formally entrusted the agent with the task of screening potential properties. His mood was one of anticipation, tinged with slight nervousness.

events.name: Communicating with the supervisor about taking a compensatory leave next week
events.description: In the afternoon, he had a face-to-face interview with Qian Yongqiang, applied for three days of compensatory leave to accompany his parents, made handover arrangements, obtained approval, and felt relieved.

events.name: Night Photography of Meixi Lake Art Center
events.description: After work, he took his camera to Meixi Lake to practice long exposure and time-lapse photography, capturing the interplay of lights and reflections. However, after the shoot, he caught a slight chill from the evening breeze, resulting in mild throat discomfort.

events.name: Agent Feedback and Property Viewing Review (Supplementary Events)
events.description: After returning home in the evening, he received the property information from Lu Jiaming. They conducted a phone review of the market alignment, agreed to compile a list over the weekend, but due to discomfort, he strongly desired to go to bed early.

events.name: Confirm Details for Weekend Movie Night (Supplementary Event)
events.description: Before going to bed, he confirmed the details of the movie night in the friends' group chat, reminded himself to pick up the cake, and drank some warm water to aid sleep due to a sore throat.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied yet slightly unwell; the completion of the report and the initiation of the room change bring pleasure, but there is a minor physical discomfort.

2025-07.daily_overview: This is a typical ENTJ-style weekend: a deep yoga experience in the morning, advancing self-media planning in the afternoon, and a movie night with overeating leading to late sleep and slight discomfort.

events.name: Regular Yoga Classes and In-depth Experience
events.description: In the morning, he attended a Hatha yoga class to alleviate shoulder and neck stiffness, and experienced Yin yoga, feeling deep stretching and mental relaxation. He documented this new experience and decided to incorporate static practice into his routine in the future.

events.name: Deepening the Positioning of Self-Media Accounts
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, he clearly defined the account's positioning as "providing systematic financial and life planning for the broad middle-class families," created detailed documents, listed core topics, and considered how to popularize the knowledge.

events.name: Seeking Professional Feedback from Friends
events.description: He shared the concept with Peng Yuqing and Zheng Wenbo. They discussed it at a coffee shop, where Peng Yuqing presented suggestions, Zheng Wenbo supplemented risk points, and he fine-tuned the priorities. He felt it was a highly rewarding experience.

events.name: Planning a Changsha Itinerary for Parents (Supplementary Events)
events.description: During breaks in his planning, he went online to check the weather and scenic spots, booked a Hunan cuisine restaurant, and made preparations for his parents' trip, feeling eager with anticipation.

events.name: Movie Night: Cuisine, Cinema, and Intellectual Exchange
events.description: In the evening, he brought a cake to Wu Junjie's home. Everyone enjoyed crayfish and beer while watching "The Wandering Earth," engaging in lively discussions that ranged from economic and technological analyses to reflections on human nature. However, due to overindulgence in food and drink, he felt slightly unwell before going to bed.

events.name: Stayed up late due to excitement after the movie.
events.description: The movie night lasted until late, and after driving back, he was too excited from the discussion to fall asleep. Reading to aid sleep proved ineffective.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and expectant, embracing a weekend of self-arranged plans.

结束状态.心情: Very pleasant yet slightly uncomfortable, social interactions bring mental satisfaction, but excessive eating has adverse effects.

2025-07.daily_overview: A day that blends family activities with personal habits. A morning run with in-depth conversations among running companions, followed by a visit to Yuelu Mountain with parents, though slight muscle soreness was felt after the morning run.

events.name: A Deep Morning Run Conversation with Fellow Runner Gao Yunfei
events.description: In the early morning, he met Gao Yunfei for a morning run. Gao Yunfei brought up his confusion about career choices, and he guided him in analyzing opportunities, risks, and goals. The two discussed balance at the mountaintop, and their relationship progressed toward a close friendship. However, after the run, he experienced slight muscle soreness.

events.name: Act as a guide to take parents on a tour of Yuelu Mountain.
events.description: After his morning run, he drove with his parents to Yuelu Mountain, where they visited the Aiwan Pavilion and the academy. He shared his running route with them, with his father showing interest in the cultural aspects and his mother enjoying the greenery. They had Hunan cuisine for lunch.

events.name: Afternoon Family Rest and Mother Cooking
events.description: The whole family rested in the afternoon. Father was reading a finance book, while mother stewed pork ribs with lotus root soup in the kitchen. The aroma filled the air, carrying the familiar scent of home cooking.

events.name: Investment Insights Exchange Between Father and Son (Supplementary Event)

2025-07.daily_overview: The family visit is drawing to a close. With carefully arranged city tours and a farewell dinner, emotions run high, leading to an extra drink. After a stroll, it's a late night.

events.name: City Sightseeing and Snack Experience
events.description: In the morning, he took his parents to the Orange Isle to view the sculpture, took photos by the Xiang River, and then went to Pozi Street to sample local snacks such as stinky tofu and sugar-oil baba. His father made humorous comments, while his mother praised the food highly.

events.name: Mother prepares hometown flavors in the kitchen.
events.description: Returning home in the afternoon, his mother made lotus root and pork rib soup for the last time, saying, "I'll make this for you one more time," which deeply moved him.

events.name: A Warm Farewell Dinner at a High-end Restaurant
events.description: In the evening, at the private room of the restaurant, he took the initiative to serve dishes and soup, reflecting on the details of the family visit. His parents praised him, and he expressed gratitude for their companionship. The conversation extended to future family plans, but due to emotional fluctuations, he ended up drinking an extra glass of wine.

events.name: A Post-Dinner Riverside Stroll and In-Depth Conversation
events.description: After dinner, he accompanied his parents for a walk along the Xiang River. His parents reminded him to take care of his health, and he shared his long-term thoughts with them, leading to a deep conversation. However, after the walk, he stayed up late due to reluctance to part.

events.name: Packing and Confirming Return Arrangements (Supplementary Event)
events.description: After returning home, his mother prepared the food while he confirmed the flight details to ensure a smooth return journey, feeling a warm and reluctant sentiment.

起始状态.心情: Cherish and hope to make the most of my parents' last full day in Changsha.

结束状态.心情: Filled with warmth and a touch of reluctance, family bonds are strengthened, yet emotional fluctuations persist.
