2025-07.daily_overview: A day of split itinerary. In the morning, I handled personal matters in Changsha, and in the afternoon, I flew to Wuhan to reminisce with childhood friends. Excitement before the trip led to decreased sleep quality, and after having some snacks, I experienced mild gastrointestinal discomfort.

events.name: Post-Photography Processing Practice
events.description: In the morning, he worked on the Meixi Lake night scene materials in his study, practicing stacking noise reduction and HDR compositing. He shared the finished photos and received likes, but his focus caused him to neglect exercise.

events.name: July Monthly Financial Review
events.description: He reviewed his income and expenses for July, analyzed the major expenditures, and concluded that they were primarily one-time expenses. While he felt in control, he was slightly anxious about the budget.

events.name: Assess the Alignment Between Budget Evaluation and Housing Replacement Plan
events.description: He calculated the accumulation of the home purchase reserve fund and found the pace to be slow. After considering adjusting the budget structure to prioritize buying a new home, he decided to make the adjustments in August.

events.name: Preparing to see off one's parents
events.description: Had a simple lunch with my parents at noon, helped them check their luggage, saw them off to the car, reminded them to be careful, and after watching them leave, prepared for my own journey.

events.name: Fly to Wuhan to meet up with childhood friends
events.description: Arrived in Wuhan in the afternoon, took the subway to check into the hotel. In the evening, my childhood friend Zhang Mingxuan arrived. We greeted each other with a hug in Wuhan dialect, instantly transporting us back to our youth. The excitement led to a decline in sleep quality.

events.name: Retracing Childhood Footsteps
events.description: The two of them went to their childhood neighborhood, looking for the grocery store and the open space, discovering old traces that sparked laughter and embarrassing memories, evoking nostalgic joy.

events.name: Visiting the Former Site of My Alma Mater and Taking a Group Photo
events.description: Locate the site of the old primary school, take a group photo for remembrance, share old photographs, and reflect on the passage of time.

events.name: The Taste Memories of Time-Honored Snack Shops
events.description: For dinner, we went to a time-honored restaurant to enjoy hot dry noodles, doupi, and other local snacks. The familiar flavors stirred up memories, and we reminisced about childhood stories. However, after eating the snacks, there was slight gastrointestinal discomfort, which soon subsided.

起始状态.心情: Methodically preparing to handle personal affairs and embark on a nostalgic journey.

结束状态.心情: Nostalgic, excited, and completely relaxed, but with a decline in sleep quality.

2025-07.daily_overview: Day 2 of the Nostalgic Journey, the return day. In the morning, we strolled and engaged in deep conversations; in the afternoon, we each headed back. Travel fatigue led to a strong inclination to sleep early.

events.name: Adjust the August Budget Draft
events.description: In the morning at the hotel, he drafted the August budget proposal, cutting digital and travel entertainment expenses, and allocating funds to the home purchase reserve, with adjustments oriented toward achieving the set goals.

events.name: Communicate Budget Adjustment Plan with Parents
events.description: Before going out in the morning, he video-called his parents to explain the adjusted plans. They understood and supported him, with his father reminding him to maintain balance and stay grounded.

events.name: Strolling Along Wuhan Riverside and Engaging in In-Depth Conversations
events.description: In the morning, I took a stroll with Zhang Mingxuan along the riverbank, sharing our emotional states and life reflections. Our conversation touched on deeper, heartfelt exchanges, which strengthened our friendship. However, the outing ended early due to the intense heat.

events.name: Airport Farewell and Return Journey
events.description: Arriving at the airport in the afternoon, we embraced at the security checkpoint and agreed to meet every year. His flight returned to Changsha, and while on the plane, he sorted through the photos, feeling warmth in his heart.

events.name: Enter new budget upon returning home (supplementary event)
events.description: Returning home in the evening, I quickly freshened up, turned on the computer, and entered the new budget into the software. I then set up framework reminders to prepare for execution in August.

events.name: Sharing Travel Anecdotes with My Younger Sister (Additional Events)
events.description: Before going to bed, he sent a photo to his sister Feng Xinran, inviting her to visit in August. His sister replied with an envious emoji, feeling joyful but fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and serene, the nostalgic journey is complete, energy brimming yet slightly fatigued.

events.name: Summary of the Self-Media Conceptualization Phase

events.name: Supplementary Study of Pension Fund Product Materials (Supplementary Event)

events.name: IFS Rooftop Time-lapse Photography Practice
events.description: After work, he went to the rooftop of IFS to practice time-lapse photography, capturing the transition from sunset to night scenery. By adjusting the parameters, he produced stunning shots and improved his technical skills.

events.name: End-of-Month Morning Run Review and Dinner Gathering

We reviewed the data summary for July to assess progress and decided to increase the distance to 8 kilometers in August while incorporating uphill routes. Afterward, we had breakfast at a Hunan restaurant and exchanged ideas.

events.name: Analyze Positive Changes in Monthly Health Data
events.description: Data analysis revealed that the average resting heart rate decreased from 65 to 60 beats per minute, indicating significant cardiovascular improvement. Health logs were recorded and shared with Gao Yunfei for mutual encouragement.

events.name: Complete the Compilation of Pension Research Materials
events.description: In the morning, all research materials are summarized and a clearly structured electronic database is established, marking the end of the research preparation phase and the readiness to proceed with planning and implementation.

events.name: Attending a FinTech Salon to Make New Friends
events.description: Attended a salon in the evening and had a lively discussion with entrepreneur Li Zhe on the integration of robo-advisors. We exchanged WeChat contacts and agreed to communicate further in the future, broadening our perspectives.

events.name: Signing of the Property Sale Intent Agreement (Supplementary Event)

2025-08.daily_overview: On Friday's workday, Feng Haoran alternated between work priorities and personal planning tasks. In the morning, he focused on consolidating and systematizing knowledge in his professional field, while in the afternoon, he began detailing specific projects to improve his living environment, demonstrating the planning and execution capabilities characteristic of an ENTJ personality.

events.name: Organize and research pension product materials
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran spread out the various promotional brochures, industry reports, and official website information on pension financial products he had recently collected in his home study. He categorized them according to the issuing entities, such as bank wealth management subsidiaries, fund companies, and insurance companies, and conducted a preliminary screening based on dimensions like yield, risk level, and tax incentives. Using colored labels, he marked several mainstream products that required in-depth analysis, preparing for the subsequent drafting of an analytical report.

events.name: Plan the balcony greening planting scheme
events.description: As the evening heat subsided slightly, Feng Haoran stepped onto his balcony. He took out a tape measure and carefully measured the length, width, and railing height of the balcony, while also observing and recording the areas exposed to sunlight in the afternoon. Considering his habit of reading and drinking coffee there, he sketched a preliminary plan in his Moleskine notebook. The layout included a vertical green wall against one side, herb planting boxes near the window, and a reserved leisure corner. He then began considering plant varieties suitable for Changsha’s summer climate.

events.name: Informal Work Communication with Superiors
events.description: After the lunch break, Feng Haoran proactively went to the office of Investment Director Qian Yongqiang to provide a brief report on several key client projects completed last month, particularly the technology sector asset allocation plan for client Huang Siqi. Qian Yongqiang acknowledged his work achievements and encouraged him to systematize these case experiences to contribute to the team's knowledge base.

events.name: Adjusting Exercise for Mild Cold Discomfort
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran experienced mild nasal congestion and fatigue, likely due to his daytime commute in the hot weather. He decided to cancel his originally planned evening walk and opted to rest at home instead. He also drank a cup of ginger tea to alleviate his symptoms, ensuring they would not affect his morning run the next day.

起始状态.心情: Steady, with a sense of planning for the new month's work, yet slightly uneasy.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled yet somewhat fatigued, having completed the day's work and plans. A mild cold requires attention to rest.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Saturday, Feng Haoran focused on handling important personal asset matters. In the morning, he completed a critical asset disposal, securing the funds safely; in the afternoon, he began reviewing personal consumption data to provide a basis for upcoming financial adjustments. The day’s theme was closely centered around [asset optimization] and [financial review].

events.name: Completion of the sale and transfer of investment apartment ownership.
events.description: In the morning, accompanied by real estate agent Lu Jiaming, Feng Haoran went to the Changsha Real Estate Registration Center. Together with the buyer, he completed the final signing procedures for the property transfer and safely received the main proceeds from the sale, after deducting various taxes and fees, through a funds supervision account. The completion of this transaction marks the successful implementation of the first step in his asset optimization plan.

events.name: Review the annual credit card spending report
events.description: Upon returning home in the afternoon, Feng Haoran received the electronic summary report of his credit card statements for the previous year from the bank. He brewed a cup of hand-drip coffee and opened the email attachment in his study. After quickly browsing the overview page of the report, he gained a macro-level understanding of his total annual expenditure, spending frequency, and main consumption scenarios. He noticed that the proportions for [Dining & Food] and [Transportation & Travel] were particularly prominent.

events.name: Video call with parents to share the progress of selling the house.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran proactively initiated a video call to his parents in Wuhan. He excitedly informed his father, Feng Jianguo, and mother, Li Xiuying, about the successful sale of his apartment and the receipt of the payment, briefly mentioning that he was currently looking at new properties. While delighted for him, his parents also reminded him to plan the use of the funds carefully. His father further shared some insights on loans and asset allocation.

events.name: Resume morning runs but shorten the distance.
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran felt his cold symptoms had alleviated, yet he decided to proceed with caution. He completed a 3-kilometer jog around the residential area at a low intensity to gradually restore his physical strength, focusing on his breathing rhythm to avoid overexertion.

结束状态.心情: Relieved and satisfied, a major financial matter has been settled, leading to a new understanding of personal consumption.

2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday was an efficient day dedicated to [Financial Management] and [Health Practice]. Feng Haoran strategically reallocated the funds that had arrived the previous day, while maintaining his regular health routines of morning jogging and yoga. Through conversations with fellow runners, he gained new insights into training methods, demonstrating a balanced advancement in both life and financial planning.

events.name: Reallocate the proceeds from property sales
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran logged into his online banking and professional securities app to execute the pre-planned fund allocation strategy. Following the predetermined proportions, he transferred the proceeds from the property sale into a dedicated savings account reserved for future home replacement, his personal Huatai Securities investment account, and a liquid emergency reserve account. This completed the revitalization and conversion of funds from [real estate] to [financial assets and liquid cash].

events.name: Record and Reflect on Yoga Practice Experiences
events.description: After the afternoon yoga class, Feng Haoran used a health app on his phone to record the day's practice on his way home. He not only filled in the list of completed poses and their duration but also specifically noted in the remarks section: [Today, Downward-Facing Dog felt particularly expansive, with a noticeable relief in the tension in my shoulders and neck. However, there was still a sense of tightness in my left hip during Pigeon Pose. Sleep quality has been consistently good over the past week.] He has begun consciously quantifying his bodily sensations.

events.name: Morning Run on Yuelu Mountain and Exchanging with Fellow Runners
events.description: At 06:40 in the morning, Feng Haoran met up with his running partner Gao Yunfei at the foot of Yuelu Mountain to begin their morning run. Wearing a fitness tracker, Feng paid close attention to his heart rate changes and pace stability during uphill segments. After the run, at a breakfast shop at the mountain's base, the two discussed their data while eating rice noodles. Based on Feng Haoran's recent increase in training volume, Gao Yunfei suggested that he could appropriately reduce his pace during long-distance training sessions to build a stronger endurance foundation, which Feng Haoran gladly accepted.

events.name: In-depth Analysis of Credit Card Consumption Data
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran opened his computer in the study, exported the detailed data from the credit card report, and categorized and imported it into the Notion note-taking software. He created visual pie charts for consumption categories and monthly trend line charts. Through analysis, he clearly identified [specialty coffee] and [business meals] as the main subcategories under the dining category, which provided precise targets for his subsequent budget adjustments.

起始状态.心情: Refreshed and invigorated, the weekend morning is full of vitality, and the cold has been cured.

结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of accomplishment, we have not only completed the deployment of key funds but also made progress in both health management and financial analysis.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the Monday of the new week, Feng Haoran swiftly translated the financial analysis results from the weekend into action. During work intervals, he formulated a new personal budget and decisively began seeking solutions to alleviate physical strain caused by work, demonstrating his agile mindset of [identifying problems—analyzing problems—solving problems].

events.name: Formulate the personal budget adjustment plan for the second half of the year.
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran did not go out. Instead, he stayed in his office, contemplating the consumption analysis chart he had created. He decided to implement the "experience-first" consumption philosophy and drafted a budget adjustment plan for the second half of 2025: reducing his weekly visits to premium coffee shops from 3–4 times to 1–2 times, and clearly allocating the saved budget to the "Annual Travel Fund" and the "Health Management Fund" (for yoga classes, physical therapy, etc.).

events.name: Synchronize budget to management tool
events.description: After drafting the budget plan, Feng Haoran immediately opened the budgeting app on his phone and the budget Excel spreadsheet on his computer to update the monthly limits for each spending category. In particular, he set prominent reminders for the [Dining - Coffee] and [Entertainment - Travel] items to ensure that the new spending habits could be effectively tracked and implemented.

events.name: Research and Select a Yoga Studio
events.description: Due to occasional flare-ups of shoulder and neck discomfort caused by prolonged desk work, Feng Haoran decided to take proactive measures. He searched online platforms, consulted his fitness enthusiast colleague Peng Yuqing, and used his off-duty hours to personally inspect the environment, course schedules, and teaching staff of three yoga studios near his company. Ultimately, he selected a yoga studio specializing in therapeutic and precise alignment practices and booked an introductory class for the following day.

events.name: Discussing Industry Insights with Colleagues During Lunch
events.description: During lunch, Feng Haoran met up with his colleague Zheng Wenbo at their usual Hunan restaurant near the company. He shared his findings from analyzing credit card data over the weekend, along with his thoughts on adjusting his budget, and joked that he would have to treat Zheng Wenbo to fewer expensive coffees in the future. Their conversation shifted from personal spending to changes in the consumption preferences of current high-net-worth clients, noting that "service experience" and "health investment" are becoming new areas of focus.

events.name: Worked overtime until late at night due to urgent project requirements.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran received an urgent request from his client Huang Siqi to adjust her technology sector investment portfolio in response to market volatility. He worked overtime in the office until late at night, conducting detailed data analysis and drafting a new plan, which resulted in a delay in his sleep time.

结束状态.心情: Fatigued yet focused, a sense of control is enhanced through budgeting and selecting yoga classes, but overtime work brings stress.

Simultaneously, an idea about personal brand building began to take shape and was put into initial action, with multiple dimensions of career development progressing in parallel.

events.name: Conduct in-depth research on key new housing listings

At this point, all the core legal steps for selling the investment apartment were completed.

events.name: Register a personal WeChat Official Account
events.description: After returning home in the evening, inspired by the exchanges with colleagues during the day and the need for personal knowledge accumulation, Feng Haoran registered a WeChat public account named after himself on his computer. events.name: Returned late from an impromptu gathering with friends

The two arranged to meet at a bar for a casual gathering, discussing investment opportunities and the Changsha real estate market. Feng Haoran, feeling excited, drank a few more glasses than usual, which significantly delayed his bedtime.

2025-08.daily_overview: Wednesday was a relatively unhurried workday. Feng Haoran resumed his morning run, which had been interrupted by the weather, and maintained online communication with the real estate agent during work breaks to prepare for the concentrated house viewings scheduled for the following day. Health management and preparations for important matters set the tone for the day.

events.name: Morning Running Training on the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran arrived at the flat track of the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt for recovery training. His focus today was to improve the pace of steady-paced running. Throughout the session, he closely monitored the real-time heart rate and cadence data displayed on his fitness tracker, striving to find the balance between high efficiency and low exertion. Ultimately, his average pace improved by 5 seconds compared to last week.

events.name: Screen target properties for next-day viewings
events.description: Utilizing fragmented time during work, Feng Haoran frequently communicated with Lu Jiaming on WeChat. Based on the latest in-depth materials received, he integrated his investment analysis model and evaluated multiple dimensions such as location potential, unit practicality, and price inversion potential. Ultimately, he identified three properties for on-site visits the following day: two newly launched projects and one secondary-hand property located in an established community.

events.name: First Experience with Therapeutic Yoga Course
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran went to the newly selected yoga studio and attended an introductory class focused on shoulder and neck therapy. Based on his long-term habit of working at a desk, the instructor taught him several micro-stretching exercises that could be performed even in the office. After the class, he felt some relief from the tension in his shoulder muscles and decided to purchase a package of sessions.

events.name: Adjusting diet due to the gathering the night before.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Thursday, Feng Haoran engaged in an intensive and information-dense house-hunting session during the day, while dedicating his evenings to his beloved astronomical observations. The interplay of rational analysis and personal passion on this day reflects his pursuit of a balanced work-life dynamic.

events.name: On-site inspection of new residential development A
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran and Lu Jiaming visited the newly launched property A in Xiangjiang New District. He not only carefully inspected the model unit, examining the layout details and natural lighting, but also proactively engaged in in-depth discussions with the sales manager. He inquired about the developer's financial status, future land planning, and the construction timelines for surrounding amenities such as schools and commercial facilities. Additionally, he took extensive notes in his notebook, recording key information and his own points of concern.

events.name: Preparing for Astronomical Observation Activities
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran checked the battery and storage card space of his old camera. He also looked up the driving route from his company to the Hunan Provincial Observatory and checked the weather forecast for that evening. After confirming clear and cloudless conditions, he was filled with anticipation for observing a clear starry sky, which would serve as an outlet to relieve the stress from recent house-hunting and work pressures.

events.name: Continue to inspect property B and second-hand housing C.
events.description: The afternoon schedule was quite packed. Feng Haoran first inspected another new development, Project B, and then proceeded without delay to view a high-quality resale property, Unit C, located in a well-established community. He personally experienced the living atmosphere, greenery standards, and property management details of different neighborhoods. In his mind, he quickly compared the differences between new and resale properties in terms of taxes and fees, renovation costs, immediate occupancy possibilities, and the underlying logic for future appreciation.

events.name: Participate in the Observatory's Public Observation Activities
events.description: After work in the evening, Feng Haoran drove to the suburban observatory. During the event, he observed Saturn's distinct rings and the moons surrounding Jupiter through a professional telescope, and attended a popular science lecture on exoplanets. The tangible presentation of the vast universe made him deeply aware of the insignificance of the individual and the value of the pursuit of knowledge.

起始状态.心情: Ready to take off and prepare for the intensive inspection days.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and invigorated, the day brought a wealth of firsthand information, while the starry night sky offered spiritual cleansing and awe.

Feng Haoran immersed himself in his passions for photography and astronomical exploration, while also maintaining his analytical focus on the significant decision of property investment. This demonstrated the ENTJ personality trait of maintaining thoughtful depth even during leisure time.

events.name: Orange Isle Bridge Urban Landscape Photography
events.description: Taking advantage of the soft morning light, Feng Haoran brought his camera to the vicinity of the Orange Isle Bridge to scout for shooting angles. He attempted to capture the integration of the river scenery with the city skyline using a wide-angle lens. Setting up a tripod, he employed a slow shutter speed to photograph the sparse morning traffic trails, seeking a visual expression that combined motion and stillness.

events.name: Sharing Observation Experience and Preliminary Summary
events.description: Returning home close to midnight after the event, Feng Haoran still couldn’t contain his excitement. He imported the slightly blurry yet profoundly meaningful photo of Saturn—taken through the telescope’s eyepiece with his phone—into his computer and wrote on his social media feed: [After many years, I once again saw Saturn’s rings directly through a telescope. The romance of science lies in turning imagination into the visible. The universe is the ultimate lesson in asset management—about scale, cycles, and uncertainty.]

events.name: Comprehensive Comparative Analysis of Property Listings
events.description: After the afternoon property viewing, Feng Haoran did not make an immediate decision. In the study at home that evening, he laid out all the information (prices, floor plans, notes, and photos of the community environment taken during the day) from the three properties he had inspected on his computer. Using the SWOT analysis method from financial analysis, he systematically listed the strengths and weaknesses of each property, conducted a comparative analysis, and considered which one best aligned with his dual objectives of [self-occupancy + investment].

events.name: Adjusting sleep schedule due to consecutive nights of staying up late.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran realized that he had been lacking sufficient sleep recently and decided to end his work early. He practiced meditation to relax and drank a cup of sleep-aid tea to improve his sleep quality.

Feng Haoran made final decisions and took action on several important matters: from upgrading photography equipment to finalizing the desired housing, and discussing with family, efficiently advancing the dual processes of personal interests and life development.

events.name: Establish a Property Comparison Analysis File
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran conducted a final compilation of all the property listings he had collected over the past week. He created a detailed comparison table on his computer, covering more than a dozen indicators such as price, area, usable floor area ratio, estimated taxes, renovation costs, surrounding planning, and school district potential, providing data-driven support for the final decision-making process.

events.name: Conduct research and purchase professional photography equipment.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran went to a large photography equipment market in Changsha. He spent several hours trying out and comparing several full-frame mirrorless cameras and prime lenses he had been eyeing at different stores, repeatedly assessing the camera body's ergonomics, autofocus speed, and screen color accuracy. Ultimately, as a reward for his recent work and an investment in his hobby, he made up his mind and purchased a professional-grade camera along with a high-quality prime lens.

events.name: Video conference with parents to discuss housing options
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran opened the property comparison file on his computer and presented it to his parents in Wuhan via video call. He provided a detailed explanation of the advantages and disadvantages he had analyzed for several preferred options. Although his parents were not familiar with the specific properties, they were more concerned about community safety, neighbor quality, and long-term value retention. Their questions also helped Feng Haoran clarify his thoughts from a different perspective. After discussion, a new apartment layout located in the core planning area of Xiangjiang New District gained the highest consensus.

events.name: Preliminary Discussion on Intended Property
events.description: After speaking with his parents, Feng Haoran had developed a clear inclination in his mind. He immediately contacted the agent Lu Jiaming and the sales representative of the property development, arranging to revisit the sales office the following day for preliminary discussions on the specific unit he had selected, covering details such as pricing and payment methods.

events.name: Celebrating the decision by dining with friends.
events.description: Late at night, Feng Haoran gathered with his friends Peng Yuqing and Cai Wenjing at a Hunan cuisine restaurant to celebrate the confirmation of his home purchase intention and the acquisition of a new camera. They engaged in lively discussions about future plans. Overjoyed, Feng Haoran indulged in more delicacies than usual, which led to a slight increase in his weight.

结束状态.心情: Excited and full of anticipation, major consumption (camera) and significant decisions (home purchase intention) were both clarified within a single day, making me feel that life is taking an upward leap.

events.name: Experience the positive changes brought by yoga.
events.description: During the morning yoga class, Feng Haoran clearly felt that his core strength and control had improved. Some balance poses he previously couldn't manage were now barely sustainable. When recording his progress in the app after class, he wrote: "After three weeks of persistence, the feedback from my body is honest. It's not just about flexibility; more importantly, the awareness and control of muscles are improving, which is crucial for those who sit for long hours."

events.name: Booking a Welcome Dinner for My Sister's Visit

events.name: Reserve a seat with the cafe owner.

Shen Xinyi enthusiastically noted down the requirements and promised to personally brew the coffee on the day.

His multitasking abilities are put to the test, but he manages to advance each task step by step through clear planning.

events.name: First In-Depth Exchange with a Fintech Entrepreneur
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran held his first monthly video conference with fintech entrepreneur Li Zhe. He shared his recent observations on the growing interest of high-net-worth clients in [data-driven investment advisory] and [ESG investing], along with relevant compliance considerations. Li Zhe presented the beta version interface of his project and its first application scenario. Both parties agreed to focus their next discussion on how technology can quantitatively assess non-financial risks, providing incremental tools for traditional investment advisory services.

events.description: Upon returning home from work, Feng Haoran eagerly opened his new camera. He also tested the sharpness and bokeh effects of the new lens under different lighting conditions, all in preparation for photographing his sister’s visit over the weekend.

events.name: Slight emotional fluctuations due to stress

events.name: Preparing Accommodation for Sister's Visit
events.description: After work, the first thing Feng Haoran did upon returning home was to thoroughly clean the guest room. He replaced the bedding with brand new sets, meticulously wiped every corner, and checked whether the air conditioning and Wi-Fi were functioning properly. Subsequently, he went to the supermarket to purchase fresh towels, toiletries, a variety of beverages, and fruits, arranging them neatly in both the guest room and the living room to create a welcoming atmosphere.

events.name: Signing the New Home Purchase Contract
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran went to the sales office and formally signed the "Commercial Housing Sales Contract" for his new home. He used part of the proceeds from selling his apartment as the down payment, completing the most crucial step in the asset swap. At the moment of signing, he felt a sense of certainty about the future.

events.name: Organize and verify property and loan application documents
events.description: In the evening, under the online guidance of Lu Jiaming, Feng Haoran began organizing the documents required for the subsequent procedures in his home study. He sorted all materials—including his ID card, household registration booklet, income certificate, bank statements, and contracts for both the old and new properties—into separate folders by category. He then checked each item against the list one by one to ensure nothing would go wrong during the property transfer and loan application processes.

events.name: Finalize the Itinerary and Transportation Arrangements
events.description: During a break from organizing documents, Feng Haoran once again reviewed the itinerary he had planned for his younger sister. Based on the latest weather forecast, he made slight adjustments to the order of indoor and outdoor activities and meticulously mapped out the driving routes from home to each attraction, along with parking information, to ensure his sister would have a relaxed and enjoyable visit during her stay.

events.name: Adjustment of exercise due to the previous day's gathering
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran felt slightly heavy in his body and decided to go for a light 4-kilometer morning run to aid metabolism and restore energy.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed yet orderly, major tasks have been completed, with the focus shifting to life affairs.

结束状态.心情: Steady yet expectant, with the housing contract signed and the home prepared, we await the arrival of our loved ones.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Thursday, the administrative processes related to the property continued to advance. Feng Haoran shuttled between government departments and banks, efficiently completing key steps such as property transfer and loan applications, while also preparing ammunition for the next steps in his personal investment portfolio.

events.name: Handling the Registration of New Property Ownership Transfer
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran, accompanied by a representative from the developer, went to the Real Estate Registration Center. They submitted a series of materials, including the home purchase contract and identification documents, and paid fees such as the deed tax. This formally completed the application process for the property transfer registration of the newly purchased property, and they received an acceptance receipt.

events.name: Communicate and finalize the home purchase loan plan.
events.description: In the afternoon, with Lu Jiaming's introduction, Feng Haoran had a meeting with a bank's client manager. Based on his good credit history and stable income, they quickly agreed on a cost-effective loan plan: a combination of provident fund and commercial loans, with a term of 25 years. They also scheduled a time for submitting the formal application materials.

events.name: Add funds to the securities investment account
events.description: After handling the major real estate transaction, Feng Haoran shifted his focus back to his personal investment goals. Through online banking, he transferred the 250,000 yuan in liquid funds released from the property sale from his savings account to his trading account at Huatai Securities. The availability of these funds marked the acceleration of his plan to build a personal investment portfolio valued at one million yuan.

events.name: Discuss weekend running plans with running partners
events.description: In anticipation of his sister's weekend visit, Feng Haoran contacted his running partner Gao Yunfei via WeChat in advance, informing him that he might not be able to participate in their regular morning runs over the weekend. Gao Yunfei expressed understanding and wished him a pleasant reunion with his sister. The two agreed to resume their joint training sessions the following week.

events.name: Go to bed early due to fatigue from traveling.
events.description: In the evening, feeling rather fatigued from a full day of errands, Feng Haoran decided to retire early to conserve energy for his sister's arrival.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic and prepared to handle a series of procedural matters.

结束状态.心情: The sense of relief after efficient progress, with major administrative procedures largely completed and funds prepared for investment, gives the feeling that everything is proceeding according to plan.

state.今日运动: None, occupied with outdoor tasks throughout the day.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Friday evening, the theme of life shifted from work and assets to warm [family moments]. Feng Haoran welcomed his sister and her best friend with anticipation, kicking off a wonderful weekend reunion with an authentic and sumptuous Hunan cuisine welcome dinner.

events.name: Yuelu Mountain Endurance Morning Run Test
events.description: This was the last morning before his sister's visit. Feng Haoran went to Yuelu Mountain alone for a longer-than-usual morning run, focusing on testing his endurance and heart rate stability on continuous uphill sections. He recorded detailed data throughout the entire run to serve as a reference for the next phase of his training plan.

events.name: Changsha South Railway Station Welcomes Sister Feng Xinran
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran arrived at Changsha South Railway Station ahead of time. When he saw his younger sister Feng Xinran and her best friend walking out of the platform with smiles, he happily waved and went up to greet them. After picking them up, he skillfully helped with their luggage and drove them back to his apartment.

events.name: Welcome Dinner at Hunan Cuisine Restaurant
events.description: In the evening, as the host, Feng Haoran hosted a welcome dinner for his sister and her close friend in a private room at a Hunan cuisine restaurant he had carefully reserved. At the table, he enthusiastically introduced the origins and ways to enjoy each specialty dish, filling the gathering with laughter and cheerful conversations. He inquired about his parents’ well-being and his sister’s work and life in Shanghai, while also sharing his own professional progress in Changsha over the years and the happy news of purchasing a home. The bond between the siblings grew warmer and more tangible through this face-to-face, in-depth conversation.

events.name: Late-night In-depth Conversation with My Sister
events.description: After returning home from dinner, Feng Haoran chatted with his sister in the living room until late at night, discussing family matters, careers, and future plans, which led to a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: With joy and anticipation, the wonderful days of family reunion on the weekend are about to begin.

结束状态.心情: Warm, happy, and content, the comfort and joy brought by family affection are irreplaceable, and there is great anticipation for the companionship over the next two days.

2025-08.daily_overview: This was a Saturday filled with warmth and thoughtful planning. An early morning run kicked off a day of vitality. In the morning, he combined professional insights with personal planning in his study, laying the groundwork for a pension analysis report. In the afternoon, as both a host and an elder brother, he guided his sister and her close friend, who had traveled from Shanghai, on a tour of Changsha’s landmarks, enjoying a heartwarming time of photography, coffee, and in-depth conversations. In the evening, a dinner with his close friend Peng Yuqing evolved into a deep planning session for a National Day road trip, sparking the idea of creating a public account to build his professional influence. Throughout the day, family affection and future planning intertwined, making it both fulfilling and profound.

events.name: Morning jog on Yuelu Mountain at dawn
events.description: As part of his daily routine, Feng Haoran set off promptly at 6 a.m. on Saturday for his morning run along South Yuelu Mountain Road. On the familiar track, he contemplated the day's schedule while running, preparing for the upcoming family gathering and evening discussion.

events.name: Develop a Framework for Pension Analysis Report
events.description: In his home study, Feng Haoran reviewed Huatai Securities' internal successful cases regarding commercial insurance and diversified investments. Integrating his earlier research notes on personal pensions, he applied an investment advisor's analytical mindset to outline the overall logical framework of the analysis report on a whiteboard. He preliminarily divided it into four main chapters: policy background, product complementarity, tool allocation, and practical recommendations.

events.name: Accompanying my younger sister on a tour and street photography
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran served as a guide and photographer, taking his sister Feng Xinran and her best friend to visit Yuelu Mountain and Orange Isle. Not only did he introduce the scenic spots, but he also engaged in street photography along the way, attempting to blend his sister’s travel state with the urban landscape of Changsha. This new shooting perspective of "portrait and environmental storytelling" filled him with novelty and excitement.

events.name: Afternoon Tea Time at Xinyi Cafe
events.description: After the tour, Feng Haoran specifically took his sisters to his favorite hand-brewed coffee shop. He introduced the owner, Shen Xinyi, to his sisters, and together they sampled the special blend coffee recommended by Ms. Shen. In the relaxed and pleasant atmosphere, the siblings went beyond casual greetings and engaged in a deeper conversation about their life plans in Shanghai and Changsha, career goals, and expectations for the future.

events.name: Dinner with Peng Yuqing and Planning a Self-Driving Tour
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran met his friend Peng Yuqing at the reserved Hunan restaurant. The two first shared updates on their recent work and life, then quickly got down to business. Peng Yuqing presented the prepared guide to Xiangxi cuisine, while Feng Haoran opened a map app. They engaged in a lively preliminary discussion about the route, duration, and feasibility of their National Day road trip through Hunan and Guizhou.

events.name: Refine the Division of Labor and Consensus for Self-Driving Tours
events.description: In the latter half of the dinner, the discussion moved into the practical implementation phase. Feng Haoran, leveraging his ENTJ planning skills, took the initiative to map out the main driving routes, safety considerations, and the overall budget framework. Peng Yuqing, drawing on her keen sense for food and entertainment, was tasked with selecting unique accommodations, documenting must-try food spots, and preparing entertainment activities for the journey. The two quickly reached a consensus on the pace of the itinerary and personal preferences, and established a preliminary division of responsibilities.

events.name: Exploring the Concept of a Personal Public Account
events.description: As the dinner was drawing to a close, Feng Haoran mentioned to Peng Yuqing his plan to launch a public account for sharing investment insights, aiming to build his personal professional influence. Drawing on her experience in new media operations, Peng Yuqing offered practical suggestions regarding account positioning, a content planning matrix, and initial promotion channels. She also explicitly expressed her willingness to provide ongoing support, which boosted Feng Haoran's confidence in launching the project.

events.name: Farewell and Follow-up Task Confirmation
events.description: After dinner, the two bid farewell outside the restaurant. Upon returning home, Feng Haoran promptly organized all the key points discussed that evening into electronic notes. He then confirmed with Peng Yuqing via WeChat their respective next tasks in preparing for the National Day trip (such as Feng Haoran needing to refine the itinerary and Peng Yuqing improving the food list) and scheduled the time for their next communication.

events.name: Reading and Relaxation Before Sleep
events.description: Before going to sleep, Feng Haoran leaned against the headboard, flipping through the latest financial magazine for a while and reflecting on the day’s experiences. From the warmth of family to the collaboration of friendship and new ideas for his personal career, he felt content and motivated. With a touch of reluctance about seeing his sister off the next day and anticipation for future plans, he drifted into sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Calm and slightly expectant, ready to host a gathering for my sister and friends.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, heartwarming, and driven by a sense of purpose, with contentment in both family bonds and friendships.

2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday was a day of farewells and quiet reflection. In the morning, I prepared breakfast for my younger sister and shared life advice, showcasing the mature and considerate side of an elder brother. After seeing her off, the afternoon was dedicated to personal space, focusing on organizing photos and delving deeply into post-processing photography techniques, transforming yesterday's inspiration into tangible skill improvement. An evening run by the riverside served as both physical and mental relaxation and a part of data-driven training. The day passed smoothly between familial farewells and the refinement of personal interests, though a slight weight gain resulted from the farewell gathering.

events.name: Preparing a farewell breakfast for my sister
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran prepared a simple breakfast (fried eggs, milk, and bread) at home for his sister and her close friend. During the meal, he shared his insights from living in Changsha for four years and some basic financial management tips. His sister, in turn, shared her feelings about this visit. The warm breakfast was filled with a sense of reluctance.

events.name: Sending my younger sister to the high-speed railway station
events.description: After breakfast, Feng Haoran drove his sister Feng Xinran and her best friend to Changsha South Railway Station. Before parting, the siblings exchanged small gifts (Feng Haoran gave Changsha specialties—spicy preserved duck and Chayan Yuese tea bags, while his sister gave butterfly pastries from Shanghai International Hotel) and agreed that their next reunion might be during the Spring Festival or when his sister visits Changsha again.

events.name: Having lunch with my sister and best friend
events.description: Before seeing them off, Feng Haoran, his sister, and her close friend had a sumptuous Hunan cuisine lunch at a restaurant near the high-speed rail station as a final farewell meal. During the gathering, they reminisced about many childhood anecdotes, which led to overeating.

events.name: Organize and post-process photos from my sister's visit
events.description: After seeing his sister off, Feng Haoran returned home and organized the photos taken during her visit on his personal computer. He carefully selected several high-quality images that integrated portraits with the environment, reflecting the theme of "a foreign land and familiar faces." He then made basic adjustments to brightness, contrast, and color tones in preparation for an online photography exhibition. This process allowed him to relive the warmth of the previous day.

events.name: Learn Advanced Photography Post-Production Techniques
events.description: Regarding the issues encountered during yesterday's landmark shoot, such as insufficient dynamic range and noticeable noise in night scenes, Feng Haoran spent the afternoon learning and practicing more advanced post-processing techniques, including stacking and layer masking, through online tutorials and professional forums. He experimented with merging multiple photos taken at different exposures in software to enhance image quality. This new skill has filled him with anticipation for future astrophotography endeavors.

events.name: Interval Running Training on the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt
events.description: In the evening, as the summer heat subsided slightly, Feng Haoran went to the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt for interval running training. He alternated between running 800 meters at a fast pace and 400 meters at a slow pace, completing a total of 5 sets. He used his watch to record the real-time pace and heart rate data at different intensities, which he would later analyze to assess his cardiovascular function and recovery capacity.

events.name: Dinner and Next Week's Work Preview
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran had a simple dinner and took some time to preview the important meetings and client appointments scheduled for the following week in Huatai Securities' internal system. He mentally prepared himself for the upcoming resumption of the pension fund report writing work and potential client communications.

起始状态.心情: A tinge of parting melancholy, yet overall serene.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Calmness, feeling fulfilled after skill learning and exercise, having transitioned from the farewell mood to a work-ready state.

2025-08.daily_overview: Monday marked a full return to work mode. Immediately after commuting, he dove into the formal drafting of the pension analysis report, demonstrating highly efficient professional capabilities. The morning was dedicated to focusing on policy background, while the afternoon delved into product analysis, skillfully incorporating real client cases. During work breaks, he proactively followed up on the progress of his home loan and shared the joy of his new photography equipment with running friends. In the evening, he began putting his National Day road trip plan into action by creating a preparation group. Before bed, he even conducted preliminary research for future balcony gardening. It was a highly efficient and multi-tasking day, but due to work pressure, increased takeout orders led to continued weight gain.

events.name: Commuting and Work Preparation
events.description: At 8 a.m., Feng Haoran set out from his home in Yuelu District and arrived at the Huatai Securities office in Kaifu District after approximately a 45-minute drive at 8:45 a.m. He brewed a cup of pour-over coffee, quickly reviewed financial news and emails, setting the tone for the day's work.

events.name: Writing the First Part of the Pension Report (Policy Background)
events.description: Based on the framework conceived over the weekend, Feng Haoran began focusing on drafting the first part of the report. He emphasized the background of the personal pension system's introduction, its policy significance, and its research purpose as a financial investment advisor. To ensure accuracy, he consulted the latest financial regulatory documents and official interpretations, thereby solidifying the theoretical foundation of the report.

events.name: Overtime work to handle urgent customer requests.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran received an urgent call from client Huang Siqi, requiring adjustments to part of the investment portfolio to address market volatility. He immediately paused his report writing, spent two hours analyzing data and providing recommendations, which resulted in having to order takeout for lunch and consuming a higher calorie intake.

events.name: Write the Second Part of the Pension Report (Product Complementarity Analysis)
events.description: After handling the client's request, Feng Haoran focused on the second part of the report, providing a detailed analysis of how commercial endowment insurance, health insurance, and other products can complement and hedge risks with personal pension accounts. Drawing on the anonymized case of asset allocation for client Huang Siqi, he simulated portfolio constructions under different risk preferences and calculated potential long-term returns and protection effects.

events.name: Wednesday Morning Run Invitation and Gear Sharing
events.description: Before leaving work, Feng Haoran contacted his running partner Gao Yunfei via WeChat to confirm their Wednesday morning running appointment. He specifically mentioned that he had purchased new photography equipment and planned to show it to Gao Yunfei during their run, sharing the joy of upgrading his hobby gear.

events.name: Follow up on the progress of property loan approval.
events.description: Feng Haoran proactively contacted the bank's account manager and inquired about the current progress of the loan approval over the phone. The account manager indicated that the materials were complete and the application had entered the review stage, with a preliminary result likely to be available within this week. Feng Haoran politely expressed his gratitude and confirmed that he would actively cooperate with any possible requests for additional materials.

events.name: Establish a National Day Self-driving Trip Preparation Group
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran created a WeChat group that included several outdoor enthusiasts such as Peng Yuqing and camping partner Xie Yutong, naming it "National Day Hunan-Guizhou Self-Driving Group." He shared his preliminary travel ideas, the proposed timeframe, and several potential camping sites he had researched (such as near the foot of Fanjing Mountain and around the Thousand-Household Miao Village) in the group. He invited everyone to discuss together, officially launching the team's preparatory work.

events.name: Investigate Balcony Gardening Varieties
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran used fragmented time to search for information online, focusing on vegetables and herbs suitable for the autumn climate in Changsha and easy to grow on a balcony. After comparison, he preliminarily selected lettuce and cherry radishes with short growth cycles, as well as commonly used rosemary and mint, adding a touch of greenery planning to the upcoming life in his new home.

起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to dive into work with Monday's drive.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: A sense of satisfaction from efficiently completing multiple tasks, though work pressure has led to slight fatigue, with optimism about both work progress and travel plans.

2025-08.daily_overview: Tuesday continued the efficient work pace, with the pension report entering a more complex stage of research on asset allocation strategies. Meanwhile, significant personal matters—property transfer and loan contract signing—were successfully completed, marking the near conclusion of asset optimization operations. However, the continuous high-intensity desk work triggered a physical warning, with noticeable discomfort in the neck for the first time. This prompted him to take immediate relief measures that evening and begin a profound reflection on the balance between work and health, leading to an early bedtime to restore energy.

events.name: Writing the Third Part of the Pension Report (Diversified Tool Allocation)
events.description: Feng Haoran focused today on researching the allocation strategies of personal pension funds with diversified investment tools such as public funds, bank wealth management products, and trusts. He cited an anonymized internal company case regarding the asset allocation of client Lin Zhihao (emphasizing long-term planning and risk diversification), providing a detailed explanation of the roles and allocation logic of different tools in long-term retirement planning.

events.name: Complete the property transfer and loan contract signing.
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran once again went to the Real Estate Registration Center and successfully collected the new property ownership certificate, which had already completed the transfer procedures. Subsequently, he immediately rushed to the bank and, under the guidance of the client manager, carefully read and signed the final mortgage loan contract, completing the confirmation of all legal documents. At this point, the core legal procedures of "selling one and buying one" were essentially concluded, and he felt a weight lifted from his shoulders.

events.name: First occurrence of neck discomfort
events.description: In the afternoon at the office, after several consecutive days of intense report writing, following up on client projects, and planning a self-driving trip, Feng Haoran had been maintaining a fixed posture while working at his desk for an extended period. He suddenly felt noticeable stiffness and mild soreness in the back of his neck and upper shoulders, accompanied by subtle cracking sounds when he attempted to turn his head. This immediately put him on alert.

events.name: Implement mitigation measures immediately.
events.description: After realizing this was a warning signal from his body, Feng Haoran immediately stopped working. He stood up, walked to the office window, and performed several minutes of neck stretches and shoulder rotations. At the same time, he changed his habit of listening to financial podcasts during the lunch break to closing his eyes and resting for 15 minutes, allowing his eyes and neck muscles to take a temporary break.

events.name: Reflection and Booking Physiotherapy
events.description: After returning home from work, the discomfort in his neck persisted. Feng Haoran deeply reflected on his recent work pattern of "prioritizing mental exertion over physical activity." He decided not to rely solely on temporary stretches and, through a mobile app, booked a massage session for the following evening at a well-regarded traditional Chinese medicine therapy center near his company, intending to seek professional treatment.

events.name: Simple Dinner and Health Information Inquiry
events.description: In the evening, he prepared a light dinner, deliberately reducing calorie intake to control his weight. After the meal, he reviewed some articles on cervical spine care and posture correction for office workers, further realizing that health management requires a systematic and proactive approach, much like investment planning.

起始状态.心情: Steady, focusing on the important tasks of the day.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room in a residence in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: The completion of transactional tasks brings a sense of relief, yet physical discomfort adds a layer of worry and reflection, strengthening the resolve to make changes.

2025-08.daily_overview: Wednesday unfolded with bodily warnings and proactive adjustments. The morning's routine run with a running partner was filled with joy as they shared new gear. During the day, work focused on solidifying the pension report using data models. Discomfort in his neck prompted him to seek professional physical therapy after work, strengthening his resolve to adjust his habits. Meanwhile, multiple threads of personal life progressed simultaneously: travel plans became more concrete, stamp collecting was systematized, funds from a property transaction were recovered and reinvested, vehicle maintenance was scheduled, and he even encountered an invitation to a coffee tasting event. Though life was busy, everything steadily advanced within his planning and control, and his weight began to decrease.

events.name: Morning run and sharing photography equipment
events.description: As agreed, Feng Haoran went for a morning run with his running partner Gao Yunfei along South Yuelu Road. He brought along his newly purchased full-frame mirrorless camera and, during a break, showed Gao Yunfei the camera body and lens, sharing insights on the improved image quality and enhanced shooting experience. As they ran, the two discussed how to better integrate their photography hobby with a healthy lifestyle, such as by capturing the scenery along their running routes.

events.name: Build a data analysis model for the report
events.description: In the office, Feng Haoran utilized Excel and professional financial analysis software to construct several core asset allocation models for the pension report. He established three typical investor profiles—conservative, moderate, and aggressive—and conducted 20-year return scenario simulations and stress tests. This process generated intuitive key data charts and curves, making the report's conclusions more persuasive.

events.name: Proceeds from apartment sale have been received.
events.description: Feng Haoran received a bank SMS notification that the full proceeds from the sale of his old apartment (approximately 250,000 yuan net after deducting various taxes, fees, and agency commissions) had been successfully credited to his account. The release of this liquidity signifies a solid step forward for his personal investment portfolio toward the one-million-yuan target.

events.name: Execute the first portfolio top-up
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran analyzed the morning market session. He believed that after a slight correction, the valuation of the consumer sector had entered a reasonable range. Accordingly, he executed the first planned buy order, utilizing approximately 80,000 yuan to establish positions in two leading consumer stocks he had been tracking for a long time.

events.name: Receive cervical massage therapy
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran went directly to the scheduled traditional Chinese medicine therapy center. Through an hour of massage and acupoint therapy, the technician alleviated the muscle tension and stiffness in his neck and shoulders. The technician also offered suggestions: avoid looking down for extended periods, stand up and move around every hour, and combine with hot compresses. This therapy session left him feeling much more comfortable.

events.name: Schedule long-distance vehicle maintenance
events.description: Considering the long-distance self-driving trip during the National Day holiday, Feng Haoran contacted his regular 4S shop by phone and scheduled a specialized pre-trip maintenance service for August 25th (Saturday). During the initial communication, he discussed key items that required focused inspection, such as the braking system, tires, and spare tire.

events.name: Systematic Stamp Collection Framework
events.description: In the evening, inspired by the online exchange with fellow collector Luo Zhenyu, Feng Haoran decided to systematize his stamp collection. In his study, he used a notebook to initially record the concepts for two collection directions: "China's Aerospace Engineering" and "World Cultural Heritage." He also outlined the strengths of his existing collection and identified gaps that need to be filled.

events.name: Received an invitation to the coffee tasting event.
events.description: When Feng Haoran went to Xinyi Cafe to buy coffee in the evening, the owner Shen Xinyi informed him that a small specialty coffee bean tasting event would be held this Saturday, focusing on rare micro-lot varieties, and warmly invited him to attend. Feng Haoran, who was quite interested in such in-depth experiences, gladly accepted the invitation.

events.name: Refine the self-driving travel itinerary and share it.
events.description: Based on the discussions in the WeChat group and utilizing feedback from map software and camping forums during the evening, Feng Haoran finalized the detailed itinerary for the road trip. He included daily driving times, accommodation (camping) points, and activity arrangements. Feng shared the detailed plan in the group and excitedly discussed his astrophotography plans, inquiring about his companions' interest.

起始状态.心情: The alertness and vitality before a morning run, feeling pleased to share new gear.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Complex yet overall positive. The body has been relaxed through physical therapy, with substantial progress made in both financial and travel plans. Despite some fatigue, there is a strong sense of accomplishment.

2025-08.daily_overview: Thursday's theme was wrapping up and starting anew. The main content of the pension report was completed in the morning, marking the conclusion of a phase of work. Reflections prompted by cervical issues led him to solidify neck stretches as a new post-morning-run habit. In the afternoon, he handled the insurance application for the new home, adding a safety lock to his assets. In the evening, he began systematically organizing his stamp collection, turning ideas into action. Meanwhile, the WeChat group for the National Day road trip became lively due to his detailed planning, with friends starting to volunteer for tasks. Supplies for the gardening plan were also ordered online. This was a transitional day from completion to initiation, with the morning run replaced by indoor exercise due to weather conditions.

events.name: Complete the main body of the pension report.
events.description: Feng Haoran summarized the analyses from the previous sections, distilling the core principles and practical pathways for the combined allocation of personal pensions with other financial instruments. Finally, from the perspective of an industry consultant, he offered specific suggestions for the future product design and service optimization of financial institutions. With this, the main body of the report, spanning nearly ten thousand words, was fully completed, and he felt a wave of relief.

events.name: Morning run canceled due to rain, replaced with indoor stretching.
events.description: It rained in the morning, so Feng Haoran was unable to go for his outdoor morning run. He performed 30 minutes of yoga and neck stretching exercises at home to maintain his exercise routine and alleviate cervical discomfort, incorporating this set of stretching movements into his regular routine.

events.name: Review of Property Replacement Operations
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran briefly reviewed the "sell one, buy one" property replacement operation. He evaluated the asset optimization effects (location upgrade, release of liquid funds) and began considering how to plan the other investment directions for this 250,000 yuan, which could be used to further enrich the stock portfolio or explore other stable assets.

events.name: Selecting Property Insurance for a New Home
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran met with an insurance broker to conduct a detailed comparison of property insurance plans for his new home offered by multiple insurance companies. After comprehensively evaluating the coverage, deductibles, and premiums, he ultimately selected a comprehensive protection plan covering risks such as fire, water damage, and theft. He then completed the online electronic signature and premium payment on the spot.

events.name: Initial Sorting of Stamp Collection
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran took out all the stamp albums and loose stamps from the bookcase and storage boxes, spreading them out on the study desk. He conducted a preliminary classification, first separating them by country (China and foreign countries), then grouping them by approximate time periods (such as pre-1980s, 1980s–2000s, and post-2000s), laying the groundwork for detailed thematic organization later.

events.name: National Day Self-Driving Trip Task Allocation
events.description: In the "National Day Hunan-Guizhou Self-Driving Tour" WeChat group, Peng Yuqing took on the task of creating a food guide after seeing the detailed itinerary. Other friends also responded one after another, with some responsible for booking hotels on non-camping days and others starting to research vehicle inspections and alternative routes. Everyone reached a preliminary consensus on setting off on the evening of September 30, fostering a strong atmosphere of teamwork.

events.name: Place an order for gardening supplies.
events.description: Based on previous research, Feng Haoran placed an order on an e-commerce platform, purchasing three plastic planting boxes with drainage holes, an adequate amount of universal potting soil, slow-release fertilizer, as well as seeds for lettuce, cherry radish, rosemary, and mint, thereby preparing the essential supplies for the balcony vegetable garden.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha
起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, prepare to complete the report and handle multiple miscellaneous tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief and ease after completing major tasks, seeing various plans (health, travel, hobbies) progressing steadily, and maintaining a positive mindset.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Friday, the work entered the final refinement stage. After a thorough read-through and preliminary revisions, the pension report became more logically coherent and smoothly expressed. The evening street photography session along the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt was a relaxing moment for him to observe the city through his new lens. On personal matters, the insurance for his new home officially took effect, and he began a meticulous thematic organization of his stamp collection. The experience of neck discomfort prompted him to make a longer-term health management decision. For the coffee tasting event he will attend tomorrow, he has also done some preparatory research in advance and is looking forward to it with anticipation. The weekend atmosphere had already permeated the evening, and his weight continued to decrease.

events.name: Review and revise the initial draft of the pension report
events.description: Feng Haoran carefully read through the completed draft of the report from beginning to end. He focused on checking the logical coherence, the accuracy of the data, and the fluency of the language. During this process, he adjusted the order of some sections to optimize the reading experience and marked several areas that required the addition of the latest market data or further verification of citations.

events.name: Xiangjiang Scenic Belt Street Photography of Humanistic Scenes
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran did not go home immediately. He took his camera to the Xiangjiang Scenic Belt and engaged in street photography under the warm glow of the sunset. He attempted to blend the modern landmarks of the Binjiang New District with the everyday scenes of citizens strolling, cycling, and dancing, capturing urban humanistic images rich in narrative and the vibrancy of daily life.

events.name: Received the electronic insurance policy for the new house.
events.description: The insurance company issued the official electronic policy. Upon receiving the document, Feng Haoran immediately downloaded and saved it in the dedicated "Assets and Insurance" folder on his personal computer. Simultaneously, he updated key information such as the policy number and the insurance company's emergency contact details into his asset management spreadsheet.

events.name: Develop a long-term health management plan
events.description: After experiencing this neck discomfort, Feng Haoran engaged in deep reflection. He decided not only to stretch daily but also to make health management a long-term and systematic practice. He plans to undergo professional physical examinations or therapy sessions quarterly as preventive maintenance and has recorded this decision in his personal schedule.

events.name: Detailed Compilation of 'China Space Engineering' Stamps
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran focused on organizing stamps themed around "China's Space Engineering." Wearing gloves, he meticulously examined the condition of each stamp (perforations, gum, presence of creases), verified the versions issued in different years (such as the Shenzhou-5 and Chang'e lunar exploration series), and meticulously recorded the serial numbers, issue years, quantities, and condition grades of each set of stamps in a dedicated notebook.

events.name: Preparing for a Coffee Tasting Event
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran was filled with anticipation for the coffee tasting session the next day. He reviewed brief information about the terroir of coffee beans from Ethiopia and Panama, deciding to have a light lunch the following day to ensure his palate remained sensitive, allowing him to fully enjoy the sensory exploration journey led by Mr. Shen.

起始状态.心情: The sense of ease on Friday begins to emerge, ready to wrap up the final tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: A sense of relaxation after completing a phase of work, looking forward to tomorrow's leisure activities, with an overall cheerful mood.

2025-08.daily_overview: Saturday was a day fully dedicated to personal interests and immersive experiences. In the morning, revising the report and organizing stamps provided a focused period of solitude. The highlight of the afternoon was a specialty coffee tasting event at the beloved café—a refined experience that engaged all the senses, accompanied by delightful conversations with fellow enthusiasts. In the evening, he took his new camera for its first thematic street photography test in familiar surroundings, finding the handling quite satisfying. The night marked the beginning of an exploration into a new realm of wellness—the first yoga trial class. It was a rich, textured, and nourishing day for both body and mind, with further progress in weight loss.

events.name: Supplementary Revision of the Pension Report
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran supplemented the latest market data and industry trends regarding the issues marked yesterday, refined several key charts in the report to make them more intuitive and professional, and added footnotes to some core conclusions, citing authoritative policy documents and research reports to enhance the academic rigor of the report.

events.name: Continue organizing the 'World Cultural Heritage' stamps.
events.description: Feng Haoran organized a collection of stamps on the theme of "World Cultural Heritage," including China's Great Wall and the Forbidden City, as well as international sites such as the Pyramids and the Palace of Versailles. He categorized them by country and heritage site, meticulously recorded their condition and quantity, and carefully placed the sorted stamps into a new thematic stamp album.

events.name: Attend a Specialty Coffee Bean Tasting Session
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran arrived punctually at the quiet area on the second floor of Xinyi Café. Under the guidance of Shen Xinyi, he, along with fewer than ten participants, sampled three rare micro-lot coffee beans from origins such as Ethiopia and Panama. He focused intently on savoring the layered flavors brought by the unique processing methods of each bean (such as distinct floral and fruity notes, and rich wine-like undertones). He also exchanged impressions with Ms. Shen and other coffee enthusiasts, fully immersing himself in this sensory feast.

events.name: In-depth Communication After the Tasting Event
events.description: After the tasting event concluded, Feng Haoran stayed behind to chat with Shen Xinyi and several other participants. They discussed their respective preferences regarding acidity and body, and Ms. Shen also shared some interesting anecdotes from her visit to coffee plantations in Yunnan. Feng Haoran took photos of the coffee bean packaging with his phone, intending to share them with friends who enjoy coffee.

events.name: Street Photography Test in the Yuelu Mountain Area
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran took his new camera for its first thematic street photography test around Yuelu Mountain South Road and the university town. He deliberately experimented with different combinations of aperture and shutter speed to experience the image quality of the new lens in backlight and artificial lighting conditions, capturing some vibrant street scenes full of life.

events.name: First Yoga Experience Class
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran went to the scheduled yoga studio to attend his first Hatha yoga experience class. Under the guidance of the instructor, he learned basic postures and diaphragmatic breathing techniques. Although some of the movements were quite challenging for him, by the end of the session, he genuinely felt relaxation in his shoulders and neck, along with a sense of inner peace, which made him decide to continue exploring yoga.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, free, and full of anticipation for the day's arrangements.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Enriched and contented, both the senses and the body have been well nourished and relaxed, feeling positive about this new attempt at yoga.
