2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday was a day that blended physical challenges, deep dives into hobbies, and a sense of life’s rituals. The early morning long-distance run served as a test of this month’s running training results. In the morning, the final layout of the pension report was completed, forming a complete draft ready for review. In the afternoon, I delved into the stamp collecting market and purchased seeds and tools for the balcony vegetable garden. In the evening, I organized coffee tasting notes, transforming experiences into knowledge. Throughout the day, the body underwent extreme challenges, while the mind explored various hobby domains in depth, storing energy for the upcoming week. Body weight decreased due to exercise expenditure.

events.name: Half-Marathon Training Run along Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt
events.description: Feng Haoran completed his planned 21-kilometer long-distance training run early on Sunday morning. He ran along the Xiangjiang River Scenic Belt and back, focusing on maintaining a stable heart rate throughout the entire session. After finishing, he performed thorough stretching exercises. This training run tested the results of his previous training efforts. Although the final few kilometers were challenging, the sense of accomplishment upon completion was immense.

events.name: Finalize Pension Report Layout
events.description: After returning home from the training exercise and resting, Feng Haoran began the final formatting of the report. He standardized the font, font size, and line spacing throughout the entire document, creating a clear table of contents and a professional cover. He then checked each page for potential typos and punctuation errors, ensuring that the report met the formal standards required for submission to his supervisor or colleagues for review.

events.name: Researching the Stamp Market and Formulating a Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran conducted in-depth research on online stamp collecting forums and auction websites, focusing on the issuance history, current market trends, and recognized rare varieties of stamps in the two major themes of "China's Space Engineering" and "World Cultural Heritage." Based on this, he began drafting a specific procurement list and targets for the upcoming year.

events.name: Procurement of Balcony Gardening Seeds and Tools
events.description: He placed an order for lettuce, cherry radish, rosemary, and mint seeds from a professional gardening seed online store, and also purchased basic tools such as a small shovel, a watering can, gardening gloves, and label tags for marking. With all the supplies ready, he was fully prepared for the planting practice on his new home's balcony.

events.name: Organize Coffee Tasting Session Notes
events.description: While brewing coffee in the evening, Feng Haoran recalled yesterday's tasting event. He organized his taste memories from the occasion and the insights gained from his exchange with Mr. Shen into his phone's memo app, meticulously recording the names, origins, processing methods, and the perceived flavor profiles of the three coffee beans. He believes that such in-depth exploration of a hobby is an essential component of a high-quality life.

events.name: Tempo Running and Data Recording
events.description: In the evening before sunset, to alleviate muscle stiffness after a long run, Feng Haoran went for a light tempo run around the neighborhood, maintaining a steady pace. He deliberately recorded detailed data such as cadence and ground contact time to analyze running form efficiency.

起始状态.心情: Focusing on the upcoming long-distance running challenge, feeling slightly nervous but full of fighting spirit.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Tired yet filled with a sense of accomplishment, having completed a long run, finalized a report, and made progress in multiple hobbies, I feel deeply satisfied and grounded.

2025-08.daily_overview: A new week begins with both gains and planning. The morning was smoothly spent on vehicle maintenance, ensuring safety for the upcoming National Day travels. In the afternoon, a series of positive financial updates arrived: the quarterly performance bonus was credited. Being an ENTJ, he efficiently allocated the funds to travel, emergency savings, and investment accounts, while mapping out the next steps. During work breaks, he engaged in in-depth discussions with colleagues about market trends. In the evening, he finalized the core concept for his stamp collection with fellow collectors. Meanwhile, invitations for a weekend camping trip were sent out. This day balanced material gains with mental planning, instilling a strong sense of control over the future, though his weight slightly increased due to celebratory indulgences.

events.name: Send the vehicle for pre-long-distance maintenance.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran drove his car to the scheduled 4S dealership. He explained his plan for a long-distance self-driving trip during the National Day holiday in detail to the service advisor, requesting a thorough inspection of the brakes, tires, chassis, and other key components. After leaving the car there, he took a taxi to his company.

events.name: Finalized Backup Pension Report
events.description: Upon arriving at the company, Feng Haoran saved the preliminary draft of the final analysis report completed over the weekend in both PDF and Word formats, backing them up to the company's encrypted cloud drive and his personal portable hard drive respectively. He organized the relevant paper materials on his desk to clear space for the next phase of report review and revisions.

events.name: Complete vehicle maintenance and record expenditures.
events.description: In the afternoon, the 4S shop notified that the maintenance was completed. Feng Haoran went to pick up the car, and the technician presented the maintenance list (including oil and filter replacement, etc.), with a total cost of 1,200 yuan. After verifying the items, he signed and made the payment, and conducted a brief test drive to confirm the car was in good condition. In the evening, he recorded this expense in his personal annual budget sheet.

events.name: Received and allocated quarterly performance bonus
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran received a bank SMS notification and a confirmation email regarding the disbursement of his second-quarter performance bonus. After logging into his mobile banking app to verify the amount, he promptly formulated an allocation plan in his financial software: a portion was transferred to a dedicated savings account labeled "National Day Self-Driving Trip"; another portion was moved into a money market fund as an emergency reserve; and the remainder was set aside as additional capital for stock investments in September. He then immediately completed the transfer operations via his mobile banking app.

events.name: Discussing the market with colleagues during lunch
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran and his colleague Zheng Wenbo had lunch together at a Hunan restaurant near the company. To celebrate the arrival of their bonuses, they ordered slightly more dishes than usual, leading to increased calorie intake. The two engaged in an in-depth discussion about their perspectives on the recent volatile market and explored potential optimization directions and sectors of focus for their personal investment portfolios following the injection of performance bonuses.

events.name: Confirming the Philatelic Collection Philosophy with Fellow Collectors
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran shared his sorting results and dual-theme concept with his collector friend Luo Zhenyu in Shenzhen via video call. After an in-depth discussion, Luo Zhenyu provided professional advice, and the two ultimately established a systematic collection direction centered on the core concepts of "Exploring the Future (Aerospace)" and "Remembering the Past (Cultural Heritage)." Feng Haoran felt that his thoughts had become clearer.

events.name: Initiating an Invitation for a Weekend Camping Activity
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran contacted his running friend Gao Yunfei and camping partner Xie Yutong via WeChat, proposing to go camping and photograph the stars at Heimi Peak National Forest Park this weekend. He checked the weather forecast, confirmed that the weekend would be clear and suitable for stargazing, and preliminarily discussed the itinerary, equipment, and division of responsibilities.

起始状态.心情: Monday's work state is calm and well-organized.

结束状态.心情: Feeling proactive and in control, the arrival of bonus payments and the implementation of multiple plans have brought a strong sense of financial security and a clear outlook for the future.

2025-08.daily_overview: Tuesday's work focus shifted from creation to organization and planning. The pension report entered its finalization stage, with the definitive version completed. On the personal front, the stamp collection underwent a transformation from disarray to a systematic arrangement, resulting in two beautifully curated thematic albums. The soft furnishing plan for the new home progressed from conceptualization to on-site measurements and list preparation, with advice sought from friends. In terms of investments, he scheduled a reminder for the additional funds to be added in September. It was a day of translating ideas into tangible outcomes and concrete plans, with body weight returning to a downward trend.

events.name: Final review and completion of the pension report
events.description: Feng Haoran conducted a final comprehensive review and detailed revision of the report, verifying the accuracy of all data, the logical coherence of the arguments, and the professionalism of the language. He added clear explanations to the charts, ultimately producing a finalized professional analysis report of approximately 5,000 words, complete with text and illustrations, ready to be shared at an appropriate time.

events.name: File the stamps into thematic stamp albums
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran was in his study, carefully placing all the previously sorted and categorized stamps into two brand-new, specialized stamp albums with protective sleeves, organized according to the themes of "Space Engineering" and "World Cultural Heritage." He ensured that each stamp was securely and flatly positioned, a process imbued with a sense of ceremony.

events.name: Mark investment for additional observation period
events.description: On both his physical investment calendar by the desk and his mobile phone schedule, Feng Haoran has clearly marked September as the "Additional Investment Observation Period." He plans to combine market analysis at that time to strategically invest the portion of funds reserved from his performance bonus into his existing stock portfolio.

events.name: Conduct on-site measurements of the new home and create a soft furnishings list.
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran went to his new apartment in Xiangjiang New District. He brought a tape measure and a notebook to take precise measurements of various areas on-site, including the living room and study, particularly focusing on the spaces planned for the study work area, photography display wall, and coffee corner. Based on the measurements and previously collected inspiration images, he created a detailed soft furnishing procurement list, specifying item specifications and an initial budget.

2025-08.daily_overview: Wednesday’s rhythm balanced reflection, sharing, and social interaction. In the morning, I visually mapped out my personal investment growth path, reinforcing my confidence. In the afternoon, I created professional catalog labels for my beloved stamp collection. In the evening, I met a friend at a café near my new home to seek advice on soft furnishing plans, gaining valuable suggestions on both aesthetics and functionality. Before bed, I engaged in online exchanges with fellow collectors on a forum. It was a day that connected past achievements, present construction, and future interest development, while my weight continued to decline.

events.name: Visualizing Personal Investment Growth Trajectory
events.description: Using charting software, Feng Haoran created an intuitive asset evolution path diagram, illustrating the dynamic changes in the proportions of various assets such as stocks, funds, and bonds throughout the process from an initial principal of 100,000 yuan to the current scale approaching 1 million yuan. He included explanations of the market conditions and strategic adjustments at each key turning point. This chart serves as a vivid testament to his professional growth and personal financial management capabilities.

events.name: Create Catalog Labels for Thematic Stamp Albums
events.description: Using computer software, he designed and printed exquisite catalog pages and descriptive labels for the two thematic stamp albums, "Aerospace Engineering" and "World Cultural Heritage." These pages and labels meticulously detail the name, issuing country, year, and a brief background introduction for each set of stamps. After trimming and pasting, the entire collection system became clear and professional, significantly enhancing the sense of accomplishment when browsing through it.

events.name: Discussing the soft furnishing plan for the new home with friends.
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran invited his friends Peng Yuqing and Wu Junjie to meet at a café near his new home. He used a tablet to show them his interior design sketches, procurement list, and pictures of his favorite furniture items. Peng Yuqing offered suggestions from the perspectives of color coordination and spatial aesthetics, while Wu Junjie shared practical insights on smart home devices such as intelligent lighting and motorized curtains. Feng Haoran took careful notes and refined his plan accordingly.

events.name: Communicating with Fellow Collectors on Stamp Forums
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran logged into his frequent stamp collecting forum and browsed discussion posts on thematic collections. Under a post titled "Technology and Civilization," he saw a comment from fellow collector "Lao Luo" (i.e., Luo Zhenyu) and left a brief online reply, gaining some inspiration on thematic expansion and classification.

2025-08.daily_overview: Thursday marked the completion and commencement of several tasks. The pension report was formally shared with colleagues and supervisors, entering the feedback phase. The comprehensive morning run at the end of the month assessed the training results of the entire month. In terms of investment operations, a second position increase was executed. Regarding personal interests, photography works were submitted for exhibition, the stamp collection plan was finalized and shared, and gardening supplies arrived. Simultaneously, preparations for the weekend camping trip began with careful organization and equipment checks. It was also a day for strategic work planning, as the team discussed the direction for the next month, while body weight remained stable.

events.name: Share the pension report and seek feedback.
events.description: Feng Haoran shared the final version of the analysis report with his close colleague Zheng Wenbo and his direct supervisor Qian Yongqiang via the company's internal system. In the accompanying message, he briefly explained his research insights and proactively expressed his desire to receive their professional feedback, as well as to discuss how to apply the relevant knowledge to customer service and his own career development.

events.name: End-of-Month Comprehensive Morning Run Assessment
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran conducted a comprehensive morning run at Yuelu Mountain, intentionally incorporating different sections such as flat roads and slopes. He compared the monthly data recorded by his fitness tracker and confirmed that his pace on the flat riverside roads had improved by approximately 5%, while also assessing his cardiopulmonary load during uphill sections. He documented these quantified results and subjective observations in his health journal.

events.name: Execute the second portfolio addition
events.description: Based on his observations, Feng Haoran believed that the valuation of leading companies in the pharmaceutical sector had entered a reasonable range he recognized after continuous fluctuations. Consequently, he executed a second buying operation, investing approximately 100,000 yuan to increase his holdings in a pharmaceutical company with outstanding R&D capabilities, further optimizing the portfolio structure.

events.name: Submit photography works for the online photography exhibition.
events.description: Feng Haoran submitted three carefully selected and post-processed photographic works to the online exhibition titled "Hometown and Old Friends," organized by the local photography community via an online platform. The photos were taken during his sister's visit. He included a brief artist statement explaining the stories behind the images, which revolved around family bonds, personal growth, and life in a new hometown.

events.name: Refine the Annual Stamp Collection Plan
events.description: On the basis of systematic organization, Feng Haoran formulated a detailed procurement list and objectives for the upcoming year, with a focus on scarce tickets within two major thematic areas. He shared this systematic collection plan along with his recent insights via WeChat with several fellow collectors, receiving positive feedback and encouragement.

events.name: Receiving Horticultural Supplies
events.description: The online-purchased planting boxes, nutrient soil, and some tools have arrived. After getting off work, Feng Haoran carried the packages back to his home in Yuelu District. After unpacking and confirming that all items were intact, he neatly stacked them in the corner of the balcony in the order of use, awaiting the formal start of planting after moving into the new home.

events.name: Organize and inspect camping and photography equipment.
events.description: To prepare for the weekend camping trip, Feng Haoran carefully organized and checked all his equipment at home after work. He confirmed that the tent, sleeping bag, moisture-proof pad, and gas canister for the stove were all sufficient. He paid special attention to inspecting the new camera, wide-angle lens, tripod, shutter release cable, and multiple spare batteries, ensuring that everything was fully functional and fully charged, making thorough preparations for astrophotography.

events.name: Participate in the team's monthly strategy planning meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran held a monthly strategic planning meeting with his superior Qian Yongqiang and team members Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya (joining online). They reviewed the market performance and customer feedback for August, analyzed the latest macroeconomic data, and preliminarily formulated the investment strategy framework and key recommendation directions for September, targeting customer groups with different risk preferences.

起始状态.心情: The mindset of month-end summarization, carrying an attitude of evaluation and outlook.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly. Multiple tasks have been completed or made progress, especially in preparing for the anticipated weekend activities, with a feeling of excitement and anticipation.

2025-08.daily_overview: Friday was the final day for preparations and purchases before the camping trip. During the day, he completed online price comparisons and placed orders for some large items for the new home. Meanwhile, inspiration for his stamp collection continued to flourish, leading to the conception of a more expansive theme framework centered on "Human Exploration and Civilization." After work, the focus shifted to making final supply purchases at an outdoor store and returning home to systematically pack and verify the equipment. All thoughts were directed toward the upcoming two-day journey into the mountains, with his weight nearing the target.

events.name: Compare prices and place orders for some new home soft furnishings
events.description: During work breaks, Feng Haoran conducted online price comparisons for key large items on the soft furnishing list, such as ergonomic chairs, coffee machines, and bookshelves. He primarily focused on brand reputation, user reviews, and delivery times. Eventually, he placed orders for some confirmed models that did not require immediate installation on several reliable e-commerce platforms, specifically scheduling the delivery for after the National Day self-driving trip.

events.name: Expanding the Theme of Stamp Collection
events.description: Inspired by recent organization efforts, Feng Haoran sketched a mind map titled "Human Exploration and Civilization" in his notebook. He preliminarily divided it into several subcategories such as "Space Exploration," "Ocean Exploration," "Land Migration and Urban Development," and "Information and Communication," and noted representative stamps he hoped to find under each category. This broadened the horizons for his collection.

events.name: Procurement of Camping Supplementary Supplies
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran went to a large outdoor equipment store in Changsha to purchase consumables and possible supplementary gear for camping. He bought high-energy bars, compressed biscuits, ample drinking water, mosquito repellent, large garbage bags, and specifically purchased a more stable carbon fiber tripod and an electronic shutter release cable for astrophotography.

events.name: Systematic Packing of Camping Equipment
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran systematically organized and packed all the equipment in his living room at home. He sorted the tent, sleeping bag, moisture-proof pad, cooking utensils, food, clothing, and medicine into different waterproof bags and storage boxes. The photography equipment was separately packed in specialized cases. Finally, he conducted a final confirmation with Gao Yunfei and Xie Yutong, agreeing to meet at the supermarket the next morning to purchase fresh ingredients.

起始状态.心情: The relaxed feeling of Friday is tinged with the excitement of preparing for a weekend outing.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room of a home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: With eager anticipation and excitement, all equipment packed and ready, I can't wait to immerse myself in the embrace of nature.

2025-08.daily_overview: Spent the entire Saturday immersed in a camping trip at Heimi Peak National Forest Park. From gathering and purchasing supplies in the morning and heading to the campsite, to hiking in the afternoon, collaborating to prepare a sumptuous barbecue dinner in the evening, and then enjoying heartfelt conversations around the bonfire and capturing the breathtaking starry sky at night, every moment was filled with the joy of outdoor activities and the warmth of spending time with friends. As an ENTJ, he relished both the satisfaction of organizing and coordinating as a leader and the focused creative moments as a photographer. It was a perfect blend of hobbies and socializing, with a slight increase in weight due to the physical exertion of the activities.

events.name: Meet up with friends and purchase ingredients
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran met with Peng Yuqing, Gao Yunfei, Xie Yutong, and others at the supermarket. Together, they purchased meat, vegetables, seasonings for the evening barbecue, as well as ample drinking water and snacks. Everyone chatted and laughed while working in coordination, quickly completing the shopping.

events.name: Go to the campsite and set up camp
events.description: In the afternoon, everyone drove to the Heimi Peak National Forest Park. After gathering at the pre-booked campsite halfway up the mountain, Feng Haoran demonstrated proficient outdoor skills by directing and participating in setting up tents, arranging canopies, and placing tables and chairs. Soon, a comfortable temporary home took shape.

events.name: Short-distance hiking to appreciate mountain forest scenery
events.description: After settling in at the campsite, the group embarked on a short hike along an easy trail in the park. Breathing in the fresh air rich in negative oxygen ions, admiring the lush mountain forest scenery of late summer and early autumn, and chatting and laughing while taking photos along the way, they completely escaped the hustle and bustle of the city.

events.name: Collaborative Preparation for a Barbecue Dinner
events.description: In the evening, returning to the camp, everyone worked together to prepare dinner. Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei were responsible for starting the fire and grilling the meat, while Peng Yuqing and Xie Yutong handled the vegetables and prepared the salad. Amid the lingering glow of the sunset and the gradually rising cooking smoke, everyone enjoyed the unique pleasure of outdoor cooking and the fruits of their collective labor, with the aroma of barbecue permeating the entire campsite.

events.name: Campfire Night Talks and Astrophotography
events.description: As night fell, everyone gathered around the campfire, sharing amusing anecdotes and troubles from their work and daily lives, with the firelight illuminating their relaxed, smiling faces. Meanwhile, Feng Haoran had already set up his camera far from the light pollution of the campsite. Guided by the starry sky app, he adjusted the settings and performed a long exposure, successfully capturing a clear Milky Way stretching across the sky along with subtle traces of star trails, which thrilled him immensely.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Excitement and anticipation before departure

结束状态.所处地点: Inside the camping tent at Heimi Peak National Forest Park
结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied, joyful, and serene. The outdoor activities during the day and the stargazing creations at night brought immense spiritual pleasure, while the deep conversations with friends also felt exceptionally warm.

state.今日运动: Approximately 2 hours of mountain hiking, campsite setup and activities

2025-08.daily_overview: The last day of August began at dawn in the campsite. After photographing the sunrise and morning mist, I shared a simple outdoor breakfast with friends, then collaborated on a Leave No Trace cleanup of the mountain forest before packing up and returning to Changsha. In the afternoon, back at my familiar home, I washed and air-dried my gear, imported and backed up the precious astrophotography photos. In the evening, I had a video call with my parents to share plans for the new home and received their support. Before bed, I conducted preliminary market research for the next step in my stamp collection. This was a transitional day, moving from nature back to daily life, drawing August to a satisfying, healthy, and memorable close, with my weight reaching the target value.

events.name: Capturing Morning Mist and Mountain Sunrise
events.description: Feng Haoran rose earlier than his companions, searching for camera angles in the morning mist to capture the serene scene of dawn light piercing through the forest as the fog gradually dissipated. At sunrise, he documented the magnificent moment when golden sunlight bathed the mountain peaks.

events.name: Camp Breakfast and Pack-up Departure
events.description: Everyone gradually got up, boiled water together using portable stoves, and made coffee and oatmeal as a simple breakfast. After the meal, the group strictly followed the principles of "Leave No Trace," cooperatively dismantled the tents, meticulously cleaned up all the trash at the campsite (including food scraps and ashes), ensured the environment was restored to its original state, and then loaded the equipment into the vehicle.

events.name: Return to Changsha and organize equipment
events.description: They each drove safely back to Changsha City. Upon arriving home, Feng Haoran’s first task was to wash and air out equipment such as the tent and moisture-proof mat, and to clean the cooking utensils. After that, he eagerly transferred the photos of the starry sky and sunrise from his camera to his computer for backup and initial review, feeling very satisfied with the quality of the shots.

events.name: Video chatting with parents to share the new home layout plan
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran held a video call with his parents in Wuhan, showing them the soft furnishing design plans, procurement list, and timeline he had prepared for his new home. His parents praised his meticulous planning. His mother, Li Xiuying, offered to send some decorative items from their home, while his father, Feng Jianguo, reminded him to pay attention to electrical safety. Their support filled him with warmth.

events.name: Research the target stamp collection market
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran conducted preliminary searches on several major stamp trading websites and auction platforms based on his conceptual framework for the theme "Human Exploration and Civilization." He researched the current market prices and scarcity levels of several target stamps (such as early space exploration and famous expedition commemorative stamps), drafted a preliminary collection target list, and prepared for subsequent actions, working late into the night before finally going to sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Inside the camping tent at Heimi Peak National Forest Park
起始状态.心情: The tranquility of early morning and the focus on photographic creation

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Returning to the tranquility and contentment of daily life. The fatigue from camping is softened by beautiful memories and the warmth of family, filling us with anticipation for the coming September.

state.今日运动: Campsite cleanup and organization, light activities

2025-09.daily_overview: On the Monday after returning from camping, Feng Haoran quickly switched back to work mode. In the early morning, he returned to his home in Changsha from Hei Mifeng and then immersed himself in a busy workday. Today, he focused on client asset analysis, initiated a planting project, and attended a yoga class. However, due to fatigue from the trip, his weight slightly decreased.

events.name: Returning from Camping and Switching States
events.description: Early in the morning, Feng Haoran packed up his gear from the campsite at Heimi Peak National Forest Park and drove back to his home in Yuelu District. He put away his photography equipment and camping gear, took a hot shower, changed into a shirt suitable for commuting, and quickly transitioned from the leisurely outdoor weekend mode to the rhythm of the workweek.

events.name: Launch the Autumn Planting Project
events.description: During his lunch break, Feng Haoran cleaned out the idle planting boxes on his home balcony. Considering the characteristics of the autumn climate, he purchased nutrient-rich soil and seeds suitable for growing crops such as lettuce and basil online. Following the instructions, he prepared the soil mixture and made all necessary preparations for the upcoming sowing.

events.name: Market Review and Watchlist Construction
events.description: In the office, Feng Haoran conducted a professional review of the volatile market performance from late August to early September. Based on his previous macroeconomic analysis, he utilized financial models to screen several stocks with solid fundamentals and valuations that have entered a reasonable range, compiling a preliminary buy-watch list.

events.name: Inspiring New Perspectives on Stamp Collecting
events.description: At home in the evening, Feng Haoran browsed through the latest issue of *Philately* magazine and explored online collecting forums. He noticed some collectors presenting systematic thematic collections, which made him reflect on his own relatively scattered collection. This inspired him to consider adjusting his strategy and shifting toward a more thematic and research-oriented collecting direction.

events.name: First Yoga Class Experience
events.description: After work, upon a colleague's recommendation, Feng Haoran visited a newly opened yoga studio near his company and took an introductory Hatha yoga class. Under the instructor's guidance, he learned basic breathing techniques and postures, focusing on stretching his tense shoulders, neck, and legs caused by prolonged sitting and morning runs.

events.name: Post-Processing and Sharing of Astrophotography
events.description: Feng Haoran used Lightroom to meticulously perform post-processing on the starry sky photos taken at Heimi Peak over the weekend, enhancing the details of the Milky Way through noise reduction and color grading. He shared his three most satisfactory works on his social media feed and photography enthusiast groups, receiving numerous likes, including one from Xu Jianing.

events.name: Drafting a Professional Article
events.description: Late at night, in the quiet study, Feng Haoran, drawing on his own advisory experience and recent market cases, completed the initial draft of the article titled "Asset Allocation Strategies in Volatile Markets." The article features a clear framework, with a primary focus on explaining how to dynamically adjust equity-bond ratios and sector allocations during periods of market turbulence.

events.name: Launch the Customer Quarterly Analysis Project
events.description: Feng Haoran convened a brief video conference with team members Zheng Wenbo and the remote participant Sun Xiaoya to officially launch the in-depth analysis project for the third-quarter asset portfolios of high-net-worth clients Huang Siqi and Lin Zhihao. The meeting clarified the data collection tasks, analytical division of labor, and preliminary timelines for the week.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the lingering afterglow of weekend relaxation and a hint of weariness.

结束状态.心情: Enriched yet somewhat fatigued, with an active mind.

2025-09.daily_overview: A fulfilling and productive day. Feng Haoran operated with the precision of a finely tuned instrument, from sowing seeds in the early morning to allocating funds at work, from planning hobbies to reviewing finances, and even devising a systematic health improvement plan. However, due to a dinner gathering, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Sowing Autumn Vegetables
events.description: After his morning run, Feng Haoran sowed lettuce and basil seeds in the prepared planting box according to the seed instructions, covered them with a thin layer of soil, and watered them thoroughly. He placed the planting box in a well-lit spot on the balcony, eagerly beginning his first attempt at urban gardening.

events.name: Inject investment liquidity
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran logged into his online banking and transferred a planned amount of funds from his savings account to his securities account, preparing to seize investment opportunities on his watchlist. After confirming the funds had been credited, he felt a greater sense of control over his operations.

events.name: Establishing a New Theme for Stamp Collecting
events.description: After a night of contemplation, Feng Haoran officially designated his new collection theme as "Cosmic Journey: Human Exploration and Civilizational Imprints," which he further divided into two main threads: "Space Exploration" and "Cultural Heritage." He handwrote preliminary collection goals and a key stamp list in his notebook.

events.name: Consult Senior Collectors
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran detailed his new theme and list to Luo Zhenyu, a senior collector in Shenzhen, via WeChat video call. Luo Zhenyu highly endorsed the idea and provided numerous specific suggestions regarding market trends, alternative philatelic items, and scarce channels.

events.name: Monthly Financial Expenditure Review
events.description: Feng Haoran opened his personal financial management software and exported the detailed transaction records for August. He focused on analyzing two major expenditures: purchasing soft furnishings for his new home and buying a video editing course, evaluating their necessity and budget deviations.

events.name: Plan the Budget for a National Day Self-Driving Trip
events.description: Based on the annual self-driving travel plan, he began estimating the approximate expenses for fuel, tolls, accommodation, and dining for the late September trip to Hunan and Guizhou, preliminarily outlining the travel budget to facilitate adjustments to other monthly expenditures.

events.name: Enable Professional Sports APP
events.description: To manage his health more scientifically, Feng Haoran downloaded a professional fitness tracking app, set up his personal profile, and entered his annual marathon training goals. He synchronized the app with his phone's calendar and set up training reminders.

events.name: Record the first training log
events.description: After completing his morning run for the day, he immediately entered data such as distance, duration, and average heart rate manually into the app, adding the note "felt easy, high humidity." This marked the beginning of a new phase of data-driven health management for him.

events.name: Analyze Running Data Bottlenecks
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran carefully reviewed the running data charts from the past year in the app and found that his metrics such as pace, distance, and VO2 max had entered a plateau over the last three months, with slow growth.

events.name: Devise a Physical Fitness Breakthrough Plan
events.description: Based on data analysis, he began to conceptualize breakthrough strategies, sketching out several key directions in his notebook, such as "increasing interval running intensity," "incorporating systematic core training," and "trying cross-training (e.g., yoga)."

events.name: Launch In-Depth Customer Analysis
events.description: In the office, Feng Haoran began to independently organize all investment materials of the client Huang Siqi, conducting an in-depth analysis of the high-risk preference stemming from her background in the technology industry, in order to prepare foundational data for subsequently designing an optimized plan tailored to her characteristics.

events.name: Dinner Party
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran dined with his colleague Zheng Wenbo and friend Wu Junjie at a Hunan restaurant, discussing market trends and career development. Due to the substantial meal, his weight increased slightly.

起始状态.心情: Clear objectives, full of drive

结束状态.心情: Deep in thought, feeling clear about multiple plans yet slightly satiated.

Feng Haoran integrated new habits into his daily routine, optimized his collection plan, and set a strict monthly budget based on the results of his review. At the same time, he purchased yoga equipment and developed a detailed physical fitness breakthrough plan, but due to work pressure, he felt slightly irritable.

events.name: Caring for Newly Sown Seeds
events.description: After his morning run, Feng Haoran checked the planting boxes on the balcony, finding the soil still moist. He had made tending to the plants part of his daily morning routine, carefully observing for any signs of sprouting.

events.name: Optimize Stamp Collection Plan
events.description: He carefully reviewed Luo Zhenyu's suggestions, optimized and supplemented the collection list for "Journey Across the Universe," adding several more cost-effective alternative ticket options and acquisition channels, making the plan more feasible.

events.name: Take stock of existing stamp inventory
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran spread out all the stamps from his collection on the desk and conducted a systematic inventory. He categorized and recorded them by era, theme, and condition, laying the groundwork for subsequent screening and classification according to new themes.

events.name: Set the consumption budget for September.
events.description: After reviewing his finances and planning a self-driving trip, Feng Haoran reset his September spending budget in the software. He proactively reduced non-essential entertainment expenses such as dining out and shopping to ensure sufficient funds for both the travel fund and investment capital.

events.name: Set budget reminders
events.description: To strictly implement the new budget, he set monthly spending limit alerts for categories such as "dining" and "shopping" in the financial management software and synchronized them to his mobile calendar, ensuring timely warnings during consumption.

events.name: Procurement of Yoga Practice Equipment
events.description: To maintain his yoga practice, Feng Haoran purchased a professional non-slip yoga mat, two sets of breathable yoga outfits, and yoga blocks for assistance online. Having the right equipment has given him more confidence in maintaining a regular practice.

events.name: Polish professional articles and request review
events.description: He made multiple rounds of revisions and refinements to the initial draft of the article "Asset Allocation" to enhance its precision and fluency. Subsequently, he sent the manuscript to his colleague Zheng Wenbo, with whom he has a good rapport, requesting a peer review to seek professional feedback.

events.name: Synchronized Motion Wearable Device
events.description: To make data recording more precise and convenient, Feng Haoran paired and synchronized his smartwatch with the newly downloaded fitness app, ensuring that subsequent data such as heart rate and step frequency could be automatically imported.

events.name: Research on Methods for Enhancing Physical Fitness
events.description: During the lunch break, he searched professional sports websites and fitness apps for detailed plans and precautions regarding "interval running training," "core strength training for runners," and "yoga for improving flexibility," taking extensive notes.

events.name: Develop a detailed physical fitness enhancement plan
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran synthesized the research materials and formally developed a two-month (September-October) "Autumn Physical Fitness Enhancement Plan." The content includes: adding one high-intensity interval running session per week, attending two yoga classes per week, and incorporating 15 minutes of core training after each run. He compiled the plan into a clear electronic document.

events.name: Analyze another client's assets
events.description: Together with Zheng Wenbo, he analyzed the asset report of client Lin Zhihao, focusing on evaluating the performance of the client's relatively high proportion of real estate-related assets amid current market fluctuations, as well as the optimization potential given the client's preference for a conservative investment approach.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations caused by work pressure
events.description: In the afternoon, due to an urgent client request, Feng Haoran had to work overtime, which left him feeling somewhat irritable. However, he managed to adjust his mood through deep breathing and a brief walk.

起始状态.心情: Steady, prepared to handle multiple tasks

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction of a plan being implemented, tinged with slight fatigue and irritation.

2025-09.daily_overview: A day filled with surprises and warmth. In the morning at Yuelu Mountain, a kind act of helping others added a bright touch to the end of the week's work. During the day, he steadily advanced his investment operations and interest planning; in the evening, he engaged in in-depth discussions with fellow collectors. His mood was uplifted by the good deed, though his weight increased due to dietary habits.

events.name: Discussing the real estate market with colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran and Zheng Wenbo had a meal at a Hunan restaurant near the company, where they discussed Feng's idea of optimizing his property portfolio. He shared several upgraded properties he was considering, and Zheng Wenbo analyzed the value retention potential of different areas from an investment perspective.

events.name: Discussing Article Materials and Resonance Points
events.description: Feng Haoran shared the data materials and storyline outline of the article he was writing about his investment journey with Zheng Wenbo. From a reader's perspective, Zheng Wenbo suggested emphasizing the psychological descriptions at several key turning points of returns.

events.name: Execute investment position increase operation
events.description: Based on the watchlist established at the beginning of the week and market analysis, Feng Haoran conducted a third round of position building in leading companies of the high-end manufacturing sector that he favored. He also made slight adjustments to the cost basis of the previous two positions, resulting in a more rational overall portfolio allocation.

events.name: Daily Morning Run
events.description: As usual, Feng Haoran set out from home in the morning for a jog on Yuelu Mountain.

events.name: Discover and Rescue Lost Elderly
events.description: At the foot of Yuelu Mountain, Feng Haoran noticed an elderly man who appeared anxious and was wandering alone. He proactively stopped to approach and inquire, discovering that the man’s speech was unclear and he seemed to be lost. Feng patiently comforted the elderly man and checked his personal belongings.

events.name: Multiple Parties Collaborate to Locate Family Members
events.description: When the elderly person was unable to clearly state their address, Feng Haoran first dialed 110 to report the situation. He then took a photo of the elderly person and posted it in the neighborhood group chats of nearby residential communities to seek assistance. Simultaneously, he attempted to operate the elderly person's smartwatch and, fortunately, managed to locate the emergency contact information.

events.name: Complete the handover and receive appreciation
events.description: Feng Haoran stayed by the elderly person's side until the police and the anxiously arriving family members arrived one after another. He clearly explained the course of events to both parties. The elderly person's son tightly grasped Feng Haoran's hand and repeatedly expressed his gratitude.

events.name: Searching for target stamps online
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran browsed stamp trading platforms such as "Zhao Yong Online" and, based on the new list, attempted to locate the first target stamp under the "Space Exploration" theme—the "Space" series of stamps issued in 1986.

events.name: Conduct in-depth research on the thematic background of stamps
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran conducted an in-depth study on the issuance history, cultural background, and market trends of the two stamp themes, "Modern Chinese Architecture" and "World Famous Paintings," on his computer, making detailed excerpts of the materials.

events.name: Establish a fixed yoga practice schedule
events.description: Based on the yoga instructor's advice and his own work schedule, Feng Haoran established a fixed practice plan for Tuesday and Thursday evenings as well as Sunday mornings, with the goal of ensuring at least two sessions per week.

events.name: Schedule an In-depth Exchange with Fellow Collectors
events.description: Feng Haoran arranged a video call with Luo Zhenyu via WeChat in advance and prepared a refined list of questions along with a notebook before the call.

events.name: Dinner Celebration
events.description: In the evening, to celebrate his act of helping others, Feng Haoran gathered with several friends at a Japanese ramen restaurant, enjoying delicious food, which resulted in a weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Calmly, welcome the last workday before the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, the joy of helping others lingers persistently, accompanied by a slight sense of contentment.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 6 kilometers at a pace of 5 minutes and 20 seconds per kilometer.

2025-09.daily_overview: A typical, well-paced Saturday. The morning jog and breakfast gathering with running buddies were filled with meaningful conversations; the afternoon was dedicated to deepening personal hobbies; the evening focused on teamwork. However, due to a dinner gathering the previous night, there was a slight weight gain, which was adjusted through exercise.

events.name: Preparing for the Weekend Morning Run
events.description: On Friday evening, Feng Haoran checked his running gear, ensuring his running shoes were dry, his sports watch was fully charged, and set the alarm for 6:30 a.m. on Saturday.

events.name: Weekend Long-Distance Slow Running and In-Depth Communication
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran and Gao Yunfei met at the foot of Yuelu Mountain and embarked on a slow run of approximately 10 kilometers along the mountain trail. As they ran, their conversation naturally shifted from recent fluctuations in technology stocks to the ongoing physical fitness enhancement plan they were implementing.

events.name: Breakfast Meeting Continuation Discussion
events.description: After the run, the two had breakfast together at their usual noodle shop at the foot of the mountain. Feng Haoran ordered beef noodles, while Gao Yunfei opted for shredded pork noodles. They continued discussing the data comparison of the health management app.

events.name: Sharing and Agreement
events.description: After breakfast, everyone went their separate ways. In the afternoon, Feng Haoran shared a public account article about "Endurance Training and Long-Termism in Investment" with Gao Yunfei via WeChat.

events.name: Finalize the stamp collection theme
events.description: In the afternoon at home, after careful consideration, Feng Haoran made the final decision to focus the "Journey Across the Universe" theme on the directions of "space exploration" and "cosmic technology," while temporarily suspending the "cultural heritage" line.

events.name: Special Topic Discussion with Fellow Tibetan Art Collectors
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran had a video call with Luo Zhenyu, elaborating on the refined theme in detail. Luo Zhenyu shared his experience of collecting materials related to the "Silk Road" topic.

events.name: Deploy Team Data Collection Tasks
events.description: As the project leader, Feng Haoran assigned tasks in the team collaboration software: Zheng Wenbo is responsible for collecting the latest macroeconomic data; Sun Xiaoya is responsible for organizing customer data; he himself is responsible for compiling the summary.

events.name: Temporarily suspending exercise habits
events.description: Due to his focus on stamp collecting in the afternoon, Feng Haoran temporarily canceled the planned additional stretching but burned calories through morning jogging.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to social and personal time over the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Dual Satisfaction from Joy, Social Interaction, and Hobbies

Feng Haoran made significant progress in both his personal life and family relationships: his assets surpassed the million mark, and he shared this joy with his parents at the first opportunity. Meanwhile, he continued advancing his professional output and client work, while wisely making adjustments to his training regimen.

events.name: Exchange Collection Insights with Fellow Collectors
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran had another video call with Luo Zhenyu, sharing his thoughts after focusing on the topic and listening to the other party's experience regarding key points for authenticating early space stamps and their market price ranges.

events.name: Confirm Personal Asset Milestones
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran logged into multiple investment accounts from his home study to conduct a summary calculation. He confirmed that the total net value of his personal investable financial assets, including stocks, funds, and deposits, had historically surpassed 1 million RMB.

events.name: Video Chatting with Parents to Share Double Happiness
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran proactively initiated a video call with his parents in Wuhan. He first reported the positive signal of promotion given by his supervisor Qian Yongqiang, then cautiously and proudly revealed that his assets had exceeded one million yuan.

events.name: Update Collection Action Plan
events.description: After the call ended, Feng Haoran promptly integrated the latest suggestions provided by Luo Zhenyu into his collection plan document, updating the priority and budget allocation for key ticket items.

events.name: Maintain the Relationship with Fellow Collectors
events.description: He sent a thank-you WeChat message to Luo Zhenyu, briefly summarizing his takeaways and indicating that he would follow up on the auction information.

events.name: Complete article typesetting and proofreading
events.description: Feng Haoran used the public account editor to finalize the layout of the article "Asset Allocation," inserted two simple asset allocation ratio diagrams, and conducted a word-by-word proofreading.

events.name: Concern for Parents' Health and Provoking Reflection
events.description: During the video call with his parents, Li Xiuying, his mother, mentioned that his father had been sleeping poorly recently, and both of them harbored some underlying concerns about health issues related to aging. Feng Haoran took note of this in his mind.

events.name: Preliminary Construction of Portfolio Model
events.description: Using professional software, Feng Haoran preliminarily constructed three investment portfolio models with distinct strategies based on the data collected by the team and in consideration of the different objectives of Huang Siqi and Lin Zhihao.

events.name: Team discussion on model backtesting results
events.description: He invited Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya via video conference to jointly analyze the historical backtesting results of the model. The three conducted an in-depth discussion on the model's performance during the 2018 bear market and the volatility period of the 2020 pandemic.

events.name: Proactively adjust the training plan
events.description: After nearly a week of implementing the new fitness program, Feng Haoran felt somewhat fatigued. He wisely replaced a planned high-intensity training session on Sunday evening with a light recovery run around the neighborhood.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to a week of busy work and exercise, Feng Haoran went to bed half an hour earlier than usual, emphasizing recovery.

结束状态.心情: Happy and grounded, family recognition brings profound satisfaction.

2025-09.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, a clear signal emerged for career advancement. Feng Haoran received crucial promotion guidance from his supervisor, which motivated him to take immediate action: publishing professional articles, scheduling health check-ups for his parents, and fully advancing client proposals. However, due to working late, his bedtime was delayed.

events.name: Report ideas to superiors and obtain key guidance.
events.description: After the weekly department meeting, Feng Haoran had a brief discussion with his direct supervisor, Qian Yongqiang, in the office. He reported his recent market insights and ideas for allocating new funds. While affirming Feng's thoughts, Qian Yongqiang clearly hinted that Feng Haoran is a strong contender for the position of investment director at the end of the year.

events.name: Prepare the findings for family reporting.
events.description: Encouraged, Feng Haoran began systematically organizing the work results from the recent client analysis project, the publication plan for public account articles, and the overall status of personal assets.

events.name: Refine the Career Action Plan
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran refined his action plan for the second half of the year in his work log, drawing on his father’s advice from last night’s phone call to "deepen expertise and proceed steadily" as well as the guidance provided by his supervisor earlier today.

events.name: Officially Released First Professional Article
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran officially published the article "Asset Allocation Strategies in Volatile Markets" on his personal WeChat public account. He simultaneously shared the article on his Moments and several financial professional groups.

events.name: Screening Physical Examination Packages for Parents
events.description: Thinking of his mother's concerns about health, Feng Haoran took advantage of his work breaks to carefully compare the health checkup packages offered by several top-tier hospitals and renowned medical examination centers in Wuhan. Considering his parents' age, he focused particularly on cardiovascular and cerebrovascular screenings, tumor detection, and bone density tests.

events.name: Finalizing the medical check-up arrangements with parents.
events.description: In the evening, he called his parents and explained in detail the selected physical examination packages and their differences. After discussion, a comprehensive package was ultimately decided upon. Feng Haoran completed the online appointment and payment.

events.name: Report and Optimize Customer Solutions

From a higher-level perspective, Mr. Qian provided several suggestions for modifications regarding risk hedging. Subsequently, Feng organized his team to conduct a final stress test on the revised plan.

events.name: Working late to meet project deadlines.

结束状态.心情: Highly inspired, with an extremely clear sense of direction, yet slightly fatigued.

events.description: After preliminary online research, Feng Haoran selected five properties that best met his upgrade requirements as "key properties for inspection." Through real estate agent Lu Jiaming, he scheduled a concentrated viewing of these five properties for this Saturday afternoon.

events.description: After work, Feng Haoran met with his friend Li Zhe, who is starting a business in wealth management technology tools, at Xinyi Café. Feng Haoran shared a service pain point from a client case, while Li Zhe demonstrated how his product prototype could address similar issues.

events.name: Organize Personal Investment Story Materials
events.description: To write an article about his personal investment journey, Feng Haoran selected several representative screenshots of successful and unsuccessful trades from his historical transaction records and performed desensitization processing on them.

Feng Haoran utilized his analytical skills to optimize the itinerary, while Peng Yuqing shared the lesser-known hidden gems of western Hunan she had collected.

events.name: Planning Soft Furnishings Purchases for the New Home

He formulated a detailed procurement budget.

events.name: Selecting Minimalist Style Decorative Paintings

events.name: Plan weekend soft furnishing purchases
events.description: (Pre-rehearsal event) He meticulously planned the weekend's shopping itinerary: viewing properties on Saturday afternoon, and visiting home furnishing stores and the flower and bird market on Sunday morning to purchase soft furnishings such as green plants and decorative paintings for the new home.

events.name: Cross-Day Continuous Event Concludes: Charity Run Preparations Completed
events.description: Final preparations for the charity run event have been completed, with light recovery training conducted. The discomfort in the ankle has largely subsided.

events.name: Relaxed Weekend Eating

结束状态.心情: Feeling excited, looking forward to tomorrow's procurement and future travels, with a slight sense of fullness.

He produced a complete 30-second short video.

events.name: Clearly Define Practical Goals for Editing Learning
events.description: After completing the basic exercises, Feng Haoran clarified his learning objective: to no longer be satisfied with merely mastering techniques, but rather to use the materials from the October self-driving tour through Hunan and Guizhou as raw material to create a 3–5 minute travel short film that combines both aesthetic appeal and narrative depth.

events.name: Discussing short film concepts with photography partners

events.name: Reviewing yoga at home.

events.name: Optimize Self-Driving Tour Routes and Alternative Plans

He moved among the various stalls, carefully selecting a beautifully shaped Monstera deliciosa, a lush Ficus lyrata, and several pots of easy-to-care-for Epipremnum aureum and Sansevieria trifasciata.

events.name: Transporting purchased items home

events.name: Soft furnishing for a new home

First, he used a level and tape measure to determine the hanging positions for the decorative paintings, installed the picture hooks with an electric drill, and hung each painting one by one. Subsequently, he placed the large potted plants in the corner of the living room and on the sunny balcony.

events.name: Record Maintenance Points and Organize

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue from work arrangements.

events.description: During the quarterly work report meeting, Feng Haoran provided a detailed presentation of his recent achievements to his direct supervisor Qian Yongqiang and the department management. Qian Yongqiang highly commended his contributions and hinted that he is a key candidate for promotion to the position of Investment Director by the end of the year.

events.name: One-on-One Career Guidance from Supervisor
events.description: After the debriefing meeting, Qian Yongqiang kept Feng Haoran behind for a private conversation. As a fellow townsman and senior colleague, he provided specific advice on how to systematically prepare for the promotion evaluation and efficiently study for the CFA Level III exam.

events.name: Celebratory Dinner with Colleagues
events.description: After work, an elated Feng Haoran dined with his colleague Zheng Wenbo at a Hunan restaurant near the company, sharing the joy of receiving positive signals for a promotion. Zheng Wenbo sincerely offered his congratulations.

events.name: Participate in Financial Investment Salon
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran attended a small investment salon for the financial industry in Changsha. He listened attentively to the insights shared by senior investors and, during the networking session, proactively exchanged contact information with a private equity fund manager and the editor-in-chief of a financial media outlet, thereby expanding his professional network.

起始状态.心情: Feeling motivated yet slightly pressured, preparing for an important presentation.

结束状态.心情: Filled with motivation and confidence, the career prospects have become clear and promising.

During the day, he worked efficiently and formulated a promotion sprint plan. In the evening, he multitasked by conducting a financial review, engaging in stamp collecting discussions, and preparing for travel. However, due to the heavy workload, he ended up staying up late.

events.name: Review of Achieving One Million in Assets

events.name: Monthly Exchange with Stamp Collectors

events.name: Organize Clothing and Equipment for Self-Driving Tours

Feng Haoran took the lead in purchasing tickets, procuring supplies, and finalizing the itinerary, while maintaining synchronization with Peng Yuqing through online collaboration. Due to the busy schedule throughout the day, physical exercise was canceled, and bedtime was earlier than usual.

He then shared the electronic purchase confirmation in the self-driving tour WeChat group.

events.name: Purchase supplies for the self-driving trip

This included daily driving routes, accommodation addresses, attraction opening hours, and other essential information. He then shared it in the group chat, requesting everyone to review and confirm.

events.name: Canceling exercise due to busy schedule.
events.description: Due to being occupied with procurement and organization throughout the day, Feng Haoran decided to cancel today's exercise plan in order to restore his energy.

He efficiently completed material checks, packing, and synchronized information with his companions. Meanwhile, he organized photos of Changsha's night scenery and established a monitoring list for his Bitcoin observation positions in the evening, maintaining his regular sleep schedule.

events.name: Distribute the final itinerary materials

He then scanned them into PDF format and distributed them via WeChat to each travel companion, ensuring that everyone had synchronized information.

events.name: Check and prepare navigation and photography equipment
events.description: In the afternoon, he inspected and prepared the photography equipment and navigation devices required for the self-driving trip, updated the car navigation map, downloaded offline maps of Western Hunan and Southeastern Guizhou on his phone, and charged all the batteries.

events.name: Final Material Procurement and Packaging
events.description: According to the checklist, Feng Haoran went to the pharmacy to purchase additional medications such as motion sickness pills and gastrointestinal medicine. He then returned home and systematically packed all personal items, photography equipment, and public supplies into the vehicle's trunk and his backpack.

events.name: Organize and filter photos of Changsha's night scenery
events.description: In the evening, during a break from packing, Feng Haoran imported the photos of Changsha's night scenes that he had taken over the past six months into his computer. He organized them by shooting date and location, selected approximately 50 candidate photos, and placed them into a folder named "Landscape, Rivers, Islands, and City - Preliminary Selection."

2025-09.daily_overview: On the last workday before the National Day holiday, the air was filled with anticipation. Feng Haoran efficiently handled his tasks during the day and conducted a final pre-trip confirmation with Peng Yuqing after work, reaching the peak of excitement. Meanwhile, he integrated the Bitcoin monitoring mechanism and went to bed early in anticipation of the holiday.

events.name: Video Editing and Animation Learning
events.description: Before heading to work in the morning, Feng Haoran delved into the principles of keyframe animation in After Effects, practicing the creation of text fade-in/fade-out effects and graphic path animations to produce a dynamic opening sequence for his previously filmed camping vlog footage.

events.name: Final Pre-Trip Communication for National Day
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran and Peng Yuqing conducted their final pre-trip communication. They verified all reservation details, the meeting time and location for the next morning, and the vehicle's fuel status via a video call. Both expressed strong anticipation for the upcoming journey.

events.name: Integrate Bitcoin monitoring into daily workflows

2025-09.daily_overview: On the last day of September, in the interval between wrapping up work and the start of the holiday, Feng Haoran conducted a series of reflections and forward-looking assessments. He completed his monthly work summary, fine-tuned investment strategies with colleagues, and reviewed his health progress through fitness data. Running tests indicated an improvement in physical fitness, bringing September to a satisfying close.

events.name: September Monthly Work Summary and Plan
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran compiled all client meeting minutes, report outputs, and performance data for September. He drafted a concise personal monthly work summary, highlighting key achievements such as reaching the million-asset milestone and receiving signals of promotion. Additionally, he preliminarily outlined the follow-up plan for key clients in October and the intensive study plan for the CFA exam.

events.name: Communicating Investment Monitoring Strategies with Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran and his colleague Zheng Wenbo briefly discussed Bitcoin monitoring strategies in the company's tea break area. Feng listened to Zheng's suggestions regarding volatility threshold settings and made minor adjustments to the monitoring checklist accordingly.

events.name: Monthly Exercise Data Summary
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran opened the fitness app and generated a summary report of his training data for the entire month of September. He carefully reviewed charts such as total running distance and trends in average heart rate, scientifically evaluated the training effectiveness for the month, which indicated an improvement in aerobic capacity.

events.name: End-of-Month Running Test and Summary
events.description: After work, to assess the phased results of the "Autumn Physical Fitness Enhancement Program," Feng Haoran conducted a 5-kilometer all-out running test at Orange Isle. He found that his best time had improved by nearly one minute compared to the beginning of the month. After summarizing the training outcomes, he felt a noticeable enhancement in both physical endurance and speed.

起始状态.心情: The calm of wrapping things up and the final anticipation for the holiday.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and content, feeling a sense of accomplishment for the past month and filled with anticipation for the future.

state.今日运动: A 5-kilometer all-out running test will be conducted in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, gentle breeze, suitable for travel.
date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first day of the National Day holiday, Feng Haoran, filled with anticipation for the annual road trip and a sense of responsibility as a photographer, set off with friends for the ancient town of Fenghuang in western Hunan. As the main driver and planner of the journey, he relished controlling the pace of the trip while using his keen lens to capture the farewell to the city at departure and the changing scenery along the way. On the road, he had already begun contemplating how to convey the theme of this journey through the language of his camera.

events.name: National Day Self-Drive Photography Journey through Hunan and Guizhou Begins
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran carefully inspected the vehicle and photography equipment. After meeting up with his friends in Changsha, he set off as the main driver. As he drove away from the city, he felt the gradually widening scenery along the highway and grew excited about the upcoming photography expedition. During a brief rest at a service area, he intentionally captured his friends' ready-to-go moments with his camera, marking the prelude to their journey.

events.name: Arriving at Fenghuang Ancient Town and Conducting Preliminary Field Research
events.description: In the afternoon, we arrived at the ancient town of Fenghuang in Xiangxi and checked into the pre-booked riverside inn. After a brief rest, Feng Haoran picked up his camera and began strolling through the ancient town with his friends to gather inspiration. Rather than rushing to take photos, he first observed the distribution of the stilted houses along both banks of the Tuo River, the structure of the Rainbow Bridge, and the changes in light during the evening. He sought out ideal shooting spots for the following day and recorded his preliminary photography ideas in his phone's memo app.

起始状态.心情: Excited and full of anticipation

结束状态.心情: Focused yet relaxed, immersed in the atmosphere of the ancient city.

state.今日运动: Long-duration driving (light activity)

date_attribute.weather: Morning fog, clearing in the afternoon.
date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: On the second day in Phoenix Ancient Town, Feng Haoran embodied the persistence of a photographer. He rose before dawn, waiting by the tranquil Tuo River for the perfect light. Skillfully operating his camera and drone, he not only captured breathtaking scenery but also paid close attention to the details of local life. The intense shooting throughout the day left him feeling fulfilled, yet he began to sense the weariness of the journey.

events.name: Morning Mist Photography on the Tuo River
events.description: At five in the morning, Feng Haoran arrived alone at his pre-selected spot by the Tuo River, carrying his equipment. He patiently waited for the sky to brighten and the mist to rise, skillfully using long-exposure techniques and drone aerial photography to capture the reflection of the stilted buildings in the morning mist and the calm river surface, as well as the serene, partially obscured view of the Rainbow Bridge. In the morning light, he also quietly documented the daily scenes of local residents washing by the river and punting boats through his telephoto lens, adding a touch of human warmth to his work.

events.name: Organizing photos in the evening and experiencing mild insomnia.
events.description: Returning to the inn in the evening, Feng Haoran excitedly browsed through the photos taken during the day, which led to an active mind, a delayed sleep time, and a feeling of slight fatigue but satisfaction.

起始状态.心情: Focused, lucid, and driven by creative desire.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied but slightly fatigued, having stayed up late due to excitement.

state.今日运动: Standing for extended periods and walking for approximately 3 hours during early morning filming.

date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: Bidding farewell to Fenghuang, Feng Haoran drove to Zhenyuan Ancient Town in Guizhou. The journey itself was a scenic experience, as he enjoyed the sense of control while driving and the changing landscapes of mountains and rivers outside the window. Upon arriving at the ancient town, he quickly immersed himself in his work, using his expertise in street photography to capture the simple, everyday life along the Wuyang River. This effort provided him with a wealth of material for his subsequent shoots.

events.name: Transition to Zhenyuan Ancient Town
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran drove from Fenghuang to Zhenyuan, Guizhou. He chose to take sections of the national highway to enjoy the more pristine scenery along the way, stopping at a viewing platform to capture the winding mountain roads with his drone. In the afternoon, upon arriving in Zhenyuan, he checked into his pre-booked riverside inn. He promptly organized his photography equipment, checked the batteries and memory cards, and prepared for the in-depth shooting scheduled for the following day.

events.name: Zhenyuan Ancient Town Evening Street Photography
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran took a walk along the Wuyang River and began his preliminary street photography. Using a telephoto lens, he captured images of elderly people fishing by the riverside, women washing clothes on stone steps, and residents playing chess at the entrance of an alley. He experimented with some dynamic tracking shots to record the footsteps of locals returning home, accumulating documentary-style footage for his short film. The Hui-style architecture of the ancient town took on warm tones under the setting sun, and he also captured many architectural details.

events.name: Try local specialty foods
events.description: During dinner, Feng Haoran and his friends tried the sour fish soup in Zhenyuan. With the rich variety of food, they felt a slight increase in their weight.

起始状态.心情: Curious about new destinations

结束状态.心情: Enriched, immersed in the excitement of shooting, with a slight sense of satisfaction after the meal.

state.今日运动: Drive for about 4 hours, and take a 2-hour evening street photography session.

2025-10.daily_overview: This was the day with the most emotional ups and downs during the journey. The morning street photography went smoothly, but the unexpected loss of his camera bag later plunged him into a brief moment of panic and anxiety. Fortunately, the kind-hearted protection from a local aunt ensured that everything was recovered. This understanding that transcended language and selfless assistance brought him a sense of awe and gratitude far beyond what the scenery could offer, making it the most profound memory of the entire trip.

events.name: Morning Street Photography at Wuyang River and an Unexpected Loss
events.description: Feng Haoran rose early to conduct a morning street photography session in the lanes of Zhenyuan Ancient Town and along the Wuyang River, focusing on capturing the morning light and scenes of daily life. While searching for the best angle on a stone staircase, he placed his camera bag containing a drone and spare lenses beside him. Fully absorbed in his shooting, he forgot the bag when he left. Approximately twenty minutes later, when he was about to change lenses, he realized the bag was missing, and his heart sank with sudden anxiety.

events.name: Anxious Search and the Guardian of Kindness
events.description: Feng Haoran immediately sprinted back along the same route, his heart filled with immense anxiety. When he returned to the spot, he saw a local woman with a child sitting beside his camera bag. Noticing his anxious expression, the woman pointed at the bag and waved her hand, signaling that she had been keeping an eye on it. Despite the language barrier, Feng Haoran instantly understood her kindness. A wave of immense surprise and gratitude washed over him.

events.name: Expressing Gratitude and Equipment Inspection
events.description: Feng Haoran insisted on offering a cash reward, but the aunt gently yet firmly declined. He then hurried to a nearby store to buy fruit and children's snacks, insisting on giving them to the aunt's child as a token of gratitude. At the aunt's prompting, he quickly checked his camera bag and confirmed that all the valuable equipment and memory cards containing a large amount of footage were intact. He bowed once more before bidding farewell.

events.name: Climbing Mount Fanjing to Photograph the Sea of Clouds
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran, having adjusted his mood, challenged himself and his friends to climb Mount Fanjing. He insisted on carrying part of his photography equipment and hiking up the mountain on foot. After reaching the summit, he patiently waited and eventually captured the rolling sea of clouds and the perilous, uniquely shaped Mushroom Rock geological landscape. Using a telephoto lens, he also captured the silhouettes of climbers against the magnificent natural backdrop, documenting the team's joy upon reaching the peak.

events.name: Sharing a Thrilling Experience with a Friend
events.description: Returning to his accommodation in the evening, Feng Haoran, still shaken yet deeply moved, recounted his thrilling but ultimately safe experience of the day to his friend Peng Yuqing in Changsha via WeChat. He reflected on the unexpected warmth encountered during his journey and shared several magnificent photos of Fanjing Mountain.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to start a new day of filming.

结束状态.心情: Complex, a mixture of lingering fear, immense gratitude, and the sense of accomplishment after reaching the summit.

state.今日运动: Morning street photography, followed by approximately four hours of high-intensity mountain hiking in the afternoon.
