2025-10.daily_overview: On the eve of the Mid-Autumn Festival, Feng Haoran, while traveling, did not forget to stay connected with his family and arranged a holiday video call in advance. During the day, he immersed himself in the unique charm of the Miao villages in Southeast Guizhou, capturing the cultural landscapes through his lens. In the evening, demonstrating the planning and execution skills typical of an ENTJ personality, he secured the best spot on the viewing platform early. Ultimately, he successfully captured the breathtaking night view of the Thousand-Household Miao Village, where countless lights twinkled like stars, completing a perfect photographic "ambush."

events.name: Finalizing the Mid-Autumn Festival call with family.
events.description: During a morning work break (handling simple work emails via phone), Feng Haoran communicated with his parents in Wuhan and his sister in Shanghai through the family WeChat group. After coordinating everyone’s schedules, they finally decided to have a video call on the evening of the Mid-Autumn Festival, ensuring a sense of ritual for the family’s “online reunion” during this traditional holiday.

events.name: Daytime Fieldwork at Xijiang Qianhu Miao Village
events.description: During the day, Feng Haoran visited the Xijiang Thousand-Household Miao Village, photographing Miao wooden houses, wind-and-rain bridges, elderly Miao people in traditional attire, as well as artisans crafting silver ornaments and embroideries, accumulating rich cultural material.

events.name: Waiting for and photographing the night view of the Miao village
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran arrived early at the viewing platform to select his camera position and set up his tripod. He patiently waited as the sky transformed from azure to deep blue until nightfall completely descended. As the lights of thousands of households in the Miao village lit up one after another, resembling stars falling into the valley, he captured this iconic and spectacular scene using long exposures, time-lapse photography, and drones from multiple angles. Interspersed with these shots were close-up scenes of Miao grandmothers meticulously crafting silver ornaments under the glow of the lights.

events.name: Celebration Party for Successful Filming
events.description: I had dinner with friends in the evening to celebrate, consuming a relatively high amount of carbohydrates, and I feel that my weight has increased slightly.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation encompasses both the warmth of family reunion and the excitement of filming challenges.

结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied and proud, excited about capturing the ideal work, yet feeling slightly heavy after the meal.

state.今日运动: Spent the whole day walking and photographing in the Miao village, standing and waiting for about 2 hours for the night view.

date_attribute.weather: Clear weather, the return journey is under good weather conditions.
date_attribute.holiday: Mid-Autumn Festival

2025-10.daily_overview: During the Mid-Autumn Festival, Feng Haoran spent a fulfilling and heartwarming day on his journey home. In the daytime, he encountered a common hiccup of road trips—a flat tire. He handled it calmly and turned it into material documenting teamwork. At night, the most important moment was the video reunion with his family, where he shared stories from his travels and listened to his parents' concerns. The support from his family dispelled the fatigue of the journey and prompted him to start planning his next visit home.

events.name: Handling a Flat Tire on the Return Journey
events.description: During the self-drive return journey, the vehicle unexpectedly had a flat tire on the national highway. As the main driver, Feng Haoran remained calm and safely pulled the car over. Working together with his friends, he skillfully retrieved the spare tire and tools, and replaced the tire while ensuring safety. He treated this unexpected minor incident as part of the travel record, using his phone to document the process of everyone helping each other and solving the problem.

events.name: Mid-Autumn Festival Family Video Reunion
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran connected with his parents in Wuhan and his sister in Shanghai via video call from his home in Changsha. They exchanged holiday greetings, and Feng Haoran enthusiastically shared his experiences from the National Day road trip, specifically mentioning the incident involving the kind-hearted people in Zhenyuan Ancient Town. After listening, his parents shared similar experiences from their youth, and his sister talked about her work and life in Shanghai. The call lasted about an hour and a half, with a warm and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Post-Call Documentation and Reflection
events.description: After the video call ended, Feng Haoran noted down the important matters mentioned by his family (such as his father's occasional dizziness recently and his sister's need for financial planning advice) in his phone's memo. He brewed a cup of hand-drip coffee, reflected on the conversation, felt the warmth brought by his family's support, and began considering the possibility of returning to Wuhan to visit his relatives in the near future.

events.name: Go to bed early due to travel fatigue.
events.description: Due to long-distance driving and emotional fluctuations, Feng Haoran felt exhausted and went to bed early to regain his energy.

起始状态.所处地点: On the return journey, at a service area in Guizhou
起始状态.心情: Eager to return home, with a hint of travel fatigue.

结束状态.心情: Warm, relaxed, and filled with a sense of belonging, yet physically fatigued.

state.今日运动: Dealing with a flat tire (light physical labor), long-distance driving

date_attribute.holiday: Day Off (National Day Holiday Adjustment)

2025-10.daily_overview: On the last day of the National Day holiday, Feng Haoran was in a "buffer period" transitioning from traveler to daily worker. His body ached from long hours of driving and carrying heavy photography equipment, and his usual morning running routine had been interrupted for a week. He spent the day mainly resting at home, beginning to sort through the massive amount of footage, making his weekly routine call to his parents, and starting to realize the need to readjust his health management rhythm.

events.name: Preliminary Organization and Backup of Travel Materials
events.description: Feng Haoran imported the massive amount of photo and video materials from the camera and drone into the hard drive of his home computer. He then created first-level folders based on the travel dates and locations (Fenghuang, Zhenyuan, Fanjing Mountain, Xijiang) for preliminary storage and backup to prevent data loss.

events.name: Reflection on Physical Condition and Health Planning
events.description: Feng Haoran felt distinct soreness in his lower back and legs due to prolonged driving and carrying photography equipment. Reflecting on his vacation, he realized that his morning running routine had been interrupted for a week. He decided that after the holiday, he would need to immediately reorganize his training plan, gradually resume his routine, and consider incorporating some stretching and strength exercises to address the strain caused by high-intensity shooting.

events.name: Weekly routine video call with parents
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran had his weekly routine video call with his parents in Wuhan. Besides greetings, he once again shared the highlights of his road trip and the kindness he encountered along the way. During the casual conversation, his mother Li Xiuying inadvertently mentioned that his father Feng Jianguo had occasionally experienced dizziness while walking recently, but thought it would be fine after some rest and did not pay much attention to it. Upon hearing this, Feng Haoran immediately became alert.

events.name: Perform gentle stretching due to soreness.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran performed 20 minutes of simple stretching at home to alleviate muscle soreness, but did not engage in formal exercise.

起始状态.心情: Relax, with the languor that follows a holiday.

结束状态.心情: Slightly worried (due to father's health) and determined to resume a regular routine.

state.今日运动: Light stretching for 20 minutes

date_attribute.holiday: Rest Day (National Day Holiday Adjustment)

2025-10.daily_overview: On a swapped workday, Feng Haoran's mental state was unusually tense. His father's health concerns weighed heavily on his mind, immediately activating his ENTJ-driven initiative. He temporarily set aside the meticulous organization of his photography materials, utilizing gaps during work hours and time after work to fully dedicate himself to researching medical checkup options for his father, scheduling hospital appointments, and collaborating with his sister to transform remote worries into concrete action plans.

events.name: Urgent Study on Father's Physical Examination Matters
events.description: During a break at work, Feng Haoran used his computer to search online for common causes of dizziness in the elderly, authoritative departments in Wuhan's top-tier hospitals, and elderly health checkup packages. He began systematically gathering information and comparing the specialties of different hospitals as well as the cost-effectiveness of their packages.

events.name: Schedule a health checkup package for parents.
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran successfully booked a comprehensive elderly health checkup package for his parents at a reputable tertiary hospital in Wuhan by phone, based on the information he had collected, and paid the fees online. He then sent the appointment confirmation to the family group chat.

events.name: Participate in the Lushan Environmental Protection Public Welfare Activity

After being assigned to a group at the gathering point, he cleaned up trash along the mountain trail with several retired aunts. During the activity, one of the aunts, who had once been a history teacher, shared stories about the changes Yuelu Mountain had undergone over the decades, giving him a new perspective on this familiar mountain. When taking a group photo at the end of the event, he felt a sense of simple satisfaction.

He first conducted an initial rough screening, deleting photos that were blurry, duplicated, or poorly composed. Subsequently, based on classification by location, he began creating secondary folders under three preliminary themes—[Tranquil Landscapes], [Dynamic Scenes], and [Humanistic Documentation]—for more refined archiving, and marked dozens of high-quality photos worthy of detailed editing.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the second Sunday of accompanying his father in a Wuhan hospital, Feng Haoran focused his energy intensely on his father's recovery and the coordination of family affairs. As the pillar of the family, he efficiently handled consultations on rehabilitation plans, organized medical expenses, coordinated planning with his sister, and found time amidst the tension to maintain necessary work communications. By the end of the day, the tasks were heavy but orderly.

events.name: Remote Management of Personal Balcony Plants
events.description: During his caregiving duties in Wuhan, Feng Haoran checked the status of the plants on his balcony in Changsha through a smart home application and found that the automatic watering and temperature control system he had set up a few days earlier was functioning well. He left a brief message to his running friend Gao Yunfei in Changsha, asking him to check on the plants' growth over the weekend if he had time.

events.name: Consulting Sports Rehabilitation Institutions
events.description: To address his own shoulder and neck discomfort caused by half-marathon running and prolonged desk work, and to seek resources for his father's future rehabilitation, Feng Haoran used a mobile app to search for and initially contacted 2-3 well-regarded sports rehabilitation centers. He inquired in detail about the assessment process, costs, and medical insurance coverage, and kept a record of the information.

events.name: Communicate with the attending physician regarding the rehabilitation plan.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran had an in-depth discussion with his father's attending physician. He gained a detailed understanding of the necessary medication adjustments, dietary restrictions, specific steps for rehabilitation exercises, and potential risk points after his father's discharge from the hospital. He carefully took notes, laying the foundation for developing a home care plan.

events.name: Organize medical expense receipts
events.description: In the rest area outside his father's hospital ward, Feng Haoran spread out all the expense receipts, diagnostic certificates, and other documents accumulated since the hospitalization. He conducted preliminary sorting, organizing, and photocopying in accordance with the requirements for medical insurance reimbursement in Wuhan, ensuring all materials were complete to save time for the subsequent reimbursement procedures.

events.name: Develop a detailed rehabilitation plan remotely with my sister.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran held a lengthy video conference with his sister Feng Xinran, who is in Shanghai. The two discussed in detail the daily care for their father after his discharge from the hospital, the arrangement of rehabilitation training, the need to hire a professional caregiver, and the home adaptation plan for aging in place in Wuhan (such as installing bathroom handrails and anti-slip mats). They also established a specific schedule for taking turns returning to Wuhan to visit, clearly defining their respective responsibilities.

events.name: Pay for additional medical expenses
events.description: According to the new medical order, Father needed to add an intravenous medication. Feng Haoran went to the nurse station to confirm the treatment sheet, then proceeded to the inpatient department's payment window to settle the fees for the additional medication and the day's treatment, ensuring uninterrupted care.

events.name: Temporarily Handling Urgent Work Emails
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran received an urgent email from a colleague at the company, requiring him to immediately respond to a client's investment inquiry. He stayed up late until the early hours of the morning to handle the matter, which resulted in a shortened sleep duration.

起始状态.心情: Focused, slightly weary, filled with a sense of responsibility.

结束状态.心情: Slightly relieved, yet fatigued from staying up late.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Monday, Feng Haoran handled urgent work remotely while advancing various preparations for his father's discharge from the hospital. He juggled between the hospital, his parents' home, and remote work, organized a crucial family meeting, and began implementing the rehabilitation plan, demonstrating exceptional multitasking abilities.

events.name: Remote guidance of team work
events.description: In the morning, taking advantage of his father's break, Feng Haoran opened his laptop at the desk in his father's home. He provided detailed written responses and strategic guidance regarding several specific business questions sent by his colleagues Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya via WeChat Work, incorporating market data to ensure the team project remained unaffected.

events.name: Convene a family rehabilitation meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, when his father's condition had stabilized and his mental state was relatively good, Feng Haoran gathered his mother and visiting relatives in the hospital room to hold a small family meeting. He informed everyone of the attending physician's opinion, collectively discussed the details of his father's home rehabilitation after discharge and the division of daily care responsibilities, and solicited opinions on whether to hire a short-term caregiver. A preliminary consensus was reached.

events.name: Research on Home Modification for Aging in Place
events.description: After the meeting, Feng Haoran returned to his parents' home to conduct an on-site inspection of areas such as the bathroom and bedroom. While measuring the dimensions, he used a mobile app and local service platforms to conduct preliminary research on construction plans and approximate costs for aging-friendly modifications, such as installing handrails and laying non-slip mats.

events.name: Preliminary Screening of Local Caregiver Resources
events.description: In the evening, based on the decisions made during the daytime family meeting, Feng Haoran began to preliminarily screen several local professional caregiver service agencies through online platforms and recommendations from relatives and friends in Wuhan. He also inquired about their service content, qualifications, and fee standards via phone calls to prepare for subsequent decision-making.

events.name: Schedule a Meeting with the Attending Physician
events.description: Feng Haoran scheduled a brief meeting with the attending physician for the following day through the ward nurse, hoping to have a final confirmation regarding his father's latest test results, the specific discharge date, and the precautions for subsequent rehabilitation.

events.name: Selecting Health Monitoring Devices for Parents
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran learned through a video call that his mother wanted a more convenient way to monitor her blood sugar. Considering his father's condition as well, he decided to purchase a set of home health monitoring devices for them. He began searching for product information and reviews on e-commerce platforms for electronic blood pressure monitors, blood glucose meters, and wristbands with fall detection and alert functions.

events.name: Canceling the planned walk due to fatigue.
events.description: Originally planning to take a walk near the hospital in the evening to relieve stress, Feng Haoran decided to rest early and canceled the walk due to excessive fatigue from running around and handling affairs during the day.

起始状态.心情: Clear-headed, with a well-defined plan

结束状态.心情: Busy and fulfilling, but with a slight sense of fatigue.

state.今日运动: Walking between the hospital and my parents' home, covering approximately 10,000 steps.

2025-11.daily_overview: With his father's discharge from the hospital approaching, Feng Haoran shifted his focus from urgent caregiving to systematic planning. He addressed backlogged personal interests, deepened his reflections on family financial security and personal health, and made advance arrangements for life after returning to Changsha, reflecting the proactive nature of an ENTJ personality.

events.name: Update Stamp Market Dynamics
events.description: In the early morning, while waiting for the doctor's rounds, Feng Haoran quickly browsed the results of the recently concluded autumn stamp auction on his phone. He updated the selling prices of several stamps he had been following into his spreadsheet and briefly analyzed market trends. This was a rare moment of relaxation amid his tense caregiving duties.

events.name: Study personal pension policies
events.description: Inspired by his father's medical expenses, Feng Haoran began to delve deeply into the policies surrounding personal pension accounts. Leveraging his background in finance, he conducted a comparative analysis of the risk-return characteristics of various investment products available within these accounts, such as publicly offered funds and savings deposits. He then contemplated how to build a more robust retirement reserve for both himself and his father.

events.name: Organize Information on Sports Rehabilitation Institutions
events.description: He compiled the information and consultation feedback from several sports rehabilitation institutions he had gathered in the previous days into an electronic spreadsheet. Based on his budget and schedule after returning to Changsha, he preliminarily identified one or two of the most suitable options as the primary targets for further investigation.

events.name: Share health planning with father
events.description: While accompanying his father, Feng Haoran mentioned that this experience had strengthened his resolve to prioritize his health more, and he planned to seek professional shoulder and neck rehabilitation services upon returning to Changsha. His father expressed strong support upon hearing this, reminding him to take good care of his health no matter how busy work became. This made Feng Haoran feel deeply comforted.

events.name: Book an Open Day at Hunan Observatory
events.description: To give himself a relaxing expectation upon returning to Changsha, Feng Haoran found out that the Hunan Provincial Observatory would have a public open day on November 21. He immediately submitted an online reservation application through the official WeChat account, planning to relieve recent stress with a stargazing activity.

events.name: Settle this week's hospitalization expenses
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran went to the inpatient settlement center, printed and carefully reviewed the detailed expense list for the week, and paid the accumulated amount. He sorted and kept all the receipts in preparation for the final discharge settlement and subsequent reimbursement.

events.name: Determine the model of the health monitoring device.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran comprehensively compared the performance, price, and user reviews of health monitoring devices from different brands. He ultimately finalized the specific models of the electronic blood pressure monitor, blood glucose meter, and health bracelet to purchase for his parents. He also checked the inventory availability at offline physical stores in Wuhan, planning to make the purchase the following day.

events.name: Outdoor ventilation canceled due to rain.
events.description: Originally scheduled for a brief outdoor walk around the hospital in the afternoon, Feng Haoran switched to performing simple shoulder and neck stretches indoors due to light rain after midday.

起始状态.心情: Stay calm, think long-term.

结束状态.心情: Meticulous planning has led to a clearer vision for the future.

state.今日运动: Walking and going up and down stairs in the hospital for about 40 minutes, plus indoor stretching.

2025-11.daily_overview: This was Feng Haoran's last day in Wuhan, with a tightly packed and highly efficient schedule. In the morning, he completed work handovers and key procurement tasks. In the afternoon, he personally taught his parents how to use new devices. In the evening, he handled the discharge procedures for his father, and late at night, he took the high-speed train back to Changsha. Within a single day, he seamlessly transitioned from the role of "family pillar" to "returning to the workplace."

events.name: Quickly Browse Industry News
events.description: In the early morning, before returning to Changsha, Feng Haoran used his breakfast time to quickly review key financial industry news and internal company research briefings. He sent an email to his direct supervisor Qian Yongqiang, briefly reporting on his father's condition and his imminent return to work, and attached several points of consideration regarding subsequent market strategies.

events.name: Reporting Pension Research to Father
events.description: Before going to the hospital in the morning, Feng Haoran had a video call with his father. He briefly reported his research findings on the personal pension policy, explained its advantages as a supplementary retirement and tax planning tool, and listened to his father's opinions.

events.name: Offline Purchase of Health Monitoring Devices
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran took some time to visit a pre-selected medical equipment store, carefully inspected the physical items of an electronic blood pressure monitor, a blood glucose meter, and a health tracker, consulted with the staff about usage details and warranty policies, and completed the purchase.

events.name: Assist father with discharge procedures.
events.description: After the doctor's final assessment, it was determined that the father met the discharge criteria. Feng Haoran assisted his father in packing his personal belongings and confirmed the discharge procedures and follow-up medication with the nurse. He then went to the settlement office and paid all the hospitalization fees.

events.name: Teach mother how to use the device.
events.description: After settling his father back home, Feng Haoran patiently demonstrated to his mother Li Xiuying how to operate all the health monitoring devices, explaining step by step from wearing and measuring to checking the data.

events.name: Set Up Remote Health Management
events.description: Feng Haoran helped his mother download the companion app on her phone and successfully paired the new device with the phone via Bluetooth. At the same time, he also set up his own phone as a remote monitoring terminal, allowing him to view his parents' health data and alarm information in real time from Changsha. Finally, they conducted the first measurement together to ensure everything was functioning properly.

events.name: Finalize the division of tasks with my sister.
events.description: After the equipment setup was completed, Feng Haoran updated his sister Feng Xinran on the situation via WeChat. The two finalized their division of labor: Feng Xinran would be responsible for contacting and screening caregivers, while Feng Haoran would coordinate the home environment modifications in Wuhan. They also drafted a preliminary schedule for taking turns visiting Wuhan before the end of the year.

events.name: Return to Changsha by high-speed rail.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran bid farewell to his parents and took the high-speed train from Wuhan back to Changsha. On the train, he reflected on the experiences of the past ten-plus days, feeling both physically and mentally exhausted, yet also taking a hint of pride in his ability to shoulder family responsibilities. He had booked a ride-hailing service in Changsha and planned to go straight home to rest.

events.name: Handling urgent customer requests on a temporary basis
events.description: On the high-speed train, Feng Haoran received a WeChat message from his client Lin Zhihao, inquiring about the details of an investment product. He immediately looked up the information on his phone and replied, ensuring the client's satisfaction, though he felt slightly fatigued.

起始状态.心情: Busy, preparing for a packed day.

结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted, feeling as if a heavy burden has been lifted, yet tinged with a faint melancholy of leaving home.

state.今日运动: Carrying items and rushing about all day, with significant physical exertion.

2025-11.daily_overview: On his first day back at work in Changsha, Feng Haoran made efforts to adjust his state and re-engage in the workplace. He handled the backlog of work accumulated during his business trip, continued to remotely follow up on his father's recovery and medical reimbursement, and organized an online family meeting after work to formally establish a remote health management mechanism.

events.name: Return to work
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran arrived at the company on time. He first had a brief meeting with his supervisor Qian Yongqiang, expressing gratitude for his understanding during his father's illness. He then fully took over the work projects that may have fallen behind during the remote work period and synchronized the progress with his colleague Zheng Wenbo.

events.name: Solicit peer feedback on the article
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran sent the first draft of an article he had written on family financial risk management to his close colleague Zheng Wenbo and his university classmate Zhou Yuwei in Shanghai, hoping to solicit professional feedback from fellow finance professionals.

events.name: Consultation on Commercial Health Insurance
events.description: In the afternoon, he contacted a familiar insurance advisor via WeChat video to inquire in detail about commercial medical insurance and critical illness insurance products suitable for his parents. He focused on understanding the coverage scope, premiums, and claims process, and requested electronic copies of the policy terms for several products.

events.name: Final settlement for father's hospital discharge
events.description: Feng Haoran remotely guided his mother to the hospital, completed the final discharge settlement for his father, paid the out-of-pocket portion after medical insurance reimbursement, and obtained the complete invoice and total expense list.

events.name: Pick up father and settle him back home.
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Xinran took leave from work and returned to Wuhan from Shanghai. Together with her mother, she brought her father home from the hospital to their residence in Jiang'an District. Following Feng Haoran's prior instructions, she arranged the bed and provided her mother with detailed caregiving guidelines.

events.name: Hold a family summary meeting
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran convened his mother and sister via video call to hold a family debriefing session. He summarized the lessons learned from handling the incident, clarified each person's responsibilities during their father's recovery phase, established a regular video communication mechanism, and committed to continuing the follow-up on age-friendly home modifications.

events.name: Create a Family Health Management Group
events.description: After the meeting, Feng Haoran created a family WeChat group, requiring his parents to share daily monitoring data such as blood pressure and blood sugar in the group. He also regularly shares health knowledge and reminders in the group, establishing a systematic remote health management model.

events.name: Submit medical insurance reimbursement materials.
events.description: With her sister's assistance, the mother submitted all the sorted reimbursement materials to the hospital's medical insurance settlement window, officially initiating the reimbursement process.

events.name: Phone inquiry about father's recovery status
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran called his father to inquire in detail about his feelings and recovery progress on the first day after being discharged from the hospital. He also asked his mother again about the reimbursement details of the existing social insurance to prepare for supplementing commercial insurance later.

events.name: Working overtime and staying up late due to backlog.
events.description: Due to a backlog of work, Feng Haoran continued to handle emails and reports at home in the evening, resulting in a later bedtime than planned.

起始状态.心情: Feeling low, in need of adjustment, with the pressure of returning to work.

结束状态.心情: Gradually calming down, feeling somewhat reassured due to the establishment of an effective family communication mechanism, yet still fatigued.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Friday, Feng Haoran attempted to return to normal life by resuming his personal routines. In the early morning, he persisted in his morning run with friends despite the rain, and attended to work during the day. In the evening, he went alone to the observatory to participate in a stargazing activity. The vast expanse of the starry sky temporarily washed away the anxieties of the past few days, granting him inner peace.

events.name: Adaptive Morning Run in the Rain
events.description: On Saturday morning, a light rain fell in Changsha. Feng Haoran and his running partner Gao Yunfei met as scheduled on South Yuelu Road, deciding to conduct an adaptive training session. They discussed equipment choices and training adjustments for running in the rain, jogged 8 kilometers in the drizzle, recorded unique exercise data, and Gao Yunfei also inquired with concern about his father's condition.

events.name: Handle daily work
events.description: During the day, Feng Haoran handles routine customer inquiries and market analysis reports at the company, and begins preparing his annual work summary.

events.name: Prepare stargazing equipment
events.description: Considering the cold weather during nighttime observations, Feng Haoran prepared a warm down jacket and scarf during the day, checked the camera batteries and memory cards, and planned the route from the company to the Hunan Provincial Observatory (located in Yuelu District).

events.name: Participate in the Observatory Open Day Event
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran drove to the Hunan Provincial Observatory, presented his reservation credentials to complete check-in. He first attended a popular science lecture on exoplanet exploration, gaining insights into the latest discoveries in the field of astronomy.

events.name: Observing Stars with Professional Telescopes
events.description: Under the guidance and assistance of the docent, Feng Haoran queued to use the observatory's professional telescope, observing Saturn with its beautiful rings and the bright Pleiades star cluster in sequence, and attempted to photograph the observed sights with a camera.

events.name: Remote Viewing of Parents' Health Data
events.description: On the way to the observatory, Feng Haoran remotely checked his parents' blood pressure and blood glucose data, which were measured for the first time using the new device, through a mobile app. He recorded the data, planning to use it as a baseline for future monitoring, and reminded his mother via WeChat to pay attention to the measurement frequency.

events.name: Slight discomfort from getting caught in the rain, going to bed early.
events.description: After his morning run, Feng Haoran felt a slight headache and nasal congestion, likely due to getting caught in the rain. He decided to rest early after stargazing in the evening to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Determined to restart through exercise, slightly dull.

结束状态.所处地点: Returning to Changsha home from Hunan Astronomical Observatory
结束状态.心情: Calm and expansive, temporarily forgetting worries due to the vastness of the universe, yet feeling slightly fatigued physically.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Saturday, Feng Haoran embarked on a tightly scheduled business trip to Beijing. He arrived in Beijing by flight in the morning and held an in-depth asset allocation meeting with key clients in the afternoon, followed by organizing materials late into the night. Despite it being a rest day, his work pace was fully intensified, demonstrating his professionalism as an investment advisor.

events.name: Addressing Plant Growth Issues
events.description: Before setting out in the morning, Feng Haoran checked the photos of plants sent by his running friend Gao Yunfei and noticed that some plants were growing slowly due to recent lack of sunlight. He quickly learned winter indoor lighting techniques through an online gardening forum and immediately ordered a plant grow light online to be delivered to his home in Changsha.

events.name: Organize and Share Stargazing Photos
events.description: On the way to the airport, Feng Haoran performed simple post-processing on several photos of the starry sky taken the night before, selected a clear picture of Saturn, and shared it on his social media feed with the caption [Gazing at the stars, temporarily forgetting worries]. It received numerous likes and comments, including from his photography partner Xu Jianing.

events.name: Arrived in Beijing and checked in.
events.description: Feng Haoran took an early morning flight from Changsha to Beijing. Upon arrival, he took a taxi to a pre-booked business hotel near the China World Trade Center to check in, unpack his luggage, and rest briefly.

events.name: In-depth meeting with client Huang Siqi
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran visited Huang Siqi's temporary office in Beijing. The two engaged in a three-hour in-depth discussion regarding her company's asset allocation plan. Feng Haoran presented the performance of the investment portfolio in light of the latest market trends and proposed optimization suggestions. The meeting was productive.

events.name: Organizing Meeting Minutes and Adjusting Plans
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran organized the key points from the day's meeting with Huang Siqi in his hotel room, drafted a detailed meeting summary, and adjusted and prepared the final presentation materials for the next day overnight, based on the new requirements discussed by the client.

events.name: Inquire about stamp museum information
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran checked the opening hours of the China Postage Stamp Museum for Sunday on his phone and decided to schedule a visit for the following afternoon as a personal break during his business trip.

events.name: Weight slightly increased due to social dining.
events.description: During dinner, Feng Haoran dined with friends in Beijing, sampling local delicacies, which led to increased intake and a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Get into work mode, focus

结束状态.心情: Tired but satisfied, the work is progressing smoothly.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Sunday morning, he completed his final tasks in Beijing and visited the Stamp Museum. In the afternoon, he flew back to Changsha. That evening, feeling emotionally low and exhausted, he visited an animal rescue station for comfort. The unexpected closeness of an orange cat touched a soft spot in his heart, sparking an impulse to adopt it.

events.name: Meeting with Potential Partners
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran, following the company's arrangement, held an informal meeting with the head of a private equity fund at a café near Beijing's Guomao area. They exchanged industry information and explored potential opportunities for future collaboration.

events.name: Submit the final proposal to the client
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran met with the client Huang Siqi once again to formally submit the revised and improved investment strategy proposal. They conducted a final review of all details, risk controls, and expected returns, and both parties signed the agreement to confirm their mutual understanding.

events.name: Visit the China Postage Stamp Museum
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran utilized the remaining time in the afternoon to visit the China Postage Stamp Museum. He systematically toured various exhibition halls, with a particular focus on viewing precious stamp specimens such as [The Whole Country is Red], which deepened his understanding of stamp history. He also purchased several sets of commemorative covers at the museum shop.

events.name: Dining with university classmates
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran met with his university classmate Zhou Yuwei, who works in Beijing, and the two had dinner together at a Hunan cuisine restaurant. They exchanged updates on their respective situations in the financial industry, shared insights on the market, and discussed their future career plans. The reunion with an old friend allowed Feng Haoran to temporarily unwind.

events.name: Return to Changsha by flight
events.description: After dinner, Feng Haoran hurried to the airport and took the late flight back to Changsha. On the plane, he reviewed the compact and efficient business trip and made preliminary plans for the year-end sprint.

events.name: Visit the Animal Rescue Station
events.description: Upon returning to his home in Changsha, his spirits remained low. To lift his mood, he went alone in the evening to visit an animal rescue station he had previously taken an interest in. Without a firm intention to adopt, his visit was driven more by curiosity and a desire for emotional solace.

events.name: Touched by an Orange Cat
events.description: At the rescue station, a gentle orange cat approached Feng Haoran on its own, rubbing against his hand and purring. This unconditional trust and warmth instantly moved him, giving him a sense of being needed and a feeling of healing.

events.name: Inquire in detail about adoption matters
events.description: Moved by his affection, Feng Haoran inquired in detail with the staff at the rescue station about all the specifics regarding the adoption of this ginger cat, including the specific procedures, required fees, vaccination status, neutering procedures, as well as daily feeding and care.

events.name: Go to bed early due to travel fatigue.
events.description: After a long flight and emotional fluctuations, Feng Haoran felt extremely fatigued and decided to rest early to regain his energy.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed due to the successful completion of work.

结束状态.心情: Complex, with a weariness interwoven with a touch of warmth stirred by the cat and the entanglement that follows a flutter of the heart.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Monday, the rational ENTJ personality regained dominance. During a work break, Feng Haoran systematically analyzed the insurance products and conducted a thorough cost-benefit analysis of his impulsive desire to adopt. Ultimately, based on a rational assessment of family responsibilities and practical conditions, he made a regretful yet resolute decision to postpone the adoption for the time being.

events.name: Analyze and compare insurance products
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran organized the insurance product information obtained the previous day in the office. Using an Excel spreadsheet, he conducted a horizontal comparative analysis across multiple dimensions, such as coverage scope, premiums, and the company's solvency. This process led to the preliminary selection of 2-3 candidate products suitable for his parents' age and health conditions.

events.name: Complete the post-trip wrap-up tasks.
events.description: He reported the completion of his business trip tasks in Beijing to his supervisor Qian Yongqiang via email and organized all invoices for reimbursement. He then began handling the backlog of emails and internal approval processes accumulated during his business trip.

events.name: Rationally Assess the Feasibility of Adoption
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran, drawing on his innate planning instincts, meticulously outlined a list of pros and cons for adopting a cat in the office. The advantages included emotional companionship and stress relief, while the practical constraints involved frequent business trips that would prevent stable care, the need to be readily available to support his father during the recovery period in Wuhan, as well as current limitations in living space and energy allocation.

events.name: Deeply Consider Emotional Needs and Planning
events.description: Through rational analysis, Feng Haoran recognized that his emotional desire for companionship was genuine. He formally added [acquiring a pet companion when conditions are favorable] to his personal future planning to-do list, but clarified that the present is not the optimal time.

events.name: Decided not to adopt for the time being.
events.description: After work, after repeated deliberation, Feng Haoran ultimately reached a rational conclusion: introducing a new life at this time would bring additional responsibilities, potentially affecting the care of his parents and his own career development. With a sense of regret but firm resolve, he silently abandoned the adoption plan.

events.name: Research on Family Medical Security
events.description: In the evening, while reviewing his father's medical expenses, Feng Haoran became even more aware of the importance of supplementary commercial insurance. He began utilizing the company's professional database to systematically search for and download information on mainstream medical and accident insurance products for the elderly available in the market, starting to build a family insurance planning information repository.

events.name: Staying up late due to insurance research
events.description: While conducting an in-depth study of insurance products in the evening, Feng Haoran was captivated by a complex clause, inadvertently staying up until the early hours of the morning, which resulted in a delay in his sleep time.

起始状态.心情: Dilemma, the struggle between reason and emotion

结束状态.心情: Returning to rationality, regret and relief coexist after the decision, responsibility becomes clearer, yet fatigue persists.

2025-11.daily_overview: Tuesday marked a positive restart in Feng Haoran's personal life. He completed the creation of his first travel short film, which received favorable feedback from friends, and took the first step toward building a family financial safety net by opening a personal pension account. His lunchtime conversation with colleagues also demonstrated his integration of health-conscious ideas into the workplace.

events.name: Organize Video Learning Outcomes
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran organized his recent self-study notes and project files on video editing, summarizing key operational techniques. He archived the completed project files for the [Road Trip] short film, marking the conclusion of this systematic learning phase.

events.name: Sharing Health Tips During the Lunch Break
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran had a meal with his colleague Zheng Wenbo near the company. Feng Haoran discussed how regular exercise and shoulder-neck rehabilitation help in managing the stress of financial work. Zheng Wenbo expressed interest, so Feng Haoran shared information about a sports rehabilitation center recommended by his running partner Gao Yunfei.

events.name: Open a personal pension account
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Feng Haoran used his mobile banking app to complete the online process of opening a personal pension account. He immediately proceeded to make his first deposit within the annual limit and selected a conservative target-date pension fund as his initial investment. This marks a crucial step in building a long-term financial safety net for his family.

events.name: Consult friends about cat-raising experience
events.description: Although he had decided not to adopt a cat for the time being, Feng Haoran still consulted his friend Peng Yuqing, who has experience in raising cats, via WeChat about the daily needs, expenses, and environmental stability requirements for cats, in order to build up knowledge for future possibilities.

events.name: Complete the final rendering of the short film "Travelogue of Hunan and Guizhou".
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Feng Haoran set the final output parameters for the short film, initiated the rendering process, and exported "Travels in Hunan and Guizhou"—which had completed all post-production work—as a high-definition video file.

events.name: Share the short video to the photography group.
events.description: After rendering the short film, Feng Haoran uploaded it to a video platform and shared the link in the [Lushan Light and Shadow] photography enthusiasts WeChat group he belongs to, along with a brief creative insight, hoping for feedback from fellow enthusiasts.

events.name: Staying up late due to a sense of accomplishment.
events.description: The sense of accomplishment from completing the short film and opening a pension account left Feng Haoran so excited that he stayed up late chatting with friends online, going to bed later than usual.

结束状态.心情: Feeling a sense of accomplishment and positivity from completing creative work and initiating financial planning.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Feng Haoran continued to advance various plans. He purchased a home yoga mat, began drafting his annual work summary, and delved into researching insurance options for his parents. The enthusiastic feedback from photography group members on his short film also provided him with ongoing motivation for creative work.

events.name: Purchase a professional yoga mat.
events.description: Out of a commitment to long-term health management, Feng Haoran carefully selected and ordered a high-quality professional yoga mat online, planning to perform simple stretching and yoga exercises at home to aid in shoulder and neck rehabilitation.

events.name: Conduct an In-Depth Assessment of Adoption Responsibilities
events.description: After deciding not to adopt for the time being, Feng Haoran would still occasionally recall his interactions with that orange cat. Considering factors such as his recent need to frequently check on his parents in Wuhan and his work-related travel plans, he once again assessed in his mind the feasibility of providing a stable and responsible environment for a pet at present, and the conclusion remained negative.

events.name: Writing Personal Annual Work Summary
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran began organizing the annual work records in the office and started drafting his personal year-end work summary. He meticulously reviewed the performance of the investment projects under his responsibility, the growth of client assets, and his personal areas of improvement, in preparation for the year-end performance review.

events.name: Search for in-depth physical examination information for middle-aged and elderly individuals.
events.description: During a work break, he conducted a preliminary search on his phone for information about comprehensive health checkup packages for middle-aged and elderly individuals. He focused on cardiovascular and cerebrovascular screenings as well as early tumor detection programs, familiarizing himself with mainstream market offerings and pricing. He plans to arrange a thorough medical examination for his parents.

events.name: Received positive feedback from the photography group.
events.description: Friends in the photography group have successively watched the short film "Travelogue of Hunan and Guizhou," engaging in lively discussions within the group. They highly praised the composition, color palette, and the emotional rhythm conveyed by the film. Feng Haoran interacted with everyone in the group, exchanging insights on shooting and editing techniques, creating a positive and engaging atmosphere.

events.name: Comparative Analysis of Insurance Product Details
events.description: In the evening, in his home study, Feng Haoran carefully compared the insurance policy terms of various products collected during the day, focusing on whether the coverage included risks such as chronic diseases and hospitalization that his parents might face. He also used an Excel spreadsheet to calculate and record key data such as premium expenditures for different age groups.

events.name: Canceling evening exercise due to work pressure.
events.description: Originally scheduled for an evening yoga session, Feng Haoran decided to focus on work and canceled the exercise plan due to encountering a bottleneck in writing the work summary.

起始状态.心情: Steady, focused on executing the plan

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled by work progress and recognition.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Thursday, Feng Haoran concluded several phases of his research work, made a final decision (to abandon the adoption plan), and took a crucial step in his career development—engaging in an in-depth pre-communication for his annual performance review with his supervisor. He prepared himself both mentally and logistically for the healing trip to Macau at the end of the month and the year-end work sprint.

events.name: Compilation of Pension and Insurance Research Abstracts
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran compiled the research notes and comparison tables on personal pensions and commercial insurance from the past week into a clear summary document. He listed follow-up action items, such as scheduling a detailed discussion with an insurance advisor and calculating specific tax-saving amounts, marking the conclusion of the information-gathering phase at this stage.

events.name: Final decision to abandon the adoption has been confirmed.
events.description: After days of careful deliberation, Feng Haoran rationally confirmed his previous decision: now was not the best time to bring a new life into the world. With a sense of regret but complete resolution, he informed his friend Peng Yuqing, whom he had previously consulted, of this decision.

events.name: Professional Communication with Partners
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran and product manager Li Zhe held a dedicated video conference to address financial compliance issues involved in the design of a collaborative product. They provided a detailed interpretation of the relevant regulatory policies and offered professional recommendations on areas such as product risk control and information disclosure.

events.name: In-depth communication on annual work and career development
events.description: This was a crucial step. Feng Haoran proactively scheduled and met with his direct supervisor, Qian Yongqiang. He began by once again expressing gratitude for his supervisor's care and support during his father's illness. He then provided a detailed report on his annual work achievements, the challenges he encountered, and his reflections. Additionally, he engaged in an in-depth discussion regarding his future career development, particularly his goal of becoming an [Investment Director], as well as the year-end key client follow-up plan. The meeting concluded with affirmation and guidance from Mr. Qian.

events.name: Inquire about insurance-covered physical examination items
events.description: To arrange medical check-ups for his parents in a more cost-effective manner, Feng Haoran contacted his friend Cai Wenjing, who works in the insurance industry, via WeChat. He inquired about medical check-up packages combined with commercial insurance, as well as the differences in coverage and cost-effectiveness among various products.

events.name: Share short videos with close friends group and engage in in-depth discussions
events.description: In the evening, encouraged by the feedback from the photography group, Feng Haoran shared "Travel Notes of Hunan and Guizhou" in a close-knit WeChat group centered around Peng Yuqing, Dong Haoran, and Cai Wenjing. His friends not only gave likes but also engaged in deeper discussions about the theme of the short film, Feng Haoran's creative transformation, and his recent life circumstances, offering him considerable emotional support.

events.name: Late sleep due to nervous communication.
events.description: The in-depth conversation with his supervisor left Feng Haoran both excited and slightly nervous. That evening, he reviewed the discussion and planned his next steps, which led to him going to bed a little later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Preparing for a crucial communication, with a touch of solemnity.

结束状态.心情: Feeling relieved and highly motivated, with smooth professional communication and personal affairs sorted out, I am full of anticipation for the upcoming trip.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Friday, Feng Haoran completed the summary of his stamp market research, scheduled an appointment with an insurance advisor, and attended an industry seminar. Regarding his unfulfilled intention of adoption, he adopted a socially responsible approach—donating to a rescue station and maintaining ongoing concern, transforming his wish into a future planning goal, handling the matter in a mature and dignified manner.

events.name: Summary of Stamp Market Research
events.description: Feng Haoran summarized the recent research on the stamp market and drafted a brief report, which includes an analysis of market conditions, an assessment of the price range for target stamps, and the next action plan. This marks a temporary conclusion of the current round of information gathering.

events.name: Schedule an appointment with an insurance advisor for a detailed discussion
events.description: Based on preliminary research, Feng Haoran scheduled an online meeting with his long-term insurance advisor. They discussed in detail the specific needs, budget, and family health conditions for purchasing insurance for his parents and himself. Several candidate insurance product options were preliminarily identified, and a decision is planned to be made after discussing with his parents over the weekend.

events.name: Participate in the Financial Industry Investment Trends Seminar
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran, dressed in a well-tailored wool-blend overcoat, attended a seminar on investment trends in the financial industry organized by his company. He exchanged market insights with peers, expanded his professional network, and encountered several potential clients.

events.name: Donate to an animal rescue shelter
events.description: To express his blessings for the ginger cat and find inner solace, Feng Haoran accessed the online donation platform of the animal rescue station via his mobile phone and completed a donation to support the station's operations.

events.name: Stay Updated on Shelter Activities
events.description: After making the donation, Feng Haoran followed the official account of the animal rescue station on Weibo to stay updated on its activities and the conditions of the rescued animals, replacing direct adoption with a form of continuous care.

events.name: Include adoption in future plans.
events.description: In his electronic planning document, Feng Haoran officially recorded [adopting a pet companion after work and family responsibilities become relatively stable] as a specific goal, clarifying its position in his life plan.

events.name: Plan year-end customer visits
events.description: Based on the communication with his supervisor, Feng Haoran began to plan the year-end return visit itinerary for key clients such as Huang Siqi and Lin Zhihao, including the schedule, visit objectives, and key communication points.

events.name: Brainstorm the next creative topic
events.description: Reviewing the feedback on the creation of "Travel Notes of Hunan and Guizhou," Feng Haoran decided to make the [photo + video] documentation format a regular practice. He began contemplating the next possible creative theme, perhaps a record of urban morning runs or a vlog for the next camping trip.

events.name: Recommended Sports Rehabilitation Center
events.description: During a morning run, Feng Haoran mentioned his shoulder and neck discomfort and recent physical examination results to his running partner, Gao Yunfei. Gao Yunfei recommended a well-regarded professional sports rehabilitation center in Changsha, shared the contact information, and Feng Haoran decided to schedule an appointment for an assessment after returning from Macau.

events.name: Staying up late due to social engagements
events.description: After the seminar, Feng Haoran had dinner with several colleagues to exchange industry insights, which led to a late return home and a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Positive, the relaxed feeling of Friday and the anticipation of completing tasks.

结束状态.心情: Peaceful, satisfied, feeling that various relationships (work, family, personal emotions, and social responsibilities) have been properly handled.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday was the day to depart for a healing journey in Macau. In the morning, Feng Haoran handled the last few pending tasks (renewing his yoga membership and finalizing insurance matters with his parents), worked overtime in the afternoon to prepare his performance review materials, and flew to Macau in the evening. He checked into a carefully selected boutique hotel, officially beginning a two-day journey of unwinding and resetting.

events.name: Decided to renew the yoga course subscription.
events.description: Looking back on nearly two months of yoga practice, Feng Haoran affirmed its comprehensive benefits in improving physical flexibility, sleep quality, and emotional stability. He decided to renew his course subscription, establishing yoga as a long-term health habit.

events.name: Finalize the insurance plan with parents.
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran detailed the plan of purchasing commercial health insurance for his parents in Wuhan via a video call, explaining the necessity, coverage, and costs. He obtained their consent and support, while reassuring his father to focus on recuperating.

events.name: Prepare Annual Performance Review Materials
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran compiled the written summary report and performance data charts into a formal performance review presentation PPT at home, preparing for the upcoming formal annual performance review meeting.

events.name: Consult clients to obtain health examination recommendations
events.description: He consulted Huang Siqi, a high-net-worth client via WeChat, leveraging her business connections to inquire about comprehensive screening packages at high-end private hospitals or professional medical examination institutions. He obtained internal referral information and plans to arrange appointments for his parents.

events.name: Arrive in Macau and check in
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran flew from Changsha to Macau. Upon arrival, he took the hotel shuttle bus to the design-themed boutique hotel he had booked in Taipa. After checking in, he set down his luggage and stood by the window of his room to admire the night view of Macau, with the fatigue of the journey replaced by a sense of novelty.

events.name: Sharing Creative Work During a Colleague Dinner
events.description: If time permits (possibly before departure during lunch), Feng Haoran, along with colleagues Zheng Wenbo and Sun Xiaoya, gathered for a meal. During the gathering, he mentioned and showcased the short film "Travelogue of Hunan and Guizhou," sharing interesting anecdotes and insights from the creative process, and engaging in a relaxed exchange about personal hobbies with his colleagues.

events.name: Adjustment of Late Sleep Due to Excitement
events.description: Upon arriving in Macau, Feng Haoran went to bed slightly later in the evening due to travel excitement and the comfortable hotel environment, but kept it within reasonable limits.

起始状态.心情: Excited, looking forward to the upcoming trip.

结束状态.心情: Relaxation, novelty, and the freshness of travel alleviated the accumulated stress from recent times.

2025-11.daily_overview: On his second day in Macau, Feng Haoran fully immersed himself in the healing itinerary he had designed. During the day, he captured the city's charm through his camera lens. In the evening, he watched the sunset by the sea, allowing his mind to wander freely. At night, he enjoyed a stunning water performance and briefly experienced the atmosphere of the casino. It was a complete mental reset and an energy recharge.

events.name: Complete insurance application online
events.description: In the morning at the hotel, Feng Haoran, after comprehensive comparisons and discussions with his family, finalized the insurance product portfolio for his parents and himself. He completed the health declaration, information filling, and electronic signature online via his mobile phone, paid the first premium, and thus resolved an important matter of concern.

events.name: Photography Walk in the Historic District
events.description: During the day, Feng Haoran took his camera and strolled alone through the Historic Centre of Macao. He focused on capturing the weathered details of the Ruins of St. Paul's and the Portuguese-style architecture at Senado Square, using his lens to record the unique charm of the city, while enjoying the focus and tranquility that photography brings.

events.name: Watching the Sunset in Serenity at Coloane Seaside
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran came to the seaside of Coloane, found a bench to sit on, and quietly watched the sunset. With the sea breeze gently blowing, he set aside all thoughts about work and family, enjoying a rare moment of solitude and completely emptying his mind.

events.name: Watch the "The House of Dancing Water" Performance
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran went to City of Dreams to watch the world-renowned large-scale water show, "The House of Dancing Water." The stunning stage effects and artistic performance completely immersed him, providing an exceptional audio-visual experience.

events.name: Lightly Experience the Casino Atmosphere
events.description: After the performance, Feng Haoran entered the casino near the hotel with a mindset of light entertainment and experience. Using only a small preset budget, he tried simple games to get a feel for the atmosphere, without becoming addicted. He maintained rationality and restraint, then left and returned to the hotel.

起始状态.心情: Comfortable, leisurely, ready to enjoy the day.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, peaceful, with the heart filled with artistic and natural beauty, stress fully released, ready to return to life.

2025-12.daily_overview: Concluding the short trip to Macau, I am smoothly transitioning back to the daily work and life routine in Changsha and beginning to implement a new health management plan.

events.name: Returning from a trip
events.description: After enjoying breakfast at the hotel in Macau, Feng Haoran checked out and took a taxi to Macau International Airport. While waiting for his flight, he used the airport Wi-Fi to check work emails and briefly planned his health recovery activities for the week. During the flight, he reviewed photos from his trip to Macau and reflected on how to balance work and family responsibilities.

events.name: Confirm the annual review meeting with the client.
events.description: Upon arriving home in Changsha in the afternoon, Feng Haoran confirmed the framework of the annual review meeting with client Huang Siqi via phone and sent an encrypted email invitation. Meanwhile, he checked the synchronization status of his parents' health monitoring devices to ensure the data was functioning properly.

events.name: Replenish supplies and plan a healthy diet.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran went to the supermarket to purchase milk, fruits, and light ingredients to replenish his supplies. After returning home, he washed his travel clothes and set a reminder on his phone to ensure he would resume his restorative morning runs and rehabilitation training starting the next day.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed yet with a slight concern for health management, ready to rebuild life's order.

结束状态.心情: A smooth transition, with full determination to implement the family health plan.

2025-12.daily_overview: Returning to the workweek, I efficiently handled multiple tasks simultaneously. However, due to discomfort in my shoulders and neck, I temporarily adjusted my exercise plan to incorporate rehabilitation training.

events.name: Resume morning stretching
events.description: Feng Haoran performed 15 minutes of stretching and core activation exercises in the living room while playing music to help stay alert. Due to stiffness in his shoulders and neck, he avoided high-intensity workouts and focused on rehabilitation movements.

events.name: System Comparison Physical Examination Institutions
events.description: During work breaks, he organized information on medical examination institutions and created a comparison table to identify suitable options for his parents and himself. During this process, he experienced shoulder and neck pain due to prolonged desk work, prompting him to take a short break and perform gentle neck exercises.

events.name: Select insurance products and prepare reports
events.description: During the lunch break, he finalized three insurance products and prepared an analysis report. He consulted a former classmate working at an insurance company via WeChat to clarify the details of the policy terms, ensuring comprehensive coverage.

events.name: Book a Professional Sports Rehabilitation Assessment
events.description: In the afternoon, he called the sports rehabilitation center to schedule an assessment for the afternoon of December 8th. The customer service representative recommended an initial consultation package for shoulder and neck strain, which Feng Haoran gladly accepted.

events.name: Preliminary Selection of Photographic Works
events.description: After work, he browsed the "Night Talks on the Xiang River" photo series and preliminarily selected 30 candidate works. During the process, he occasionally stood up and moved around due to fatigue to avoid shoulder and neck strain.

events.name: Deep Analysis of Customer Investment Data
events.description: In the evening, export the investment data of client Huang Siqi and conduct preliminary cleaning. Due to focused work, he stayed up late but set a sleep reminder for 23:45.

结束状态.心情: Enriched, looking forward to the rehabilitation plan, slightly fatigued.

events.name: Received a reminder for the maturity of a financial product.
events.description: After returning to the company, check the push notifications from the financial management app to confirm the product maturity and quickly evaluate redemption options.

events.description: Dining with colleague Zheng Wenbo at a Hunan restaurant, I shared my confusion about insurance research. Zheng Wenbo recounted his personal experience and suggested choosing products with guaranteed renewal. Feng Haoran benefited greatly from this advice.

events.name: View and compare the final returns of financial products
events.description: The income from maturing products was confirmed at 52,018 yuan in the morning, with an annualized yield of 3.8%. After comparing with money market funds, he decided to allocate part of the funds toward his parents' insurance premiums.

events.name: Video Call to Explain Insurance Plan to Parents
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran had a video call with his parents, sharing his screen to explain the advantages and disadvantages of insurance. events.name: Discussing the Idea of Parents Relocating to Changsha with My Sister
events.description: After work, I had a video call with my sister and formally proposed the idea of relocating. My sister was supportive but reminded me about the need to rebuild social connections. We divided tasks to gather information, and Feng Haoran spoke more slowly due to fatigue.

events.name: Sounding out parents' attitudes toward relocation
events.description: Contacted parents again, shared photos of Changsha Park, and tentatively inquired about their willingness to stay for a short period. The parents showed an open attitude but expressed nostalgia for their old neighbors. Feng Haoran expressed understanding.

events.name: Going to bed early restores energy.
events.description: Cancel the originally scheduled work preparations for the evening. After performing a simple 10-minute neck and shoulder stretch, go to bed early to compensate for the lack of sleep from the previous night. Set an alarm to ensure tomorrow's morning run.

2025-12.daily_overview: Passing the CFA exam brought joy throughout the day. The celebratory dinner led to staying up late and weight gain, yet work matters progressed in an orderly manner.

events.name: Laundering and organizing clothing
events.description: In the morning, wash and iron the coat to keep the clothing neat and tidy, preparing for weekend activities.

events.name: Communicating Physical Examination Arrangements with Parents
events.description: During a work break, Feng Haoran called his parents to provide details about the medical examination institution. His parents responded positively and agreed to include a comprehensive health check-up in their plans for the next year, which brought Feng Haoran a sense of relief.

events.name: Inquire and confirm the passing of the CFA Level III exam.
events.description: I logged onto the official website at noon and confirmed the approval, feeling a surge of accomplishment and relief, and immediately took a screenshot to save it.

events.name: Sharing Good News About Exam Results with Family
events.description: I immediately sent a screenshot to the family group chat and made a video call. My parents praised me, while my younger sister jokingly asked me to treat everyone, creating a joyful atmosphere.

events.name: Reporting Professional Progress to Superiors
events.description: In the afternoon, I reported to my supervisor Qian Yongqiang via the work software. Qian Yongqiang replied with congratulations and encouraged me to continue working hard.

events.name: Arranging a celebratory dinner gathering with friends.
events.description: I shared the good news in our friends' group chat and suggested getting together for a meal. We agreed to meet at a Hunan restaurant at 7 p.m.

events.name: Received an invitation to a coffee tasting event.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the first workday after returning to Changsha from a short trip to Macau, Feng Haoran, while readjusting to the work rhythm, systematically initiated a plan to arrange annual health check-ups for his parents. During the day, he efficiently researched multiple medical examination institutions in between handling work tasks. In the evening, he discussed the matter with his sister via video call and decided to purchase health monitoring devices for their parents, demonstrating a strong sense of responsibility and meticulous planning in family health management. Additionally, he purchased theater tickets in advance, making arrangements for cultural activities over the weekend.

events.name: Handling Post-Travel Matters
events.description: Feng Haoran put away the photography equipment from his Macau trip, organized his luggage, and selected several satisfactory sunset photos to save on his computer for later editing. During a break in the morning, he dealt with the backlog of emails and quickly got into his work rhythm.

events.name: Research on Medical Examination Institutions
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran made phone calls one by one to the initially selected medical examination institutions. As an investment advisor, he inquired in detail about service items, package prices, equipment models, doctor qualifications, and report interpretation services, just as he would analyze investment products. He then organized the obtained information into detailed preliminary notes by category, with a particular focus on in-depth items such as cardiovascular and cerebrovascular examinations and lung CT scans.

events.name: Reading health magazines during the lunch break.
events.description: While waiting for his colleague at the café, Feng Haoran browsed through a health magazine, learned new tips for staying warm during winter exercise, and recorded them in his phone's memo.

events.name: Video conference with sister to discuss parents' health
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran had a video call with his sister Feng Xinran in Shanghai. He shared the preliminary research findings on medical examination institutions, and together they assessed their parents' health conditions (their father is in the recovery phase from a cerebral infarction, while their mother is the primary caregiver). Considering their father's recent situation, they both agreed that, in addition to annual health check-ups, it was more urgent to purchase remote health monitoring devices (such as blood pressure monitors and body fat scales) capable of real-time data upload for their parents. This would enable the siblings to remotely monitor changes in their parents' daily health data.

events.name: Planning Weekend Cultural Activities
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran purchased tickets for the weekend performance of the immersive theater production "The Time Traveler's Wife" through a ticketing platform, selecting seats with a good view on the second floor. He checked the theater address and transportation routes, planned the time to head to the theater after work, and cleared his work schedule for Friday evening in advance.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight lingering sense of relaxation after the trip, ready to get back to work.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Substantial and well-organized, having completed the first step in planning for parents' health, and looking forward to the weekend.
