2025-12.daily_overview: A typical workday that integrates health concepts into every aspect of work and life. Feng Haoran not only shares health insights with colleagues but also applies rigorous analytical skills to compare medical examination institutions and select health equipment. At the same time, he continues to implement his rehabilitation treatment plan and systematically incorporates the therapist's recommendations into his daily work, demonstrating the strong execution and systematic thinking characteristic of the ENTJ personality type.

events.name: Morning Rehabilitation Training
events.description: Feng Haoran completed a 10-minute YTWL rowing and shoulder-back strengthening exercise at home as part of his rehabilitation plan, officially incorporating it into his morning routine. He felt some relief from the tightness in his shoulders and neck.

events.name: Urgent Handling of Work Emails
events.description: Upon receiving an urgent consultation email from a client in the morning, Feng Haoran delayed his lunch break to promptly handle and respond to the matter, which left him feeling somewhat fatigued in the afternoon.

events.name: Midday Health Exchange
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran dined with his colleague Zheng Wenbo at a Hunan restaurant near the company. He proactively shared how his consistent practice of yoga and morning runs had enhanced his energy levels and improved work efficiency. He also mentioned his recent systematic rehabilitation therapy, encouraging his colleague to pay attention to personal health management, particularly in addressing the strain caused by prolonged desk work.

events.name: Deepen the Analysis of Medical Examination Institutions
events.description: During a break in his afternoon work, Feng Haoran compiled the information on medical examination institutions collected the previous day into a detailed comparative analysis table. He focused on analyzing the coverage of in-depth items such as cardiovascular and cerebrovascular examinations and low-dose lung CT scans, price differences among various institutions, and their nationwide chain service capabilities (considering his parents are in Wuhan). He applied comparative evaluation methods commonly used in investment analysis.

events.name: Second Rehabilitation Therapy and Habit Consolidation
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran went to the rehabilitation center for his second treatment. The therapist reviewed his completion of home exercises over the past week and corrected some details in his movements. This session introduced more complex shoulder and back training exercises. After the treatment, Feng Haoran set up timed reminders on both his phone and computer calendars. These reminders are programmed to pop up every 45 minutes of work, forcing him to stand up and perform two minutes of simple stretching. He is determined to systematize the concept of rehabilitation.

events.name: Choosing Health Devices for Parents
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran searched online and compared different brands of smart blood pressure monitors, body fat scales, and other devices. He paid special attention to the ease of operation (considering his parents' age), the ability to sync data to a cloud-based app, and the font size of the device display. After an initial screening, he narrowed down the options to two or three candidate models for further comparison.

起始状态.所处地点: Living room of a home in Yuelu District, Changsha City

2025-12.daily_overview: This was an information-dense day with frequent shifts in roles. During the day, Feng Haoran handled potential external collaborations and prepared for his year-end performance review. In the evening, he experienced a groundbreaking immersive theater performance, which led to an in-depth artistic discussion with a friend. Meanwhile, events such as purchasing health equipment for his parents and exchanging rehabilitation insights with fellow runners were interspersed throughout the day, showcasing his diverse interests and efficient time management skills.

events.name: Explore possibilities for external cooperation
events.description: During a phone conversation on a weekday evening, Feng Haoran informally discussed potential future collaboration models with fintech entrepreneur Li Zhe. Based on their understanding developed over several months of communication, Feng Haoran inquired about the possibility of participating in the project as a part-time advisor or making a small follow-on investment in Li Zhe's company during its next round of financing. Li Zhe expressed his welcome and willingness to explore these possibilities further.

events.name: Preparing the Year-End Work Report
events.description: Feng Haoran utilized the entire morning to systematically organize the initial draft of the annual work achievements report. This included core client asset growth data, analyses of several successful differentiated investment cases, and a summary of his specific contributions to team collaboration. He made thorough preparations for the upcoming year-end performance review with his supervisor, Qian Yongqiang.

events.name: Morning Running Social and Health Sharing
events.description: Early in the morning, Feng Haoran and his running partner Gao Yunfei went for a jog along South Yuelu Road. He proactively shared his recent experience with rehabilitation therapy and newly developed healthy habits, such as stretching during work breaks, and discussed how financial professionals can balance exercise, work, and recovery under the pressure of high-intensity mental work. Gao Yunfei also shared his insights on stress relief in IT project management.

events.name: Place an order for parental health devices
events.description: During the lunch break, Feng Haoran finally placed an order on the e-commerce platform, purchasing a selected set of smart health devices (including a large-font voice-broadcast electronic blood pressure monitor and a smart body fat scale). He carefully filled in the delivery address and contact information for his parents in Wuhan.

events.name: Watch an immersive theater performance.
events.description: After finishing a day's work, Feng Haoran left the company and took the subway to a small theater located in Kaifu District. On the way, he was still reviewing the day's work using the memo app on his phone, while shifting his mood in anticipation of the upcoming artistic experience.

events.name: Immersive Art Experience
events.description: Feng Haoran watched the immersive play "The Time Traveler's Wife" in the theater. He was deeply captivated by the actors' close-up performances among the audience, the exquisite stage design, and the interactive viewing experience. Completely immersed in the plot about time and love, he temporarily forgot about market fluctuations and work pressures.

events.name: Sharing Viewing Experience
events.description: After the performance, Feng Haoran was left wanting more. On the subway ride home, he composed a reflective post filled with his impressions, accompanied by photos of the theater environment, and shared it on his WeChat Moments. He expressed the freshness brought by this unique experience and his reflections on the narrative form.

events.name: Art Discussion with Friends
events.description: After seeing the post on her friend's circle, Peng Yuqing took the initiative to send a message to discuss it. The two engaged in an in-depth conversation on WeChat about the play's plot logic, the differences between immersive performances and traditional theater, as well as the philosophical reflections on "choice" and "fate" embedded in the play. Feng Haoran realized that this artistic experience not only provided relaxation but also offered fresh intellectual inspiration.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Enriched and purposeful, with curiosity about the upcoming artistic experience.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Excited and mentally active, the artistic experience and profound exchange brought long-lost spiritual delight and relaxation.

2025-12.daily_overview: As the weekend approached, Feng Haoran efficiently advanced the decision-making closure for several key matters. He summarized the annual exchange outcomes with external partners, finalized the medical examination institution with his parents, and completed the debugging of health equipment. All arrangements were in perfect order, laying the groundwork for weekend relaxation and preparing for the important work meetings scheduled for the following week.

events.name: Summary of External Monthly Communication
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran held his final monthly exchange of the year with Li Zhe at the Xinyi Hand-Drip Coffee Shop. The two systematically reviewed the gains from their regular exchanges over the past few months, sorting out the identified trends in the fintech industry, customer pain points, and potential areas for collaboration. Based on this, they jointly decided to formalize the monthly exchange mechanism and drafted a preliminary plan for the next year, while agreeing to explore more specific possibilities for pilot cooperation. Feng Haoran felt that this relationship had broadened his industry perspective.

events.name: Rest early due to work pressure.
events.description: After handling multiple tasks during the day, Feng Haoran felt somewhat fatigued and decided to rest early in the evening to regain his energy.

events.name: Discussing Medical Examination Options with Parents
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran introduced the preliminary screening results from the medical examination institution to his parents in Wuhan via video call. He emphasized the core advantage of choosing a nationwide chain institution—its convenience for accessing and comparing annual reports across different cities, which is crucial for tracking his father's recovery progress and his mother's health trends. After listening to his professional analysis, his parents expressed trust in his choice.

events.name: Finalize the medical examination institution
events.description: After a comprehensive comparative analysis, considering his parents' opinions, and factoring in the convenience of accompanying them or undergoing the examination independently in Changsha, Feng Haoran ultimately selected a well-known medical examination institution. This institution has chain branches in major cities across the country, offers in-depth cardiovascular and cerebrovascular as well as imaging examinations that meet the requirements, and supports online report access and cross-city services.

events.name: Debugging Health Monitoring Equipment
events.description: After receiving the logistics notification indicating that the device had been shipped, Feng Haoran downloaded the accompanying mobile app in advance. He logged in with his account in Changsha, conducted debugging and configuration, and simulated the processes of data measurement, uploading, and sharing to ensure all functions were operating properly. This thorough preparation laid the groundwork for remotely guiding his parents in using the device later on.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Steady and composed, planning to complete several concluding tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and relaxed, several key decisions on family health management have been implemented, and the weekend is approaching.

2025-12.daily_overview: This day marks a significant milestone in Feng Haoran's career development and personal growth. The morning yoga session reinforced his healthy habits, while the year-end performance review in the afternoon brought the exciting news of a promotion recommendation. Subsequently, a deep conversation with his supervisor, Qian Yongqiang, at a café elevated their purely professional relationship to one of mentorship and friendship, providing him with invaluable guidance for both his career and life.

events.name: Weekend Yoga Class
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran attended a yoga class, focusing on a shoulder and neck relaxation sequence designed for individuals with long-term desk jobs. He felt that after six months of consistent practice, his body's flexibility and sense of balance had significantly improved, and the stiffness in his neck had greatly diminished.

events.name: Year-End Performance Review
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran attended the annual performance review meeting with his direct supervisor, Qian Yongqiang, in the conference room as scheduled by the company. Feng Haoran systematically reported on his work throughout the year, presenting prepared data and case studies. Qian Yongqiang gave high praise, particularly commending his sense of responsibility and crisis management skills demonstrated during his father's illness, and formally informed him that a recommendation report for his promotion to Investment Director had been submitted.

events.name: Private Coffee Exchange
events.description: After the formal interview concluded, Qian Yongqiang, as a fellow townsman and senior colleague, invited Feng Haoran to Shen Xinyi's café near the company after work for a cup of hand-brewed coffee, aiming for a more private and in-depth conversation.

events.name: Brief Celebration with Colleagues
events.description: After the interview, Feng Haoran encountered Zheng Wenbo. The two had a brief conversation, sharing their joy about the promotion and their expectations for future collaboration.

events.name: In-depth Exploration of Career and Family
events.description: In the café, Qian Yongqiang once again affirmed Feng Haoran's professional performance and, based on the interview content, delved more specifically into the team management skills and strategic vision he would require as a future investment director. Subsequently, in the capacity of an elder, Qian Yongqiang inquired with concern about the recovery of Feng Haoran's father's health and his plans to bring his parents to Changsha for their retirement. He also shared his own experiences over the years in balancing career and family.

events.name: Relationship Elevation
events.description: As the coffee conversation drew to a close, Feng Haoran sincerely expressed his gratitude to General Manager Qian for his guidance and care. This conversation, which went beyond the scope of their professional relationship, left him feeling deeply warmed and supported. The bond between them was evolving into one of mentor and friend. They bid farewell at the entrance of the café.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and expectant, ready to enjoy the weekend and attend an important interview.

结束状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Feeling inspired, grateful, and highly motivated, I have achieved a key breakthrough in my career development and gained a valuable life mentor.

2025-12.daily_overview: A family day filled with warmth and thoughtful planning. Feng Haoran settled the joy and reflections from the previous day during his morning run, and efficiently advanced multiple communication and planning tasks during the day. The evening’s "cloud family dinner" became the highlight of the day, as the family shared meals and exchanged updates via video call. The profound bond of kinship dispelled the regret of geographical separation and further strengthened his resolve for future family plans.

events.name: Morning Run and Review
events.description: In the early morning, Feng Haoran went for a jog along the Xiangjiang River, reflecting on his two conversations with Mr. Qian from the previous day. He contemplated his career development path after the promotion and how to more systematically plan for bringing his parents to Changsha for their retirement. He also recorded some inspirations in his phone's memo.

events.name: Discussing Family Plans with Running Partners After a Morning Run
events.description: After the morning run, Feng Haoran briefly discussed with Gao Yunfei the idea of bringing their parents to Changsha, and Gao Yunfei shared similar experiences and practical advice.

events.name: Year-End Customer Relationship Maintenance
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran summarized the progress of two potential clients in Guangzhou that he had been following throughout the year. He prepared a concise annual maintenance summary email, thanking the clients for their attention over the past year and attaching key points of the market outlook for the coming year, thereby concluding this phase of ongoing maintenance in a professional manner.

events.name: Preparing for a team dinner
events.description: Feng Haoran communicated with his colleague Zheng Wenbo and supervisor Qian Yongqiang to confirm the specific date for their colleague Sun Xiaoya's upcoming work report in Changsha next week. After discussion, they selected an exquisite Hangzhou cuisine restaurant as the venue for the gathering. Feng Haoran was responsible for booking a private room for the evening of December 27 and notifying the relevant personnel.

events.name: Proposing a Christmas Gathering with Friends
events.description: Feng Haoran proactively contacted his friends Peng Yuqing and Wu Junjie in Changsha via WeChat, proposing to have a dinner gathering together on Christmas night to celebrate. Everyone responded positively, and the time and preliminary restaurant choice were tentatively confirmed.

events.name: Refine the Comprehensive Family Health Checkup Plan
events.description: Feng Haoran formulated a specific family health checkup plan: arranging for his parents to undergo the examination at the Wuhan branch, while he would have his checkup at the Changsha branch during the same period. He preliminarily checked the available appointment times in both cities to facilitate subsequent unified coordination.

events.name: Propose a family video dinner gathering
events.description: Considering that his father was still in recovery and he could not return to Wuhan in the near future, Feng Haoran proposed a "video dinner" in the family group chat that evening. He set the dinner time and asked his parents and younger sister to each prepare hometown dishes, while he took charge of ordering Changsha specialty takeout. His mother, Li Xiuying, readily agreed and began making preparations.

events.name: Order Hometown Takeout
events.description: After lunch, Feng Haoran carefully selected several authentic Hunan dishes that his parents might enjoy through a food delivery app, such as stir-fried beef with chili, steamed fish head with chopped chili, and a combination of cured meats, and scheduled the delivery to his home for dinner time.

events.name: Warm Family Video Dinner
events.description: At the agreed time in the evening, Feng Haoran initiated a family video call from his home dining table using a tablet. Family members logged in one after another, exchanging greetings and showcasing the dishes they had prepared: lotus root and pork rib soup from Wuhan, steamed Wuchang fish, sweet and sour spare ribs from Shanghai, and takeout Hunan cuisine from Changsha. Everyone chatted lively while enjoying the meal, creating a warm atmosphere.

events.name: Sharing Joy and Daily Life
events.description: Feng Haoran provided a detailed update on his good news of receiving a promotion recommendation and the results of his recent health check-up. His parents showed him the newly added houseplants at home and inquired about the details of his life in Changsha. His younger sister shared some interesting anecdotes from her work in Shanghai. During the conversation, Feng Haoran once again mentioned his plan to bring his parents to live with him in Changsha in the future, which received positive responses from his family.

events.name: The End of the Dinner Gathering
events.description: After nearly two hours of laughter and joy, the video call came to an end. Feng Haoran felt cheerful and motivated. He cleared the dining table and sent a message of gratitude and goodnight wishes in the family group chat, his heart filled with warmth.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Peaceful and joyful, ready to enjoy family day with yesterday's happiness.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room in a home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Happiness, warmth, and a sense of belonging—family bonds grow even stronger with the support of technology.

As he observed the increasingly enriched and well-structured collection system, he felt a profound sense of satisfaction and direction.

events.name: Excitement over discovering rare stamps
events.description: During the organizing process, Feng Haoran discovered a rare early stamp and excitedly shared photos of it with fellow collectors.

events.name: Exchange collection insights with fellow collectors
events.description: After completing the organization, Feng Haoran held a video call with Luo Zhenyu, a fellow collector based in Shenzhen, to discuss the practices and insights gained from focusing on thematic collecting over the past few months. He showcased some of the key stamps newly acquired, sharing the efficiency and enjoyment brought by a well-defined collection strategy. Luo Zhenyu provided positive feedback and exchanged insights on some market trends.

events.name: Adjust career planning
events.description: Inspired by a colleague's promotion and his own imminent advancement, Feng Haoran took a moment during work to revisit and fine-tune his three-year career plan. He contemplated how to smoothly transition into the role of Investment Director within the next year and set more specific phased goals.

events.name: Preparing a Congratulatory Gift for a Colleague's Promotion
events.description: After discussing with Zheng Wenbo, Feng Haoran jointly selected a congratulatory gift suitable for Sun Xiaoya—a high-end stationery set that combines both design and practicality, to express the team's sentiments. It is planned to be presented during tomorrow evening's dinner gathering.

events.name: Share party photos
events.description: After organizing the group photos and fun moments taken at the Christmas party, Feng Haoran shared them in the friends' WeChat group. Everyone interacted and commented online, reminiscing about the joyful time from the previous night, and agreed to meet again around the Spring Festival.

events.name: Prepare Physical Examination Persuasion Materials
events.description: Feng Haoran compiled his medical examination report data from the past three years and reviewed medical materials on the necessity of comprehensive health checkups for middle-aged and elderly individuals. He extracted the key points to prepare for formally persuading his parents to agree to a family-wide comprehensive health checkup over the weekend.

events.name: Routine Family Health Call
events.description: During his weekly scheduled video call with his parents, Feng Haoran proactively shared the positive changes brought about by his recent adherence to rehabilitation exercises and adjustments to his office sitting posture. This helped reassure his family about his health condition.

events.name: Remote Guidance for Parents on Using Health Devices
events.description: The smart health devices have been delivered to Feng Haoran's parents' home in Wuhan. Through a video call, Feng patiently and step-by-step demonstrated to his parents how to operate the blood pressure monitor and body fat scale, explained how to view historical data and trend charts on the mobile app, and answered their various questions until they indicated they had a basic grasp of the operations.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Steady, facing the final busyness before the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Everything is proceeding in an orderly manner, with multiple tasks being advanced, and preparations are fully in place for family communication over the weekend.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Saturday morning, with a focus on health summary, Feng Haoran completed his final yoga class of the year and decided to renew his membership, integrating yoga into his long-term health regimen. During the day, he engaged in year-end administrative tasks. The evening was a warm team celebration, where everyone toasted to Sun Xiaoya's promotion, strengthening colleague friendships over delicious food and laughter.

events.name: The final yoga class of the year
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran attended the final Saturday yoga class of the year. He was particularly focused during the session, viewing it as a summary of his consistent efforts over the past six months. After the class, he logged the session in his fitness app and added a note affirming the correctness of his decision to incorporate yoga into his adjusted plan.

events.name: Discussing Next Year's Plan with the Coach After Yoga Class
events.description: After class, Feng Haoran briefly discussed next year's course arrangements and personal goals with the yoga instructor, who suggested incorporating more flexibility training.

events.name: Renew yoga course subscription
events.description: After the yoga class, Feng Haoran discussed with the instructor about the expiration of his course at the end of the year. Given the significant improvements in his body flexibility and the alleviation of shoulder and neck discomfort over the past few months, he decided on the spot to renew his subscription for the next quarter, formally incorporating yoga into his long-term health management plan.

events.name: Year-End Affairs Arrangement
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran organized his 2025 work logs, important investment analysis records, study notes (including CFA exam preparation), and key points of family communication in his home study, preparing materials for the systematic annual review scheduled for the following day.

events.name: Team Promotion Celebration Dinner
events.description: In the evening, the team held a promotion celebration dinner for Sun Xiaoya at a pre-booked Hangzhou cuisine restaurant. Supervisor Qian Yongqiang delivered a speech acknowledging her work, while Feng Haoran and Zheng Wenbo shared amusing anecdotes and moments of synergy from their collaborations with Sun Xiaoya. Feng Haoran presented a prepared congratulatory gift on behalf of the team. Everyone temporarily set aside work matters, engaging in lively conversations about food, travel, and life in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the leisurely weekend morning.

结束状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha (after returning from a gathering)
结束状态.心情: Joyful and warm, with deep team camaraderie, the health plan has been solidified.

2025-12.daily_overview: This was a day of deep reflection, planning, and family decision-making. Feng Haoran conducted a systematic annual review, comprehensively examining the gains and losses of the past year across work, health, finances, and personal interests, while also formulating preliminary integrated goals for 2026. In the evening, he successfully persuaded his parents to agree to a comprehensive family health check-up plan, marking a crucial step in shifting the family’s health management approach from reactive measures to proactive prevention.

events.name: Annual Interest Review
events.description: In the morning, Feng Haoran posted his annual photography summary on the photography community, sharing insights on his transition from documentary street photography to experimenting with the "Night Talks on the Xiang River" series. He also browsed through summaries from other photography enthusiasts to plan his shooting themes for the coming year (considering trying humanistic portraiture). Meanwhile, he reviewed all the achievements from systematically organizing and sharing photography knowledge.

events.name: Evaluate Sports Health Outcomes
events.description: Feng Haoran reviewed the records from his fitness app over the past six months. He evaluated the improvement in comfort levels for his shoulders, neck, and lower back after incorporating yoga, and the conclusion was highly positive. Considering the winter season, he briefly communicated with his yoga instructor regarding warm-up suggestions before class to better protect his body.

events.name: Systematic Annual Review
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran initiated a deep review in his study. He systematically organized his plans for 2025 on a new notebook, dividing them into sections (career development, learning and growth, investment and finance, family relationships, health management, hobbies and interests). He recorded key achievements, gains, and profound lessons, while conducting an in-depth analysis of the underlying reasons.

events.name: Share post-game analysis insights with friends
events.description: During the review interval, Feng Haoran shared some of his annual reflections with Peng Yuqing via WeChat, particularly his thoughts on health management, which resonated with her.

events.name: Plan New Year's Goals
events.description: Based on the review conclusions, Feng Haoran began to formulate the core objectives for 2026: professionally, focusing on enhancing team management capabilities; in family planning, arranging comprehensive health check-ups for his parents and advancing research on local elderly care options; in learning, exploring new knowledge on family asset allocation and retirement planning; and in financial actions, deciding after evaluation to open a personal pension account in early 2026.

events.name: Break Down Annual Goals
events.description: He has preliminarily broken down annual goals such as "promotion to investment director" and "building a family financial health protection system" into specific quarterly key tasks, for example, completing the opening of a personal pension account in Q1 and leading a successful team project in Q2.

events.name: Family Health Decision-Making Meeting
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran initiated a family group video call via WeChat to have a formal discussion with his parents in Wuhan and his sister in Shanghai.

events.name: Persuading Parents to Undergo Comprehensive Health Check-ups
events.description: During the call, Feng Haoran presented the comparative data from his prepared physical examination and medical materials. Drawing on his father's recent experience with cerebral infarction, he elaborated in detail on the value of comprehensive health check-ups in preventing serious illnesses. Initially, his father Feng Jianguo expressed hesitation, believing the cost was high and the procedure unnecessary.

events.name: Siblings jointly persuade
events.description: Feng Xinran immediately supported her brother's proposal, supplementing her persuasion from the perspectives of modern health concepts, children's responsibility for their parents' health, and the idea that "prevention is far less costly than treatment." After nearly an hour of patient communication and emotional encouragement from the siblings, their parents were finally convinced and agreed to make a comprehensive family health check-up an important family matter for the first half of 2026.

events.name: Determine the preliminary plan
events.description: The family has preliminarily decided to schedule the health check-up in March or April 2026, after the Spring Festival, when the climate is favorable. The specific date and institution (based on Feng Haoran's prior research) will be further coordinated and confirmed later. Feng Haoran is responsible for overall coordination.

events.name: First View of Parents' Health Data
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran checked his parents' uploaded blood pressure and body fat data for the first time through a mobile app, and everything was normal. He had a brief call with his parents to confirm that they had developed the habit of using the device and urged them to continue maintaining it.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Calm and ready for in-depth summarization and planning.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement intertwined with responsibility, the annual review clarified the direction, reaching a family health decision was a major victory, and inner resolve remained firm.

state.今日运动: None, primarily focusing on mental activities and family communication.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the second-to-last working day of the year, the theme was wrapping up and reporting. Feng Haoran concluded the year-end review with external partner Li Zhe, resulting in a preliminary cooperation memorandum. He completed the final session of his rehabilitation package, with his physical condition showing significant improvement. In the evening, he compiled the consensus on family health check-ups into a document and shared the key takeaways from his annual review with close friends.

events.name: Year-End Review of External Cooperation
events.description: After work, Feng Haoran and Li Zhe held their final face-to-face meeting of the year at the company. Both parties reviewed the year’s consulting exchanges and agreed that the relationship had provided valuable new industry perspectives. Based on the strategic plans discussed, they preliminarily outlined informal cooperation intentions and key directions for the upcoming year, with Feng Haoran responsible for drafting a memorandum of cooperation.

events.name: Formulating Consensus on Family Health Check-ups
events.description: Feng Haoran compiled the key discussion points, preliminary consensus, and schedule regarding the in-depth physical examination from last night’s family video call into a clear written summary. He then sent it to the family WeChat group for everyone to review at any time. They also agreed to check the specific availability of local medical examination institutions in their respective locations for follow-up arrangements.

events.name: Share Annual Achievements with Friends
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran had a phone conversation with his friend Peng Yuqing, sharing the key insights from his annual review and preliminary plans for the new year, particularly regarding family health and career development. He also listened to her feedback and suggestions.

events.name: Complete the rehabilitation package treatment.
events.description: This was the final session of the rehabilitation package. The therapist performed a comprehensive manual release and conducted a final assessment, comparing the improvements before and after the treatment (reduced muscle tension and optimized posture). Both parties summarized the outcomes of the six sessions, with the therapist emphasizing the importance of integrating "micro-level corrections" with "macro-level habits" and providing follow-up self-maintenance training recommendations. Feng Haoran's discomfort in the neck and shoulders has largely subsided.

起始状态.心情: Stay focused on the final wrap-up work at the end of the year.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Effortless and successful, a health plan was smoothly completed, with both external relations and family matters properly concluded.

Feng Haoran focused on wrapping up and reporting on year-end tasks, presenting to his supervisor how his externally maintained relationships could be transformed into potential institutional business opportunities. He began checking his equipment for the New Year's Eve photography event the following night, feeling a sense of ritualistic anticipation for bidding farewell to 2025.

events.name: Report on External Relations Progress
events.description: Feng Haoran proactively reported to Investment Director Qian Yongqiang on the process of establishing a consulting relationship with Li Zhe over the past six months, the observed potential opportunities in fintech, and the preliminary informal cooperation intentions between both parties. He sought the company’s assessment opinions or potential support, attempting to transform personal relationship maintenance into possible institutional business opportunities. Qian Yongqiang indicated that this would be included in the department’s discussions on business innovation for the new year.

events.name: Year-end Work Wrap-up
events.description: After handling the final emails and customer inquiries, tidying up his desk, and exchanging "Happy New Year" greetings with his colleagues, Feng Haoran concluded his work on the last working day of 2025.

events.name: Check New Year's Eve Photography Equipment
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran organized his photography equipment in his home study, meticulously checking the condition of his camera, lenses, tripod, spare batteries, and memory cards. He cleaned the lenses and ensured the batteries were fully charged, making thorough preparations for the New Year's Eve time-lapse photography by the Xiangjiang River the following night.

events.name: Cleaning Camera Lenses
events.description: When inspecting the equipment, Feng Haoran meticulously cleaned the lens to ensure imaging quality.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the last day of 2025, Feng Haoran began with morning training, handled final tasks during the day, and conducted a New Year's Eve photography ritual in the evening, which he ended early to maintain a regular routine. He recorded the sunset and city lights by the Xiang River, completing the final piece of his "Night Talks by the Xiang River" series, and exchanged video blessings with friends. Returning home in the evening, he reviewed his health data and welcomed 2026 with a heart full of contentment and anticipation.

events.name: Morning Rehabilitation Training
events.description: Feng Haoran completed a 15-minute neck and shoulder strengthening exercise at home as part of his daily maintenance routine, feeling in good physical condition.

events.name: Close the online film exhibition.
events.description: Feng Haoran converted the online exhibition page of "Night Talks on the Xiang River" from a several-week duration into a permanent archive mode. He compiled and summarized all the received evaluations and suggestions, and archived these valuable feedback materials as references for future creative endeavors.

events.name: Pre-Departure Preparations in the Afternoon
events.description: In the afternoon, Feng Haoran prepared warm clothing, hot drinks, and a power bank. He had researched several potential shooting spots along the Xiangjiang River in advance and ultimately decided to avoid the most crowded fireworks viewing area in the city center. Instead, he chose a relatively open riverside walkway location that would allow him to capture both the city's nightscape and the reflections on the river surface.

events.name: Head to the riverside to scout for camera positions.
events.description: In the evening, Feng Haoran drove to the preselected location. He found an excellent camera position with an open view, reeds in the foreground, and the Changsha Financial Center building cluster in the background, quickly setting up his tripod and camera.

events.name: Shooting Sunset and Blue Hour
events.description: Feng Haoran began his time-lapse photography, capturing the sky's color transition from golden to deep purple during the sunset over the Xiang River, as well as the "blue hour" when the city skyline lights gradually illuminated. The river breeze was chilly, but he remained focused on adjusting the parameters.

events.name: Shooting City Nightscapes
events.description: As night fell completely, the city lights sparkled brilliantly. Feng Haoran adjusted his camera settings to capture the night scenery along both banks of the Xiang River, the reflections of lights from passing boats on the water, and the light shows on the buildings of the financial center, accumulating new material for the "Night Talks on the Xiang River" series.

events.name: Video call to exchange greetings
events.description: Around 9 p.m., Feng Haoran connected via video call with his friends Wu Junjie and Peng Yuqing, who were also in Changsha. The three exchanged New Year's greetings, shared the night views of their respective locations, and reflected on their experiences over the past year. Though they were in different places, their hearts were connected.

events.name: Returned home early after concluding the photography session.
events.description: To maintain a regular schedule, Feng Haoran packed up his photography equipment before 10 p.m. and drove back to his home in Yuelu District, avoiding staying up late.

events.name: Review Annual Health Data
events.description: Before going to bed, Feng Haoran checked the annual exercise and health data summary on his mobile app. Comparing it with his goals set at the beginning of the year, he felt satisfied and made a plan for a morning run the next day.

events.name: Reflection and Outlook
events.description: After sitting quietly in his study for a moment, Feng Haoran reflected on his growth over the past year and silently made a New Year's resolution: he hopes to explore more distant places with his camera in 2026, create value in his new professional role, and steadily advance the plan for his family's reunion.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a sense of anticipation for the completion of the annual ritual.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Yuelu District, Changsha City
结束状态.心情: Complete, tranquil, and full of hope, bidding farewell to the old year with love, and welcoming the new year with a clear and resolute heart.
